engChrName: Temporary placement to check event progression. Once sub-events have been officially added, please delete.
engSearchText:
Temporary placement to check event progression.
Once sub-events have been officially added,
please delete.
jpnChrName: イベント進行確認用に仮配置しています。 ※サブイベントが正式入力しましたら削除をお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
イベント進行確認用に仮配置しています。
※サブイベントが正式入力しましたら削除をお願いいたします。

engChrName: These settings are for checking mob placement during day/evening/night. Remove these once they are no longer needed.
engSearchText:
These settings are for checking mob placement
during day/evening/night. Remove these once they
are no longer needed.
jpnChrName: 昼・夕・夜のモブ配置確認用です。 ※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
昼・夕・夜のモブ配置確認用です。
※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。

engChrName: HP and EP were fully restored!
engSearchText: HP and EP were fully restored!
jpnChrName: ＨＰ・ＥＰが全回復した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>ＨＰ・ＥＰが全回復した！

engChrName: I always knew something was fishy about those orbal hookahs, but I never imagined they were using unapproved ingredients!
engSearchText:
I always knew something was fishy about those orbal
hookahs, but I never imagined they were using
unapproved ingredients!
jpnChrName: 導力シーシャ、胡散臭いとは思っていたが…… まさか未認可の成分が入っていたとは。
jpnSearchText:
導力シーシャ、胡散臭いとは思っていたが……
まさか未認可の成分が入っていたとは。

engChrName: I had some in stock myself, unfortunately. Makes me glad I kept recommending the traditional ones to customers.
engSearchText:
I had some in stock myself, unfortunately. Makes me
glad I kept recommending the traditional ones
to customers.
jpnChrName: うちにも在庫は流れてきたが…… 伝統シーシャの方を勧めていて良かったよ。
jpnSearchText:
うちにも在庫は流れてきたが……
伝統シーシャの方を勧めていて良かったよ。

engChrName: I did get pretty worried since I had some customers who bought some of the orbal hookahs I had in stock.
engSearchText:
I did get pretty worried since I had some customers
who bought some of the orbal hookahs I had in stock.
jpnChrName: うちで導力シーシャを買って行った 人も幾らかはいて不安だったが……
jpnSearchText:
うちで導力シーシャを買って行った
人も幾らかはいて不安だったが……

engChrName: Thankfully, from the way it looks this morning, they all seem to have calmed down. Can't tell you what a relief THAT is.
engSearchText:
Thankfully, from the way it looks this morning, they
all seem to have calmed down. Can't tell you what a
relief THAT is.
jpnChrName: 今朝の様子を見るに、皆落ち着いているみたいで…… 多少は肩の荷が下りたね。
jpnSearchText:
今朝の様子を見るに、皆落ち着いているみたいで……
多少は肩の荷が下りたね。

engChrName: The tourists have been getting pretty...rowdy, lately, to put it nicely.
engSearchText:
The tourists have been getting pretty...rowdy, lately,
to put it nicely.
jpnChrName: ここのところの観光客の威勢は 何だか不安になるよな。
jpnSearchText:
ここのところの観光客の威勢は
何だか不安になるよな。

engChrName: Another hookah seller I know was telling me about how his customers got in such a frenzy that things were a little out of hand.
engSearchText:
Another hookah seller I know was telling me about
how his customers got in such a frenzy that things
were a little out of hand.
jpnChrName: シーシャ売りの同業者も客が 昂り過ぎてて困ったって言ってたよ。
jpnSearchText:
シーシャ売りの同業者も客が
昂り過ぎてて困ったって言ってたよ。

engChrName: I get everyone's excited about the film festival and all, but it's almost like they've properly lost their minds.
engSearchText:
I get everyone's excited about the film festival and all,
but it's almost like they've properly lost their minds.
jpnChrName: 映画祭が楽しみとは言え…… ああまで我を忘れるほどのものかね？
jpnSearchText:
映画祭が楽しみとは言え……
ああまで我を忘れるほどのものかね？

engChrName: My traditional, flame-powered hookahs still sell pretty well these days.
engSearchText:
My traditional, flame-powered hookahs still sell
pretty well these days.
jpnChrName: 今のところは俺らの伝統シーシャも ちゃんと売れてはいるが……
jpnSearchText:
今のところは俺らの伝統シーシャも
ちゃんと売れてはいるが……

engChrName: But it's these new orbal-powered hookahs that draw in all the repeat customers, now.
engSearchText:
But it's these new orbal-powered hookahs that draw
in all the repeat customers, now.
jpnChrName: どうも導力シーシャの方が リピーターは多いんだよな。
jpnSearchText:
どうも導力シーシャの方が
リピーターは多いんだよな。

engChrName: It's a shame. The old-fashioned ones still have a lot to offer, as long as you enjoy them in moderation. But times are what they are. *sigh*
engSearchText:
It's a shame. The old-fashioned ones still have a lot to
offer, as long as you enjoy them in moderation.
But times are what they are. *sigh*
jpnChrName: こういうのはほどほどに楽しむから 良いものだってのになぁ……
jpnSearchText:
こういうのはほどほどに楽しむから
良いものだってのになぁ……

engChrName: Welcome! Have you thought about treating yourself to a hookah? A nice, long hookah session is a traditional pastime in the Central East!
engSearchText:
Welcome! Have you thought about treating yourself
to a hookah? A nice, long hookah session is a
traditional pastime in the Central East!
jpnChrName: いらっしゃい、中東の伝統的な水タバコ “シーシャ”はいかがかね？
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃい、中東の伝統的な水タバコ
“シーシャ”はいかがかね？

engChrName: Not only do they smell nice, but they've a wonderful cooling sensation when smoked. Definitely a must in a place that gets as hot as Tharbad!
engSearchText:
Not only do they smell nice, but they've a wonderful
cooling sensation when smoked. Definitely a must in
a place that gets as hot as Tharbad!
jpnChrName: 香りと一緒に涼しげな気分も味わえるしね、 暑い土地じゃあ有難い品さ。
jpnSearchText:
香りと一緒に涼しげな気分も味わえるしね、
暑い土地じゃあ有難い品さ。

engChrName: Lately, these portable orbal-powered hookahs have been all the rage in Tharbad.
engSearchText:
Lately, these portable orbal-powered hookahs have
been all the rage in Tharbad.
jpnChrName: 最近は流行みたいでな、携帯式の 導力シーシャとやらも回ってきたんだが……
jpnSearchText:
最近は流行みたいでな、携帯式の
導力シーシャとやらも回ってきたんだが……

engChrName: Honestly, though, I can't say I'm a big fan. They've got no class! In my book, nothing beats a good, old, traditional hookah.
engSearchText:
Honestly, though, I can't say I'm a big fan.
They've got no class! In my book, nothing beats a
good, old, traditional hookah.
jpnChrName: 正直、こりゃいまいち風情が無くてね。 やはりこの伝統シーシャが一番さ。
jpnSearchText:
正直、こりゃいまいち風情が無くてね。
やはりこの伝統シーシャが一番さ。

engChrName: When tourists come to me looking for the hookah hookup, I want them to enjoy something with some real taste to it. Do it right, you know?
engSearchText:
When tourists come to me looking for the hookah
hookup, I want them to enjoy something with some
real taste to it. Do it right, you know?
jpnChrName: 俺としては、やっぱり風情ってものを 観光客にも味わってもらいたくてね。
jpnSearchText:
俺としては、やっぱり風情ってものを
観光客にも味わってもらいたくてね。

engChrName: I offer orbal hookahs to those who want them, but otherwise, I don't go out of my way to push 'em on to folks. They just aren't my style.
engSearchText:
I offer orbal hookahs to those who want them, but
otherwise, I don't go out of my way to push 'em on
to folks. They just aren't my style.
jpnChrName: 導力シーシャも一応は置いているが、 あんまり押し出す気にはなれないな。
jpnSearchText:
導力シーシャも一応は置いているが、
あんまり押し出す気にはなれないな。

engChrName: Mother Jamileh said it was okay for me to go back outside.
engSearchText:
Mother Jamileh said it was okay for me to go
back outside.
jpnChrName: 司祭さんが、今はもうお外に出て 良いって言ってくれたの。
jpnSearchText:
司祭さんが、今はもうお外に出て
良いって言ってくれたの。

engChrName: It's much calmer now than it was yesterday. I'm so glad!
engSearchText:
It's much calmer now than it was yesterday. I'm
so glad!
jpnChrName: たしかに、きのうまでとはなんだか ゼンゼンフンイキがちがうね！
jpnSearchText:
たしかに、きのうまでとはなんだか
ゼンゼンフンイキがちがうね！

engChrName: Clim's going home soon, so we're going to enjoy the film festival while we can!
engSearchText:
Clim's going home soon, so we're going to enjoy the
film festival while we can!
jpnChrName: クリム君ももうすぐ帰っちゃうし、 イッショにエイガサイ楽しむんだ！
jpnSearchText:
クリム君ももうすぐ帰っちゃうし、
イッショにエイガサイ楽しむんだ！

engChrName: There are a lot of people yelling and fighting outside. It's safe inside the temple, though.
engSearchText:
There are a lot of people yelling and fighting outside.
It's safe inside the temple, though.
jpnChrName: お外で大声を出したりケンカしたりしている ヒトもいるけど、寺院にいればアンシンなの。
jpnSearchText:
お外で大声を出したりケンカしたりしている
ヒトもいるけど、寺院にいればアンシンなの。

engChrName: But I'm worried about my mom. She works in the bazaar. I wish she could be with me here...
engSearchText:
But I'm worried about my mom. She works in
the bazaar. I wish she could be with me here...
jpnChrName: むしろ、バザールでおしごとしてるお母さんが シンパイ……寺院にイッショにいればいいのに。
jpnSearchText:
むしろ、バザールでおしごとしてるお母さんが
シンパイ……寺院にイッショにいればいいのに。

engChrName: Clim is really interested in fairy tales. I wonder what sort of books he likes to read at home?
engSearchText:
Clim is really interested in fairy tales. I wonder what
sort of books he likes to read at home?
jpnChrName: クリム君はおとぎ話を楽しそうに聞いてるけど、 ふだんはどんなお話を読んでいるんだろう？
jpnSearchText:
クリム君はおとぎ話を楽しそうに聞いてるけど、
ふだんはどんなお話を読んでいるんだろう？

engChrName: After talking to him, now I want to learn about stories from further west!
engSearchText:
After talking to him, now I want to learn about
stories from further west!
jpnChrName: わたしも、西方のおとぎ話を聞いて みたくなっちゃった！
jpnSearchText:
わたしも、西方のおとぎ話を聞いて
みたくなっちゃった！

engChrName: I'm so happy Clim likes hearing about Central Eastern fairy tales!
engSearchText:
I'm so happy Clim likes hearing about Central
Eastern fairy tales!
jpnChrName: 中東のおとぎ話、クリムくんも よろこんでくれてうれしい！
jpnSearchText:
中東のおとぎ話、クリムくんも
よろこんでくれてうれしい！

engChrName: Most kids who visit Tharbad don't really care about them. It's so nice to meet someone who does!
engSearchText:
Most kids who visit Tharbad don't really care
about them. It's so nice to meet someone who does!
jpnChrName: カンコウの子だと、あんまり キョーミ持ってくれない子も多いしね！
jpnSearchText:
カンコウの子だと、あんまり
キョーミ持ってくれない子も多いしね！

engChrName: ...And then, once the djinn appears from the lamp, it repeats the first word and leaves!
engSearchText:
...And then, once the djinn appears from the lamp, it
repeats the first word and leaves!
jpnChrName: それでね、ランプから出てきた精霊（ジン）が、 サイショの言葉をくりかえして帰っちゃうの！
jpnSearchText:
それでね、ランプから出てきた精霊（ジン）が、
サイショの言葉をくりかえして帰っちゃうの！

engChrName: Wow, that's awesome! Central Eastern fairy tales are so neat and cool!
engSearchText:
Wow, that's awesome! Central Eastern fairy tales are
so neat and cool!
jpnChrName: へぇ～すごいなぁ！ 中東のおとぎ話もフシギだね！
jpnSearchText:
へぇ～すごいなぁ！
中東のおとぎ話もフシギだね！

engChrName: Heehee, I know, right?
engSearchText: Heehee, I know, right?
jpnChrName: えへへ、そうでしょ？
jpnSearchText: えへへ、そうでしょ？

engChrName: My grandma and the people from the temple tell me stories with different morals all the time!
engSearchText:
My grandma and the people from the temple tell me
stories with different morals all the time!
jpnChrName: キョウクンがあるって、おばあちゃんや 寺院の人たちがお話してくれるんだ！
jpnSearchText:
キョウクンがあるって、おばあちゃんや
寺院の人たちがお話してくれるんだ！

engChrName: Do people like to tell any neat, weird stories where you're from? I'd love to hear them!
engSearchText:
Do people like to tell any neat, weird stories where
you're from? I'd love to hear them!
jpnChrName: キミのところにも、フシギなお話って あったら聞いてみたいな！
jpnSearchText:
キミのところにも、フシギなお話って
あったら聞いてみたいな！

engChrName: Sure! I can tell you about them!
engSearchText: Sure! I can tell you about them!
jpnChrName: いいよ、お礼にお話するね！
jpnSearchText: いいよ、お礼にお話するね！

engChrName: But after that, I wanna hear more about your fairy tales, okay?
engSearchText:
But after that, I wanna hear more about your fairy
tales, okay?
jpnChrName: でも、そのあと中東のおとぎ話、 もっと聞いてみたいかも！
jpnSearchText:
でも、そのあと中東のおとぎ話、
もっと聞いてみたいかも！

engChrName: Okay! Then why don't we visit the temple?
engSearchText: Okay! Then why don't we visit the temple?
jpnChrName: じゃあ、いっしょに寺院に行かない？
jpnSearchText: じゃあ、いっしょに寺院に行かない？

engChrName: Mother Jamileh knows a lot about stuff like that. I'm sure she'll be able to tell you lots!
engSearchText:
Mother Jamileh knows a lot about stuff like that. I'm
sure she'll be able to tell you lots!
jpnChrName: 司祭さん、色んなおとぎ話にくわしいから、 色々なお話を聞けるとおもうよ！
jpnSearchText:
司祭さん、色んなおとぎ話にくわしいから、
色々なお話を聞けるとおもうよ！

engChrName: See? I told you Mother Jamileh knew lots of stories!
engSearchText: See? I told you Mother Jamileh knew lots of stories!
jpnChrName: ね、司祭さん色んなお話を知っているでしょ？
jpnSearchText: ね、司祭さん色んなお話を知っているでしょ？

engChrName: She always puts her all into telling them, too. That's what makes going to Sunday School so much fun!
engSearchText:
She always puts her all into telling them, too. That's
what makes going to Sunday School so much fun!
jpnChrName: お話のしかたもキモチがこもってて凄いし、 日曜学校がいつも楽しみなんだ！
jpnSearchText:
お話のしかたもキモチがこもってて凄いし、
日曜学校がいつも楽しみなんだ！

engChrName: Yeah, I bet! She's really, really good. I'm so happy I got to hear new stories from her!
engSearchText:
Yeah, I bet! She's really, really good. I'm so happy I
got to hear new stories from her!
jpnChrName: うん……ほんとうにじょうずだし、 ボクの知らないお話が聞けて良かった！
jpnSearchText:
うん……ほんとうにじょうずだし、
ボクの知らないお話が聞けて良かった！

engChrName: This temple is so amazing.
engSearchText: This temple is so amazing.
jpnChrName: それにしても……この寺院も なんだかすごいなって。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……この寺院も
なんだかすごいなって。

engChrName: Even though we both pray to the same goddess, it looks and feels completely different from the chapel I go to!
engSearchText:
Even though we both pray to the same goddess,
it looks and feels completely different from the
chapel I go to!
jpnChrName: 同じ女神様なのに、ボクの行っている レイハイドウとはゼンゼン違って面白いし！
jpnSearchText:
同じ女神様なのに、ボクの行っている
レイハイドウとはゼンゼン違って面白いし！

engChrName: Wow, it's really that different? That's crazy!
engSearchText: Wow, it's really that different? That's crazy!
jpnChrName: へえ、やっぱりちがうんだ！
jpnSearchText: へえ、やっぱりちがうんだ！

engChrName: I'd love to hear what western ones are like. Could you tell me a little about them?
engSearchText:
I'd love to hear what western ones are like. Could you
tell me a little about them?
jpnChrName: うーん、わたしも一回、西方の レイハイドウでお話聞いてみたいなー。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、わたしも一回、西方の
レイハイドウでお話聞いてみたいなー。

engChrName: This movie festival's totally unlike the festivals we usually have around here. It's great!
engSearchText:
This movie festival's totally unlike the festivals we
usually have around here. It's great!
jpnChrName: エイガサイ、ふだんのおまつりとはゼンゼン フンイキがちがっておもしろい！
jpnSearchText:
エイガサイ、ふだんのおまつりとはゼンゼン
フンイキがちがっておもしろい！

engChrName: Are western festivals like this?
engSearchText: Are western festivals like this?
jpnChrName: 西方のおまつりってこういうのなの？
jpnSearchText: 西方のおまつりってこういうのなの？

engChrName: No way! We don't have any festivals like this in my town, either!
engSearchText:
No way! We don't have any festivals like this in my
town, either!
jpnChrName: ううん、キンジョのおまつりもこういうの じゃなかったよ！
jpnSearchText:
ううん、キンジョのおまつりもこういうの
じゃなかったよ！

engChrName: My dad told me that this one is special and that an amazing guy called Salvatore Gotti came up with it!
engSearchText:
My dad told me that this one is special and that an
amazing guy called Salvatore Gotti came up with it!
jpnChrName: エイガサイはトクベツで、ゴッチって エラいヒトが考えてるんだってパパがいってた！
jpnSearchText:
エイガサイはトクベツで、ゴッチって
エラいヒトが考えてるんだってパパがいってた！

engChrName: Oh, wow! I didn't know that!
engSearchText: Oh, wow! I didn't know that!
jpnChrName: そうなんだ！
jpnSearchText: そうなんだ！

engChrName: Umm, I don't know a lot about movies, actually.
engSearchText: Umm, I don't know a lot about movies, actually.
jpnChrName: でも、じつはわたしエイガはあんまりしらなくて……
jpnSearchText: でも、じつはわたしエイガはあんまりしらなくて……

engChrName: Could you maybe tell me about western movies while we walk around? I wanna learn more!
engSearchText:
Could you maybe tell me about western movies while
we walk around? I wanna learn more!
jpnChrName: せっかくイッショにまわれるんだし、 西方のエイガとかもいろいろ教えてよ！
jpnSearchText:
せっかくイッショにまわれるんだし、
西方のエイガとかもいろいろ教えてよ！

engChrName: Yeah, okay! There are movies about everything! They even make ones based on picture books!
engSearchText:
Yeah, okay! There are movies about everything!
They even make ones based on picture books!
jpnChrName: うん、いいよ！ 絵本がゲンサクになったエイガとかもあるんだ！
jpnSearchText:
うん、いいよ！
絵本がゲンサクになったエイガとかもあるんだ！

engChrName: If I see them at the festival, I'll tell you!
engSearchText: If I see them at the festival, I'll tell you!
jpnChrName: エイガサイででてきたら教えるね！
jpnSearchText: エイガサイででてきたら教えるね！

engChrName: My dad is all better now! Yippee! Now we can all enjoy the film festival!
engSearchText:
My dad is all better now! Yippee! Now we can all
enjoy the film festival!
jpnChrName: パパがいつものパパになってよかった、 これでみんなでエイガサイ見れるね！
jpnSearchText:
パパがいつものパパになってよかった、
これでみんなでエイガサイ見れるね！

engChrName: I'm gonna walk around and see what's going on with my new friend.
engSearchText:
I'm gonna walk around and see what's going on with
my new friend.
jpnChrName: 新しいお友達もできたし、 イッショに回るんだ。
jpnSearchText:
新しいお友達もできたし、
イッショに回るんだ。

engChrName: Once the film festival is over, I plan to give Imani this picture book I brought with me, just before I go home. I hope she likes it!
engSearchText:
Once the film festival is over, I plan to give Imani this
picture book I brought with me, just before I
go home. I hope she likes it!
jpnChrName: エイガサイ終わったら帰る前に、イマーニちゃんに 持ってきた絵本もプレゼントするよ！
jpnSearchText:
エイガサイ終わったら帰る前に、イマーニちゃんに
持ってきた絵本もプレゼントするよ！

engChrName: Dad's been acting really weird since last night. He never yells like that...
engSearchText:
Dad's been acting really weird since last night.
He never yells like that...
jpnChrName: パパ、きのうの夜からなんだかヘンなんだ。 ふだんはあんなに大声出さないのに……
jpnSearchText:
パパ、きのうの夜からなんだかヘンなんだ。
ふだんはあんなに大声出さないのに……

engChrName: He must be tired. I'm sure he'll be back to normal soon.
engSearchText:
He must be tired. I'm sure he'll be back to
normal soon.
jpnChrName: でも、パパだってつかれてるし、 いつもどおりにもどるよね。
jpnSearchText:
でも、パパだってつかれてるし、
いつもどおりにもどるよね。

engChrName: I'm not scared at all! The people in the temple are all so nice.
engSearchText:
I'm not scared at all! The people in the temple are all
so nice.
jpnChrName: 寺院の人たちも優しいし、 ちっともこわくなんかないよ。
jpnSearchText:
寺院の人たちも優しいし、
ちっともこわくなんかないよ。

engChrName: I wanna teach Imani all about the fairy tales of where I'm from!
engSearchText:
I wanna teach Imani all about the fairy tales of where
I'm from!
jpnChrName: イマーニちゃんにも、ボクたちのおとぎ話を もっとおしえてあげたいなー。
jpnSearchText:
イマーニちゃんにも、ボクたちのおとぎ話を
もっとおしえてあげたいなー。

engChrName: I know! Maybe I should give her my picture book that I brought with me!
engSearchText:
I know! Maybe I should give her my picture book that
I brought with me!
jpnChrName: そうだ、あとでボクの持ってきた絵本を プレゼントしようかな！
jpnSearchText:
そうだ、あとでボクの持ってきた絵本を
プレゼントしようかな！

engChrName: That's okay, isn't it? It'll be like a souvenir, but of me, since it's from my home! She won't even hafta travel for it!
engSearchText:
That's okay, isn't it? It'll be like a souvenir, but of me,
since it's from my home! She won't even hafta travel
for it!
jpnChrName: ボクたちがおみやげをもらうように、 ボクがここの子にプレゼントあげてもいいよね？
jpnSearchText:
ボクたちがおみやげをもらうように、
ボクがここの子にプレゼントあげてもいいよね？

engChrName: I've read a lot of picture books before.
engSearchText: I've read a lot of picture books before.
jpnChrName: これまでいろんな絵本を読んできたけど……
jpnSearchText: これまでいろんな絵本を読んできたけど……

engChrName: But the Central East has so many fairy tales I've never heard of!
engSearchText:
But the Central East has so many fairy tales I've never
heard of!
jpnChrName: 中東ってところには、まだボクの しらないお話がいっぱいあるんだね！
jpnSearchText:
中東ってところには、まだボクの
しらないお話がいっぱいあるんだね！

engChrName: Imani knows a lot about them! I'm gonna ask the bishop lady to tell me some, too!
engSearchText:
Imani knows a lot about them! I'm gonna ask the
bishop lady to tell me some, too!
jpnChrName: イマーニちゃんもモノシリだし、 シサイさんのお話も聞いてみたいな！
jpnSearchText:
イマーニちゃんもモノシリだし、
シサイさんのお話も聞いてみたいな！

engChrName: I really lost my mind yesterday. It was pathetic. All I did was make my family worry about me...
engSearchText:
I really lost my mind yesterday. It was pathetic.
All I did was make my family worry about me...
jpnChrName: 昨日はどうかしていた……家族にも 心配をかけて、本当に情けないものだよ。
jpnSearchText:
昨日はどうかしていた……家族にも
心配をかけて、本当に情けないものだよ。

engChrName: I thought I'd enjoy a little of the unique local tobacco, but I guess that goes to show why you should always look before you leap.
engSearchText:
I thought I'd enjoy a little of the unique local tobacco,
but I guess that goes to show why you should always
look before you leap.
jpnChrName: サルバッドならではのタバコと思ったが…… やはり、見慣れない物に飛び付くべきじゃないな。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドならではのタバコと思ったが……
やはり、見慣れない物に飛び付くべきじゃないな。

engChrName: With all the trouble I caused my family, I need to make it up to them. So today, with the film festival, it's all about them.
engSearchText:
With all the trouble I caused my family, I need to
make it up to them. So today, with the film festival,
it's all about them.
jpnChrName: 贖罪の為にも今日の映画祭は精一杯の 家族サービスをしないとな。
jpnSearchText:
贖罪の為にも今日の映画祭は精一杯の
家族サービスをしないとな。

engChrName: That includes looking after my son's new friend like any responsible parent should.
engSearchText:
That includes looking after my son's new friend like
any responsible parent should.
jpnChrName: 息子の新しい友達も、責任を持って しっかり見守ってあげよう。
jpnSearchText:
息子の新しい友達も、責任を持って
しっかり見守ってあげよう。

engChrName: GUAHAHAHA! I've been such a fool! A complete and utter moron! What have I been DOING with my life?!
engSearchText:
GUAHAHAHA! I've been such a fool! A complete
and utter moron! What have I been DOING with
my life?!
jpnChrName: ハハハハ、全く馬鹿らしい！
jpnSearchText: ハハハハ、全く馬鹿らしい！

engChrName: Coming here and taking in the FESTIVE atmosphere has made me realize I was so stupid for letting myself be a cog in the corporate machine!
engSearchText:
Coming here and taking in the FESTIVE
atmosphere has made me realize I was so stupid for
letting myself be a cog in the corporate machine!
jpnChrName: ここに来て、陽気な空気を感じていたら 会社の歯車になった俺が馬鹿に思えてくる！
jpnSearchText:
ここに来て、陽気な空気を感じていたら
会社の歯車になった俺が馬鹿に思えてくる！

engChrName: Stupid manager and his bald head... Worthless coworkers... Everybody's always trying to make ME take responsibility for everything!
engSearchText:
Stupid manager and his bald head...
Worthless coworkers... Everybody's always trying to
make ME take responsibility for everything!
jpnChrName: フン、クソハゲ部長に役立たずの後輩め…… いつも俺にばかり責任押し付けやがって！
jpnSearchText:
フン、クソハゲ部長に役立たずの後輩め……
いつも俺にばかり責任押し付けやがって！

engChrName: Screw this! Screw that! SCREW IT ALL! I should quit and try something new instead! Be my own boss for once in my miserable life!
engSearchText:
Screw this! Screw that! SCREW IT ALL! I should
quit and try something new instead! Be my own boss
for once in my miserable life!
jpnChrName: 畜生、俺も会社辞めてこの街で 一旗揚げてやりたいなー！
jpnSearchText:
畜生、俺も会社辞めてこの街で
一旗揚げてやりたいなー！

engChrName: I never expected my son to be so taken with Central Eastern culture. It's great! I'm taking it as a sign that we should travel more often.
engSearchText:
I never expected my son to be so taken with Central
Eastern culture. It's great! I'm taking it as a sign that
we should travel more often.
jpnChrName: 息子が中東文化にハマるとはね。 わざわざ遠出してみるものだ。
jpnSearchText:
息子が中東文化にハマるとはね。
わざわざ遠出してみるものだ。

engChrName: Speaking of Central Eastern culture, I knew about hookahs before coming here.
engSearchText:
Speaking of Central Eastern culture, I knew about
hookahs before coming here.
jpnChrName: それにしても、中東文化といえば、 シーシャ自体は知っていたけど……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、中東文化といえば、
シーシャ自体は知っていたけど……

engChrName: But I had no idea these orbal hookahs were a thing nowadays. Feels like they popped up out of nowhere.
engSearchText:
But I had no idea these orbal hookahs were a
thing nowadays. Feels like they popped up out
of nowhere.
jpnChrName: いつの間にか、こんな導力シーシャ なんてものまで出来ていたとはね。
jpnSearchText:
いつの間にか、こんな導力シーシャ
なんてものまで出来ていたとはね。

engChrName: I'm glad my son's making friends with one of the local kids.
engSearchText:
I'm glad my son's making friends with one of the
local kids.
jpnChrName: 息子が地元の子と仲良くなれて何よりだ。
jpnSearchText: 息子が地元の子と仲良くなれて何よりだ。

engChrName: Ever since I was sent out here to work, I've been looking for an opportunity to bring my family to Tharbad, too.
engSearchText:
Ever since I was sent out here to work, I've been
looking for an opportunity to bring my family to
Tharbad, too.
jpnChrName: 出張で来て以来、いつか家族も 連れて来たいと考えてはいたが……
jpnSearchText:
出張で来て以来、いつか家族も
連れて来たいと考えてはいたが……

engChrName: I'd only planned to take him to the film festival and go sightseeing. It's a perfect stroke of luck that he's found a friend, too.
engSearchText:
I'd only planned to take him to the film festival and
go sightseeing. It's a perfect stroke of luck that he's
found a friend, too.
jpnChrName: 観光と映画祭見物のつもりだっただけに、 息子も交流の機会を持てたのはラッキーだね。
jpnSearchText:
観光と映画祭見物のつもりだっただけに、
息子も交流の機会を持てたのはラッキーだね。

engChrName: Who ever thought our son would be so interested in other cultures?
engSearchText:
Who ever thought our son would be so interested in
other cultures?
jpnChrName: いやあ、まさかうちのクリムが あんなに異文化に興味持つとはね。
jpnSearchText:
いやあ、まさかうちのクリムが
あんなに異文化に興味持つとはね。

engChrName: He told me he wants to have a lamp and a rug.
engSearchText: He told me he wants to have a lamp and a rug.
jpnChrName: さっき、その影響か絨毯とランプが 欲しいって言っていたけど……
jpnSearchText:
さっき、その影響か絨毯とランプが
欲しいって言っていたけど……

engChrName: We should probably just get him the lamp, don't you think? A rug's going to be a bit expensive.
engSearchText:
We should probably just get him the lamp, don't
you think? A rug's going to be a bit expensive.
jpnChrName: 絨毯は高すぎるし……買ってあげるなら、 ランプの方かな？
jpnSearchText:
絨毯は高すぎるし……買ってあげるなら、
ランプの方かな？

engChrName: I don't know. Just because he wants a rug doesn't mean we all couldn't use it as a family. Why don't we buy a replica or something?
engSearchText:
I don't know. Just because he wants a rug doesn't
mean we all couldn't use it as a family. Why don't we
buy a replica or something?
jpnChrName: まあ、最悪家族で使えるものだし、 絨毯もレプリカ品とかなら良いんじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
まあ、最悪家族で使えるものだし、
絨毯もレプリカ品とかなら良いんじゃない？

engChrName: Also, not to change the subject, but...honey, what's that thing you're smoking?
engSearchText:
Also, not to change the subject, but...honey, what's
that thing you're smoking?
jpnChrName: それよりあなた…… その吸っているものは何なの？
jpnSearchText:
それよりあなた……
その吸っているものは何なの？

engChrName: Oh, this? It's a hookah. It's a traditional way of smoking tobacco in the Central East.
engSearchText:
Oh, this? It's a hookah. It's a traditional way of
smoking tobacco in the Central East.
jpnChrName: ああ、シーシャっていう 中東の伝統的なタバコらしいよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、シーシャっていう
中東の伝統的なタバコらしいよ。

engChrName: This portable type you can carry around with you only came out recently. It's pretty handy.
engSearchText:
This portable type you can carry around with you only
came out recently. It's pretty handy.
jpnChrName: この持ち運びに便利なタイプは 最近になって出たものみたいだけどね。
jpnSearchText:
この持ち運びに便利なタイプは
最近になって出たものみたいだけどね。

engChrName: I know I've been trying to cut back on smoking, but I thought I should at least try this stuff since we're here. It can't hurt!
engSearchText:
I know I've been trying to cut back on smoking, but I
thought I should at least try this stuff since we're here.
It can't hurt!
jpnChrName: ここのところタバコは控えていたけど、 こういう時くらいは味わっても良いと思ってね。
jpnSearchText:
ここのところタバコは控えていたけど、
こういう時くらいは味わっても良いと思ってね。

engChrName: My husband's back to his normal self. I'm just grateful that our son didn't get caught up in the commotion.
engSearchText:
My husband's back to his normal self. I'm just
grateful that our son didn't get caught up in
the commotion.
jpnChrName: 夫は元に戻ったし、何より騒ぎに息子が 巻き込まれなくてよかったけど……
jpnSearchText:
夫は元に戻ったし、何より騒ぎに息子が
巻き込まれなくてよかったけど……

engChrName: But I still wonder what happened. The seller did apologize for those hookahs being 'unauthorized' or whatever it was. Was it really...?
engSearchText:
But I still wonder what happened. The seller did
apologize for those hookahs being 'unauthorized' or
whatever it was. Was it really...?
jpnChrName: 一体何だったのかしら………そういえばあのシーシャ、 お店の人が未認可だったとか謝ってたけど……
jpnSearchText:
一体何だったのかしら………そういえばあのシーシャ、
お店の人が未認可だったとか謝ってたけど……

engChrName: I have a lot of questions and concerns, still. But right now, I'm going to try to enjoy the film festival, especially while Imani's with us!
engSearchText:
I have a lot of questions and concerns, still. But right
now, I'm going to try to enjoy the film festival,
especially while Imani's with us!
jpnChrName: 色々不安だけど……イマーニちゃんもいるし、 今は映画祭を楽しまないとね……！
jpnSearchText:
色々不安だけど……イマーニちゃんもいるし、
今は映画祭を楽しまないとね……！

engChrName: I don't know what's going on with my husband. He's never been the best drinker, to be sure, but...
engSearchText:
I don't know what's going on with my husband.
He's never been the best drinker, to be sure, but...
jpnChrName: うちの夫……どうしたのかしら。 確かにもともと酒癖は良くない方だけど……
jpnSearchText:
うちの夫……どうしたのかしら。
確かにもともと酒癖は良くない方だけど……

engChrName: He hasn't drunk anything today, and even when he gets drunk, he's never quite like, umm, this.
engSearchText:
He hasn't drunk anything today, and even when he
gets drunk, he's never quite like, umm, this.
jpnChrName: 今日はまだお酒は飲んでいないし、 酔ってもここまでははっちゃけないわ。
jpnSearchText:
今日はまだお酒は飲んでいないし、
酔ってもここまでははっちゃけないわ。

engChrName: The other people carrying on over there also look like they're extremely drunk, too. But I don't think I saw them drinking, either!
engSearchText:
The other people carrying on over there also look like
they're extremely drunk, too. But I don't think I saw
them drinking, either!
jpnChrName: 向こうで踊って騒いでいる人たちも何だか 酔っているように見えるけど……
jpnSearchText:
向こうで踊って騒いでいる人たちも何だか
酔っているように見えるけど……

engChrName: What in the world is going on here...?
engSearchText: What in the world is going on here...?
jpnChrName: 一体どうしちゃっているのかしらね……
jpnSearchText: 一体どうしちゃっているのかしらね……

engChrName: I appreciate my husband taking us all out on this trip, especially since it's given our son so many new experiences.
engSearchText:
I appreciate my husband taking us all out on this trip,
especially since it's given our son so many
new experiences.
jpnChrName: 久しぶりの旅行に来れた事や、息子が新しい 経験をできた事は夫に感謝したいけど……
jpnSearchText:
久しぶりの旅行に来れた事や、息子が新しい
経験をできた事は夫に感謝したいけど……

engChrName: I don't know if him smoking that hookah when he's not used to it is such a good idea, though. No matter how 'ambient' he says it is.
engSearchText:
I don't know if him smoking that hookah when he's
not used to it is such a good idea, though. No matter
how 'ambient' he says it is.
jpnChrName: いくら雰囲気があるからっていきなり、 慣れない水タバコを吸うなんて大丈夫かしら。
jpnSearchText:
いくら雰囲気があるからっていきなり、
慣れない水タバコを吸うなんて大丈夫かしら。

engChrName: Are those hookahs really that good? I see an awful lot of people smoking them all over town. You have to wonder...
engSearchText:
Are those hookahs really that good? I see an awful lot
of people smoking them all over town. You have
to wonder...
jpnChrName: 見れば街中に吸っている人がいるけど…… そんなに良いモノなのかしらねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
見れば街中に吸っている人がいるけど……
そんなに良いモノなのかしらねぇ。

engChrName: Seeing as the film festival is being held, too, I decided to take my husband up on his idea and come with our son on his business trip.
engSearchText:
Seeing as the film festival is being held, too, I decided
to take my husband up on his idea and come with our
son on his business trip.
jpnChrName: 映画祭もあることだし、せっかくだから 夫の提案に乗って来てみたけど……
jpnSearchText:
映画祭もあることだし、せっかくだから
夫の提案に乗って来てみたけど……

engChrName: I figured it would be nice, but I never anticipated that our son would hit it off with one of the local children. What a wonderful surprise!
engSearchText:
I figured it would be nice, but I never anticipated that
our son would hit it off with one of the local
children. What a wonderful surprise!
jpnChrName: 息子が地元の子と交流できたのは、 予想外の収穫だわ。
jpnSearchText:
息子が地元の子と交流できたのは、
予想外の収穫だわ。

engChrName: I want him to grow up to be wise and broad-minded, so I'm glad he's getting exposed to other cultures while he's still young.
engSearchText:
I want him to grow up to be wise and broad-minded,
so I'm glad he's getting exposed to other cultures
while he's still young.
jpnChrName: 広い視野を持った人に育って欲しいし、 今のうちから多文化と触れるのも良い経験ね。
jpnSearchText:
広い視野を持った人に育って欲しいし、
今のうちから多文化と触れるのも良い経験ね。

engChrName: Things have finally calmed down today. I'm still wondering what the heck was going on around here yesterday, though!
engSearchText:
Things have finally calmed down today. I'm still
wondering what the heck was going on around here
yesterday, though!
jpnChrName: 昨日までの変な雰囲気……今朝になって急に 落ち着いちゃったけど、何だったのかしら。
jpnSearchText:
昨日までの変な雰囲気……今朝になって急に
落ち着いちゃったけど、何だったのかしら。

engChrName: Whatever it was, I'm glad it's over. I was starting to worry if that's what the Central East was always like.
engSearchText:
Whatever it was, I'm glad it's over. I was starting to
worry if that's what the Central East was always like.
jpnChrName: まあ、とにかくあれが中東の雰囲気じゃなくて 良かったわ、偏見を持ちかけちゃった。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、とにかくあれが中東の雰囲気じゃなくて
良かったわ、偏見を持ちかけちゃった。

engChrName: Now I can just enjoy the film festival without worrying about that, and start getting excited for the next trip I'm taking!
engSearchText:
Now I can just enjoy the film festival without
worrying about that, and start getting excited for the
next trip I'm taking!
jpnChrName: 一安心できたし、今は映画祭を楽しんで、 今後の旅行のためにも気分を盛り上げていきたいわ。
jpnSearchText:
一安心できたし、今は映画祭を楽しんで、
今後の旅行のためにも気分を盛り上げていきたいわ。

engChrName: It might be the day before the film festival and all, but it feels like people are almost getting TOO excited for it, you know?
engSearchText:
It might be the day before the film festival and all, but
it feels like people are almost getting TOO excited
for it, you know?
jpnChrName: 映画祭前日とは言え、 何だか盛り上がり過ぎなような……
jpnSearchText:
映画祭前日とは言え、
何だか盛り上がり過ぎなような……

engChrName: I mean, I could tell people were excited yesterday, too, but today it's suddenly hit a fever pitch.
engSearchText:
I mean, I could tell people were excited yesterday,
too, but today it's suddenly hit a fever pitch.
jpnChrName: 何というか、昨日も凄い熱気だとは思ったけど、 今朝になって急に高まっている気がするわ。
jpnSearchText:
何というか、昨日も凄い熱気だとは思ったけど、
今朝になって急に高まっている気がするわ。

engChrName: Maybe I'm just overthinking things, but it just feels so abrupt. I don't know...
engSearchText:
Maybe I'm just overthinking things, but it just feels
so abrupt. I don't know...
jpnChrName: うーん、考え過ぎかもしれないけど…… 何となく急すぎるような……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、考え過ぎかもしれないけど……
何となく急すぎるような……

engChrName: It's amazing how good the hamam is at cleaning your skin and removing hair. I'd heard stories before, but hamaming is believing!
engSearchText:
It's amazing how good the hamam is at cleaning
your skin and removing hair. I'd heard stories before,
but hamaming is believing!
jpnChrName: 噂には聞いていたけど、ハマムの 垢すりと脱毛……凄い効果ね。
jpnSearchText:
噂には聞いていたけど、ハマムの
垢すりと脱毛……凄い効果ね。

engChrName: I don't just feel like I look better—I can tell my blood flow has improved, too. I'm so nice and warm. I'm going to sleep like a log tonight!
engSearchText:
I don't just feel like I look better—I can tell my blood
flow has improved, too. I'm so nice and warm.
I'm going to sleep like a log tonight!
jpnChrName: 綺麗になっただけでなく、血行が良くなった みたいでポカポカして、よく眠れそう。
jpnSearchText:
綺麗になっただけでなく、血行が良くなった
みたいでポカポカして、よく眠れそう。

engChrName: I should see if Altair has any hamams... Wait, no I shouldn't! That'll just ruin the surprise when I go there, if I know what to expect!
engSearchText:
I should see if Altair has any hamams... Wait, no
I shouldn't! That'll just ruin the surprise when I go
there, if I know what to expect!
jpnChrName: アルタイルにもハマムがあれば…… って、それじゃ旅の楽しみが無くなるか。
jpnSearchText:
アルタイルにもハマムがあれば……
って、それじゃ旅の楽しみが無くなるか。

engChrName: Traditional technology like this is so impressive. I remember being blown away by the löyly bath I took when I was in Remiferia, too.
engSearchText:
Traditional technology like this is so impressive.
I remember being blown away by the löyly bath I took
when I was in Remiferia, too.
jpnChrName: レミフェリアのロウリュでも感じたけど、 こういう伝統もすごい技術よねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
レミフェリアのロウリュでも感じたけど、
こういう伝統もすごい技術よねぇ。

engChrName: As hot as this place gets, it's still really nice. I like it! In fact, the heat makes it feel like I'm visiting a whole other planet.
engSearchText:
As hot as this place gets, it's still really nice. I like it!
In fact, the heat makes it feel like I'm visiting a whole
other planet.
jpnChrName: うーん、暑いけどここも良いモノね。 暑さも含めて、別世界な感じを味わえて。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、暑いけどここも良いモノね。
暑さも含めて、別世界な感じを味わえて。

engChrName: I used to not wander far when I left home, but after visiting Creil and Remiferia, I now really get a kick out of traveling as far as I can.
engSearchText:
I used to not wander far when I left home, but after
visiting Creil and Remiferia, I now really get a kick
out of traveling as far as I can.
jpnChrName: 前は近場ばかり行ってたけど、この前にクレイユ村と レミフェリアに行って以来、遠出も好きになってね。
jpnSearchText:
前は近場ばかり行ってたけど、この前にクレイユ村と
レミフェリアに行って以来、遠出も好きになってね。

engChrName: Oh, yeah! I remember hearing that the sand at Mishelam Beach was shipped in from the Central East.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah! I remember hearing that the sand at
Mishelam Beach was shipped in from the
Central East.
jpnChrName: そう言えばミシュラムのレイクビーチの砂って、 中東から運んでるんだったわね。
jpnSearchText:
そう言えばミシュラムのレイクビーチの砂って、
中東から運んでるんだったわね。

engChrName: Maybe if my plans work out, I'll go visit there sometime next month, and soak up some more sun.
engSearchText:
Maybe if my plans work out, I'll go visit there
sometime next month, and soak up some more sun.
jpnChrName: せっかくだし、来月辺りに都合が付いたら そのビーチにも行ってみようかしら。
jpnSearchText:
せっかくだし、来月辺りに都合が付いたら
そのビーチにも行ってみようかしら。

engChrName: There's still a lot of energy surrounding the film festival, but it feels nothing like the craziness that was happening yesterday.
engSearchText:
There's still a lot of energy surrounding the film
festival, but it feels nothing like the craziness that was
happening yesterday.
jpnChrName: 映画祭……凄い盛り上がりだけど、 昨日までの熱狂とは雰囲気が違うわね。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭……凄い盛り上がりだけど、
昨日までの熱狂とは雰囲気が違うわね。

engChrName: Maybe the rumors I've been hearing about those confiscated orbal hookahs being the culprit really were true.
engSearchText:
Maybe the rumors I've been hearing about those
confiscated orbal hookahs being the culprit really
were true.
jpnChrName: 結局、あの撤去された導力シーシャが 原因だったって噂は本当かしら？
jpnSearchText:
結局、あの撤去された導力シーシャが
原因だったって噂は本当かしら？

engChrName: Anyway, at least we all managed to make it to the festival in one piece. Now to go out and enjoy it while I can!
engSearchText:
Anyway, at least we all managed to make it to the
festival in one piece. Now to go out and enjoy it while
I can!
jpnChrName: 何にせよ、映画祭は無事に迎えられたわけだし…… 少しは楽しまないとね。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ、映画祭は無事に迎えられたわけだし……
少しは楽しまないとね。

engChrName: Ugh... I ended up waking up early today because there was a commotion right in front of my home this morning.
engSearchText:
Ugh... I ended up waking up early today because
there was a commotion right in front of my home
this morning.
jpnChrName: 今朝は家の目の前でも騒ぎがあって…… 早くに目が覚めてしまったわ……
jpnSearchText:
今朝は家の目の前でも騒ぎがあって……
早くに目が覚めてしまったわ……

engChrName: This might be festival season, but I've never seen Tharbaders act so...wildly.
engSearchText:
This might be festival season, but I've never seen
Tharbaders act so...wildly.
jpnChrName: 催し事が近づいているとはいえ、 地元の人までこんなに熱狂するなんてねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
催し事が近づいているとはいえ、
地元の人までこんなに熱狂するなんてねぇ……

engChrName: Sure, people get excited sometimes, but we're good about not causing trouble for other people. But now? It's bizarre.
engSearchText:
Sure, people get excited sometimes, but we're good
about not causing trouble for other people. But now?
It's bizarre.
jpnChrName: 昔はお祭りがあっても、迷惑にならないように 弁えていたはずだけどねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
昔はお祭りがあっても、迷惑にならないように
弁えていたはずだけどねぇ……

engChrName: Even with the film festival right around the corner, the nights around here have gotten strangely loud and hectic.
engSearchText:
Even with the film festival right around the corner,
the nights around here have gotten strangely loud
and hectic.
jpnChrName: 映画祭が近いとはいえ……夜も 賑やかになったものねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭が近いとはいえ……夜も
賑やかになったものねぇ。

engChrName: Unlike the Entertainment District, it used to be that when the sun went down, things really mellowed out in the Cultural District.
engSearchText:
Unlike the Entertainment District, it used to be that
when the sun went down, things really mellowed out
in the Cultural District.
jpnChrName: 少し前まで歓楽街はともかく、伝統地区は 日が落ちると落ち着いたものだったけど……
jpnSearchText:
少し前まで歓楽街はともかく、伝統地区は
日が落ちると落ち着いたものだったけど……

engChrName: But lately, it's becoming more and more like the Entertainment District. It's all a little...concerning.
engSearchText:
But lately, it's becoming more and more like the
Entertainment District. It's all a little...concerning.
jpnChrName: ここ最近は、歓楽街の空気にどんどん 同化されているみたいで……少し不安かも……
jpnSearchText:
ここ最近は、歓楽街の空気にどんどん
同化されているみたいで……少し不安かも……

engChrName: Now, what should I get for this week's groceries? Might be a good idea to be a bit sparing on the budget...
engSearchText:
Now, what should I get for this week's groceries?
Might be a good idea to be a bit sparing on
the budget...
jpnChrName: さて、今週分の食材はどうしようかしらね。 敢えて慎ましくしておくべきかしら……
jpnSearchText:
さて、今週分の食材はどうしようかしらね。
敢えて慎ましくしておくべきかしら……

engChrName: People think everyone in Tharbad and Elsaim are rich, but as you can see, most of us are a lot more humble.
engSearchText:
People think everyone in Tharbad and Elsaim are
rich, but as you can see, most of us are a lot
more humble.
jpnChrName: サルバッドやエルザイムは豊かな印象が あるけど、私ら庶民はこんなものよ。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドやエルザイムは豊かな印象が
あるけど、私ら庶民はこんなものよ。

engChrName: Not that we're not blessed here in many ways. Circumstances can definitely vary, depending on where you go in the Central East.
engSearchText:
Not that we're not blessed here in many ways.
Circumstances can definitely vary, depending on
where you go in the Central East.
jpnChrName: まあ、これでも恵まれている方だけどね。 中東もそれなりに差があるものだし……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、これでも恵まれている方だけどね。
中東もそれなりに差があるものだし……

engChrName: This region has its conflicts. It sounds really tragic just how much Qadas has fallen in the wake of its development and all that.
engSearchText:
This region has its conflicts. It sounds really tragic
just how much Qadas has fallen in the wake of its
development and all that.
jpnChrName: 中東も紛争はあるし、ヴァリス発展の煽りで 落ちぶれたカダス地方とかも悲惨だって聞くし……
jpnSearchText:
中東も紛争はあるし、ヴァリス発展の煽りで
落ちぶれたカダス地方とかも悲惨だって聞くし……

engChrName: The young folk in these parts appear to have calmed down considerably. What could've happened to make them so mellow now?
engSearchText:
The young folk in these parts appear to have calmed
down considerably. What could've happened to make
them so mellow now?
jpnChrName: 若い衆は昨日までに比べて幾分か落ち着いた ように見えるな、急に何があったというのだ。
jpnSearchText:
若い衆は昨日までに比べて幾分か落ち着いた
ように見えるな、急に何があったというのだ。

engChrName: I don't see those wretched mechanical hookahs any longer, either. Ha! That'd certainly go a long way if they got rid of those terrible things.
engSearchText:
I don't see those wretched mechanical hookahs any
longer, either. Ha! That'd certainly go a long way if
they got rid of those terrible things.
jpnChrName: 忌々しい機械仕掛けのシーシャも見なくなったが…… ふん、一緒に退散してくれたならせいせいするわ。
jpnSearchText:
忌々しい機械仕掛けのシーシャも見なくなったが……
ふん、一緒に退散してくれたならせいせいするわ。

engChrName: I suppose I can let bygones be bygones now that they've all learned to act human once again. Well, all save one, that is...
engSearchText:
I suppose I can let bygones be bygones now that
they've all learned to act human once again. Well, all
save one, that is...
jpnChrName: まあ、今は人並み程度には節度を取り戻したと 見えるしの……たまには大目に見てやるか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、今は人並み程度には節度を取り戻したと
見えるしの……たまには大目に見てやるか。

engChrName: I'm talking about that Salvatore Gotti's films! Gehenna will freeze before I ever have anything good to say about that man's filth!
engSearchText:
I'm talking about that Salvatore Gotti's films!
Gehenna will freeze before I ever have anything good
to say about that man's filth!
jpnChrName: じゃが……それでもあのゴッチなる 男の映画だけは絶対に認める気は無いぞ！
jpnSearchText:
じゃが……それでもあのゴッチなる
男の映画だけは絶対に認める気は無いぞ！

engChrName: Young people these days have no respect for law and order. I heard there was a big fight around here just this morning!
engSearchText:
Young people these days have no respect for law
and order. I heard there was a big fight around here
just this morning!
jpnChrName: 今朝は乱闘騒ぎまであったと聞くが、 日に日に若い衆は秩序を失っておるな。
jpnSearchText:
今朝は乱闘騒ぎまであったと聞くが、
日に日に若い衆は秩序を失っておるな。

engChrName: If they hadn't drowned themselves in vice, forgetting their devotion to Arusha, this city wouldn't be the mess that it is today.
engSearchText:
If they hadn't drowned themselves in vice, forgetting
their devotion to Arusha, this city wouldn't be the
mess that it is today.
jpnChrName: こうも街が乱れたのは、翼の女神（アル─シャ）への 感謝を忘れ、俗悪なものに溺れたからじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
こうも街が乱れたのは、翼の女神（アル─シャ）への
感謝を忘れ、俗悪なものに溺れたからじゃ。

engChrName: Those 'motion pictures' are especially wretched. I tried to watch one of that Salvatore Gotti's things and was absolutely appalled!
engSearchText:
Those 'motion pictures' are especially wretched.
I tried to watch one of that Salvatore Gotti's things
and was absolutely appalled!
jpnChrName: 特に映画なる物……やたら名を聞くゴッチとやらの 作品を試しに見てみたが……何なんじゃあれは！？
jpnSearchText:
特に映画なる物……やたら名を聞くゴッチとやらの
作品を試しに見てみたが……何なんじゃあれは！？

engChrName: Such obscene trash is good for nothing but destroying people's morals! No wonder the young have lost their way!
engSearchText:
Such obscene trash is good for nothing but destroying
people's morals! No wonder the young have lost
their way!
jpnChrName: あんな低俗で倫理観を破壊する代物を見るから、 こうして人間性を喪うんじゃないかね！？
jpnSearchText:
あんな低俗で倫理観を破壊する代物を見るから、
こうして人間性を喪うんじゃないかね！？

engChrName: Bah, the scent of those newfangled mechanical hookahs! They've ruined the flavor of our own hookahs over here.
engSearchText:
Bah, the scent of those newfangled
mechanical hookahs! They've ruined the flavor of our
own hookahs over here.
jpnChrName: ふん、あの機械仕掛けのシーシャの匂いで ワシらのシーシャまで不味くなってしもうた。
jpnSearchText:
ふん、あの機械仕掛けのシーシャの匂いで
ワシらのシーシャまで不味くなってしもうた。

engChrName: What could these people possibly want, thinking they can come in with their weird devices, 'mechanizing' our culture?
engSearchText:
What could these people possibly want, thinking they
can come in with their weird devices, 'mechanizing'
our culture?
jpnChrName: 変なもので伝統文化を壊しおって…… そうまでして一体何を欲すると言うのか。
jpnSearchText:
変なもので伝統文化を壊しおって……
そうまでして一体何を欲すると言うのか。

engChrName: I'm going to need to have another talk with Father Mukhtar about the state of the world. Because I don't like where it's headed, that's for sure!
engSearchText:
I'm going to need to have another talk with Father
Mukhtar about the state of the world. Because I don't
like where it's headed, that's for sure!
jpnChrName: ムフタール様にも改めて相談させていただこう、 ワシらの世界の在り様についてな。
jpnSearchText:
ムフタール様にも改めて相談させていただこう、
ワシらの世界の在り様についてな。

engChrName: Young people, I swear! They're all in a tizzy over this forsaken film festival! Doesn't anyone know self-restraint these days?!
engSearchText:
Young people, I swear! They're all in a tizzy over this
forsaken film festival! Doesn't anyone know
self-restraint these days?!
jpnChrName: 全く、若い衆は映画祭だのと 浮かれおって……慎みを知らんのか。
jpnSearchText:
全く、若い衆は映画祭だのと
浮かれおって……慎みを知らんのか。

engChrName: And it's not just the film festival that's wrong! So's that fountain in the Entertainment District! Back in my day, we treasured water!
engSearchText:
And it's not just the film festival that's wrong!
So's that fountain in the Entertainment District!
Back in my day, we treasured water!
jpnChrName: 歓楽街の噴水にしても、昔は貴重だった 恵みの水を無駄に使い捨てておる……
jpnSearchText:
歓楽街の噴水にしても、昔は貴重だった
恵みの水を無駄に使い捨てておる……

engChrName: It's good to see the city thriving, but everybody seems to have forgotten they all have Arusha to thank for our prosperity! Hmph!
engSearchText:
It's good to see the city thriving, but everybody seems
to have forgotten they all have Arusha to thank for
our prosperity! Hmph!
jpnChrName: 豊かになったのは結構じゃが、どうにも 翼の女神（アル─シャ）への感謝を忘れておるようにしか思えん。
jpnSearchText:
豊かになったのは結構じゃが、どうにも
翼の女神（アル─シャ）への感謝を忘れておるようにしか思えん。

engChrName: Haha, now that the smell of those fake hookahs is gone, the real stuff tastes even better! Nothing beats tradition there.
engSearchText:
Haha, now that the smell of those fake hookahs is
gone, the real stuff tastes even better! Nothing beats
tradition there.
jpnChrName: ははは、あの紛い物の匂いも消え、 本当のシーシャが美味いものだ。
jpnSearchText:
ははは、あの紛い物の匂いも消え、
本当のシーシャが美味いものだ。

engChrName: In any case, I'm glad to see that the young folks have calmed down.
engSearchText:
In any case, I'm glad to see that the young folks have
calmed down.
jpnChrName: やはりシーシャと言えば、これに限るな…… 若者達も幾分か落ち着いたようで何よりだ。
jpnSearchText:
やはりシーシャと言えば、これに限るな……
若者達も幾分か落ち着いたようで何よりだ。

engChrName: Now I can simply sit back and enjoy all the excitement that the film festival has brought to the city.
engSearchText:
Now I can simply sit back and enjoy all the
excitement that the film festival has brought to
the city.
jpnChrName: 改めて、映画祭とやらの盛況ぶりを 見守ってみようではないか。
jpnSearchText:
改めて、映画祭とやらの盛況ぶりを
見守ってみようではないか。

engChrName: I do my best to try and respect what young folks try to do, but all of this mayhem is testing even my patience.
engSearchText:
I do my best to try and respect what young folks try to
do, but all of this mayhem is testing even
my patience.
jpnChrName: 儂とて若い衆も尊重してやりたいが、 ここまで乱れたとなると流石になぁ……
jpnSearchText:
儂とて若い衆も尊重してやりたいが、
ここまで乱れたとなると流石になぁ……

engChrName: I understand everyone getting excited at being exposed to new ideas and culture, but that's no excuse for them to go act like hoodlums!
engSearchText:
I understand everyone getting excited at being
exposed to new ideas and culture, but that's no excuse
for them to go act like hoodlums!
jpnChrName: 若者が新しい文化に触れたり浮かれるのも判るが、 やはり迷惑をかけない一線は弁えるべきだろう。
jpnSearchText:
若者が新しい文化に触れたり浮かれるのも判るが、
やはり迷惑をかけない一線は弁えるべきだろう。

engChrName: Either way, something about all this doesn't feel right to me. None of what's happening feels natural. Hmm...
engSearchText:
Either way, something about all this doesn't feel right
to me. None of what's happening feels natural.
Hmm...
jpnChrName: だが……どうにも不自然というか、 異様な気配もあるような……
jpnSearchText:
だが……どうにも不自然というか、
異様な気配もあるような……

engChrName: I can sympathize with Abdullah's worries. Tharbad is changing so fast, it feels as though we hardly have time to even remember tradition.
engSearchText:
I can sympathize with Abdullah's worries. Tharbad is
changing so fast, it feels as though we hardly have
time to even remember tradition.
jpnChrName: アブドラーの不安も尤もだ、伝統を顧みる 余裕があるかもわからぬ変化の早さだからな。
jpnSearchText:
アブドラーの不安も尤もだ、伝統を顧みる
余裕があるかもわからぬ変化の早さだからな。

engChrName: Even so, we mustn't forget that we have Professor Hamilton and her incredible work to thank for our current fortune.
engSearchText:
Even so, we mustn't forget that we have Professor
Hamilton and her incredible work to thank for our
current fortune.
jpnChrName: とはいえ……今の豊かさは、 ハミルトン博士の尽力あってこそ。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ……今の豊かさは、
ハミルトン博士の尽力あってこそ。

engChrName: It would be disrespectful to everything she's done for our fair city to completely reject the Tharbad we have today.
engSearchText:
It would be disrespectful to everything she's done for
our fair city to completely reject the Tharbad we
have today.
jpnChrName: 今の在り方を否定し過ぎては、 博士の努力に失礼な気もするのだ。
jpnSearchText:
今の在り方を否定し過ぎては、
博士の努力に失礼な気もするのだ。

engChrName: It might well be worthwhile for us to take a step back, like she did, and reconsider our position.
engSearchText:
It might well be worthwhile for us to take a step back,
like she did, and reconsider our position.
jpnChrName: 我らも、あの方のように一歩引いて 自分達を見つめ直すべきかもしれん……
jpnSearchText:
我らも、あの方のように一歩引いて
自分達を見つめ直すべきかもしれん……

engChrName: Oh, don't be like that, Abdullah. It's nice to see young people going out and enjoying new things. It brings a smile to MY face!
engSearchText:
Oh, don't be like that, Abdullah. It's nice to see
young people going out and enjoying new things.
It brings a smile to MY face!
jpnChrName: まあ、そう言うなアブドラーよ。 新しい事物を好む若者も微笑ましいではないか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、そう言うなアブドラーよ。
新しい事物を好む若者も微笑ましいではないか。

engChrName: Not to mention, if we cling to our ways too much, we as a people will have trouble getting along with those out west.
engSearchText:
Not to mention, if we cling to our ways too much, we
as a people will have trouble getting along with those
out west.
jpnChrName: それに、あまり我らの価値観に縛り付けても、 西方人と慣れ合いにくいだろう。
jpnSearchText:
それに、あまり我らの価値観に縛り付けても、
西方人と慣れ合いにくいだろう。

engChrName: Though...those orbaled-up hookahs can go get buried in a dune, that I'll grant.
engSearchText:
Though...those orbaled-up hookahs can go get buried
in a dune, that I'll grant.
jpnChrName: ──とは言え、あの導力シーシャだけは 少々頂けない気もするがな。
jpnSearchText:
──とは言え、あの導力シーシャだけは
少々頂けない気もするがな。

engChrName: This is where the parade's going to kick off later!
engSearchText: This is where the parade's going to kick off later!
jpnChrName: この後、ここからパレードが始まるの……！
jpnSearchText: この後、ここからパレードが始まるの……！

engChrName: I've been watching them put it all together, and it's really looking like it'll be out of this world!
engSearchText:
I've been watching them put it all together, and it's
really looking like it'll be out of this world!
jpnChrName: 大掛かりなパレードの準備を見ていると、 本当に雲の上の存在なのかなって思えちゃうけど……
jpnSearchText:
大掛かりなパレードの準備を見ていると、
本当に雲の上の存在なのかなって思えちゃうけど……

engChrName: But I can't just stand here gawking at it! I'm going to try spying on their practice sessions to see what I can use to up my game!
engSearchText:
But I can't just stand here gawking at it! I'm going to
try spying on their practice sessions to see what I can
use to up my game!
jpnChrName: でも、ただ見上げてばかりじゃダメだよね、 少しでもよく見て技術を盗まないと！
jpnSearchText:
でも、ただ見上げてばかりじゃダメだよね、
少しでもよく見て技術を盗まないと！

engChrName: I had some weirdo get, well, weird with me earlier. He was genuinely scary! His eyes looked so weird and bugged-out.
engSearchText:
I had some weirdo get, well, weird with me earlier.
He was genuinely scary! His eyes looked so weird
and bugged-out.
jpnChrName: さっき、変な人に絡まれたんだけど 何だか目が変で怖かった……
jpnSearchText:
さっき、変な人に絡まれたんだけど
何だか目が変で怖かった……

engChrName: Ugh, the first time I've gotten any real attention doing this and it had to turn out like that! Just my luck.
engSearchText:
Ugh, the first time I've gotten any real attention
doing this and it had to turn out like that! Just
my luck.
jpnChrName: うう、よりにもよって最初に 声かけられるのがこんな形になるなんて……
jpnSearchText:
うう、よりにもよって最初に
声かけられるのがこんな形になるなんて……

engChrName: I can only imagine how many times Saara and Shaheena must've had to deal with that. Arusha...
engSearchText:
I can only imagine how many times Saara and
Shaheena must've had to deal with that. Arusha...
jpnChrName: サァラさんたちはこういう苦労を 何回もしてきたんだね……
jpnSearchText:
サァラさんたちはこういう苦労を
何回もしてきたんだね……

engChrName: I heard Saara and Shaheena were ambushed by some awful guys this afternoon.
engSearchText:
I heard Saara and Shaheena were ambushed by some
awful guys this afternoon.
jpnChrName: サァラさん達、昼間は変な人に 絡まれて大変だったって……
jpnSearchText:
サァラさん達、昼間は変な人に
絡まれて大変だったって……

engChrName: That must've been so scary! I guess drawing a crowd isn't all fun and games when you get to be as popular as they are.
engSearchText:
That must've been so scary! I guess drawing a crowd
isn't all fun and games when you get to be as popular
as they are.
jpnChrName: やっぱり、人気が出て見てくれる人も 増えるとそういう苦労もあるのかな……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり、人気が出て見てくれる人も
増えるとそういう苦労もあるのかな……

engChrName: *sigh* I think something must be missing in my practice routine. I don't know if it's enough to catch up to those two.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I think something must be missing in my
practice routine. I don't know if it's enough to catch
up to those two.
jpnChrName: ふう……練習もこんなものじゃ 足りないかな、あの二人みたいになるには。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……練習もこんなものじゃ
足りないかな、あの二人みたいになるには。

engChrName: You've seen them, right? The pair of sisters that dance over in front of the oasis.
engSearchText:
You've seen them, right? The pair of sisters that
dance over in front of the oasis.
jpnChrName: そうそう、オアシス前で踊っている 姉妹がいるんだけど、もう見た？
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、オアシス前で踊っている
姉妹がいるんだけど、もう見た？

engChrName: They're so good! I really look up to them. It's my goal to be just like them one day.
engSearchText:
They're so good! I really look up to them. It's my goal
to be just like them one day.
jpnChrName: あの二人は私にとっても目標なんだよね…… ああいう踊り子になれたらなってね。
jpnSearchText:
あの二人は私にとっても目標なんだよね……
ああいう踊り子になれたらなってね。

engChrName: The film festival's as bustling as you'd expect. It feels like night and day compared to how things were yesterday.
engSearchText:
The film festival's as bustling as you'd expect. It feels
like night and day compared to how things
were yesterday.
jpnChrName: 映画祭当日ってだけあって凄い盛り上がりだが…… 昨日までとは何となく雰囲気が違うな。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭当日ってだけあって凄い盛り上がりだが……
昨日までとは何となく雰囲気が違うな。

engChrName: Mind you, we still did good business even during all that weirdness. We weren't hurting for mira, that's for sure.
engSearchText:
Mind you, we still did good business even during all
that weirdness. We weren't hurting for mira, that's
for sure.
jpnChrName: まあ、俺らもあの間はよく売れたし、 ミラ回りは良くなったと思う他ねぇか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、俺らもあの間はよく売れたし、
ミラ回りは良くなったと思う他ねぇか。

engChrName: Still, whatever happened, I'm glad it's behind us. I feel a lot more comfortable selling my meat when the city feels alive like this.
engSearchText:
Still, whatever happened, I'm glad it's behind us.
I feel a lot more comfortable selling my meat when
the city feels alive like this.
jpnChrName: 何があったにせよ、こういう雰囲気の中なら 安心して商売もできそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
何があったにせよ、こういう雰囲気の中なら
安心して商売もできそうだ。

engChrName: My supplier was weirdly riled up when he came to drop off some stock earlier.
engSearchText:
My supplier was weirdly riled up when he came to
drop off some stock earlier.
jpnChrName: さっき食材を持ってきてくれた 業者が妙に興奮しててな。
jpnSearchText:
さっき食材を持ってきてくれた
業者が妙に興奮しててな。

engChrName: It was hard even carrying a conversation with him. He was fired up, but speaking incoherently at the same time. Bizarre.
engSearchText:
It was hard even carrying a conversation with him.
He was fired up, but speaking incoherently at the
same time. Bizarre.
jpnChrName: 何というか、支離滅裂な話を熱心に するから、話を合わせるのに苦労したぜ。
jpnSearchText:
何というか、支離滅裂な話を熱心に
するから、話を合わせるのに苦労したぜ。

engChrName: He's not the only one who's been acting off, either. The tourists and some other residents are being odd, too.
engSearchText:
He's not the only one who's been acting off, either.
The tourists and some other residents are being
odd, too.
jpnChrName: そいつに限らず、 街の連中や観光客もそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
そいつに限らず、
街の連中や観光客もそうだが……

engChrName: It could just be because of the festival coming up. But...it's giving me the creeps, somehow. Doesn't seem right.
engSearchText:
It could just be because of the festival coming up.
But...it's giving me the creeps, somehow.
Doesn't seem right.
jpnChrName: 催し事が近いからとは言え、 何だか不安になるね、こういう空気は。
jpnSearchText:
催し事が近いからとは言え、
何だか不安になるね、こういう空気は。

engChrName: Looking for something for dinner? How about some camel meat? They say it pairs well with a nice libation!
engSearchText:
Looking for something for dinner? How about some
camel meat? They say it pairs well with a
nice libation!
jpnChrName: 夕飯にもラクダ肉はどうかな、 お酒にも結構合うらしいんだ、これが。
jpnSearchText:
夕飯にもラクダ肉はどうかな、
お酒にも結構合うらしいんだ、これが。

engChrName: Here in the Central East, families often come together to eat camel on holidays and the like.
engSearchText:
Here in the Central East, families often come
together to eat camel on holidays and the like.
jpnChrName: 中東じゃ伝統的な祝祭日なんかに 一族で囲んでラクダを食べるんだが……
jpnSearchText:
中東じゃ伝統的な祝祭日なんかに
一族で囲んでラクダを食べるんだが……

engChrName: You might find yourself craving some alcohol at those gatherings, but our customs strictly forbid drinking at those times.
engSearchText:
You might find yourself craving some alcohol at those
gatherings, but our customs strictly forbid drinking at
those times.
jpnChrName: そういう時もお酒が欲しくなる事もあるね。 まあ、その時は飲んじゃいけないしきたりだが。
jpnSearchText:
そういう時もお酒が欲しくなる事もあるね。
まあ、その時は飲んじゃいけないしきたりだが。

engChrName: Well, well, well. Can't say I see groups of tourists that look like you all very often. Color me intrigued!
engSearchText:
Well, well, well. Can't say I see groups of tourists that
look like you all very often. Color me intrigued!
jpnChrName: ほほう、観光客にしてはなかなか 面白い顔ぶれのご一行だな。
jpnSearchText:
ほほう、観光客にしてはなかなか
面白い顔ぶれのご一行だな。

engChrName: The little lady there must be Central Eastern, too, right? But judging from her apparel...from the mountains, am I right?
engSearchText:
The little lady there must be Central Eastern,
too, right? But judging from her apparel...from the
mountains, am I right?
jpnChrName: そっちの嬢ちゃんは中東人みたいだが、 服の意匠なんかを見るに山岳地の出かな。
jpnSearchText:
そっちの嬢ちゃんは中東人みたいだが、
服の意匠なんかを見るに山岳地の出かな。

engChrName: Which means none of you probably have much experience eating camel.
engSearchText:
Which means none of you probably have much
experience eating camel.
jpnChrName: となると、お客さんら皆ラクダは 結構珍しいんじゃないかい。
jpnSearchText:
となると、お客さんら皆ラクダは
結構珍しいんじゃないかい。

engChrName: If you ask me, I think you should change that! Why not have some of my camel meat? Nobody comes away unsatisfied, and I mean nobody!
engSearchText:
If you ask me, I think you should change that!
Why not have some of my camel meat?
Nobody comes away unsatisfied, and I mean nobody!
jpnChrName: せっかくだし、うちのラクダ肉はどうだい。 どの人にも損はさせない味だと思うよ。
jpnSearchText:
せっかくだし、うちのラクダ肉はどうだい。
どの人にも損はさせない味だと思うよ。

engChrName: I specialize in camel meat-based dishes here, which are an ordinary part of Central Eastern cuisine.
engSearchText:
I specialize in camel meat-based dishes here, which
are an ordinary part of Central Eastern cuisine.
jpnChrName: うちでは中東じゃ親しまれてる ラクダ肉料理も勧めていてな。
jpnSearchText:
うちでは中東じゃ親しまれてる
ラクダ肉料理も勧めていてな。

engChrName: That might surprise you to hear, since many think of them as beasts of burden, but they're eaten pretty regularly, as a matter of fact.
engSearchText:
That might surprise you to hear, since many think of
them as beasts of burden, but they're eaten pretty
regularly, as a matter of fact.
jpnChrName: ラクダと言えば荷物持ちの印象が強いが 実は中東じゃそれなりに食用にもされていてね。
jpnSearchText:
ラクダと言えば荷物持ちの印象が強いが
実は中東じゃそれなりに食用にもされていてね。

engChrName: They're a valuable source of protein, in particular, in our corner of Zemuria, where grazing land isn't exactly found over every hill.
engSearchText:
They're a valuable source of protein, in particular, in
our corner of Zemuria, where grazing land isn't
exactly found over every hill.
jpnChrName: 牛を育てるには牧草が足りない 土地も多いし、貴重なタンパク源だ。
jpnSearchText:
牛を育てるには牧草が足りない
土地も多いし、貴重なタンパク源だ。

engChrName: The city feels a little...different from how it was yesterday. There's a much more positive energy in the air.
engSearchText:
The city feels a little...different from how it
was yesterday. There's a much more positive energy in
the air.
jpnChrName: 相変わらず凄い盛り上がりだこと、 昨日までとは雰囲気がちょっとちがうけど……
jpnSearchText:
相変わらず凄い盛り上がりだこと、
昨日までとは雰囲気がちょっとちがうけど……

engChrName: I guess we have the film festival to thank for that. I think I'll stay around and soak in the atmosphere.
engSearchText:
I guess we have the film festival to thank for that.
I think I'll stay around and soak in the atmosphere.
jpnChrName: これが映画祭というものなのかしらねぇ。 ともあれ、雰囲気だけでも感じてみるわ。
jpnSearchText:
これが映画祭というものなのかしらねぇ。
ともあれ、雰囲気だけでも感じてみるわ。

engChrName: I don't know very much at all about motion pictures, but it's a good opportunity to learn more about what young people think these days.
engSearchText:
I don't know very much at all about motion pictures,
but it's a good opportunity to learn more about what
young people think these days.
jpnChrName: 映画というものはよく知らないけど、 若い人らの気持ちは判ってあげたいしねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
映画というものはよく知らないけど、
若い人らの気持ちは判ってあげたいしねぇ。

engChrName: The energy here is...simply incredible. Are all film festivals so joyous?
engSearchText:
The energy here is...simply incredible. Are all film
festivals so joyous?
jpnChrName: それにしてもこんなにも盛り上がるなんて…… 映画祭というのはそんなに愉快なものなのね。
jpnSearchText:
それにしてもこんなにも盛り上がるなんて……
映画祭というのはそんなに愉快なものなのね。

engChrName: It scares me how many people are so...unrestrained. But I must admit, my curiosity is now piqued.
engSearchText:
It scares me how many people are so...unrestrained.
But I must admit, my curiosity is now piqued.
jpnChrName: 正直、節度の無い人も多くて怖いけど、 映画祭がどんなものかは改めて気になるわ。
jpnSearchText:
正直、節度の無い人も多くて怖いけど、
映画祭がどんなものかは改めて気になるわ。

engChrName: Plus it's a chance to hopefully learn a little more about younger folks. I don't want to toss that away!
engSearchText:
Plus it's a chance to hopefully learn a little more about
younger folks. I don't want to toss that away!
jpnChrName: 若い人たちの事も、少しは理解して あげないとねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
若い人たちの事も、少しは理解して
あげないとねぇ……

engChrName: I heard that some ne'er-do-wells gave those poor, poor dancers quite a bit of trouble.
engSearchText:
I heard that some ne'er-do-wells gave those poor,
poor dancers quite a bit of trouble.
jpnChrName: 昼間は不埒な輩が踊り子さんに 絡んでいて大変だったと聞くわ……
jpnSearchText:
昼間は不埒な輩が踊り子さんに
絡んでいて大変だったと聞くわ……

engChrName: It's such a shame. In my day, travelers who came here were considerate towards us. But these days...
engSearchText:
It's such a shame. In my day, travelers who came here
were considerate towards us. But these days...
jpnChrName: 昔は旅行の人もあたしらに配慮してくれて いたんだけどねぇ……最近はなんというか……
jpnSearchText:
昔は旅行の人もあたしらに配慮してくれて
いたんだけどねぇ……最近はなんというか……

engChrName: I worry that our way of life here is in danger. It troubles me, greatly. There's nothing quite like our Cultural District, here in Tharbad.
engSearchText:
I worry that our way of life here is in danger.
It troubles me, greatly. There's nothing quite like our
Cultural District, here in Tharbad.
jpnChrName: せっかくの伝統地区なのに……あたしらの 暮らしが壊されないか、不安になってきたわ……
jpnSearchText:
せっかくの伝統地区なのに……あたしらの
暮らしが壊されないか、不安になってきたわ……

engChrName: Hello there. Interested in some Central Eastern antiques?
engSearchText:
Hello there. Interested in some Central
Eastern antiques?
jpnChrName: いらっしゃい、中東の骨董品に 興味はあるかしら？
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃい、中東の骨董品に
興味はあるかしら？

engChrName: Everybody in these parts really values history, which is good when you trade in artifacts like I do.
engSearchText:
Everybody in these parts really values history, which is
good when you trade in artifacts like I do.
jpnChrName: ここの人らは、皆古い物を大切にする からねぇ……交換屋としても有難いの。
jpnSearchText:
ここの人らは、皆古い物を大切にする
からねぇ……交換屋としても有難いの。

engChrName: For as much as the Entertainment District has changed, the Cultural District is still humming along, same as ever. Business is good.
engSearchText:
For as much as the Entertainment District has
changed, the Cultural District is still humming along,
same as ever. Business is good.
jpnChrName: 最近は歓楽街の方も変わってしまったけど…… 伝統地区なら落ち着いて商いが出来てねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
最近は歓楽街の方も変わってしまったけど……
伝統地区なら落ち着いて商いが出来てねぇ。

engChrName: The fact this part of town still looks the way it does is all thanks to how much people around here cherish history. It's wonderful.
engSearchText:
The fact this part of town still looks the way it does is
all thanks to how much people around here
cherish history. It's wonderful.
jpnChrName: この街並みが残るのも、ここの人が古い物を 大切にする性分だからかねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
この街並みが残るのも、ここの人が古い物を
大切にする性分だからかねぇ……

engChrName: If you're interested in those black pomegranates, you should talk to Philica. She runs a stall over in the Entertainment District.
engSearchText:
If you're interested in those black pomegranates, you
should talk to Philica. She runs a stall over in the
Entertainment District.
jpnChrName: ザクロを買って行ったのは 歓楽街で屋台をやっているフィリカさんです。
jpnSearchText:
ザクロを買って行ったのは
歓楽街で屋台をやっているフィリカさんです。

engChrName: If you explain your situation to her, maybe she'll be willing to help. Only one way to find out, right?
engSearchText:
If you explain your situation to her, maybe she'll be
willing to help. Only one way to find out, right?
jpnChrName: 事情を説明して、相談してみると いうのはどうでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
事情を説明して、相談してみると
いうのはどうでしょうか……？

engChrName: Things are as bustling as ever over here, but somehow it all feels a little...different compared to yesterday. It's tough to explain.
engSearchText:
Things are as bustling as ever over here, but somehow
it all feels a little...different compared to yesterday.
It's tough to explain.
jpnChrName: 相変わらずの盛況ぶりですが…… 何となく昨日までとは空気が変わりましたね。
jpnSearchText:
相変わらずの盛況ぶりですが……
何となく昨日までとは空気が変わりましたね。

engChrName: The parents of my daughter's new friend, the ones from out of town, came to say hello. They seem like incredibly nice people.
engSearchText:
The parents of my daughter's new friend, the ones
from out of town, came to say hello. They seem like
incredibly nice people.
jpnChrName: 娘と仲良くなった子の親御さんも先ほど 挨拶に来られましたが、随分と良い方のようで。
jpnSearchText:
娘と仲良くなった子の親御さんも先ほど
挨拶に来られましたが、随分と良い方のようで。

engChrName: They're taking her to the film festival, which I appreciate. I'm too busy with work to go, and was apprehensive about letting her go alone.
engSearchText:
They're taking her to the film festival, which
I appreciate. I'm too busy with work to go, and was
apprehensive about letting her go alone.
jpnChrName: 私は仕事があるので娘だけで映画祭見物をさせるのは 心配でしたし、娘にも友達が出来て良かったですよ。
jpnSearchText:
私は仕事があるので娘だけで映画祭見物をさせるのは
心配でしたし、娘にも友達が出来て良かったですよ。

engChrName: I really appreciate the temple agreeing to look after my daughter for a little while.
engSearchText:
I really appreciate the temple agreeing to look after
my daughter for a little while.
jpnChrName: 寺院が娘を預かってくれて本当に助かりますよ。
jpnSearchText: 寺院が娘を預かってくれて本当に助かりますよ。

engChrName: With all of these people coming in and the bazaar getting so busy, I'd be worried about her getting lost. This way, I know she's safe.
engSearchText:
With all of these people coming in and the bazaar
getting so busy, I'd be worried about her getting lost.
This way, I know she's safe.
jpnChrName: やはりこうも人が増えて活気づいた状況だと、 迷子とかにならないかも心配ですし。
jpnSearchText:
やはりこうも人が増えて活気づいた状況だと、
迷子とかにならないかも心配ですし。

engChrName: Plus that new friend she made yesterday is there, too. That'll help keep her occupied.
engSearchText:
Plus that new friend she made yesterday is there, too.
That'll help keep her occupied.
jpnChrName: 昨日仲良くなったお子さんも一緒のようですし、 退屈する事も無いでしょうしね。
jpnSearchText:
昨日仲良くなったお子さんも一緒のようですし、
退屈する事も無いでしょうしね。

engChrName: The film festival's great for business. With all these tourists coming to town, my sales have nearly doubled!
engSearchText:
The film festival's great for business. With all these
tourists coming to town, my sales have
nearly doubled!
jpnChrName: 映画祭のお陰もあって、普段よりも観光客が 多いですしね、売り上げも倍近いです。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭のお陰もあって、普段よりも観光客が
多いですしね、売り上げも倍近いです。

engChrName: I'm a little concerned I'm going to run low on some of my stock. But that's not the worst problem to have, when I can put so much money away.
engSearchText:
I'm a little concerned I'm going to run low on some
of my stock. But that's not the worst problem to have,
when I can put so much money away.
jpnChrName: 正直、品薄にならないかは不安ですけど、 ミラを貯められそうで嬉しいものです。
jpnSearchText:
正直、品薄にならないかは不安ですけど、
ミラを貯められそうで嬉しいものです。

engChrName: Plus my daughter is so curious about Western culture. I want to take her traveling one of these days, so it'll help me save for that, too.
engSearchText:
Plus my daughter is so curious about Western culture.
I want to take her traveling one of these days, so it'll
help me save for that, too.
jpnChrName: うちの娘、西方の文化にも興味がありますし、 いつか旅行に連れて行ってあげたいですしね。
jpnSearchText:
うちの娘、西方の文化にも興味がありますし、
いつか旅行に連れて行ってあげたいですしね。

engChrName: Got an appetite for some Central Eastern fruits or spices, by any chance? You won't find my goods anywhere else in Calvard!
engSearchText:
Got an appetite for some Central Eastern fruits or
spices, by any chance? You won't find my goods
anywhere else in Calvard!
jpnChrName: 中東の香辛料や果実などはいかがですか、 共和国でもここ以外では珍しいかと思いますよ。
jpnSearchText:
中東の香辛料や果実などはいかがですか、
共和国でもここ以外では珍しいかと思いますよ。

engChrName: Western nobles have loved our spices for generations. That's the reason trade first took off between our cultures!
engSearchText:
Western nobles have loved our spices for generations.
That's the reason trade first took off between
our cultures!
jpnChrName: 昔から西方諸国の貴族にも中東の 香辛料が人気で、交易も盛んでしたしね。
jpnSearchText:
昔から西方諸国の貴族にも中東の
香辛料が人気で、交易も盛んでしたしね。

engChrName: You should really give them a try. Once you do, you'll wonder how you ever lived without them!
engSearchText:
You should really give them a try. Once you do, you'll
wonder how you ever lived without them!
jpnChrName: きっと皆さんも癖になると思いますよ、 是非試しに使ってみてくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
きっと皆さんも癖になると思いますよ、
是非試しに使ってみてくださいね。

engChrName: It looks like my daughter, Imani, has made friends with a child visiting from out of town.
engSearchText:
It looks like my daughter, Imani, has made friends
with a child visiting from out of town.
jpnChrName: 向こうで娘のイマーニが観光客の お子さんと仲良くなったみたいで。
jpnSearchText:
向こうで娘のイマーニが観光客の
お子さんと仲良くなったみたいで。

engChrName: I've had the pleasure of doing some cultural exchanges for my business, but to see her do that with just a picture book is...really special.
engSearchText:
I've had the pleasure of doing some cultural exchanges
for my business, but to see her do that with just a
picture book is...really special.
jpnChrName: 私は商いを通じて文化交流を経験しましたが、 娘も絵本で向こうの子と仲良くなれて……
jpnSearchText:
私は商いを通じて文化交流を経験しましたが、
娘も絵本で向こうの子と仲良くなれて……

engChrName: Honestly, it's wonderful to see people embrace our culture and find themselves captivated by it.
engSearchText:
Honestly, it's wonderful to see people embrace our
culture and find themselves captivated by it.
jpnChrName: やっぱり、人を惹きつける 文化っていうのは素晴らしいものですよね。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり、人を惹きつける
文化っていうのは素晴らしいものですよね。

engChrName: I'll be honest, it's a little tough handing over the reins to Shaheena for the parade, even if Mr. Gotti and Prince Sherid are okay with it.
engSearchText:
I'll be honest, it's a little tough handing over the reins
to Shaheena for the parade, even if Mr. Gotti and
Prince Sherid are okay with it.
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督や公太子殿下に認めてもらえたのに、 パレードを妹に代わってもらうのは心苦しいですが……
jpnSearchText:
ゴッチ監督や公太子殿下に認めてもらえたのに、
パレードを妹に代わってもらうのは心苦しいですが……

engChrName: And it's a really big responsibility for her. Between you and me, I'm a little anxious, to say the least.
engSearchText:
And it's a really big responsibility for her.
Between you and me, I'm a little anxious, to say
the least.
jpnChrName: シャヒーナも……先ほど私が練習を見てあげた 限りでは十分に果たせると思います。
jpnSearchText:
シャヒーナも……先ほど私が練習を見てあげた
限りでは十分に果たせると思います。

engChrName: But...after watching her practice, I know she's got what it takes. If someone has to take over for me, I'm glad it's her! She's going to be great!
engSearchText:
But...after watching her practice, I know she's got
what it takes. If someone has to take over for me, I'm
glad it's her! She's going to be great!
jpnChrName: 妹に重大な役目をと思うと少し気も引けますが…… きっと、シャヒーナは乗り越えてくれるはずです！
jpnSearchText:
妹に重大な役目をと思うと少し気も引けますが……
きっと、シャヒーナは乗り越えてくれるはずです！

engChrName: You guys have nothing to worry about! I'll shine just as bright in that parade as my sister can!
engSearchText:
You guys have nothing to worry about! I'll shine just
as bright in that parade as my sister can!
jpnChrName: あたしがサァラ姉の代わりに輝いてみせるよ、 お兄さん達も心配しないで！
jpnSearchText:
あたしがサァラ姉の代わりに輝いてみせるよ、
お兄さん達も心配しないで！

engChrName: It's easy for me to forget, sometimes, but I know just how much Saara has struggled to make sure we make ends meet.
engSearchText:
It's easy for me to forget, sometimes, but I know just
how much Saara has struggled to make sure we make
ends meet.
jpnChrName: 思えばサァラ姉には、家計の事でもずっと 苦労を掛けて来ちゃったけど……
jpnSearchText:
思えばサァラ姉には、家計の事でもずっと
苦労を掛けて来ちゃったけど……

engChrName: So getting on that float is the least I can do to pay her back! I'm gonna dance so hard, it'll be an even better show than she'd put on!
engSearchText:
So getting on that float is the least I can do to pay
her back! I'm gonna dance so hard, it'll be an even
better show than she'd put on!
jpnChrName: こういう時にこそ、あたしが踊りでサァラ姉を 超えるほど頑張れば、少しは恩返しにもなるよね！
jpnSearchText:
こういう時にこそ、あたしが踊りでサァラ姉を
超えるほど頑張れば、少しは恩返しにもなるよね！

engChrName: Rahmani's back to his usual self now, which I'm glad to see. What do you think was going on earlier? That was so odd.
engSearchText:
Rahmani's back to his usual self now, which I'm glad
to see. What do you think was going on earlier?
That was so odd.
jpnChrName: ラフマーニさんも元に戻って良かったけど…… 昨日までの空気は一体何だったのかねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ラフマーニさんも元に戻って良かったけど……
昨日までの空気は一体何だったのかねぇ。

engChrName: You know, I feel like I haven't seen any of those orbal hookahs today. Wait... They couldn't have been behind it, could they?
engSearchText:
You know, I feel like I haven't seen any of those orbal
hookahs today. Wait... They couldn't have been
behind it, could they?
jpnChrName: そういえば、例の導力シーシャってのが今朝から 見かけないような気もするけど……まさかね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、例の導力シーシャってのが今朝から
見かけないような気もするけど……まさかね。

engChrName: Well, whatever it was, I can stop worrying about what's going on out there and get back to focusing on my business now.
engSearchText:
Well, whatever it was, I can stop worrying about
what's going on out there and get back to focusing
on my business now.
jpnChrName: まあ、あの騒ぎの心配がなくなった分、 あたしらも本来の商いに専念できるってものさ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、あの騒ぎの心配がなくなった分、
あたしらも本来の商いに専念できるってものさ。

engChrName: The real festival's going to be kicking off soon. I bet all the bars tonight are going to be more alive than they've ever felt!
engSearchText:
The real festival's going to be kicking off soon. I bet
all the bars tonight are going to be more alive than
they've ever felt!
jpnChrName: 映画祭はこれからが本番……夜の酒場なんて、 今までにないくらい盛り上がるだろうしねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
映画祭はこれからが本番……夜の酒場なんて、
今までにないくらい盛り上がるだろうしねぇ！

engChrName: I've known Rahmani a good while now, and I like to think I understand him pretty well.
engSearchText:
I've known Rahmani a good while now, and I like to
think I understand him pretty well.
jpnChrName: ラフマーニさんとはそれなりに 付き合いがあるけど……
jpnSearchText:
ラフマーニさんとはそれなりに
付き合いがあるけど……

engChrName: But I've never seen the man in such high spirits. He hasn't even had anything to drink!
engSearchText:
But I've never seen the man in such high spirits.
He hasn't even had anything to drink!
jpnChrName: お酒が入ってる訳でもないのに、 あんなに調子が良いのは初めて見るね。
jpnSearchText:
お酒が入ってる訳でもないのに、
あんなに調子が良いのは初めて見るね。

engChrName: I've heard that there's been even more commotion than usual over at the bazaar, too.
engSearchText:
I've heard that there's been even more commotion
than usual over at the bazaar, too.
jpnChrName: バザールの方でも、いつも以上に 騒ぎが多いって話は聞いているし……
jpnSearchText:
バザールの方でも、いつも以上に
騒ぎが多いって話は聞いているし……

engChrName: It's all getting to be concerning. Our guests can't exactly enjoy their stay here if there's too much of a ruckus outside, you know?
engSearchText:
It's all getting to be concerning. Our guests can't
exactly enjoy their stay here if there's too much of a
ruckus outside, you know?
jpnChrName: あんまり騒ぎが過ぎるとお客にも 迷惑だし、心配になってきたねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
あんまり騒ぎが過ぎるとお客にも
迷惑だし、心配になってきたねぇ。

engChrName: On behalf of the hamam owner, I just wanted to thank you all again for helping out with that.
engSearchText:
On behalf of the hamam owner, I just wanted to
thank you all again for helping out with that.
jpnChrName: ハマムの件、向こうのご主人に代わって 改めてお礼を言わせてもらうよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハマムの件、向こうのご主人に代わって
改めてお礼を言わせてもらうよ。

engChrName: It's amazing just how much we can all accomplish when we come together to solve a problem like that.
engSearchText:
It's amazing just how much we can all accomplish
when we come together to solve a problem like that.
jpnChrName: こうしてお客の力も借りつつ解決すると、 人の繋がりの力を実感出来たりもしてさ。
jpnSearchText:
こうしてお客の力も借りつつ解決すると、
人の繋がりの力を実感出来たりもしてさ。

engChrName: Also, I'm glad we had an extra bed to spare for that lovely new lady you've added to your ranks.
engSearchText:
Also, I'm glad we had an extra bed to spare for that
lovely new lady you've added to your ranks.
jpnChrName: それと、新しく来た連れの美人さんも ちょうど部屋の寝床が空いてて良かったわねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
それと、新しく来た連れの美人さんも
ちょうど部屋の寝床が空いてて良かったわねぇ。

engChrName: I hate having to put her in that shared room, but all of our other rooms are full. You got really lucky with your reservation, there.
engSearchText:
I hate having to put her in that shared room, but all
of our other rooms are full. You got really lucky with
your reservation, there.
jpnChrName: 他の部屋は埋まっちゃってるからね、相部屋で 悪いけど、寝床の数が合ってて幸運じゃないかい。
jpnSearchText:
他の部屋は埋まっちゃってるからね、相部屋で
悪いけど、寝床の数が合ってて幸運じゃないかい。

engChrName: Now that our son's getting older, I feel it's time for him to start getting ready to take over the inn in the future.
engSearchText:
Now that our son's getting older, I feel it's time for
him to start getting ready to take over the inn in
the future.
jpnChrName: 息子にもそろそろ、将来の主人として どっしり構えて欲しくてねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
息子にもそろそろ、将来の主人として
どっしり構えて欲しくてねぇ。

engChrName: I'm trying to set him up with a nice girl so he'll settle down, but he's completely glum about the whole idea. Puts me in a bit of a spot.
engSearchText:
I'm trying to set him up with a nice girl so he'll settle
down, but he's completely glum about the whole idea.
Puts me in a bit of a spot.
jpnChrName: 身を固めるためにお見合いをさせたいんだけど、 息子はどうにも消極的で困ったものさ。
jpnSearchText:
身を固めるためにお見合いをさせたいんだけど、
息子はどうにも消極的で困ったものさ。

engChrName: I wish he had more confidence in himself. He's a perfectly capable young man who's got his act together. What isn't there to like?
engSearchText:
I wish he had more confidence in himself. He's a
perfectly capable young man who's got his
act together. What isn't there to like?
jpnChrName: あの子もしっかりやれてるんだし、 少しは自信持って欲しいもんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
あの子もしっかりやれてるんだし、
少しは自信持って欲しいもんだよ。

engChrName: I hate to impose when you're all supposed to be guests, but we appreciate you taking a look at the hamam.
engSearchText:
I hate to impose when you're all supposed to be
guests, but we appreciate you taking a look at
the hamam.
jpnChrName: お客さんに頼んで悪いけど、 ハマムの件、よろしく頼んだよ！
jpnSearchText:
お客さんに頼んで悪いけど、
ハマムの件、よろしく頼んだよ！

engChrName: I really hope we can all find a way to fix it. It's not exactly good for business if those baths are out of commission, you know.
engSearchText:
I really hope we can all find a way to fix it. It's not
exactly good for business if those baths are out of
commission, you know.
jpnChrName: やっぱりあそこが使えないと締まらないしね。 皆のためにも、何とか直してあげないと。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱりあそこが使えないと締まらないしね。
皆のためにも、何とか直してあげないと。

engChrName: What a surprise this is! I didn't expect to see you again without the rest of your clan, Feri.
engSearchText:
What a surprise this is! I didn't expect to see you
again without the rest of your clan, Feri.
jpnChrName: それにしても、フェリちゃんが今度は 団以外の人たちと来てくれるとはねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、フェリちゃんが今度は
団以外の人たちと来てくれるとはねぇ。

engChrName: I remember the last time you stayed here, you said you wanted to get out and see more of the world. Have you gotten to do that?
engSearchText:
I remember the last time you stayed here, you said
you wanted to get out and see more of the world.
Have you gotten to do that?
jpnChrName: ふふ、あの時は広い世界を見たいと 言っていたけど、それが叶ったのかい？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、あの時は広い世界を見たいと
言っていたけど、それが叶ったのかい？

engChrName: Yeah! Van's taught me so much.
engSearchText: Yeah! Van's taught me so much.
jpnChrName: はい、ヴァンさんにも首都で 色々教えて貰えていて……
jpnSearchText:
はい、ヴァンさんにも首都で
色々教えて貰えていて……
