engChrName: The only problem is, the more I learn, the more I realize just how big Zemuria is! That makes me wanna see even more of what's out there!
engSearchText:
The only problem is, the more I learn, the more I
realize just how big Zemuria is! That makes me
wanna see even more of what's out there!
jpnChrName: でも、知れば知るほど世界が広がって、 見たいものがどんどん増えていくんです！
jpnSearchText:
でも、知れば知るほど世界が広がって、
見たいものがどんどん増えていくんです！

engChrName: Sounds like a good problem to me! Now that you're on this new path, it's only natural to keep wanting to learn more and more.
engSearchText:
Sounds like a good problem to me! Now that you're
on this new path, it's only natural to keep wanting to
learn more and more.
jpnChrName: それは良い事だね、知りたい事が増えるのは、 新しい事への道筋に気づいているからさ。
jpnSearchText:
それは良い事だね、知りたい事が増えるのは、
新しい事への道筋に気づいているからさ。

engChrName: And if I had to guess, the real adventure has only just begun for you. There's a lot more for you to discover out there.
engSearchText:
And if I had to guess, the real adventure has only just
begun for you. There's a lot more for you to discover
out there.
jpnChrName: だから、フェリちゃんはこれから 今まで以上に色々見るだろうと思うよ。
jpnSearchText:
だから、フェリちゃんはこれから
今まで以上に色々見るだろうと思うよ。

engChrName: If you have time, either tonight or later, I'd love to hear all about what you've seen so far. Sound good?
engSearchText:
If you have time, either tonight or later, I'd love to
hear all about what you've seen so far. Sound good?
jpnChrName: まあ、今夜にでもまた、新しく見てきた 事なんかを聞かせておくれよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、今夜にでもまた、新しく見てきた
事なんかを聞かせておくれよ。

engChrName: Okay! I can't wait to talk about it all with you, Ms. Hala!
engSearchText:
Okay! I can't wait to talk about it all with you,
Ms. Hala!
jpnChrName: はい、是非また色々なお話をしたいです！
jpnSearchText: はい、是非また色々なお話をしたいです！

engChrName: This inn has always played host to all kinds of folk. It comes with Tharbad sitting near the border.
engSearchText:
This inn has always played host to all kinds of folk.
It comes with Tharbad sitting near the border.
jpnChrName: 国境の街なのもあって、うちの宿も 昔から色々な人を泊めていてね。
jpnSearchText:
国境の街なのもあって、うちの宿も
昔から色々な人を泊めていてね。

engChrName: Take that trader over there. He stays with us every month.
engSearchText:
Take that trader over there. He stays with us
every month.
jpnChrName: あっちにいる交易商の人なんて、 毎月うちに泊まってくれているのさ。
jpnSearchText:
あっちにいる交易商の人なんて、
毎月うちに泊まってくれているのさ。

engChrName: Feri's clan are consistent regulars, too. I lost track of how many times they stayed with us throughout last year!
engSearchText:
Feri's clan are consistent regulars, too. I lost track of
how many times they stayed with us throughout
last year!
jpnChrName: フェリちゃんのいる戦士団も、 去年で泊めるのは何度目になったやら。
jpnSearchText:
フェリちゃんのいる戦士団も、
去年で泊めるのは何度目になったやら。

engChrName: Despite today being the film festival, everyone—our guests, the merchants, other tourists—has mellowed out a bit, it feels like.
engSearchText:
Despite today being the film festival, everyone—our
guests, the merchants, other tourists—has mellowed
out a bit, it feels like.
jpnChrName: 昨日までとはお客さんの雰囲気も、街の人たちも 映画祭当日なのに落ち着いてる気がしますね。
jpnSearchText:
昨日までとはお客さんの雰囲気も、街の人たちも
映画祭当日なのに落ち着いてる気がしますね。

engChrName: What do you think was going on? Thankfully nothing ended up happening here in the inn, but I still can't help but wonder.
engSearchText:
What do you think was going on?
Thankfully nothing ended up happening here in the
inn, but I still can't help but wonder.
jpnChrName: 結局昨日までのは何だったんだろう……うちでは トラブルは無かったけどやはり気になるなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
結局昨日までのは何だったんだろう……うちでは
トラブルは無かったけどやはり気になるなぁ。

engChrName: Ah, well. The festival's starting, which means more guests for us. As my mother always says, it's time to get cracking and work, work, work!
engSearchText:
Ah, well. The festival's starting, which means more
guests for us. As my mother always says, it's time to
get cracking and work, work, work!
jpnChrName: まあ、どの道この後も映画祭だしお客は来る。 母さんの言う通り気持ちを入れ替えて頑張らないと！
jpnSearchText:
まあ、どの道この後も映画祭だしお客は来る。
母さんの言う通り気持ちを入れ替えて頑張らないと！

engChrName: The festival might be tomorrow, but is it worth getting THIS excited for? It feels like everyone's going nuts.
engSearchText:
The festival might be tomorrow, but is it worth
getting THIS excited for? It feels like everyone's
going nuts.
jpnChrName: 催し事の前日とはいえ、普段大人しい人まで こうも舞い上がるものなのでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
催し事の前日とはいえ、普段大人しい人まで
こうも舞い上がるものなのでしょうか？

engChrName: Some of the neighbors seem like completely different people, all full of energy and practically bouncing off the walls!
engSearchText:
Some of the neighbors seem like completely different
people, all full of energy and practically bouncing off
the walls!
jpnChrName: 近所の人たちにも、人が変わったような 弾け方の人もいますし……
jpnSearchText:
近所の人たちにも、人が変わったような
弾け方の人もいますし……

engChrName: I'm really worried this is all going to cause trouble for the inn, somehow.
engSearchText:
I'm really worried this is all going to cause trouble for
the inn, somehow.
jpnChrName: うちも何かのトラブルに巻き込まれないか、 心配でなりませんよ。
jpnSearchText:
うちも何かのトラブルに巻き込まれないか、
心配でなりませんよ。

engChrName: For the sake of our guests, I hope things settle down sooner rather than later. I don't want all this getting in the way of their comfort.
engSearchText:
For the sake of our guests, I hope things settle down
sooner rather than later. I don't want all this getting
in the way of their comfort.
jpnChrName: お客さんたちに安心していただくためにも、 早く落ち着いてくれるといいけどなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
お客さんたちに安心していただくためにも、
早く落ち着いてくれるといいけどなぁ。

engChrName: Thanks for fixing the problem over at the hamam down the street. You guys have been a big help around here.
engSearchText:
Thanks for fixing the problem over at the hamam
down the street. You guys have been a big help
around here.
jpnChrName: ハマムの問題を解決してくれたそうですね、 僕からも是非お礼を言わせて下さい。
jpnSearchText:
ハマムの問題を解決してくれたそうですね、
僕からも是非お礼を言わせて下さい。

engChrName: If only Mom would take a page out of your book. Instead of doing something worthwhile with her time, she's just been playing cupid all year...
engSearchText:
If only Mom would take a page out of your book.
Instead of doing something worthwhile with her
time, she's just been playing cupid all year...
jpnChrName: しかし……母さんときたら今年に入ってから、 やたらとお見合い話を勧めてくるんですよね。
jpnSearchText:
しかし……母さんときたら今年に入ってから、
やたらとお見合い話を勧めてくるんですよね。

engChrName: She wants me to hurry up and settle down for 'the future of the inn.' But I'm just not ready to take over. And I'm not being humble!
engSearchText:
She wants me to hurry up and settle down for 'the
future of the inn.' But I'm just not ready to take over.
And I'm not being humble!
jpnChrName: 宿の主人として身を固めろって言うけど…… 謙遜とか抜きに、本当にまだまだなのに……
jpnSearchText:
宿の主人として身を固めろって言うけど……
謙遜とか抜きに、本当にまだまだなのに……

engChrName: My mother is really intent on me settling down and starting a family.
engSearchText:
My mother is really intent on me settling down and
starting a family.
jpnChrName: 母さん、よっぽど僕に身を 固めて欲しいらしくて……
jpnSearchText:
母さん、よっぽど僕に身を
固めて欲しいらしくて……

engChrName: One time, I just happened to say how pretty one of the dancing sisters was and then she went out and tried to find a girl like her.
engSearchText:
One time, I just happened to say how pretty one of
the dancing sisters was and then she went out and
tried to find a girl like her.
jpnChrName: 以前に、姉妹の踊り子さんが素敵だねって話したら、 わざわざ似ている子を探したりもして……
jpnSearchText:
以前に、姉妹の踊り子さんが素敵だねって話したら、
わざわざ似ている子を探したりもして……

engChrName: If you're wondering why she didn't introduce us, it's because she 'couldn't possibly picture us being a good fit,' which... *sigh*
engSearchText:
If you're wondering why she didn't introduce us, it's
because she 'couldn't possibly picture us being a good
fit,' which... *sigh*
jpnChrName: ……ちなみに踊り子さん本人に紹介しないのは、 流石に釣り合わなさそうだからだそうです。
jpnSearchText:
……ちなみに踊り子さん本人に紹介しないのは、
流石に釣り合わなさそうだからだそうです。

engChrName: Hey, I remember you! You were with those jaegers that stayed with us last year, weren't you? Looks like you've been doing well.
engSearchText:
Hey, I remember you! You were with those jaegers
that stayed with us last year, weren't you? Looks like
you've been doing well.
jpnChrName: あ、去年いらした戦士団の子ではないですか！ やー、お元気そうで何よりです。
jpnSearchText:
あ、去年いらした戦士団の子ではないですか！
やー、お元気そうで何よりです。

engChrName: If I remember, you really enjoyed our kofta, didn't you?
engSearchText:
If I remember, you really enjoyed our kofta,
didn't you?
jpnChrName: 確かうちの“キョフテ”をとても 気に入ってくれていましたね。
jpnSearchText:
確かうちの“キョフテ”をとても
気に入ってくれていましたね。

engChrName: I'll be sure to get some for you while you're here.
engSearchText: I'll be sure to get some for you while you're here.
jpnChrName: ふふ、どこかのタイミングで またお出ししますよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、どこかのタイミングで
またお出ししますよ。

engChrName: Wow, thanks, Khosrow!
engSearchText: Wow, thanks, Khosrow!
jpnChrName: ホスローさん、お久しぶりです。
jpnSearchText: ホスローさん、お久しぶりです。

engChrName: I can't believe you remembered what I like to eat! You really are as good as your mom says.
engSearchText:
I can't believe you remembered what I like to eat!
You really are as good as your mom says.
jpnChrName: ご飯の事まで覚えてくれていたなんて、 流石ハーラさんが言うだけありますね。
jpnSearchText:
ご飯の事まで覚えてくれていたなんて、
流石ハーラさんが言うだけありますね。

engChrName: Everybody in my clan was saying you're gonna be an amazing owner once you take over!
engSearchText:
Everybody in my clan was saying you're gonna be an
amazing owner once you take over!
jpnChrName: 団の皆も、良い主人になりそうだって 褒めてくれてましたよ！
jpnSearchText:
団の皆も、良い主人になりそうだって
褒めてくれてましたよ！

engChrName: Haha, it's no big deal. Your clan is just one of the more...distinct guests we've had, so your preferences came back to me pretty easily.
engSearchText:
Haha, it's no big deal. Your clan is just one of the
more...distinct guests we've had, so your preferences
came back to me pretty easily.
jpnChrName: いやぁ、流石に戦士団は記憶に 残りやすいから覚えていただけですよ。
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ、流石に戦士団は記憶に
残りやすいから覚えていただけですよ。

engChrName: Trust me, I've got a long way to go before I'll be ready to run the inn.
engSearchText:
Trust me, I've got a long way to go before I'll be ready
to run the inn.
jpnChrName: 僕なんて宿の主人としてまだまだですし……
jpnSearchText: 僕なんて宿の主人としてまだまだですし……

engChrName: Though that hasn't stopped my mother from trying to jump the gun and get things moving... *sigh*
engSearchText:
Though that hasn't stopped my mother from trying to
jump the gun and get things moving... *sigh*
jpnChrName: それなのに母さんときたら、 僕に気の早い話を持ちかけてくるから……
jpnSearchText:
それなのに母さんときたら、
僕に気の早い話を持ちかけてくるから……

engChrName: Things? What kind of things?
engSearchText: Things? What kind of things?
jpnChrName: ？　気の早い話とは……
jpnSearchText: ？　気の早い話とは……

engChrName: Oh, it's nothing. You don't need to worry about it. She'll forget about it and move on soon enough. I hope.
engSearchText:
Oh, it's nothing. You don't need to worry about it.
She'll forget about it and move on soon enough.
I hope.
jpnChrName: いやいや、大したお話じゃないですし、 多分流れるので……お気になさらず。
jpnSearchText:
いやいや、大したお話じゃないですし、
多分流れるので……お気になさらず。

engChrName: My mother has really high hopes for me as the future owner of the inn, even if I think I still have a LOT to learn before I'll be ready.
engSearchText:
My mother has really high hopes for me as the future
owner of the inn, even if I think I still have a LOT to
learn before I'll be ready.
jpnChrName: 僕は自分などまだまだだとは思いますが、 母も将来の主人にと期待していますしね。
jpnSearchText:
僕は自分などまだまだだとは思いますが、
母も将来の主人にと期待していますしね。

engChrName: But hearing that everyone in the Kruga appreciates my work does give me a little more confidence. I'll keep trying to make everyone proud.
engSearchText:
But hearing that everyone in the Kruga appreciates
my work does give me a little more confidence.
I'll keep trying to make everyone proud.
jpnChrName: 戦士団の方々に誉めてもらえたなら少し 自信がつきましたし、今一度頑張ってみますよ。
jpnSearchText:
戦士団の方々に誉めてもらえたなら少し
自信がつきましたし、今一度頑張ってみますよ。

engChrName: What happened to me yesterday...? My memory's pretty fuzzy, but I guess I had Hala and her family pretty worried for a bit there.
engSearchText:
What happened to me yesterday...? My memory's
pretty fuzzy, but I guess I had Hala and her family
pretty worried for a bit there.
jpnChrName: 昨日、俺はどうかしてたようだ……途中から記憶が 曖昧だが、ハーラさん達には心配をかけた……
jpnSearchText:
昨日、俺はどうかしてたようだ……途中から記憶が
曖昧だが、ハーラさん達には心配をかけた……

engChrName: It's not like anything could've changed overnight. But why do things feel so different all of a sudden?
engSearchText:
It's not like anything could've changed overnight.
But why do things feel so different all of a sudden?
jpnChrName: 今日になっていきなり何か生活環境とかが 変わったという訳でもないはずだがな……
jpnSearchText:
今日になっていきなり何か生活環境とかが
変わったという訳でもないはずだがな……

engChrName: If I had to guess, maybe it's got something to do with the festival starting and those orbal hookahs disappearing from stores. Who knows?
engSearchText:
If I had to guess, maybe it's got something to do with
the festival starting and those orbal hookahs
disappearing from stores. Who knows?
jpnChrName: 強いて言うなら映画祭が始まったって事と、 導力シーシャが店から無くなってた事か……
jpnSearchText:
強いて言うなら映画祭が始まったって事と、
導力シーシャが店から無くなってた事か……

engChrName: Gahaha, I'm telling you, Tharbad's booming bigger than ever right now!
engSearchText:
Gahaha, I'm telling you, Tharbad's booming bigger
than ever right now!
jpnChrName: ハハハ、それにしてもサルバッドは いつに増して景気が良いな！
jpnSearchText:
ハハハ、それにしてもサルバッドは
いつに増して景気が良いな！

engChrName: I've got to get in on this while the getting's good and stock up on everything I can possibly get my hands on!
engSearchText:
I've got to get in on this while the getting's good and
stock up on everything I can possibly get my
hands on!
jpnChrName: とりあえず、この景気には乗りたいしな、 仕入れられるものは片っ端から仕入れよう！
jpnSearchText:
とりあえず、この景気には乗りたいしな、
仕入れられるものは片っ端から仕入れよう！

engChrName: Who cares if I go a little in the red right now? It'll work out! I can just tell I'll be able to recoup everything and then some! No prob!
engSearchText:
Who cares if I go a little in the red right now?
It'll work out! I can just tell I'll be able to recoup
everything and then some! No prob!
jpnChrName: 赤字になりそうだが、まあ何とかなる！ 今なら簡単に埋め合わせられる気がするぞい！
jpnSearchText:
赤字になりそうだが、まあ何とかなる！
今なら簡単に埋め合わせられる気がするぞい！

engChrName: There's another trader I know who lost his camel. It sounded like a real nightmare.
engSearchText:
There's another trader I know who lost his camel.
It sounded like a real nightmare.
jpnChrName: 他所の商人の方じゃラクダが いなくなって大変だったらしいな。
jpnSearchText:
他所の商人の方じゃラクダが
いなくなって大変だったらしいな。

engChrName: I've got to be careful so the same thing doesn't happen to me... Eh, cross that bridge if I come to it. For now, I'm taking a break.
engSearchText:
I've got to be careful so the same thing doesn't
happen to me... Eh, cross that bridge if I come to it.
For now, I'm taking a break.
jpnChrName: 俺も気をつけないとな…… まあ、とりあえず今は一息つくか。
jpnSearchText:
俺も気をつけないとな……
まあ、とりあえず今は一息つくか。

engChrName: You only live once. I bought one of those orbal hookahs that are so big right now. Might as well give it a whirl, right?
engSearchText:
You only live once. I bought one of those orbal
hookahs that are so big right now. Might as well give
it a whirl, right?
jpnChrName: せっかくだし、さっき買った流行りの 導力シーシャとやらを試してみようかね。
jpnSearchText:
せっかくだし、さっき買った流行りの
導力シーシャとやらを試してみようかね。

engChrName: Hmm... So this is what it tastes like. It's got its quirks, but it's not bad for what it is.
engSearchText:
Hmm... So this is what it tastes like. It's got its
quirks, but it's not bad for what it is.
jpnChrName: ふむ、これが導力シーシャか…… 多少のクセはともかく、悪くはない。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、これが導力シーシャか……
多少のクセはともかく、悪くはない。

engChrName: Stings my nose a little, but it sure wakes you up.
engSearchText: Stings my nose a little, but it sure wakes you up.
jpnChrName: 少し鼻にツンと来るが、 これはこれで目が醒めそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
少し鼻にツンと来るが、
これはこれで目が醒めそうだな。

engChrName: The fact I can smoke this while riding my camel or in the car is a real lifesaver as a traveling salesman, I'll tell you what.
engSearchText:
The fact I can smoke this while riding my camel or in
the car is a real lifesaver as a traveling salesman, I'll
tell you what.
jpnChrName: 何より、ラクダや車に乗ったまま吸えるのが、 旅商人としては助かるところだね。
jpnSearchText:
何より、ラクダや車に乗ったまま吸えるのが、
旅商人としては助かるところだね。

engChrName: Coming to this inn always relaxes me. The proprietress and I are pretty friendly, so she understands what I always like and need.
engSearchText:
Coming to this inn always relaxes me.
The proprietress and I are pretty friendly, so she
understands what I always like and need.
jpnChrName: この宿は何度来ても落ち着くな、 女将さんも顔馴染みだから気も利かせてくれる。
jpnSearchText:
この宿は何度来ても落ち着くな、
女将さんも顔馴染みだから気も利かせてくれる。

engChrName: Plus it's easy to park your camels outside. Stuff like that is what makes old inns a godsend to traders like me.
engSearchText:
Plus it's easy to park your camels outside. Stuff like
that is what makes old inns a godsend to traders
like me.
jpnChrName: ラクダも置きやすいし、昔ながらの 宿ってのは俺達交易商には有難いものだ。
jpnSearchText:
ラクダも置きやすいし、昔ながらの
宿ってのは俺達交易商には有難いものだ。

engChrName: Once I give Hala my little gift from home I brought with me, it'll be time to start talking business.
engSearchText:
Once I give Hala my little gift from home I brought
with me, it'll be time to start talking business.
jpnChrName: さて、ハーラさんに土産を渡したら、 張り切って商談に繰り出そうかね。
jpnSearchText:
さて、ハーラさんに土産を渡したら、
張り切って商談に繰り出そうかね。

engChrName: With all the places still lacking paved roads, even these days, there continues to be a place for traders like me who go around on camel.
engSearchText:
With all the places still lacking paved roads, even
these days, there continues to be a place for traders
like me who go around on camel.
jpnChrName: 道路が未整備な地も残っているしな、俺のように ラクダを使う交易商も、まだまだいるものでね。
jpnSearchText:
道路が未整備な地も残っているしな、俺のように
ラクダを使う交易商も、まだまだいるものでね。

engChrName: Those orbal hookahs I've been seeing must be REALLY new. I didn't see anything like them when I was in the city just last month.
engSearchText:
Those orbal hookahs I've been seeing must be
REALLY new. I didn't see anything like them when
I was in the city just last month.
jpnChrName: そういえば、街で先月は無かった 携帯式のシーシャを見かけたが……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、街で先月は無かった
携帯式のシーシャを見かけたが……

engChrName: I might have to get one and try it out. They look like something you could smoke even while on camelback, not just when you need a break.
engSearchText:
I might have to get one and try it out. They look like
something you could smoke even while on camelback,
not just when you need a break.
jpnChrName: あれならラクダに乗っていても吸えそうだな。 道中の息抜きに良さそうだし、試してみるか。
jpnSearchText:
あれならラクダに乗っていても吸えそうだな。
道中の息抜きに良さそうだし、試してみるか。

engChrName: The film festival is now upon us. After yesterday's disturbances, I still have my worries, but ultimately, it's a day I welcome.
engSearchText:
The film festival is now upon us. After yesterday's
disturbances, I still have my worries, but ultimately,
it's a day I welcome.
jpnChrName: いよいよ映画祭ですか、昨日の騒ぎもあり、 心配もありますがやはり歓迎したいものです。
jpnSearchText:
いよいよ映画祭ですか、昨日の騒ぎもあり、
心配もありますがやはり歓迎したいものです。

engChrName: After all, such cultural exchanges have fostered mutual understanding between people and long contributed greatly to Tharbad's development.
engSearchText:
After all, such cultural exchanges have fostered
mutual understanding between people and long
contributed greatly to Tharbad's development.
jpnChrName: 文化による相互理解は、この街の発展に 古くより貢献してきたものですしね。
jpnSearchText:
文化による相互理解は、この街の発展に
古くより貢献してきたものですしね。

engChrName: It is true that some people here worry about the festival's effects on our culture and ways of living. Nobody can deny that.
engSearchText:
It is true that some people here worry about the
festival's effects on our culture and ways of living.
Nobody can deny that.
jpnChrName: 無論、伝統への影響や生活の変容を心配する 方もいらっしゃる事は事実です。
jpnSearchText:
無論、伝統への影響や生活の変容を心配する
方もいらっしゃる事は事実です。

engChrName: It's our place as the temple to recognize those concerns and the communal balance, and address those things in a responsible manner.
engSearchText:
It's our place as the temple to recognize those
concerns and the communal balance, and address
those things in a responsible manner.
jpnChrName: そうした方々との理解や均衡も、私共で 責任を持って対応していく所存です。
jpnSearchText:
そうした方々との理解や均衡も、私共で
責任を持って対応していく所存です。

engChrName: Despite Tharbad being a lively entertainment destination for decades now, never in all my time have I seen such a tumult in the city.
engSearchText:
Despite Tharbad being a lively entertainment
destination for decades now, never in all my time
have I seen such a tumult in the city.
jpnChrName: ふむ、サルバッドが娯楽都市として発展して 久しいと言え、ここまでの騒ぎは初ですな……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、サルバッドが娯楽都市として発展して
久しいと言え、ここまでの騒ぎは初ですな……

engChrName: Many residents are understandably concerned about what's going on. I pray all this doesn't lead to any greater conflicts.
engSearchText:
Many residents are understandably concerned about
what's going on. I pray all this doesn't lead to any
greater conflicts.
jpnChrName: やはり不安に感じる方も多いようですが、 これを以て対立が深まる事は避けなければ。
jpnSearchText:
やはり不安に感じる方も多いようですが、
これを以て対立が深まる事は避けなければ。

engChrName: It's during times such as these that we must spread the spirit of tolerance and understanding that have served us so well.
engSearchText:
It's during times such as these that we must spread
the spirit of tolerance and understanding that have
served us so well.
jpnChrName: 私達が共有してきた寛容の精神も、 こういう時にこそ活かされるべきでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
私達が共有してきた寛容の精神も、
こういう時にこそ活かされるべきでしょう。

engChrName: Once the festival is over, I hope to be able to sit down with our politicians and business leaders to discuss the future of our city.
engSearchText:
Once the festival is over, I hope to be able to sit down
with our politicians and business leaders to discuss the
future of our city.
jpnChrName: 催しが終わったら私としても、市政や運営側と 今後の在り方について話を持ちたいところです。
jpnSearchText:
催しが終わったら私としても、市政や運営側と
今後の在り方について話を持ちたいところです。

engChrName: Our Cultural District isn't some sort of museum exhibit. It's home to many people, a place whose ways of living are precious to them.
engSearchText:
Our Cultural District isn't some sort of
museum exhibit. It's home to many people, a place
whose ways of living are precious to them.
jpnChrName: 伝統地区は見世物ではなく、慣れ親しんだ 生活を送る方々の居場所でもあります。
jpnSearchText:
伝統地区は見世物ではなく、慣れ親しんだ
生活を送る方々の居場所でもあります。

engChrName: Figuring out how to preserve and uphold those traditions while embracing modernization is always a constant balancing act we must deal with.
engSearchText:
Figuring out how to preserve and uphold those
traditions while embracing modernization is always a
constant balancing act we must deal with.
jpnChrName: それ故、如何にして伝統の護持と近代化を 均衡させるかは、常に横たわる課題でしてな。
jpnSearchText:
それ故、如何にして伝統の護持と近代化を
均衡させるかは、常に横たわる課題でしてな。

engChrName: This temple does its best to respond to people's concerns, and we therefore serve as something of a representative of the community.
engSearchText:
This temple does its best to respond to people's
concerns, and we therefore serve as something of a
representative of the community.
jpnChrName: そうした相談にも寺院として積極的に応じ、 彼らの代弁もさせて頂く事もあります。
jpnSearchText:
そうした相談にも寺院として積極的に応じ、
彼らの代弁もさせて頂く事もあります。

engChrName: Central Eastern temples are institutions of tolerance, at heart. We always strive to promote mutual understanding among one another.
engSearchText:
Central Eastern temples are institutions of tolerance,
at heart. We always strive to promote mutual
understanding among one another.
jpnChrName: 中東寺院は本来、寛容を是とするもの。 互いの理解のため、力を尽くしております。
jpnSearchText:
中東寺院は本来、寛容を是とするもの。
互いの理解のため、力を尽くしております。

engChrName: Tharbad used to be a trading hub, first and foremost. But in the past two decades, it's rapidly developed into a city for recreation.
engSearchText:
Tharbad used to be a trading hub, first and foremost.
But in the past two decades, it's rapidly developed
into a city for recreation.
jpnChrName: このサルバッドは元より交易の要衝でしたが、 この２０年で娯楽都市として急速に発展しました。
jpnSearchText:
このサルバッドは元より交易の要衝でしたが、
この２０年で娯楽都市として急速に発展しました。

engChrName: As a result, there are naturally a number of citizens who feel concerned that Tharbad is losing sight of its original culture.
engSearchText:
As a result, there are naturally a number of citizens
who feel concerned that Tharbad is losing sight of its
original culture.
jpnChrName: そのため、伝統が失われないかを不安視する 方もやはりいらっしゃるものでしてな。
jpnSearchText:
そのため、伝統が失われないかを不安視する
方もやはりいらっしゃるものでしてな。

engChrName: I do my best to take their thoughts and feelings into consideration in talking to people so that, together, we can make Tharbad even better.
engSearchText:
I do my best to take their thoughts and feelings into
consideration in talking to people so that, together,
we can make Tharbad even better.
jpnChrName: そうした方々の意見も汲みつつ、 より良い街にするため話し合っております。
jpnSearchText:
そうした方々の意見も汲みつつ、
より良い街にするため話し合っております。

engChrName: Welcome, everyone. This is a place of worship for Arusha, the Winged Goddess.
engSearchText:
Welcome, everyone. This is a place of worship for
Arusha, the Winged Goddess.
jpnChrName: “翼の女神（アルーシャ）”を拝する場へ ようこそいらっしゃいましたな、皆様方。
jpnSearchText:
“翼の女神（アルーシャ）”を拝する場へ
ようこそいらっしゃいましたな、皆様方。

engChrName: Many tourists these days wander into our temple out of curiosity. I hope your visit today offers some insight into our culture.
engSearchText:
Many tourists these days wander into our temple out
of curiosity. I hope your visit today offers some
insight into our culture.
jpnChrName: 昨今は物珍しさで訪れる観光客も多いですが、 今一度私達の文化を知る機会になれば。
jpnSearchText:
昨今は物珍しさで訪れる観光客も多いですが、
今一度私達の文化を知る機会になれば。

engChrName: As a scholar of Septian law, I spare no effort when it comes to spreading knowledge of the Testaments to the people.
engSearchText:
As a scholar of Septian law, I spare no effort when it
comes to spreading knowledge of the Testaments to
the people.
jpnChrName: 私も七耀法学者の一人、衆人に聖典の知恵を 授ける事には何も惜しまぬつもりです。
jpnSearchText:
私も七耀法学者の一人、衆人に聖典の知恵を
授ける事には何も惜しまぬつもりです。

engChrName: In the harsh deserts of the Central East, we all help one another, so it's only natural for people to share their beliefs in the spirit of tolerance.
engSearchText:
In the harsh deserts of the Central East, we all help
one another, so it's only natural for people to share
their beliefs in the spirit of tolerance.
jpnChrName: 中東では砂漠の厳しい環境で助け合うため、 寛容を以て信仰と知恵を共有するものでしてな。
jpnSearchText:
中東では砂漠の厳しい環境で助け合うため、
寛容を以て信仰と知恵を共有するものでしてな。

engChrName: That spirit matters more than ever as contact with the western lands increases and our daily lives here continue to change and evolve.
engSearchText:
That spirit matters more than ever as contact with the
western lands increases and our daily lives here
continue to change and evolve.
jpnChrName: 西方との交流が増え、生活も変わりつつある 今こそ、そうした精神は一層活きる事でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
西方との交流が増え、生活も変わりつつある
今こそ、そうした精神は一層活きる事でしょう。

engChrName: I'm confident that the knowledge and teachings we have come to embrace here will prove helpful to westerners such as yourselves as well.
engSearchText:
I'm confident that the knowledge and teachings we
have come to embrace here will prove helpful to
westerners such as yourselves as well.
jpnChrName: 私達が共有してきた知恵や教訓は、西方の方々の お役に立てる事もきっとあるはずです。
jpnSearchText:
私達が共有してきた知恵や教訓は、西方の方々の
お役に立てる事もきっとあるはずです。

engChrName: The trouble from yesterday seems to have died down, so I've told the children it's okay to go outside, especially since it's festival day.
engSearchText:
The trouble from yesterday seems to have died down,
so I've told the children it's okay to go outside,
especially since it's festival day.
jpnChrName: 昨日よりは騒ぎも減り、何より映画祭当日なので 子供たちにも外で遊んで良いと呼びかけました。
jpnSearchText:
昨日よりは騒ぎも減り、何より映画祭当日なので
子供たちにも外で遊んで良いと呼びかけました。

engChrName: That said, with all these crowds around, they should still only walk around the festival if they have a guardian accompanying them.
engSearchText:
That said, with all these crowds around, they should
still only walk around the festival if they have a
guardian accompanying them.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、この人混みですし親御さんと一緒に 周る事が前提ではありますが。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、この人混みですし親御さんと一緒に
周る事が前提ではありますが。

engChrName: Still, the film festival is a wonderful opportunity for them. It's important for them to get to have all sorts of experiences.
engSearchText:
Still, the film festival is a wonderful opportunity
for them. It's important for them to get to have all
sorts of experiences.
jpnChrName: 貴重な映画祭という機会ですしね、子供たちが 多様な経験をする場も大切にするべきかと。
jpnSearchText:
貴重な映画祭という機会ですしね、子供たちが
多様な経験をする場も大切にするべきかと。

engChrName: I just had a talk with Father Mukhtar about how we should keep the children safe, seeing as there's so much trouble today.
engSearchText:
I just had a talk with Father Mukhtar about how we
should keep the children safe, seeing as there's so
much trouble today.
jpnChrName: 今朝は特に騒ぎが多いので、子供たちの 安全について教区長とも相談したところでして。
jpnSearchText:
今朝は特に騒ぎが多いので、子供たちの
安全について教区長とも相談したところでして。

engChrName: It could be really dangerous if any of them get lost out there, which is why I'm telling them they shouldn't walk by themselves.
engSearchText:
It could be really dangerous if any of them get lost out
there, which is why I'm telling them they shouldn't
walk by themselves.
jpnChrName: 迷子などの危険もあるので、子供たちになるべく 一人で歩かないよう呼び掛けております。
jpnSearchText:
迷子などの危険もあるので、子供たちになるべく
一人で歩かないよう呼び掛けております。

engChrName: For those parents who are too busy to look after them today, we're also happy to take their children in and look after them, if need be.
engSearchText:
For those parents who are too busy to look after them
today, we're also happy to take their children in and
look after them, if need be.
jpnChrName: 特に、親御さんが忙しい方などは寺院で 責任を持って預かっているところです。
jpnSearchText:
特に、親御さんが忙しい方などは寺院で
責任を持って預かっているところです。

engChrName: It makes me so happy to see little Clim take an interest in our folklore. It's been a pleasure to teach him about it.
engSearchText:
It makes me so happy to see little Clim take an
interest in our folklore. It's been a pleasure to teach
him about it.
jpnChrName: ふふ、クリム君も興味を持ってくれて 私としても教え甲斐がありますね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、クリム君も興味を持ってくれて
私としても教え甲斐がありますね。

engChrName: Some of our congregants have expressed concern that people are beginning to forget the moral teachings behind such stories.
engSearchText:
Some of our congregants have expressed concern
that people are beginning to forget the moral
teachings behind such stories.
jpnChrName: 最近では、伝承の教訓が忘れられないか 心配する方もいらっしゃいますが……
jpnSearchText:
最近では、伝承の教訓が忘れられないか
心配する方もいらっしゃいますが……

engChrName: But all you need see is a child listening and enjoying those stories innocently to know that hope is by no means lost.
engSearchText:
But all you need see is a child listening and enjoying
those stories innocently to know that hope is by no
means lost.
jpnChrName: こうして純粋に聞いてくれる子を見ると 安心できるものですね。
jpnSearchText:
こうして純粋に聞いてくれる子を見ると
安心できるものですね。

engChrName: Welcome to our temple. Truth be told, we've had some rather temperamental tourists cross our doors recently.
engSearchText:
Welcome to our temple. Truth be told, we've had
some rather temperamental tourists cross our
doors recently.
jpnChrName: 私達の寺院へようこそ。 近頃は粗暴な観光客も見られますが……
jpnSearchText:
私達の寺院へようこそ。
近頃は粗暴な観光客も見られますが……

engChrName: However, I can tell that none of you are here to cause trouble, and am more than happy to have you here.
engSearchText:
However, I can tell that none of you are here to cause
trouble, and am more than happy to have you here.
jpnChrName: 皆様の様な方々でしたら歓迎いたします。
jpnSearchText: 皆様の様な方々でしたら歓迎いたします。

engChrName: Central Eastern temples are meant to be places of tolerance, which is why we've always opened our doors in the spirit of understanding.
engSearchText:
Central Eastern temples are meant to be places of
tolerance, which is why we've always opened our
doors in the spirit of understanding.
jpnChrName: 本来中東寺院は寛容を是とするもの、 当寺院も相互理解のため解放しておりました故。
jpnSearchText:
本来中東寺院は寛容を是とするもの、
当寺院も相互理解のため解放しておりました故。

engChrName: Unfortunately, we've recently been seeing so many unruly tourists here. When things get too out of hand, sadly, I do ask them to leave.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, we've recently been seeing so many
unruly tourists here. When things get too out of
hand, sadly, I do ask them to leave.
jpnChrName: ですが最近は……目に余る不埒な観光客も増え、 度が過ぎる場合は退出していただいています。
jpnSearchText:
ですが最近は……目に余る不埒な観光客も増え、
度が過ぎる場合は退出していただいています。

engChrName: Would you all happen to be interested in the Central East's unique folklore, by any chance? It's quite a rich storytelling tradition.
engSearchText:
Would you all happen to be interested in the Central
East's unique folklore, by any chance? It's quite a rich
storytelling tradition.
jpnChrName: そういえば、中東には独自の言い伝えも 多いのですが、興味はおありですか？
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、中東には独自の言い伝えも
多いのですが、興味はおありですか？

engChrName: I teach those stories to the local children during Sunday School, but I think they have plenty to offer for visitors from other regions.
engSearchText:
I teach those stories to the local children during
Sunday School, but I think they have plenty to offer
for visitors from other regions.
jpnChrName: 日曜学校では地元の子らに教えておりますが、 他の地の方にも知っていただければ良いなと。
jpnSearchText:
日曜学校では地元の子らに教えておりますが、
他の地の方にも知っていただければ良いなと。

engChrName: Sadly, not many children from outside of Tharbad show much interest in learning about them, which is a shame.
engSearchText:
Sadly, not many children from outside of Tharbad
show much interest in learning about them, which is
a shame.
jpnChrName: ですが、なかなか観光客のお子さんが興味を 示してくださるのも珍しいのですよね。
jpnSearchText:
ですが、なかなか観光客のお子さんが興味を
示してくださるのも珍しいのですよね。

engChrName: I have to wonder what all that crazy fervor going on earlier was.
engSearchText:
I have to wonder what all that crazy fervor going on
earlier was.
jpnChrName: 昨日までの乱れた空気、 結局何が原因だったのでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
昨日までの乱れた空気、
結局何が原因だったのでしょうか？

engChrName: It must not have had anything to do with the festival itself, because things are definitely calmer than they were yesterday.
engSearchText:
It must not have had anything to do with the festival
itself, because things are definitely calmer than they
were yesterday.
jpnChrName: 当日なのに昨日より落ち着いている以上、 映画祭のせいではないようですが……
jpnSearchText:
当日なのに昨日より落ち着いている以上、
映画祭のせいではないようですが……

engChrName: I guess I shouldn't have jumped to conclusions and pinned the blame on the festival, but...the whole thing is still very odd.
engSearchText:
I guess I shouldn't have jumped to conclusions and
pinned the blame on the festival, but...the whole
thing is still very odd.
jpnChrName: まあ、その意味では映画祭を悪く思ったのは 申し訳ないですが……やはり少し不気味です。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、その意味では映画祭を悪く思ったのは
申し訳ないですが……やはり少し不気味です。

engChrName: Everybody's getting all worked up about the festival, but I don't get what all the excitement's about.
engSearchText:
Everybody's getting all worked up about the festival,
but I don't get what all the excitement's about.
jpnChrName: 映画祭で賑わっているけど正直、 馴染みのない私にはピンとこないです。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭で賑わっているけど正直、
馴染みのない私にはピンとこないです。

engChrName: Could it really be all that great? Maybe it's just because I don't really know all that much about films. It's hard to say.
engSearchText:
Could it really be all that great? Maybe it's just
because I don't really know all that much about films.
It's hard to say.
jpnChrName: 同世代の子達は結構楽しみにしている みたいですが……そんなに良い物なんですか？
jpnSearchText:
同世代の子達は結構楽しみにしている
みたいですが……そんなに良い物なんですか？

engChrName: I've kept my distance from them up until now, but maybe I should try watching one and see if I can figure anything out.
engSearchText:
I've kept my distance from them up until now, but
maybe I should try watching one and see if I can
figure anything out.
jpnChrName: 今までは敬遠していましたが……この機に何か 知れたら、試しに見た方が良いのですかね？
jpnSearchText:
今までは敬遠していましたが……この機に何か
知れたら、試しに見た方が良いのですかね？

engChrName: Ugh, tourists these days have no respect for what they're visiting.
engSearchText:
Ugh, tourists these days have no respect for what
they're visiting.
jpnChrName: はぁ……それにしても最近の 観光客は本当に無節操ですよね。
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……それにしても最近の
観光客は本当に無節操ですよね。

engChrName: Tharbad isn't just some theme park that exists for their enjoyment! It's a place where people live, and they want to live here in peace.
engSearchText:
Tharbad isn't just some theme park that exists for
their enjoyment! It's a place where people live, and
they want to live here in peace.
jpnChrName: サルバッドはただの観光地じゃなくて、 私達が安心して暮らす場所のはず。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドはただの観光地じゃなくて、
私達が安心して暮らす場所のはず。

engChrName: Don't get me wrong. I'm happy to see that kid take an interest in our culture! I just wish more people were like him. *sigh*
engSearchText:
Don't get me wrong. I'm happy to see that kid take
an interest in our culture! I just wish more people
were like him. *sigh*
jpnChrName: あの子のように、私達の文化に関心を 持ってくれる人は歓迎したいですけど……
jpnSearchText:
あの子のように、私達の文化に関心を
持ってくれる人は歓迎したいですけど……

engChrName: To be fair, I think there are lots of local people my age that have been drawn in by all the glitz and glamor of the Entertainment District.
engSearchText:
To be fair, I think there are lots of local people my
age that have been drawn in by all the glitz and
glamor of the Entertainment District.
jpnChrName: 歓楽街の雰囲気に影響されている 同年代の子たちも多いけど……
jpnSearchText:
歓楽街の雰囲気に影響されている
同年代の子たちも多いけど……

engChrName: But deep down, I think a lot of them still value our traditions and culture, even if they won't say it out loud.
engSearchText:
But deep down, I think a lot of them still value our
traditions and culture, even if they won't say it
out loud.
jpnChrName: 口にしないだけで内心、伝統を大切に したいという人も多いと思います。
jpnSearchText:
口にしないだけで内心、伝統を大切に
したいという人も多いと思います。

engChrName: I know that because they all still come down here to the temple on holidays and pray with the elders.
engSearchText:
I know that because they all still come down here to
the temple on holidays and pray with the elders.
jpnChrName: 少なくとも祝祭日には皆もこの寺院に来て、 お年寄りたちと一緒に祈りますし。
jpnSearchText:
少なくとも祝祭日には皆もこの寺院に来て、
お年寄りたちと一緒に祈りますし。

engChrName: That's why I think this place is so important and I'm glad to have it. It's preserving those traditional values so they don't get lost.
engSearchText:
That's why I think this place is so important and I'm
glad to have it. It's preserving those traditional values
so they don't get lost.
jpnChrName: そういう意味でも、伝統の価値を 守ってくれる寺院は本当に有難くて……
jpnSearchText:
そういう意味でも、伝統の価値を
守ってくれる寺院は本当に有難くて……

engChrName: Heading into the hamam? Admission's on the house. Least I can do for saving my whole business.
engSearchText:
Heading into the hamam? Admission's on
the house. Least I can do for saving my
whole business.
jpnChrName: ハマムに入っていくかね？ 恩人の君たちは無料にしておくよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハマムに入っていくかね？
恩人の君たちは無料にしておくよ。

engChrName: I... I can't believe His Highness would grace our humble hamam with his presence!
engSearchText:
I... I can't believe His Highness would grace our
humble hamam with his presence!
jpnChrName: まさか、殿下がうちのハマムに いらっしゃる事になるとは……
jpnSearchText:
まさか、殿下がうちのハマムに
いらっしゃる事になるとは……

engChrName: I heard he was an affable guy, and he is. But it's hard not to get nervous serving someone with such a high profile, you know?
engSearchText:
I heard he was an affable guy, and he is. But it's hard
not to get nervous serving someone with such a high
profile, you know?
jpnChrName: 親しみやすい方と聞いているが…… いざいらっしゃると、緊張するものだね……
jpnSearchText:
親しみやすい方と聞いているが……
いざいらっしゃると、緊張するものだね……

engChrName: I've got to make sure everything's running perfectly so he enjoys his visit! Can't have anything embarrassing happen while he's here!
engSearchText:
I've got to make sure everything's running perfectly
so he enjoys his visit! Can't have anything embarrassing
happen while he's here!
jpnChrName: 先日の水枯れのような醜態を見せぬよう、 しっかり管理して楽しんでいただかねば。
jpnSearchText:
先日の水枯れのような醜態を見せぬよう、
しっかり管理して楽しんでいただかねば。

engChrName: Compared to yesterday, our customers seem a lot more calm now. Really, the whole city is. What was going on before, I wonder?
engSearchText:
Compared to yesterday, our customers seem a lot
more calm now. Really, the whole city is. What was
going on before, I wonder?
jpnChrName: しかし、昨日に比べて街の様子もうちの客も 落ち着いているが……結局何だったんだ？
jpnSearchText:
しかし、昨日に比べて街の様子もうちの客も
落ち着いているが……結局何だったんだ？

engChrName: I haven't seen those orbal hookahs, either. I heard they were laced with something and that was the cause of all that chaos.
engSearchText:
I haven't seen those orbal hookahs, either. I heard
they were laced with something and that was the
cause of all that chaos.
jpnChrName: 今朝から見なくなったシーシャに何か混ざってた からだって噂もあるけど本当なのかい？
jpnSearchText:
今朝から見なくなったシーシャに何か混ざってた
からだって噂もあるけど本当なのかい？

engChrName: Anyway, if that's the case, why not take a break here? Flush out all that bad stuff by working up a little sweat!
engSearchText:
Anyway, if that's the case, why not take a break here?
Flush out all that bad stuff by working up a
little sweat!
jpnChrName: まあ、そういう事ならハマムで休むのも良いかもな。 汗と一緒に悪いモノを流していくのも一つの手さ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、そういう事ならハマムで休むのも良いかもな。
汗と一緒に悪いモノを流していくのも一つの手さ。

engChrName: I've never seen this much excitement in the city, even after it started taking off 20 years ago. The hamam never has this many customers!
engSearchText:
I've never seen this much excitement in the city, even
after it started taking off 20 years ago. The hamam
never has this many customers!
jpnChrName: ここまでの賑わいはこの２０年で初めてだ、 うちのハマムも稀に見る客入りっぷりだよ。
jpnSearchText:
ここまでの賑わいはこの２０年で初めてだ、
うちのハマムも稀に見る客入りっぷりだよ。

engChrName: It's not all fun and games, though. I've heard a lot of tourists are letting their hair down a bit TOO much and going off the rails.
engSearchText:
It's not all fun and games, though. I've heard a lot of
tourists are letting their hair down a bit TOO much
and going off the rails.
jpnChrName: だが、羽目を外し過ぎた無節操な客も やたら多いって聞くしな。
jpnSearchText:
だが、羽目を外し過ぎた無節操な客も
やたら多いって聞くしな。

engChrName: We're definitely having to keep a close eye to make sure nobody tries to peep on others or steal things from the changing rooms.
engSearchText:
We're definitely having to keep a close eye to make
sure nobody tries to peep on others or steal things
from the changing rooms.
jpnChrName: うちでも、覗きや更衣室での盗みが 無いかしっかり注意しないとな。
jpnSearchText:
うちでも、覗きや更衣室での盗みが
無いかしっかり注意しないとな。

engChrName: Thanks for getting the water back and running again, everyone. Feel free to relax here as long as you all like.
engSearchText:
Thanks for getting the water back and running
again, everyone. Feel free to relax here as long as you
all like.
jpnChrName: お陰でハマムが復活した、ありがとう。 改めて寛いでいってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
お陰でハマムが復活した、ありがとう。
改めて寛いでいってくれ。

engChrName: In fact, I know you only asked for one free bath, but you can use these facilities as much as you like. I heard how much trouble it was!
engSearchText:
In fact, I know you only asked for one free bath, but
you can use these facilities as much as you like.
I heard how much trouble it was!
jpnChrName: なかなか大変だったみたいだし、１回なんて言わず 滞在中は何度でも無料で入ってくれて構わないよ。
jpnSearchText:
なかなか大変だったみたいだし、１回なんて言わず
滞在中は何度でも無料で入ってくれて構わないよ。

engChrName: It's become easy to take our water for granted nowadays, even though we're in the middle of a desert.
engSearchText:
It's become easy to take our water for granted
nowadays, even though we're in the middle of
a desert.
jpnChrName: しかし、いつの間にか水があるのを 当たり前と思っていたが……
jpnSearchText:
しかし、いつの間にか水があるのを
当たり前と思っていたが……

engChrName: But before the professor and the Verne Company came through with the waterworks project, sometimes we went bone dry out here.
engSearchText:
But before the professor and the Verne Company
came through with the waterworks project,
sometimes we went bone dry out here.
jpnChrName: あの先生とヴェルヌ社が治水工事をしてくれる 前は水枯れもたまにはあったんだよな。
jpnSearchText:
あの先生とヴェルヌ社が治水工事をしてくれる
前は水枯れもたまにはあったんだよな。

engChrName: We've been blessed with so much water for 20 years, I was beginning to forget what a miracle that whole system really is.
engSearchText:
We've been blessed with so much water for 20 years, I
was beginning to forget what a miracle that whole
system really is.
jpnChrName: ２０年も水が豊かな事に慣れてて、 危うく感謝を忘れかけていたよ……
jpnSearchText:
２０年も水が豊かな事に慣れてて、
危うく感謝を忘れかけていたよ……

engChrName: I'm sorry to trouble you, but if you could get to the bottom of this and get the water flowing again, I'd really appreciate it.
engSearchText:
I'm sorry to trouble you, but if you could get
to the bottom of this and get the water flowing
again, I'd really appreciate it.
jpnChrName: それでは、申し訳ないが水枯れの 原因をどうか突き止めてくれ……
jpnSearchText:
それでは、申し訳ないが水枯れの
原因をどうか突き止めてくれ……

engChrName: I can't tell you just how important the hamam is, not just to us, of course, but to everyone living in the Cultural District.
engSearchText:
I can't tell you just how important the hamam is,
not just to us, of course, but to everyone living in the
Cultural District.
jpnChrName: このハマムは俺達にとって、この伝統地区の 住民にとっても大切な場所なんだ。
jpnSearchText:
このハマムは俺達にとって、この伝統地区の
住民にとっても大切な場所なんだ。

engChrName: It was nice of the prince to invite us here. Finally got to take a load off my shoulders for a little bit.
engSearchText:
It was nice of the prince to invite us here. Finally got
to take a load off my shoulders for a little bit.
jpnChrName: ふふ、殿下にお招きいただいたおかげで いい感じに身体を解せたわ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、殿下にお招きいただいたおかげで
いい感じに身体を解せたわ。

engChrName: We're all ready for the parade on our end. So until things kick off, I'm going to take it nice and slow. Save my stamina for what's to come.
engSearchText:
We're all ready for the parade on our end. So until
things kick off, I'm going to take it nice and slow.
Save my stamina for what's to come.
jpnChrName: 一応、一通りの準備は済ませた事だし 今は体力を温存しないと、ね。
jpnSearchText:
一応、一通りの準備は済ませた事だし
今は体力を温存しないと、ね。

engChrName: It's so important to relax when you can. That soak in the baths really helped me soothe my mind and body.
engSearchText:
It's so important to relax when you can. That soak in
the baths really helped me soothe my mind and body.
jpnChrName: お陰様で心身を休める事が出来ました。 リラックスは大切ですしね。
jpnSearchText:
お陰様で心身を休める事が出来ました。
リラックスは大切ですしね。

engChrName: I just hope that Shaheena's not too nervous going into this parade. It's a lot to have foisted onto her all of a sudden...
engSearchText:
I just hope that Shaheena's not too nervous going
into this parade. It's a lot to have foisted onto her all
of a sudden...
jpnChrName: シャヒーナちゃんも、しっかり心を 落ち着けて臨んでくれるといいんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
シャヒーナちゃんも、しっかり心を
落ち着けて臨んでくれるといいんですけど……

engChrName: No, I have to believe in her. In fact, I do! Judith and I both know she can do it. Everything's going to be just fine!
engSearchText:
No, I have to believe in her. In fact, I do! Judith and I
both know she can do it. Everything's going to be
just fine!
jpnChrName: いえ、きっと大丈夫です。 私も先輩もあの子を信じていますから。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、きっと大丈夫です。
私も先輩もあの子を信じていますから。

engChrName: That was quite the intense match we had in there! Such moments like that are why I love bathhouses such as this.
engSearchText:
That was quite the intense match we had in there!
Such moments like that are why I love bathhouses
such as this.
jpnChrName: ふふ、なかなか熱い勝負だったね…… やはり風呂というのは良いものだよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、なかなか熱い勝負だったね……
やはり風呂というのは良いものだよ。

engChrName: Being among your peers in the buff, and competing like that, you learn a lot about each other as men.
engSearchText:
Being among your peers in the buff, and competing
like that, you learn a lot about each other as men.
jpnChrName: 裸の付き合いとは言うが、勝負をしてみれば それはそれで色々と曝け出せるものだしね。
jpnSearchText:
裸の付き合いとは言うが、勝負をしてみれば
それはそれで色々と曝け出せるものだしね。

engChrName: Oh, I learned a lot about you two, all right. Especially just how much the old fart here is getting on in years.
engSearchText:
Oh, I learned a lot about you two, all right.
Especially just how much the old fart here is getting
on in years.
jpnChrName: クク、確かに暑い勝負だったぜ、物理的にな。 このおっさんも、老化を曝け出しちまったし。
jpnSearchText:
クク、確かに暑い勝負だったぜ、物理的にな。
このおっさんも、老化を曝け出しちまったし。

engChrName: Yeah, yeah, laugh it up. Just remember, we're only five years apart. You'll be right in my shoes before you know it.
engSearchText:
Yeah, yeah, laugh it up. Just remember, we're only
five years apart. You'll be right in my shoes before you
know it.
jpnChrName: アーロン……言っておくが、 お前もあと５年でああなるんだからな？
jpnSearchText:
アーロン……言っておくが、
お前もあと５年でああなるんだからな？

engChrName: Do I even want to know what you three got up to in there?
engSearchText:
Do I even want to know what you three got up to
in there?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん達……本当に何をしていたんですか……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん達……本当に何をしていたんですか……

engChrName: Whatever was going on, we could certainly hear your voices on the other side and it all sounded rather...colorful.
engSearchText:
Whatever was going on, we could certainly hear your
voices on the other side and it all sounded
rather...colorful.
jpnChrName: 一応、女湯まで変な声が聞こえていた事は 報告しておきますね。
jpnSearchText:
一応、女湯まで変な声が聞こえていた事は
報告しておきますね。

engChrName: Haha! Forgive our tomfoolery. That said, your whole group seems rather jovial, Van, even more than I initially surmised.
engSearchText:
Haha! Forgive our tomfoolery. That said, your whole
group seems rather jovial, Van, even more than I
initially surmised.
jpnChrName: ふふ……やはり君達は女性陣も含めて 実に愉快な一行だ、思っていた以上にね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……やはり君達は女性陣も含めて
実に愉快な一行だ、思っていた以上にね。

engChrName: Once these festivities are over, and the case is truly behind us, I'd love to do this again. Not for business, purely for pleasure.
engSearchText:
Once these festivities are over, and the case is truly
behind us, I'd love to do this again. Not for business,
purely for pleasure.
jpnChrName: 目下の祭典が無事に終わり、事件も区切りが付いたら 改めて個人的に招待したいものだ。
jpnSearchText:
目下の祭典が無事に終わり、事件も区切りが付いたら
改めて個人的に招待したいものだ。

engChrName: Glad you enjoyed our company, Your Highness. Means a lot, comin' from a man of your stature.
engSearchText:
Glad you enjoyed our company, Your Highness.
Means a lot, comin' from a man of your stature.
jpnChrName: まあ、殿下にそういっていただけるのは 俺としても有難い限りではありますがね……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、殿下にそういっていただけるのは
俺としても有難い限りではありますがね……

engChrName: But if we're gonna have any more competitions, can it wait until I've trained up a little? I don't wanna lose to this punkass again.
engSearchText:
But if we're gonna have any more competitions, can it
wait until I've trained up a little? I don't wanna lose to
this punkass again.
jpnChrName: 流石に次に勝負する時は、このガキに勝てる程度には 体を慣らしてきてからにさせてもらいますよ。
jpnSearchText:
流石に次に勝負する時は、このガキに勝てる程度には
体を慣らしてきてからにさせてもらいますよ。

engChrName: Somebody's a sore loser, huh? Accept your fate already, old fart. Your time has come... and goooooone.
engSearchText:
Somebody's a sore loser, huh? Accept your fate
already, old fart. Your time has come...
and goooooone.
jpnChrName: クク、大人気ねぇなァ？　素直に年代の 差ってのを認めろや？
jpnSearchText:
クク、大人気ねぇなァ？　素直に年代の
差ってのを認めろや？

engChrName: Hahaha! Very well! I'll hold off on any more competitions until I've trained as well. But it is in the cards now! Remember that!
engSearchText:
Hahaha! Very well! I'll hold off on any more
competitions until I've trained as well. But it is in the
cards now! Remember that!
jpnChrName: はは、それまでには僕の方も鍛え直しておくよ。 まあ、機会があればまた勝負と行こうじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
はは、それまでには僕の方も鍛え直しておくよ。
まあ、機会があればまた勝負と行こうじゃないか。

engChrName: Now that I've worked up a decent sweat in those baths, it's time to turn my attention back towards the film festival in earnest.
engSearchText:
Now that I've worked up a decent sweat in those
baths, it's time to turn my attention back towards the
film festival in earnest.
jpnChrName: さて、ひと汗かいたところで、ここからは 一応真面目に映画祭を見届けないとね。
jpnSearchText:
さて、ひと汗かいたところで、ここからは
一応真面目に映画祭を見届けないとね。

engChrName: I am here on behalf of my father, after all. It's my responsibility to see this event through, especially in light of what's transpired.
engSearchText:
I am here on behalf of my father, after all. It's my
responsibility to see this event through, especially in
light of what's transpired.
jpnChrName: 一応、父上の代理で来ている身だ、 事件があった事も含め責任を持って見届けよう。
jpnSearchText:
一応、父上の代理で来ている身だ、
事件があった事も含め責任を持って見届けよう。

engChrName: Luckily, my head feels so clear now that I'm confident I can give my speech completely off the cuff. I won't need any script to back me up.
engSearchText:
Luckily, my head feels so clear now that I'm
confident I can give my speech completely off
the cuff. I won't need any script to back me up.
jpnChrName: ハマムのお陰で頭もすっきりしたしな、 スピーチも原稿なしで問題無くいけそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
ハマムのお陰で頭もすっきりしたしな、
スピーチも原稿なしで問題無くいけそうだ。

engChrName: *sigh* We could hear His Highness loud and clear, all the way on the women's side.
engSearchText:
*sigh* We could hear His Highness loud and clear, all
the way on the women's side.
jpnChrName: まったく、殿下の声は女湯にまで 響いていましたが……
jpnSearchText:
まったく、殿下の声は女湯にまで
響いていましたが……

engChrName: You can, and should, tell the prince off when he starts to get out of hand in such situations as that. You have my permission, in fact.
engSearchText:
You can, and should, tell the prince off when he starts
to get out of hand in such situations as that. You have
my permission, in fact.
jpnChrName: あなた達も、殿下が何か羽目を外していたら 多少厳しく言って頂いても構いませんので。
jpnSearchText:
あなた達も、殿下が何か羽目を外していたら
多少厳しく言って頂いても構いませんので。

engChrName: Doing so will not offend the royal family. If anything, he could stand to be more disciplined, like the prince of Erebonia is said to be.
engSearchText:
Doing so will not offend the royal family. If anything,
he could stand to be more disciplined, like the prince
of Erebonia is said to be.
jpnChrName: 不敬罪などにはなりませんし、帝国の皇子は もっと手厳しくされていたと聞きますので。
jpnSearchText:
不敬罪などにはなりませんし、帝国の皇子は
もっと手厳しくされていたと聞きますので。

engChrName: I know it's not gonna mean much comin' from me after all that, but...you never catch a break, do you? Must be hard, lookin' after him.
engSearchText:
I know it's not gonna mean much comin' from me
after all that, but...you never catch a break, do you?
Must be hard, lookin' after him.
jpnChrName: 何ていうか、殿下の提案に乗っちまった自分が 言うのもなんだが……色々苦労しているみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
何ていうか、殿下の提案に乗っちまった自分が
言うのもなんだが……色々苦労しているみたいだな。

engChrName: Oh, no. It's all part of my job as his bodyguard. If anything, I consider it an honor to be able to serve someone as unique as His Highness.
engSearchText:
Oh, no. It's all part of my job as his bodyguard.
If anything, I consider it an honor to be able to serve
someone as unique as His Highness.
jpnChrName: いえ、それも守護職の役目ですし、このような 個性的な方を守護できることはむしろ光栄かと。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、それも守護職の役目ですし、このような
個性的な方を守護できることはむしろ光栄かと。

engChrName: If you say so. Still looks like a tough job to me.
engSearchText: If you say so. Still looks like a tough job to me.
jpnChrName: まあ、あんたがそういってくれるなら良いが……
jpnSearchText: まあ、あんたがそういってくれるなら良いが……

engChrName: You know, Naje was pretty quiet while we were all in the baths together.
engSearchText:
You know, Naje was pretty quiet while we were all in
the baths together.
jpnChrName: それにしても、女湯の方ではナージェさんは あまり話に入って来ませんでしたけど……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、女湯の方ではナージェさんは
あまり話に入って来ませんでしたけど……

engChrName: But she looked amazing! Holy smokes! Her body's unbelievable!
engSearchText:
But she looked amazing! Holy smokes! Her
body's unbelievable!
jpnChrName: ナージェさんも結構、身体の方が凄かったですよね！
jpnSearchText: ナージェさんも結構、身体の方が凄かったですよね！

engChrName: Oh, yeah? You're telling me there's more than meets the eye underneath that trim suit of hers?
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah? You're telling me there's more than meets
the eye underneath that trim suit of hers?
jpnChrName: ほう、武骨な黒服の下に隠れた ふくよかな魅惑の肢体ってか？
jpnSearchText:
ほう、武骨な黒服の下に隠れた
ふくよかな魅惑の肢体ってか？

engChrName: 'Cause now that you mention it, I can certainly believe it.
engSearchText:
'Cause now that you mention it, I can certainly
believe it.
jpnChrName: クク、それもなかなか想像してみりゃあ……
jpnSearchText: クク、それもなかなか想像してみりゃあ……

engChrName: Indeed. I myself was quite impressed with her musculature, seeing it up close.
engSearchText:
Indeed. I myself was quite impressed with her
musculature, seeing it up close.
jpnChrName: ええ、私も間近で見て感心致しました。 ナージェ様の……筋肉。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、私も間近で見て感心致しました。
ナージェ様の……筋肉。

engChrName: You would not know it otherwise, but she clearly maintains an extensive routine. She was taut as a bow-string, with no slack at any point.
engSearchText:
You would not know it otherwise, but she clearly
maintains an extensive routine. She was taut as a
bow-string, with no slack at any point.
jpnChrName: 無駄がなく引き締まっており、遠目には分かりませんが 非常に合理的な付き方をしていて……
jpnSearchText:
無駄がなく引き締まっており、遠目には分かりませんが
非常に合理的な付き方をしていて……

engChrName: I stay on top of my royal swordfighting training, that's why.
engSearchText:
I stay on top of my royal swordfighting training,
that's why.
jpnChrName: 一応宮廷剣術の方は鍛錬を 欠かしていませんので。
jpnSearchText:
一応宮廷剣術の方は鍛錬を
欠かしていませんので。

engChrName: I've never given much thought to my appearance. But it is a nice testament to my training to be complimented for the resulting physique.
engSearchText:
I've never given much thought to my appearance.
But it is a nice testament to my training to be
complimented for the resulting physique.
jpnChrName: 見た目を気にした事はありませんが……鍛錬の成果として 身体つきを誉められるのは悪くない気分です。
jpnSearchText:
見た目を気にした事はありませんが……鍛錬の成果として
身体つきを誉められるのは悪くない気分です。

engChrName: That's...one way to look at it, I guess.
engSearchText: That's...one way to look at it, I guess.
jpnChrName: ……そっちかよ。
jpnSearchText: ……そっちかよ。

engChrName: Now that the prince has had his fun and appears satisfied, it's time we return our focus to the task at hand.
engSearchText:
Now that the prince has had his fun and appears
satisfied, it's time we return our focus to the task
at hand.
jpnChrName: ともあれ……殿下も満足されたようですし、 ここからは改めて気を引き締めて臨まねば。
jpnSearchText:
ともあれ……殿下も満足されたようですし、
ここからは改めて気を引き締めて臨まねば。

engChrName: As representative of the principality, His Highness has spent much time and effort trying to get to the bottom of all of these...mishaps.
engSearchText:
As representative of the principality, His Highness
has spent much time and effort trying to get to the
bottom of all of these...mishaps.
jpnChrName: 殿下も公国の代理として異変の解明には 尽力されてきました。
jpnSearchText:
殿下も公国の代理として異変の解明には
尽力されてきました。

engChrName: I pray the event goes as planned and his work is rewarded. I know how much he's personally looking forward to it. But we'll see.
engSearchText:
I pray the event goes as planned and his work
is rewarded. I know how much he's personally
looking forward to it. But we'll see.
jpnChrName: 殿下が個人的にも待ち望んでいた映画祭が 最後まで果たされる形で報われれば良いのですが……
jpnSearchText:
殿下が個人的にも待ち望んでいた映画祭が
最後まで果たされる形で報われれば良いのですが……

engChrName: You boys sure got noisy over there. Whatever you three were doing, you sounded pretty into it.
engSearchText:
You boys sure got noisy over there. Whatever you
three were doing, you sounded pretty into it.
jpnChrName: ん、ヴァン達も随分と賑やかに やっていたみたいだね……
jpnSearchText:
ん、ヴァン達も随分と賑やかに
やっていたみたいだね……

engChrName: Heh, not that I'm one to criticize. I've gotten up to my fair share of trouble like that before. I know how it goes.
engSearchText:
Heh, not that I'm one to criticize. I've gotten up to
my fair share of trouble like that before. I know how
it goes.
jpnChrName: まあ、正直似たようなノリを知らない 訳じゃないし驚きはしないけどね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、正直似たようなノリを知らない
訳じゃないし驚きはしないけどね。

engChrName: Yeah, I can imagine, knowin' the kind of company you've kept over the years.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I can imagine, knowin' the kind of company
you've kept over the years.
jpnChrName: まあ、あんたの繋がりを考えりゃ…… だいたいの察しはつくが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、あんたの繋がりを考えりゃ……
だいたいの察しはつくが……

engChrName: We had a nice time! I got to hear all kinds of stories from her about what Aida was like, back in the day!
engSearchText:
We had a nice time! I got to hear all kinds of stories
from her about what Aida was like, back in the day!
jpnChrName: ええ、改めて落ち着いて昔の アイーダさんについて聞けました！
jpnSearchText:
ええ、改めて落ち着いて昔の
アイーダさんについて聞けました！

engChrName: And she has so many interesting thoughts on jaegers, now that she's a bracer these days, too! I love talking to her!
engSearchText:
And she has so many interesting thoughts on jaegers,
now that she's a bracer these days, too! I love talking
to her!
jpnChrName: 他にも、遊撃士としてのフィーさんから見た 猟兵についての話も興味深かったですし……
jpnSearchText:
他にも、遊撃士としてのフィーさんから見た
猟兵についての話も興味深かったですし……

engChrName: I didn't think what I had to share was THAT interesting, but I appreciate it.
engSearchText:
I didn't think what I had to share was THAT
interesting, but I appreciate it.
jpnChrName: ふふ、別にそこまで大それた話をした つもりもないけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、別にそこまで大それた話をした
つもりもないけど。

engChrName: If my experiences can help you, then I'm content.
engSearchText: If my experiences can help you, then I'm content.
jpnChrName: 一応、私の体験談くらいでフェリのために なるなら満更でもないし。
jpnSearchText:
一応、私の体験談くらいでフェリのために
なるなら満更でもないし。

engChrName: (Damn. Were you girls talking about heavy shit that entire time while our dumb asses were horsing around?)
engSearchText:
(Damn. Were you girls talking about heavy shit that
entire time while our dumb asses were
horsing around?)
jpnChrName: （おいおい……オレ達が馬鹿やってる間に   女子組は随分とお堅い話をしてたのかよ……）
jpnSearchText:
（おいおい……オレ達が馬鹿やってる間に
女子組は随分とお堅い話をしてたのかよ……）

engChrName: (Not entirely. I would say that the latter half of our time spent in the baths was spent discussing more... typical concerns of young ladies.)
engSearchText:
(Not entirely. I would say that the latter half of our
time spent in the baths was spent discussing more...
typical concerns of young ladies.)
jpnChrName: （まあ、後半は意外と普通の思春期の   女子らしい話題に変わりましたけれど……）
jpnSearchText:
（まあ、後半は意外と普通の思春期の
女子らしい話題に変わりましたけれど……）

engChrName: (RISETTE! Don't say it like that! You're going to give Aaron weird thoughts!)
engSearchText:
(RISETTE! Don't say it like that! You're going to
give Aaron weird thoughts!)
jpnChrName: （リ、リゼットさん！？   アーロンさんに変な言い方しないでください！）
jpnSearchText:
（リ、リゼットさん！？
アーロンさんに変な言い方しないでください！）

engChrName: Anyway, I'm glad I finally had a chance to sit down and spend some time talking to Feri.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I'm glad I finally had a chance to sit down
and spend some time talking to Feri.
jpnChrName: とにかく、フェリと落ち着いて 話す機会を持てて良かった。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、フェリと落ち着いて
話す機会を持てて良かった。

engChrName: It was...a good reminder that we all owe it to Aida, too, to confront Almata.
engSearchText:
It was...a good reminder that we all owe it to Aida,
too, to confront Almata.
jpnChrName: ここからは……アイーダのためにも、 お互いアルマータに立ち向かっていかないとね。
jpnSearchText:
ここからは……アイーダのためにも、
お互いアルマータに立ち向かっていかないとね。

engChrName: I heard you all helped out with that whole Vegas Films mess. Thank you. It seems you're more trustworthy than I gave you credit for.
engSearchText:
I heard you all helped out with that whole Vegas
Films mess. Thank you. It seems you're more
trustworthy than I gave you credit for.
jpnChrName: ベガスフィルムの一件では協力されたそうで…… 少々、認識を改めた方が良さそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
ベガスフィルムの一件では協力されたそうで……
少々、認識を改めた方が良さそうですね。

engChrName: From what Fie has told me, you're all really capable. Even more than we were originally expecting, to be honest.
engSearchText:
From what Fie has told me, you're all really capable.
Even more than we were originally expecting, to
be honest.
jpnChrName: フィーさんからも伺いましたが、 どうやら想定以上の手並みのようで……
jpnSearchText:
フィーさんからも伺いましたが、
どうやら想定以上の手並みのようで……

engChrName: Just because those orbal hookahs have been confiscated doesn't mean we can breathe a sigh of relief and take it easy now.
engSearchText:
Just because those orbal hookahs have been
confiscated doesn't mean we can breathe a sigh of
relief and take it easy now.
jpnChrName: ともあれ、問題のシーシャは回収されましたが…… ここで気を抜く訳にはいきません。
jpnSearchText:
ともあれ、問題のシーシャは回収されましたが……
ここで気を抜く訳にはいきません。

engChrName: Almata almost certainly still has their eye on something else. We'll have to be on high alert, all throughout the festival.
engSearchText:
Almata almost certainly still has their eye on
something else. We'll have to be on high alert, all
throughout the festival.
jpnChrName: おそらく、アルマータには他にも狙いがあるはず。 映画祭本番こそ警戒すべきでしょう……
jpnSearchText:
おそらく、アルマータには他にも狙いがあるはず。
映画祭本番こそ警戒すべきでしょう……

engChrName: We've been getting reports of fighting and sudden disturbances all day. The police have their hands full trying to respond to everything.
engSearchText:
We've been getting reports of fighting and sudden
disturbances all day. The police have their hands full
trying to respond to everything.
jpnChrName: 今朝から乱闘や突発的な騒ぎの報告が…… 警察の方でも対応に追われているようです。
jpnSearchText:
今朝から乱闘や突発的な騒ぎの報告が……
警察の方でも対応に追われているようです。

engChrName: Apparently, according to two people I talked to who dealt with a similar case, this is completely identical to another case.
engSearchText:
Apparently, according to two people I talked to who
dealt with a similar case, this is completely identical
to another case.
jpnChrName: しかし、対応に当たった二人の話を聞く限り、 やはり“あの件”と全く同じですか……
jpnSearchText:
しかし、対応に当たった二人の話を聞く限り、
やはり“あの件”と全く同じですか……

engChrName: There must be some mutual connection behind both incidents. Hmm...
engSearchText:
There must be some mutual connection behind
both incidents. Hmm...
jpnChrName: ……となると、共通して背後にある ファクターは……
jpnSearchText:
……となると、共通して背後にある
ファクターは……

engChrName: Once she gets here from the main branch, we should probably step up our investigation.
engSearchText:
Once she gets here from the main branch, we should
probably step up our investigation.
jpnChrName: ……やはり、総支部の彼女が到着次第、 調査を本格化させた方が良さそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
……やはり、総支部の彼女が到着次第、
調査を本格化させた方が良さそうですね。

engChrName: The fact we have limited room to navigate these cases unless a civilian is directly harmed does make things more difficult.
engSearchText:
The fact we have limited room to navigate these
cases unless a civilian is directly harmed does
make things more difficult.
jpnChrName: 私達遊撃士協会は、直接的に民間人に 被害が及ばない限り動きにくいのが実情です。
jpnSearchText:
私達遊撃士協会は、直接的に民間人に
被害が及ばない限り動きにくいのが実情です。

engChrName: We're trying to investigate what's going on in Tharbad's shadows right now.
engSearchText:
We're trying to investigate what's going on in
Tharbad's shadows right now.
jpnChrName: 今現在のサルバッドにおいて陰で何が 起こっているのか、調査中ではありますが……
jpnSearchText:
今現在のサルバッドにおいて陰で何が
起こっているのか、調査中ではありますが……

engChrName: Unfortunately, we can only take it so far by ourselves. We'll probably need to coordinate with the police to some extent to get anywhere.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, we can only take it so far by ourselves.
We'll probably need to coordinate with the police to
some extent to get anywhere.
jpnChrName: 踏み込める範囲にも限界がありますので、 警察などともある程度は連携も必要でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
踏み込める範囲にも限界がありますので、
警察などともある程度は連携も必要でしょう。

engChrName: Which is to say, if you all find anything, please, don't keep it to yourselves. The more we work together, the better this will all end.
engSearchText:
Which is to say, if you all find anything, please, don't
keep it to yourselves. The more we work together, the
better this will all end.
jpnChrName: ……そちらも、裏で何か掴んだ場合は秘め隠さず、 こちらと共有できると助かりますね。
jpnSearchText:
……そちらも、裏で何か掴んだ場合は秘め隠さず、
こちらと共有できると助かりますね。

engChrName: I hope you all are able to figure out who that mysterious green-haired bracer is by tomorrow.
engSearchText:
I hope you all are able to figure out who that
mysterious green-haired bracer is by tomorrow.
jpnChrName: 緑髪の遊撃士が誰なのか、 明日にでも特定できるといいのですが……
jpnSearchText:
緑髪の遊撃士が誰なのか、
明日にでも特定できるといいのですが……

engChrName: If not, we'll probably have to open an investigation ourselves so we can get the victim his wallet back. We can't keep him waiting too long.
engSearchText:
If not, we'll probably have to open an investigation
ourselves so we can get the victim his wallet back.
We can't keep him waiting too long.
jpnChrName: そうでなくとも、財布を取り返せるよう 調査を進める必要がありそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
そうでなくとも、財布を取り返せるよう
調査を進める必要がありそうですね。

engChrName: You all did a great job getting the situation under control before the damage got too severe. We really appreciate it.
engSearchText:
You all did a great job getting the situation under
control before the damage got too severe. We really
appreciate it.
jpnChrName: 皆さんの協力のおかげで 被害を最小限に留める事が出来ました。
jpnSearchText:
皆さんの協力のおかげで
被害を最小限に留める事が出来ました。

engChrName: I guess your nose for these things really is as strong as everybody says. I'll be taking a few pages out of your book from now on.
engSearchText:
I guess your nose for these things really is as strong as
everybody says. I'll be taking a few pages out of your
book from now on.
jpnChrName: 噂に違わぬその“嗅覚”と言いますか…… 私も見習わなくてはいけませんね。
jpnSearchText:
噂に違わぬその“嗅覚”と言いますか……
私も見習わなくてはいけませんね。

engChrName: Huh, I don't remember seeing that woman with you the last time we spoke.
engSearchText:
Huh, I don't remember seeing that woman with you
the last time we spoke.
jpnChrName: そういえば、先ほどは見なかった方も 合流されているようですね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、先ほどは見なかった方も
合流されているようですね。

engChrName: ...Judging by her outfit, I think I have a pretty good idea of what she's doing here and what her position is.
engSearchText:
...Judging by her outfit, I think I have a pretty good
idea of what she's doing here and what her
position is.
jpnChrName: ……そのスタイルのメイド服となれば、 立場はある程度察しがつきます。
jpnSearchText:
……そのスタイルのメイド服となれば、
立場はある程度察しがつきます。

engChrName: You might not think it, but we do have some insight into ongoing trends within Central Eastern finance.
engSearchText:
You might not think it, but we do have some insight
into ongoing trends within Central Eastern finance.
jpnChrName: 私達としても、中東資本の動向も含め、 ある程度は把握しておりますので。
jpnSearchText:
私達としても、中東資本の動向も含め、
ある程度は把握しておりますので。

engChrName: Oh, are you guys from Arkride Solutions? The ones those 4SPGs are supposed to be for?
engSearchText:
Oh, are you guys from Arkride Solutions? The ones
those 4SPGs are supposed to be for?
jpnChrName: あら、あなた方はもしや……昨日から 噂の流れている“４ｓｐｇ”──
jpnSearchText:
あら、あなた方はもしや……昨日から
噂の流れている“４ｓｐｇ”──

engChrName: I've been hearing a lot of talk about you guys since you came into town.
engSearchText:
I've been hearing a lot of talk about you guys since
you came into town.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋という方々でしょうか。
jpnSearchText: 裏解決屋という方々でしょうか。

engChrName: You have, huh? Guess word travels pretty fast in these parts.
engSearchText:
You have, huh? Guess word travels pretty fast in
these parts.
jpnChrName: ああ、そっちも情報が早いみたいで。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そっちも情報が早いみたいで。

engChrName: It does, although the main branch told me about you all, as well, so I'm a little familiar with you already.
engSearchText:
It does, although the main branch told me about you
all, as well, so I'm a little familiar with you already.
jpnChrName: ええ、あなた方については総支部からも 聞いておりますし、最低限把握しています。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、あなた方については総支部からも
聞いておりますし、最低限把握しています。

engChrName: Including what you guys got up to over in Langport. Apparently you were even more capable than expected.
engSearchText:
Including what you guys got up to over in Langport.
Apparently you were even more capable
than expected.
jpnChrName: もちろん、煌都での活動も聞き及んでいます、 どうやら想定以上に腕が立つようで。
jpnSearchText:
もちろん、煌都での活動も聞き及んでいます、
どうやら想定以上に腕が立つようで。

engChrName: Well, would you look at that? Sounds like the guild's giving us some props. About time, if you ask me!
engSearchText:
Well, would you look at that? Sounds like the guild's
giving us some props. About time, if you ask me!
jpnChrName: クク、随分と一目置かれているみてぇだな。
jpnSearchText: クク、随分と一目置かれているみてぇだな。

engChrName: Yeah, but that also means we now got a reputation to maintain with these people, especially in light of what's going on.
engSearchText:
Yeah, but that also means we now got a reputation to
maintain with these people, especially in light of
what's going on.
jpnChrName: まあ、その口ぶりとサルバッドの状況を 見れば……何を期待してんのかは察しがつくぜ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、その口ぶりとサルバッドの状況を
見れば……何を期待してんのかは察しがつくぜ。

engChrName: Not that we mind taking a load off the guild—ain't the first time. But don't expect us to take everything. We still reserve the right to decide.
engSearchText:
Not that we mind taking a load off the guild—ain't the
first time. But don't expect us to take everything.
We still reserve the right to decide.
jpnChrName: ま、ギルドの下請けってのも今に始まった 事じゃねぇが、仕事は選ばせてもらうからな？
jpnSearchText:
ま、ギルドの下請けってのも今に始まった
事じゃねぇが、仕事は選ばせてもらうからな？

engChrName: I understand. We appreciate you being so up front about it. Don't worry, we'll be careful in what we choose to pass on to you.
engSearchText:
I understand. We appreciate you being so up front
about it. Don't worry, we'll be careful in what we
choose to pass on to you.
jpnChrName: 話が早くて有難いですね、まあ私達としても、 あなた方へ回す仕事も選びますのでご安心を。
jpnSearchText:
話が早くて有難いですね、まあ私達としても、
あなた方へ回す仕事も選びますのでご安心を。

engChrName: We simply appreciate your ability to handle some of our load and delegate responsibilities among yourselves as needed.
engSearchText:
We simply appreciate your ability to handle some of
our load and delegate responsibilities among
yourselves as needed.
jpnChrName: 聞く限りでは、ある程度は私達との負担の分散や 役割分担もできる方々との事ですので。
jpnSearchText:
聞く限りでは、ある程度は私達との負担の分散や
役割分担もできる方々との事ですので。

engChrName: As you can imagine, we have more on our plate than simply providing security for the festival and sorting out any tourist problems.
engSearchText:
As you can imagine, we have more on our plate than
simply providing security for the festival and sorting
out any tourist problems.
jpnChrName: 一応、私達もやるべき事は映画祭の警備や 観光客トラブルへの対応だけではないので。
jpnSearchText:
一応、私達もやるべき事は映画祭の警備や
観光客トラブルへの対応だけではないので。

engChrName: (Hmm... Sounds like the guild could be investigating something on their end, too.)
engSearchText:
(Hmm... Sounds like the guild could be investigating
something on their end, too.)
jpnChrName: （ギルドでも何かを探っているって感じか。）
jpnSearchText: （ギルドでも何かを探っているって感じか。）

engChrName: (All the more reason to help 'em out, then. Not only will they owe us a favor or two, we might be able to get some intel out of 'em.)
engSearchText:
(All the more reason to help 'em out, then. Not only
will they owe us a favor or two, we might be able to
get some intel out of 'em.)
jpnChrName: （それならここでも、恩を売るついでに   何か情報も得られるかもしれねぇな……）
jpnSearchText:
（それならここでも、恩を売るついでに
何か情報も得られるかもしれねぇな……）

engChrName: I'm sure you've sensed it yourselves, but Tharbad is in somewhat of a peculiar position.
engSearchText:
I'm sure you've sensed it yourselves, but Tharbad is in
somewhat of a peculiar position.
jpnChrName: おそらくあなた達もお気づきかとは思いますが、 サルバッドは少々特殊な状況下に在ります。
jpnSearchText:
おそらくあなた達もお気づきかとは思いますが、
サルバッドは少々特殊な状況下に在ります。

engChrName: More and more issues are cropping up, and while we're not sure why yet, we do know that it's not just because of the film festival.
engSearchText:
More and more issues are cropping up, and while
we're not sure why yet, we do know that it's not just
because of the film festival.
jpnChrName: 単に映画祭でトラブルが増えている、 それだけではない事は確かでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
単に映画祭でトラブルが増えている、
それだけではない事は確かでしょう。

engChrName: I won't intrude into whatever business has brought you here. But you should be aware that we do have an investigation underway.
engSearchText:
I won't intrude into whatever business has brought
you here. But you should be aware that we do have an
investigation underway.
jpnChrName: そちらの受けた案件には踏み込みませんが、 こちらも一応、調査は始めていまして。
jpnSearchText:
そちらの受けた案件には踏み込みませんが、
こちらも一応、調査は始めていまして。

engChrName: So if you could bear in mind the complexity of the situation before making any moves, we'd appreciate it.
engSearchText:
So if you could bear in mind the complexity of the
situation before making any moves, we'd
appreciate it.
jpnChrName: ですのであなた方も、状況の複雑さはある程度 弁えて行動してもらえると助かります。
jpnSearchText:
ですのであなた方も、状況の複雑さはある程度
弁えて行動してもらえると助かります。

engChrName: We might've gotten the trouble sorted out at the bazaar, but something about it all still doesn't sit right with me.
engSearchText:
We might've gotten the trouble sorted out at the
bazaar, but something about it all still doesn't sit right
with me.
jpnChrName: 一応、バザールの方でもトラブルには対応したが やっぱりどこか引っかかる気がするな……
jpnSearchText:
一応、バザールの方でもトラブルには対応したが
やっぱりどこか引っかかる気がするな……

engChrName: I've heard Tharbad's seeing more and more tourists who are getting out of hand, like what those dancers had to deal with.
engSearchText:
I've heard Tharbad's seeing more and more tourists
who are getting out of hand, like what those dancers
had to deal with.
jpnChrName: 昼間に踊り子に絡んだ観光客みたいな、 ああいうパターンが増えているらしい。
jpnSearchText:
昼間に踊り子に絡んだ観光客みたいな、
ああいうパターンが増えているらしい。

engChrName: Hmm... I think tomorrow I'll focus my efforts on the Entertainment District. More people from out of town end up there.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I think tomorrow I'll focus my efforts on the
Entertainment District. More people from out of
town end up there.
jpnChrName: ……明日は歓楽街の方を中心に対応しようか、 あっちの方が外部の人も多く来る事だしね。
jpnSearchText:
……明日は歓楽街の方を中心に対応しようか、
あっちの方が外部の人も多く来る事だしね。

engChrName: You must be the people from Arkride Solutions. I've heard all about your exploits in Edith and Langport from Alvis.
engSearchText:
You must be the people from Arkride Solutions.
I've heard all about your exploits in Edith and
Langport from Alvis.
jpnChrName: あんたらが裏解決屋だな、 首都や煌都での活躍は僕も聞いているよ。
jpnSearchText:
あんたらが裏解決屋だな、
首都や煌都での活躍は僕も聞いているよ。

engChrName: He always grumbles about you guys whenever you come up. What the heck did you guys do to give him a fuse like that?
engSearchText:
He always grumbles about you guys whenever you
come up. What the heck did you guys do to give him
a fuse like that?
jpnChrName: まあ、アルヴィスからは悪口しか聞いてないけど…… 一体何をああまで怒っているのやら。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、アルヴィスからは悪口しか聞いてないけど……
一体何をああまで怒っているのやら。

engChrName: You'll have to ask him. You're a friend of Alvis, though, huh? Guess I can see it. You two look 'bout the same age.
engSearchText:
You'll have to ask him. You're a friend of Alvis,
though, huh? Guess I can see it. You two look 'bout
the same age.
jpnChrName: あんたはアルヴィスと知り合いなのか。 見たところ同年代っぽいな。
jpnSearchText:
あんたはアルヴィスと知り合いなのか。
見たところ同年代っぽいな。

engChrName: We're actually a year apart, but we came up in the guild around the same time, yeah. We worked together a fair bit when we were junior bracers.
engSearchText:
We're actually a year apart, but we came up in the
guild around the same time, yeah. We worked
together a fair bit when we were junior bracers.
jpnChrName: まあ、一年違いだがほぼ同期みたいなものかな。 準遊撃士の頃はそこそこ絡んでいたよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、一年違いだがほぼ同期みたいなものかな。
準遊撃士の頃はそこそこ絡んでいたよ。

engChrName: I was the first one to get promoted up to C-rank between us, but I think I might not stay ahead much longer.
engSearchText:
I was the first one to get promoted up to C-rank
between us, but I think I might not stay ahead
much longer.
jpnChrName: ちなみに、Ｃ級への昇格は僕が先だったんでね。 Ｂ級も先を越されないようにしたいが……
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、Ｃ級への昇格は僕が先だったんでね。
Ｂ級も先を越されないようにしたいが……

engChrName: He says he's on the verge of hitting B-rank. Going to have to hustle if I don't want him to beat me.
engSearchText:
He says he's on the verge of hitting B-rank. Going to
have to hustle if I don't want him to beat me.
jpnChrName: アルヴィスがＢ級目前って話も聞くし、 僕もここらが頑張りどころかな。
jpnSearchText:
アルヴィスがＢ級目前って話も聞くし、
僕もここらが頑張りどころかな。

engChrName: Sounds like you guys have got yourselves a nice little rivalry. I know what that's like. I've got some folks like that over in my theater.
engSearchText:
Sounds like you guys have got yourselves a nice
little rivalry. I know what that's like. I've got some
folks like that over in my theater.
jpnChrName: ハッ、大したライバル意識じゃねぇか。 オレにも華劇でライバル視してくる奴がいるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、大したライバル意識じゃねぇか。
オレにも華劇でライバル視してくる奴がいるぜ。

engChrName: I wouldn't say it's anything that serious. Just a little friendly competition, I guess.
engSearchText:
I wouldn't say it's anything that serious. Just a little
friendly competition, I guess.
jpnChrName: 別にライバルってほど大したものでもないよ。
jpnSearchText: 別にライバルってほど大したものでもないよ。

engChrName: But I have done my fair share of training while traveling all over the place. I want to make the most of my time while I'm out here.
engSearchText:
But I have done my fair share of training while
traveling all over the place. I want to make the most
of my time while I'm out here.
jpnChrName: まあ、元より各地を周って修練してる身だしな、 この機会は活かすつもりさ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、元より各地を周って修練してる身だしな、
この機会は活かすつもりさ。

engChrName: Plus this city has its problems right now. As a bracer, I can't just ignore them. I have to do something to help.
engSearchText:
Plus this city has its problems right now. As a bracer,
I can't just ignore them. I have to do something
to help.
jpnChrName: どの道、遊撃士である以上は困っている この状況は見逃す訳にいかないしね。
jpnSearchText:
どの道、遊撃士である以上は困っている
この状況は見逃す訳にいかないしね。

engChrName: Good on you, man. For someone who looks pretty laid back on the outside, you actually sound pretty passionate about your job. Respect.
engSearchText:
Good on you, man. For someone who looks pretty
laid back on the outside, you actually sound pretty
passionate about your job. Respect.
jpnChrName: 淡々としているようで随分と 熱い奴じゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText:
淡々としているようで随分と
熱い奴じゃねぇか。

engChrName: I think we're gonna get along just fine. You don't sound like the type of guy who'll give us trouble like Alvis.
engSearchText:
I think we're gonna get along just fine. You don't
sound like the type of guy who'll give us trouble
like Alvis.
jpnChrName: まあ、アルヴィスよりは面倒が無くて 俺達としては付き合いやすそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、アルヴィスよりは面倒が無くて
俺達としては付き合いやすそうだが。

engChrName: Oh, yeah! I forgot that we were supposed to have a B-rank bracer coming in to help from the main branch.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah! I forgot that we were supposed to have a
B-rank bracer coming in to help from the
main branch.
jpnChrName: そういえば、総支部からＢ級遊撃士が 応援に来るとも聞いていたな。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、総支部からＢ級遊撃士が
応援に来るとも聞いていたな。

engChrName: It'll be good to have the extra help around, but I can't let myself become dependent on it, either.
engSearchText:
It'll be good to have the extra help around, but I can't
let myself become dependent on it, either.
jpnChrName: 心強い限りだけど、その人に 甘える訳にもいかないしな。
jpnSearchText:
心強い限りだけど、その人に
甘える訳にもいかないしな。

engChrName: If I'm going to hit that B-rank myself, I've got to try and pull my weight as best I can.
engSearchText:
If I'm going to hit that B-rank myself, I've got to try
and pull my weight as best I can.
jpnChrName: まあ、その人に追い付くくらいの つもりで僕もやってみるとするさ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、その人に追い付くくらいの
つもりで僕もやってみるとするさ。

engChrName: I'm so shocked and humbled to know His Highness is at the hamam. I'd heard he was an affable man, but to witness him in person...
engSearchText:
I'm so shocked and humbled to know His Highness is
at the hamam. I'd heard he was an affable man, but
to witness him in person...
jpnChrName: まさか殿下があちらのハマムにいらっしゃるとは。 親しみやすい方とは聞いておりましたが……
jpnSearchText:
まさか殿下があちらのハマムにいらっしゃるとは。
親しみやすい方とは聞いておりましたが……

engChrName: I never dreamed the day would come that I would have the honor of protecting someone from the royal family alongside Naje.
engSearchText:
I never dreamed the day would come that I would
have the honor of protecting someone from the royal
family alongside Naje.
jpnChrName: しかし、ナージェ殿と共に公王家の方を お守りする日が来る事になろうとは。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、ナージェ殿と共に公王家の方を
お守りする日が来る事になろうとは。
