engChrName: It's an extremely great honor, as you can imagine, not just as a bracer, but as someone versed in Elsaim's royal swordfighting style.
engSearchText:
It's an extremely great honor, as you can imagine, not
just as a bracer, but as someone versed in Elsaim's
royal swordfighting style.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士であると共に、宮廷剣術を修める身として、 光栄な事であると言えるでしょうな。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士であると共に、宮廷剣術を修める身として、
光栄な事であると言えるでしょうな。

engChrName: That was a nasty turn of events last night, and it's a shame those orbal hookahs proliferated as far as they did, even if only temporarily.
engSearchText:
That was a nasty turn of events last night, and it's a
shame those orbal hookahs proliferated as far as they
did, even if only temporarily.
jpnChrName: 昨晩には不幸な事件もあり、導力シーシャも 一度は広まってしまいましたが……
jpnSearchText:
昨晩には不幸な事件もあり、導力シーシャも
一度は広まってしまいましたが……

engChrName: Thankfully, none of that has stopped the festival. Now it's time to do my part to ensure it's a good event for the people of Tharbad.
engSearchText:
Thankfully, none of that has stopped the festival.
Now it's time to do my part to ensure it's a good
event for the people of Tharbad.
jpnChrName: こうして映画祭を開催できた以上、この街の方々の ためになる催しになるようにしたいところです。
jpnSearchText:
こうして映画祭を開催できた以上、この街の方々の
ためになる催しになるようにしたいところです。

engChrName: I have to do whatever I can to help mitigate any disturbances or other concerns that might arise, so that everyone can get the most out of today.
engSearchText:
I have to do whatever I can to help mitigate any
disturbances or other concerns that might arise, so
that everyone can get the most out of today.
jpnChrName: 私は遊撃士として少しでも混乱や不安を排除し、 皆が映画祭の恩恵を受けられるようにせねば。
jpnSearchText:
私は遊撃士として少しでも混乱や不安を排除し、
皆が映画祭の恩恵を受けられるようにせねば。

engChrName: Renton's apparently checking into the general movements of new arrivals, so I'm going to tackle things from a different angle.
engSearchText:
Renton's apparently checking into the general
movements of new arrivals, so I'm going to tackle
things from a different angle.
jpnChrName: レントンは来訪者の動向を探るそうなので 私は土地勘を活かすといたしましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
レントンは来訪者の動向を探るそうなので
私は土地勘を活かすといたしましょうか。

engChrName: Specifically, I'm going to ask the caravanners if they've noticed any unusual activity nearby to see if I can glean anything with their insight.
engSearchText:
Specifically, I'm going to ask the caravanners if
they've noticed any unusual activity nearby to see if I
can glean anything with their insight.
jpnChrName: サルバッドの近辺で何か不穏な動きが無いか、 キャラバンの方々にも聞くとしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドの近辺で何か不穏な動きが無いか、
キャラバンの方々にも聞くとしましょう。

engChrName: I just wish we didn't have to worry about more fights breaking out. I'd really prefer to focus entirely on our investigation. *sigh*
engSearchText:
I just wish we didn't have to worry about more fights
breaking out. I'd really prefer to focus entirely on
our investigation. *sigh*
jpnChrName: とは言え……再び乱闘が起きる可能性も考えると、 調査だけに注力できないのは心苦しいですが。
jpnSearchText:
とは言え……再び乱闘が起きる可能性も考えると、
調査だけに注力できないのは心苦しいですが。

engChrName: I've been looking into the new arrivals who are coming into the area from the Central East.
engSearchText:
I've been looking into the new arrivals who are
coming into the area from the Central East.
jpnChrName: 一応、中東方面から新たに来訪する方々にも 探りは入れてはいるのですが……
jpnSearchText:
一応、中東方面から新たに来訪する方々にも
探りは入れてはいるのですが……

engChrName: So far, nothing suspicious has turned up about those coming from Elsaim, which means... Hmm...
engSearchText:
So far, nothing suspicious has turned up about those
coming from Elsaim, which means... Hmm...
jpnChrName: やはり、エルザイム方面のルートには怪しい 部分は無さそうですね、となると……
jpnSearchText:
やはり、エルザイム方面のルートには怪しい
部分は無さそうですね、となると……

engChrName: Either way, Tharbad is going to see an influx of tourists starting tomorrow. We have to optimize our intel gathering as best we can.
engSearchText:
Either way, Tharbad is going to see an influx of
tourists starting tomorrow. We have to optimize our
intel gathering as best we can.
jpnChrName: 何にせよ明日以降は一層観光客も増えますし…… 情報収集も可能な限り効率化せねばなりません。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ明日以降は一層観光客も増えますし……
情報収集も可能な限り効率化せねばなりません。

engChrName: We can't expect our help from the capital to take care of everything for us.
engSearchText:
We can't expect our help from the capital to take care
of everything for us.
jpnChrName: 首都から来るという応援の方に頼りきりに なる訳にもいきませんからな。
jpnSearchText:
首都から来るという応援の方に頼りきりに
なる訳にもいきませんからな。

engChrName: It's fair to say that Tharbad acts as a bridge between the Principality of Elsaim and Calvard.
engSearchText:
It's fair to say that Tharbad acts as a bridge between
the Principality of Elsaim and Calvard.
jpnChrName: この地はいわば、エルザイム公国と共和国の 架け橋と言っても過言ではありません。
jpnSearchText:
この地はいわば、エルザイム公国と共和国の
架け橋と言っても過言ではありません。

engChrName: You can see that in the film festival. The Elsaim royal family has such high expectations for it, they've directly invested in it.
engSearchText:
You can see that in the film festival. The Elsaim royal
family has such high expectations for it, they've
directly invested in it.
jpnChrName: その地で、公王家も期待を注ぎ出資された 催しが行われようとしている。
jpnSearchText:
その地で、公王家も期待を注ぎ出資された
催しが行われようとしている。

engChrName: As both a proud master of Elsaim's royal swordfighting style, and a bracer in general, it's a genuine honor to watch over this region.
engSearchText:
As both a proud master of Elsaim's royal
swordfighting style, and a bracer in general, it's a
genuine honor to watch over this region.
jpnChrName: エルザイムの宮廷剣術を修めた者として、そして 遊撃士としてこの地を守れるのは光栄な事です。
jpnSearchText:
エルザイムの宮廷剣術を修めた者として、そして
遊撃士としてこの地を守れるのは光栄な事です。

engChrName: You know royal swordfighting...? Wait, I know you! You're really famous in the Central East for being the strongest shamshir fighter! Wow!
engSearchText:
You know royal swordfighting...? Wait, I know you!
You're really famous in the Central East for being the
strongest shamshir fighter! Wow!
jpnChrName: エルザイムの宮廷剣術ですか……中東では 有名ですよね、曲刀（シャムシール）最強の武門として……！
jpnSearchText:
エルザイムの宮廷剣術ですか……中東では
有名ですよね、曲刀（シャムシール）最強の武門として……！

engChrName: Guess that means you got quite the reputation back home, huh?
engSearchText:
Guess that means you got quite the reputation back
home, huh?
jpnChrName: てことは、あんたはエルザイムでも 名の知れた剣士ってところか。
jpnSearchText:
てことは、あんたはエルザイムでも
名の知れた剣士ってところか。

engChrName: You were born in Elsaim, right? Sounds like you have close ties to this branch of the guild, though.
engSearchText:
You were born in Elsaim, right? Sounds like you have
close ties to this branch of the guild, though.
jpnChrName: 生まれも公国だとは思うが…… この支部に随分と馴染んでいるみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
生まれも公国だとは思うが……
この支部に随分と馴染んでいるみたいだな。

engChrName: I do. At first, I worked in Ludos, Elsaim's capital. But the Calvard branch was kind enough to extend an invitation, and now, here I am.
engSearchText:
I do. At first, I worked in Ludos, Elsaim's capital.
But the Calvard branch was kind enough to extend an
invitation, and now, here I am.
jpnChrName: ええ、最初は公都ルドスで活動していましたが、 共和国の方から招聘していただけましてね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、最初は公都ルドスで活動していましたが、
共和国の方から招聘していただけましてね。

engChrName: I miss home, to be sure. But I couldn't pass up this opportunity. It's a huge privilege, being stationed in such an important city.
engSearchText:
I miss home, to be sure. But I couldn't pass up
this opportunity. It's a huge privilege, being stationed
in such an important city.
jpnChrName: 公国から離れるのはやや寂しいですが、 こうした要衝を任せていただけたのは光栄な事。
jpnSearchText:
公国から離れるのはやや寂しいですが、
こうした要衝を任せていただけたのは光栄な事。

engChrName: It allows me to be of use to both Calvard and Elsaim. I like to believe that it was Arusha's will that brought me here.
engSearchText:
It allows me to be of use to both Calvard and Elsaim.
I like to believe that it was Arusha's will that brought
me here.
jpnChrName: 両国双方の方々のお役に立てますし、 これも翼の女神の思し召しなのでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
両国双方の方々のお役に立てますし、
これも翼の女神の思し召しなのでしょう。

engChrName: I've been living in Tharbad for five years now. At this point, I think of it as my second home.
engSearchText:
I've been living in Tharbad for five years now. At this
point, I think of it as my second home.
jpnChrName: ５年ほどこの街で暮らしましたが、 今や第二の故郷と言える程です。
jpnSearchText:
５年ほどこの街で暮らしましたが、
今や第二の故郷と言える程です。

engChrName: It's very fulfilling work. I get to help people who come here from all over Zemuria, as well as contribute to Calvard & Elsaim's good relations.
engSearchText:
It's very fulfilling work. I get to help people who
come here from all over Zemuria, as well as
contribute to Calvard & Elsaim's good relations.
jpnChrName: 往来する各地の方々のお力になり、両国の友好にも 貢献できる事がやはり充実していましてな。
jpnSearchText:
往来する各地の方々のお力になり、両国の友好にも
貢献できる事がやはり充実していましてな。

engChrName: Recently, we've been seeing more and more trouble. It is what it is. As a bracer, I just have to keep doing my job and that's that.
engSearchText:
Recently, we've been seeing more and more trouble.
It is what it is. As a bracer, I just have to keep doing
my job and that's that.
jpnChrName: ここ数日はトラブルも増えつつありますが、 遊撃士としても使命を果たすのみです。
jpnSearchText:
ここ数日はトラブルも増えつつありますが、
遊撃士としても使命を果たすのみです。

engChrName: Oh, hey, guys. I was just lending a hand with preparations for the big parade!
engSearchText:
Oh, hey, guys. I was just lending a hand with
preparations for the big parade!
jpnChrName: おお、あんたらか。 俺もパレード準備を手伝っていたところだ。
jpnSearchText:
おお、あんたらか。
俺もパレード準備を手伝っていたところだ。

engChrName: The procession's going to start from the plaza here, so I thought it'd be nice if we locals pitched in to make sure it goes off without a hitch.
engSearchText:
The procession's going to start from the plaza here, so
I thought it'd be nice if we locals pitched in to make
sure it goes off without a hitch.
jpnChrName: この広場から行進が始まるらしいからな、 この辺の人らで少しでも手伝おうって事でさ。
jpnSearchText:
この広場から行進が始まるらしいからな、
この辺の人らで少しでも手伝おうって事でさ。

engChrName: After all, we're talking about HER big debut here. After watching her so long from the sidelines, I can't not help her, can I?
engSearchText:
After all, we're talking about HER big debut here.
After watching her so long from the sidelines, I can't
not help her, can I?
jpnChrName: 何より、あの子の晴れ舞台でもあるしな。 普段から見守ってた俺も貢献しないと。
jpnSearchText:
何より、あの子の晴れ舞台でもあるしな。
普段から見守ってた俺も貢献しないと。

engChrName: They'll be filming the whole thing from that airship, too, so it's all got to look absolutely perfect from every possible angle!
engSearchText:
They'll be filming the whole thing from that airship,
too, so it's all got to look absolutely perfect from every
possible angle!
jpnChrName: あの飛行船からも撮影するんだろうし、 全方位で完璧に見せなくっちゃ。
jpnSearchText:
あの飛行船からも撮影するんだろうし、
全方位で完璧に見せなくっちゃ。

engChrName: With all these tourists going nuts, I'm thinking maybe I should just cancel my Sandsea tours for today. *sigh*
engSearchText:
With all these tourists going nuts, I'm thinking
maybe I should just cancel my Sandsea tours
for today. *sigh*
jpnChrName: こうも観光客が荒れてるようじゃ、 今日は砂漠のツアーは中止かな……
jpnSearchText:
こうも観光客が荒れてるようじゃ、
今日は砂漠のツアーは中止かな……

engChrName: It's infuriating when people drift off from the car on a whim. I'd be in a world of trouble if any kids got lost in those sand dunes.
engSearchText:
It's infuriating when people drift off from the car on
a whim. I'd be in a world of trouble if any kids got
lost in those sand dunes.
jpnChrName: 軽い気持ちで車を離れられると本当に困る。 砂漠の迷子は冗談じゃ済まないからな。
jpnSearchText:
軽い気持ちで車を離れられると本当に困る。
砂漠の迷子は冗談じゃ済まないからな。

engChrName: Though, to be honest, I'm even more concerned about how Saara and her sister are doing right now.
engSearchText:
Though, to be honest, I'm even more concerned
about how Saara and her sister are doing right now.
jpnChrName: まあ、それ以上に心配なのは サァラちゃんたちについてだけどね……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、それ以上に心配なのは
サァラちゃんたちについてだけどね……

engChrName: I'm happy they recruited Saara for the parade, but I'm worried she's working herself too hard. Then to have all this craziness on top of that?
engSearchText:
I'm happy they recruited Saara for the parade, but I'm
worried she's working herself too hard. Then to have
all this craziness on top of that?
jpnChrName: スカウトもあって色々と無理してないか…… そんな状況でこの騒ぎだよ。
jpnSearchText:
スカウトもあって色々と無理してないか……
そんな状況でこの騒ぎだよ。

engChrName: *sigh* I had a lot of tours today, which is always great. But every one of my customers was acting like a nut. It was scary.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I had a lot of tours today, which is always great.
But every one of my customers was acting like a nut.
It was scary.
jpnChrName: ふう、今日のツアーも人気で何よりだったけど…… どいつも妙に舞い上がってて危なっかしいな。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、今日のツアーも人気で何よりだったけど……
どいつも妙に舞い上がってて危なっかしいな。

engChrName: We've been getting a lot of people lately who're like those men who harassed Saara and Shaheena. People with no inhibitions at all.
engSearchText:
We've been getting a lot of people lately who're like
those men who harassed Saara and Shaheena.
People with no inhibitions at all.
jpnChrName: 昼にサァラちゃんらに絡んだ奴もそうだが、 最近は変に節操の無い人が増えてるんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
昼にサァラちゃんらに絡んだ奴もそうだが、
最近は変に節操の無い人が増えてるんだよ。

engChrName: I had people during my Sandsea tours that tried to wander off on me and go who knows where despite it being, you know, a desert!
engSearchText:
I had people during my Sandsea tours that tried to
wander off on me and go who knows where despite it
being, you know, a desert!
jpnChrName: 砂漠の観光でも、勝手にツアーを離れて どっか行こうとする奴もいるしなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
砂漠の観光でも、勝手にツアーを離れて
どっか行こうとする奴もいるしなぁ……

engChrName: Now that Saara's been recruited to perform in the festival, I just hope nothing weird happens that ruins the parade. That'd be terrible!
engSearchText:
Now that Saara's been recruited to perform in the
festival, I just hope nothing weird happens that ruins
the parade. That'd be terrible!
jpnChrName: サァラちゃん、せっかく映画祭のスカウトもあったし、 変なトラブルで台無しになるのは避けないとな。
jpnSearchText:
サァラちゃん、せっかく映画祭のスカウトもあったし、
変なトラブルで台無しになるのは避けないとな。

engChrName: If I'm being honest with you guys, it feels like this city's gotten more and more dangerous lately, in all sorts of ways.
engSearchText:
If I'm being honest with you guys, it feels like this
city's gotten more and more dangerous lately, in all
sorts of ways.
jpnChrName: ここのところの雰囲気は正直言えば、 色々と危なっかしいような気がしてさ。
jpnSearchText:
ここのところの雰囲気は正直言えば、
色々と危なっかしいような気がしてさ。

engChrName: They might not show it, but I have to imagine that deep down, Saara and Shaheena are worried. They work in the streets, after all.
engSearchText:
They might not show it, but I have to imagine that
deep down, Saara and Shaheena are worried.
They work in the streets, after all.
jpnChrName: サァラちゃんたちも、内心では 不安がっているんじゃないかな。
jpnSearchText:
サァラちゃんたちも、内心では
不安がっているんじゃないかな。

engChrName: Those two have so much on their plate. I really hope they can continue their dancing in peace. But who knows what's going to happen...
engSearchText:
Those two have so much on their plate. I really hope
they can continue their dancing in peace. But who
knows what's going to happen...
jpnChrName: あの二人も色々あるし、なるべく 安心して踊り続けて欲しいけど……
jpnSearchText:
あの二人も色々あるし、なるべく
安心して踊り続けて欲しいけど……

engChrName: Thanks for stepping in and rescuing Saara and her sister, you guys.
engSearchText:
Thanks for stepping in and rescuing Saara and her
sister, you guys.
jpnChrName: さっきはサァラちゃんたちを 助けてくれてありがとうな。
jpnSearchText:
さっきはサァラちゃんたちを
助けてくれてありがとうな。

engChrName: I've known those two for a long while. It's sad to say we've been seeing more and more visitors like those dirtbags walking our streets.
engSearchText:
I've known those two for a long while. It's sad to say
we've been seeing more and more visitors like those
dirtbags walking our streets.
jpnChrName: あの姉妹とはそれなりの付き合いだけど、 どうも最近はああいう輩も来るようでね……
jpnSearchText:
あの姉妹とはそれなりの付き合いだけど、
どうも最近はああいう輩も来るようでね……

engChrName: Normally, I work as a tour guide out in the Sandsea, driving people in my car. But when those girls are out dancing, I take my customers to them.
engSearchText:
Normally, I work as a tour guide out in the Sandsea,
driving people in my car. But when those girls are out
dancing, I take my customers to them.
jpnChrName: 俺は車で砂漠のツアーガイドをやっているんだが、 踊りの時には客も連れてきてるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
俺は車で砂漠のツアーガイドをやっているんだが、
踊りの時には客も連れてきてるんだ。

engChrName: With things the way they are right now, though, I guess I have to start being more careful which tourists I take around, period.
engSearchText:
With things the way they are right now, though, I
guess I have to start being more careful which tourists
I take around, period.
jpnChrName: しかし、こんな状況じゃ俺も……観光客を 呼び込む時はしっかり注意しておかないと。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、こんな状況じゃ俺も……観光客を
呼び込む時はしっかり注意しておかないと。

engChrName: Those two girls have been dancing ever since my little brother Timur started helping me out with the business.
engSearchText:
Those two girls have been dancing ever since my little
brother Timur started helping me out with
the business.
jpnChrName: 二人がここで踊りを披露し始めたのは、 弟のティムルが手伝い始めてくれた辺りからでさ。
jpnSearchText:
二人がここで踊りを披露し始めたのは、
弟のティムルが手伝い始めてくれた辺りからでさ。

engChrName: It's been great! We've both grown our customer bases and we both share some of our customers with each other. We both win when we do good.
engSearchText:
It's been great! We've both grown our customer bases
and we both share some of our customers with
each other. We both win when we do good.
jpnChrName: それ以来はお互いのお客も楽しみが増えて、 客層同士の交流もできてきたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
それ以来はお互いのお客も楽しみが増えて、
客層同士の交流もできてきたんだ。

engChrName: I owe those two a lot for what they've done. That's why I need to be careful who I take on, so I don't cause them any trouble.
engSearchText:
I owe those two a lot for what they've done.
That's why I need to be careful who I take on, so I
don't cause them any trouble.
jpnChrName: その意味じゃ二人にも世話になっているし、 今後は客層もしっかり見て呼び込まないとな。
jpnSearchText:
その意味じゃ二人にも世話になっているし、
今後は客層もしっかり見て呼び込まないとな。

engChrName: A lot's happened this week, but at least we finally get to see the parade!
engSearchText:
A lot's happened this week, but at least we finally get
to see the parade!
jpnChrName: 色々あったけど……いよいよ パレードが見られるんだね！
jpnSearchText:
色々あったけど……いよいよ
パレードが見られるんだね！

engChrName: I like movies, too, but what I really wanna see is Saara dancing!
engSearchText:
I like movies, too, but what I really wanna see is
Saara dancing!
jpnChrName: 映画も嫌いじゃないけど、僕としては サァラ姉ちゃんの踊りが楽しみだよ。
jpnSearchText:
映画も嫌いじゃないけど、僕としては
サァラ姉ちゃんの踊りが楽しみだよ。

engChrName: She's gonna look so pretty in the parade. She's always so beautiful, too...
engSearchText:
She's gonna look so pretty in the parade. She's always
so beautiful, too...
jpnChrName: きっと普段以上に 綺麗に見えるんだろうなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
きっと普段以上に
綺麗に見えるんだろうなぁ……

engChrName: Anyway, I've gotta help get things ready! Talk to you guys later!
engSearchText:
Anyway, I've gotta help get things ready! Talk to you
guys later!
jpnChrName: 準備のお手伝い、張り切らないと！
jpnSearchText: 準備のお手伝い、張り切らないと！

engChrName: Are Shaheena and her big sister okay...?
engSearchText: Are Shaheena and her big sister okay...?
jpnChrName: シャヒーナたち、大丈夫かな……？
jpnSearchText: シャヒーナたち、大丈夫かな……？

engChrName: There are so many more scary people than before. I'm scared it's gonna be just like yesterday for them again.
engSearchText:
There are so many more scary people than before.
I'm scared it's gonna be just like yesterday for
them again.
jpnChrName: いつも以上に乱暴な人が増えてるし、 昨日みたいなことが無いか心配だよ。
jpnSearchText:
いつも以上に乱暴な人が増えてるし、
昨日みたいなことが無いか心配だよ。

engChrName: The parade is tomorrow! If something happens to them, I, I... *sniffle*
engSearchText:
The parade is tomorrow! If something happens to
them, I, I... *sniffle*
jpnChrName: せっかく明日のパレードもあるのに、 何かに巻き込まれたりしたら……
jpnSearchText:
せっかく明日のパレードもあるのに、
何かに巻き込まれたりしたら……

engChrName: I saw Saara talking to some hairy old guy. He was weird. He was dressed up like he was on vacation.
engSearchText:
I saw Saara talking to some hairy old guy. He
was weird. He was dressed up like he was on vacation.
jpnChrName: そういえばサァラ姉ちゃん、昼間派手な服を 着たおじさんに何か声掛けられててさ。
jpnSearchText:
そういえばサァラ姉ちゃん、昼間派手な服を
着たおじさんに何か声掛けられててさ。

engChrName: My brother says his name is Mr. Gotti. I guess he's somebody important who works for the film festival.
engSearchText:
My brother says his name is Mr. Gotti. I guess he's
somebody important who works for the film festival.
jpnChrName: 兄ちゃんが言うには、ゴッチっていう 映画祭の関係の偉い人みたいなんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
兄ちゃんが言うには、ゴッチっていう
映画祭の関係の偉い人みたいなんだけど……

engChrName: Saara looked so surprised when she was talking to him. Wait a minute... Is she gonna be dancing in the parade?! She is, isn't she?!
engSearchText:
Saara looked so surprised when she was talking
to him. Wait a minute... Is she gonna be dancing in
the parade?! She is, isn't she?!
jpnChrName: サァラ姉ちゃんも驚いた顔してたし…… もしかして、踊りを祭りで見せるのかな！？
jpnSearchText:
サァラ姉ちゃんも驚いた顔してたし……
もしかして、踊りを祭りで見せるのかな！？

engChrName: You guys were awesome! You sure taught those bullies a lesson!
engSearchText:
You guys were awesome! You sure taught those
bullies a lesson!
jpnChrName: さっきは凄かったね、乱暴なヤツを 懲らしめてくれてせいせいしたよ！
jpnSearchText:
さっきは凄かったね、乱暴なヤツを
懲らしめてくれてせいせいしたよ！

engChrName: Shaheena and Saara both work so hard. I can tell.
engSearchText: Shaheena and Saara both work so hard. I can tell.
jpnChrName: シャヒーナもサァラ姉ちゃんも、 本当に頑張り屋でさぁ……
jpnSearchText:
シャヒーナもサァラ姉ちゃんも、
本当に頑張り屋でさぁ……

engChrName: How could anyone be so mean to them?! That's wrong!
engSearchText:
How could anyone be so mean to them?!
That's wrong!
jpnChrName: あんな二人の頑張りを踏み躙るなんて、 絶対に許せないよ！
jpnSearchText:
あんな二人の頑張りを踏み躙るなんて、
絶対に許せないよ！

engChrName: My big brother and I have known Shaheena and Saara since they first came to Tharbad.
engSearchText:
My big brother and I have known Shaheena and
Saara since they first came to Tharbad.
jpnChrName: 僕と兄ちゃん、シャヒーナたちが 街に来てからの付き合いでさ。
jpnSearchText:
僕と兄ちゃん、シャヒーナたちが
街に来てからの付き合いでさ。

engChrName: He says he has a lot of sympathy for them because they're two siblings who work so hard, just like us.
engSearchText:
He says he has a lot of sympathy for them because
they're two siblings who work so hard, just like us.
jpnChrName: 兄ちゃん、キョウダイで頑張ってる者同士、 シンパシーとかいうの感じるんだって。
jpnSearchText:
兄ちゃん、キョウダイで頑張ってる者同士、
シンパシーとかいうの感じるんだって。

engChrName: And I totally agree! That's as good a reason as any to make friends with someone!
engSearchText:
And I totally agree! That's as good a reason as any to
make friends with someone!
jpnChrName: ま、僕としちゃ難しい事は良いけどさ。 仲良くするのに理由なんて関係無いよ！
jpnSearchText:
ま、僕としちゃ難しい事は良いけどさ。
仲良くするのに理由なんて関係無いよ！

engChrName: Hey! If it isn't my favorite spriggan and company! Get a load of all this! My pride and joy is ready to be unleashed upon the city!
engSearchText:
Hey! If it isn't my favorite spriggan and company!
Get a load of all this! My pride and joy is ready to be
unleashed upon the city!
jpnChrName: おお、お前さん達か！　見ての通り、 ワシの肝いりのパレードも準備万端じゃ！
jpnSearchText:
おお、お前さん達か！　見ての通り、
ワシの肝いりのパレードも準備万端じゃ！

engChrName: You all will be in for one hell of a show! More than you can possibly imagine! It'll shock and amaze you in ways you didn't know were shockable!
engSearchText:
You all will be in for one hell of a show! More than
you can possibly imagine! It'll shock and amaze you in
ways you didn't know were shockable!
jpnChrName: お前さん達もきっと驚くじゃろう、 予想の上を行くド派手さに仕上がっておるはずだ！
jpnSearchText:
お前さん達もきっと驚くじゃろう、
予想の上を行くド派手さに仕上がっておるはずだ！

engChrName: Ol' Gaspard...wouldn't want anyone moping over him, so I'm staying focused on delivering the glitziest, most glamorous show ever seen!
engSearchText:
Ol' Gaspard...wouldn't want anyone moping over
him, so I'm staying focused on delivering the glitziest,
most glamorous show ever seen!
jpnChrName: 今は亡きギャスパーも湿っぽいのは望まんじゃろう、 彼のためにもとにかく派手にやるぞ！
jpnSearchText:
今は亡きギャスパーも湿っぽいのは望まんじゃろう、
彼のためにもとにかく派手にやるぞ！

engChrName: As for what happened last night...well, I plan to say basically the same thing in my speech later.
engSearchText:
As for what happened last night...well, I plan to say
basically the same thing in my speech later.
jpnChrName: 昨晩の件については……ワシがスピーチの折に 話せる範囲で公表しておくとする。
jpnSearchText:
昨晩の件については……ワシがスピーチの折に
話せる範囲で公表しておくとする。

engChrName: Rumors are already beginning to float around. Way I see it, people won't be able to enjoy the festival if they have any misgivings about it.
engSearchText:
Rumors are already beginning to float around. Way I
see it, people won't be able to enjoy the festival if they
have any misgivings about it.
jpnChrName: 噂も立ち始めとるしな、変に疑ったまま 映画祭を迎えては楽しむものも楽しめんからな。
jpnSearchText:
噂も立ち始めとるしな、変に疑ったまま
映画祭を迎えては楽しむものも楽しめんからな。

engChrName: That said, I always give my speeches off the cuff. No scripts for me! You gotta talk from the heart to reach people, in my opinion.
engSearchText:
That said, I always give my speeches off the cuff.
No scripts for me! You gotta talk from the heart to
reach people, in my opinion.
jpnChrName: ちなみにワシはスピーチの原稿は用意せん主義じゃ。 感じたままに話した方が気持ちも伝わるからな！
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにワシはスピーチの原稿は用意せん主義じゃ。
感じたままに話した方が気持ちも伝わるからな！

engChrName: The Tharbad Police view the rampant counterfeiting in this town as a serious problem in need of addressing.
engSearchText:
The Tharbad Police view the rampant counterfeiting
in this town as a serious problem in need
of addressing.
jpnChrName: 以前から“偽ブランド品”の横行は 問題視されていましたが……
jpnSearchText:
以前から“偽ブランド品”の横行は
問題視されていましたが……

engChrName: Your case deserves urgent attention from us. When I get back to the station, I'm going to notify my boss of what's happened.
engSearchText:
Your case deserves urgent attention from us. When I
get back to the station, I'm going to notify my boss of
what's happened.
jpnChrName: やはり早急に手を打つ必要がありますね。 署に戻り次第、上官にこの件を報告します。
jpnSearchText:
やはり早急に手を打つ必要がありますね。
署に戻り次第、上官にこの件を報告します。

engChrName: Rest assured, that seller won't get away with this. He WILL be brought to justice, I promise!
engSearchText:
Rest assured, that seller won't get away with this.
He WILL be brought to justice, I promise!
jpnChrName: 必ず検挙してみせますのでご安心ください！
jpnSearchText: 必ず検挙してみせますのでご安心ください！

engChrName: *sigh* How am I ever going to find this guy if even the Bracer Guild doesn't know where he is? Man...
engSearchText:
*sigh* How am I ever going to find this guy if even
the Bracer Guild doesn't know where he is? Man...
jpnChrName: ふぅ……まさか遊撃士協会に行っても 見つからないだなんて……
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……まさか遊撃士協会に行っても
見つからないだなんて……

engChrName: He could be anywhere! I guess I'll wait around a little and hope I hear back from the guild...
engSearchText:
He could be anywhere! I guess I'll wait around a little
and hope I hear back from the guild...
jpnChrName: あの人は一体どこにいるんだろう…… 連絡が来ないか、少し待ってみようかな……
jpnSearchText:
あの人は一体どこにいるんだろう……
連絡が来ないか、少し待ってみようかな……

engChrName: Sinem's over there, working hard.
engSearchText: Sinem's over there, working hard.
jpnChrName: あっちでシーナム君が頑張っているんだ。
jpnSearchText: あっちでシーナム君が頑張っているんだ。

engChrName: Things might be a little confusing for her at first, but the longer she does it, the more she'll come to grips with everything.
engSearchText:
Things might be a little confusing for her at first, but
the longer she does it, the more she'll come to grips
with everything.
jpnChrName: うんうん、最初は戸惑うだろうが そうやって仕事は覚えていくものだ！
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、最初は戸惑うだろうが
そうやって仕事は覚えていくものだ！

engChrName: It's our job to teach her as much as we can, as quick as we can, so that she can come to live an honest and independent life.
engSearchText:
It's our job to teach her as much as we can, as quick as
we can, so that she can come to live an honest and
independent life.
jpnChrName: 彼女がいつか独り立ち出来るように この調子で、色々と教えてあげないとなぁ！
jpnSearchText:
彼女がいつか独り立ち出来るように
この調子で、色々と教えてあげないとなぁ！

engChrName: Sinem needs to get used to how things work in the bazaar, so I plan on starting her off as a barker.
engSearchText:
Sinem needs to get used to how things work in the
bazaar, so I plan on starting her off as a barker.
jpnChrName: まずはバザールに馴染んでもらう為にも 呼び込み係りから始めようと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
まずはバザールに馴染んでもらう為にも
呼び込み係りから始めようと思ってな。

engChrName: With the influx of tourists right now, it ought to make for good training for her.
engSearchText:
With the influx of tourists right now, it ought to
make for good training for her.
jpnChrName: 丁度、観光客が増えている時期だし いい修業になると思うぞ！
jpnSearchText:
丁度、観光客が増えている時期だし
いい修業になると思うぞ！

engChrName: Now that I've introduced Sinem to everyone at the bazaar, we're going to go off and have dinner somewhere.
engSearchText:
Now that I've introduced Sinem to everyone at the
bazaar, we're going to go off and have
dinner somewhere.
jpnChrName: バザールの皆への彼女の紹介も済んで、 ひとまず夕食を食べに行く所なんだ。
jpnSearchText:
バザールの皆への彼女の紹介も済んで、
ひとまず夕食を食べに行く所なんだ。

engChrName: She's not so good with words, but thankfully, everyone seems to understand that she's sorry for all the trouble she's caused.
engSearchText:
She's not so good with words, but thankfully,
everyone seems to understand that she's sorry for all
the trouble she's caused.
jpnChrName: 彼女は素直じゃないが、バザールの皆へ 申し訳なく思ってる気持ちは届いたようでね。
jpnSearchText:
彼女は素直じゃないが、バザールの皆へ
申し訳なく思ってる気持ちは届いたようでね。

engChrName: Not everyone's forgiven her, but I was at least able to get them to tolerate her being in the bazaar, which is an important first step.
engSearchText:
Not everyone's forgiven her, but I was at least able to
get them to tolerate her being in the bazaar, which is
an important first step.
jpnChrName: 全員とはいかずとも、 無事、バザールに受け入れてもらえたよ。
jpnSearchText:
全員とはいかずとも、
無事、バザールに受け入れてもらえたよ。

engChrName: What happens from there might come down to how hard she decides to work.
engSearchText:
What happens from there might come down to how
hard she decides to work.
jpnChrName: 後は彼女の働きぶりにかかってる かもしれないな。
jpnSearchText:
後は彼女の働きぶりにかかってる
かもしれないな。

engChrName: In the meantime, I think I'm going to treat her to a good meal before we head on over to the temple. It's about time she had something nice!
engSearchText:
In the meantime, I think I'm going to treat her to a
good meal before we head on over to the temple.
It's about time she had something nice!
jpnChrName: さてと……この後寺院の所へ行く前に まずは美味しい料理をご馳走しようじゃないか！
jpnSearchText:
さてと……この後寺院の所へ行く前に
まずは美味しい料理をご馳走しようじゃないか！

engChrName: I think I'm going to treat Sinem to a good meal before we head on over to the temple. It's about time she had something nice!
engSearchText:
I think I'm going to treat Sinem to a good meal
before we head on over to the temple. It's about time
she had something nice!
jpnChrName: さてと……明日から頑張ってもらう為にも まずは美味しい料理をご馳走しようじゃないか！
jpnSearchText:
さてと……明日から頑張ってもらう為にも
まずは美味しい料理をご馳走しようじゃないか！

engChrName: Nothing's going to change with her unless we make sure she's not starving any longer.
engSearchText:
Nothing's going to change with her unless we make
sure she's not starving any longer.
jpnChrName: まずは彼女の腹ごしらえから 始めないといけないな。
jpnSearchText:
まずは彼女の腹ごしらえから
始めないといけないな。

engChrName: I know! I'll pay another visit to Hala's inn and see if she can throw something together for us.
engSearchText:
I know! I'll pay another visit to Hala's inn and see if
she can throw something together for us.
jpnChrName: ははは、ここはまたハーラさんの 宿酒場の世話になるとするかな！
jpnSearchText:
ははは、ここはまたハーラさんの
宿酒場の世話になるとするかな！

engChrName: Obviously, I'm aware of which stalls our little thief has struck until now.
engSearchText:
Obviously, I'm aware of which stalls our little thief
has struck until now.
jpnChrName: 私の方でもスリの被害に遭った 店は把握しているのだが……
jpnSearchText:
私の方でもスリの被害に遭った
店は把握しているのだが……

engChrName: But the owners of the stalls are all a little too polite to give, shall we say, unvarnished opinions.
engSearchText:
But the owners of the stalls are all a little too polite to
give, shall we say, unvarnished opinions.
jpnChrName: 相手が元締めの私となると、 皆気を遣ってしまうようだからね。
jpnSearchText:
相手が元締めの私となると、
皆気を遣ってしまうようだからね。

engChrName: Hopefully, if you guys talk to them instead, they'll be willing to speak their minds more freely.
engSearchText:
Hopefully, if you guys talk to them instead, they'll be
willing to speak their minds more freely.
jpnChrName: 君たちが直接話を聞いた方が 忌憚ない意見を聞けるんじゃないかな。
jpnSearchText:
君たちが直接話を聞いた方が
忌憚ない意見を聞けるんじゃないかな。

engChrName: I'm sorry to have to get you all involved in this, but I appreciate your help. Good luck out there!
engSearchText:
I'm sorry to have to get you all involved in this, but I
appreciate your help. Good luck out there!
jpnChrName: 世話をかけるがよろしく頼むよ。
jpnSearchText: 世話をかけるがよろしく頼むよ。

engChrName: Hmm... What should I do? We can't ignore this problem any longer. It's getting out of hand...
engSearchText:
Hmm... What should I do? We can't ignore this
problem any longer. It's getting out of hand...
jpnChrName: ううむ……どうしたものか…… これ以上は見過ごす訳にも……
jpnSearchText:
ううむ……どうしたものか……
これ以上は見過ごす訳にも……

engChrName: (Wonder what his problem is? He keeps mumbling on about something.)
engSearchText:
(Wonder what his problem is? He keeps mumbling
on about something.)
jpnChrName: （なんだ？   グダグダ言ってるみてえだが。）
jpnSearchText:
（なんだ？
グダグダ言ってるみてえだが。）

engChrName: (Beats me. Could be someone who needs our help.)
engSearchText: (Beats me. Could be someone who needs our help.)
jpnChrName: （さてな……だが、どこかに   依頼を出してる可能性はありそうだ。）
jpnSearchText:
（さてな……だが、どこかに
依頼を出してる可能性はありそうだ。）

engChrName: (Why don't we see if there are any bulletin boards around here? Maybe he posted something already.)
engSearchText:
(Why don't we see if there are any bulletin boards
around here? Maybe he posted something already.)
jpnChrName: （見てない掲示板を   確認しに行ってみましょうか。）
jpnSearchText:
（見てない掲示板を
確認しに行ってみましょうか。）

engChrName: H-Hello! Welcome!
engSearchText: H-Hello! Welcome!
jpnChrName: い、いらっしゃいませ～……
jpnSearchText: い、いらっしゃいませ～……

engChrName: Er, we've got...sweet honey and, uh...the freshest apples in town. Won't you...buy some? Maybe?
engSearchText:
Er, we've got...sweet honey and, uh...the freshest
apples in town. Won't you...buy some? Maybe?
jpnChrName: ええと……蜜が甘くて 皮まで新鮮なリンゴ……いかがですか～……
jpnSearchText:
ええと……蜜が甘くて
皮まで新鮮なリンゴ……いかがですか～……

engChrName: (Augh! This is SO awkward! Do I really have to yell all the time? I don't know what the heck I'm supposed to say!)
engSearchText:
(Augh! This is SO awkward! Do I really have to yell
all the time? I don't know what the heck I'm
supposed to say!)
jpnChrName: （ううっ～、何て言ったらいいか分からないし   大声を出すなんて恥ずかしいんだけど！）
jpnSearchText:
（ううっ～、何て言ったらいいか分からないし
大声を出すなんて恥ずかしいんだけど！）

engChrName: (But I can't give up! I have to make at least some sales so I don't get fired...)
engSearchText:
(But I can't give up! I have to make at least some sales
so I don't get fired...)
jpnChrName: （でも……少しくらい結果を出さないと   クビにされちゃうかもしれないし……）
jpnSearchText:
（でも……少しくらい結果を出さないと
クビにされちゃうかもしれないし……）

engChrName: (Gah, hang in there, Sinem! Just give it all you've got!)
engSearchText:
(Gah, hang in there, Sinem! Just give it all
you've got!)
jpnChrName: （くっ、とにかく頑張らないと……！）
jpnSearchText: （くっ、とにかく頑張らないと……！）

engChrName: Once you find out how tasty these apples are, you'll have to stop yourself from stealing more! Just like me!
engSearchText:
Once you find out how tasty these apples are, you'll
have to stop yourself from stealing more! Just like me!
jpnChrName: この店から盗む時は、必ず盗っておきたいくらい 美味しいリンゴですよ～……！
jpnSearchText:
この店から盗む時は、必ず盗っておきたいくらい
美味しいリンゴですよ～……！

engChrName: (Crap! I shouldn't have said that much! I need to change my approach, pronto!)
engSearchText:
(Crap! I shouldn't have said that much! I need to
change my approach, pronto!)
jpnChrName: （って、素直に言いすぎちゃった……   この言い方は止めておこう……）
jpnSearchText:
（って、素直に言いすぎちゃった……
この言い方は止めておこう……）

engChrName: *sigh* How did I end up working for a stall I used to swipe food from? I mean, seriously.
engSearchText:
*sigh* How did I end up working for a stall I used to
swipe food from? I mean, seriously.
jpnChrName: はぁ、昨日まで盗んでた店のために 呼び込みをする事になるなんてね。
jpnSearchText:
はぁ、昨日まで盗んでた店のために
呼び込みをする事になるなんてね。

engChrName: But...I guess I can't complain TOO much. I have gotten some nice food to eat, and I like the room I'm staying in.
engSearchText:
But...I guess I can't complain TOO much. I have
gotten some nice food to eat, and I like the room I'm
staying in.
jpnChrName: でも……美味しいご飯を奢ってもらったし、 いい部屋も貰っちゃったし……
jpnSearchText:
でも……美味しいご飯を奢ってもらったし、
いい部屋も貰っちゃったし……

engChrName: It could be worse. Maybe it's not so bad working here, after all.
engSearchText:
It could be worse. Maybe it's not so bad working
here, after all.
jpnChrName: 少しは頑張ってやっても いいかもしれないわね。
jpnSearchText:
少しは頑張ってやっても
いいかもしれないわね。

engChrName: Between running away from you guys and then introducing myself to everyone at the bazaar, today has been...a lot. Like, a lot a lot.
engSearchText:
Between running away from you guys and then
introducing myself to everyone at the bazaar, today
has been...a lot. Like, a lot a lot.
jpnChrName: 今日はアンタ達と街中を走り回った上に、 その上バザールのやつらに顔を出して回って……
jpnSearchText:
今日はアンタ達と街中を走り回った上に、
その上バザールのやつらに顔を出して回って……

engChrName: *sigh* I'm so tired, I feel like I could pass out any second!
engSearchText:
*sigh* I'm so tired, I feel like I could pass out
any second!
jpnChrName: はぁ……今日は散々だったわ。 疲れて眠くなって来たかも…………
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……今日は散々だったわ。
疲れて眠くなって来たかも…………

engChrName: ...I feel so lame being treated to food like that, though. Like I'm just some kind of charity case people can feel sorry for.
engSearchText:
...I feel so lame being treated to food like
that, though. Like I'm just some kind of charity case
people can feel sorry for.
jpnChrName: ……ご飯を奢ってもらうなんて 施しを受けるみたいで格好悪いけど。
jpnSearchText:
……ご飯を奢ってもらうなんて
施しを受けるみたいで格好悪いけど。

engChrName: Not that I'm in any position to turn down that kind of thing, now that I've agreed to work at the bazaar. Ugh.
engSearchText:
Not that I'm in any position to turn down that kind
of thing, now that I've agreed to work at the bazaar.
Ugh.
jpnChrName: バザールで働くって決めたんだから、 突っぱねてもいられないわよね……
jpnSearchText:
バザールで働くって決めたんだから、
突っぱねてもいられないわよね……

engChrName: I'm just about to introduce all of the vendors to Sinem.
engSearchText:
I'm just about to introduce all of the vendors
to Sinem.
jpnChrName: これからバザールの皆に 彼女の紹介をしようと思うんだ。
jpnSearchText:
これからバザールの皆に
彼女の紹介をしようと思うんだ。

engChrName: I don't exactly expect everyone to welcome her with open arms. It's quite possible some of them will give her a hard time.
engSearchText:
I don't exactly expect everyone to welcome her with
open arms. It's quite possible some of them will give
her a hard time.
jpnChrName: もちろん最初はみんなから叱られたり するかもしれないけど……
jpnSearchText:
もちろん最初はみんなから叱られたり
するかもしれないけど……

engChrName: But it's all just part of the process. In time, I'm sure they'll learn to warm up to her, and even embrace her.
engSearchText:
But it's all just part of the process. In time, I'm sure
they'll learn to warm up to her, and even embrace her.
jpnChrName: それも必要な事だと思うし、 ゆくゆくは仲間になれると思ってるからね。
jpnSearchText:
それも必要な事だと思うし、
ゆくゆくは仲間になれると思ってるからね。

engChrName: Sounds like it'll be rough. Good luck, Sinem! You can do it! We've all got your back!
engSearchText:
Sounds like it'll be rough. Good luck, Sinem! You can
do it! We've all got your back!
jpnChrName: なるほど…… 頑張ってください、応援してますから！
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……
頑張ってください、応援してますから！

engChrName: *sigh* I dunno what you expect me to say to these people. Seriously!
engSearchText:
*sigh* I dunno what you expect me to say to
these people. Seriously!
jpnChrName: はぁ……どのツラ下げてって感じでしょ。
jpnSearchText: はぁ……どのツラ下げてって感じでしょ。

engChrName: I told you before, I'm not gonna apologize for what I did!
engSearchText:
I told you before, I'm not gonna apologize for what
I did!
jpnChrName: それに、盗んだ事は反省してないからね。
jpnSearchText: それに、盗んだ事は反省してないからね。

engChrName: I had to do it to survive. I would've literally died if I didn't take matters into my own hands...
engSearchText:
I had to do it to survive. I would've literally died if I
didn't take matters into my own hands...
jpnChrName: 前にも言ったけど…… 飢え死にしない為には必要だった訳だし……
jpnSearchText:
前にも言ったけど……
飢え死にしない為には必要だった訳だし……

engChrName: Then be honest and tell them that. I think everyone knows, deep down, that was the case.
engSearchText:
Then be honest and tell them that. I think everyone
knows, deep down, that was the case.
jpnChrName: なに、皆にも素直にそう言えばいいだけさ。 君の事情は察してくれているだろう。
jpnSearchText:
なに、皆にも素直にそう言えばいいだけさ。
君の事情は察してくれているだろう。

engChrName: Still, if you understand what you did was wrong, it wouldn't hurt to tell them you're sorry, would it?
engSearchText:
Still, if you understand what you did was wrong, it
wouldn't hurt to tell them you're sorry, would it?
jpnChrName: ただまあ、悪い事をしたと思っているなら 素直になっておいた方がいいかもしれないな？
jpnSearchText:
ただまあ、悪い事をしたと思っているなら
素直になっておいた方がいいかもしれないな？

engChrName: That's what I'm saying! I'm NOT sorry about what happened, not even a lit—
engSearchText:
That's what I'm saying! I'm NOT sorry about what
happened, not even a lit—
jpnChrName: だ、だから悪い事したなんて 思ってないんだから……！
jpnSearchText:
だ、だから悪い事したなんて
思ってないんだから……！

engChrName: *grumble*
engSearchText: *grumble*
jpnChrName: （グゥ～ギュルルル……）
jpnSearchText: （グゥ～ギュルルル……）

engChrName: Bahaha! Right, I suppose we've been talking too long. Looks like we need to get some food in you first, hmm?
engSearchText:
Bahaha! Right, I suppose we've been talking too long.
Looks like we need to get some food in you
first, hmm?
jpnChrName: ははは！　悪い悪い、 まずは腹ごしらえが必要だったか！
jpnSearchText:
ははは！　悪い悪い、
まずは腹ごしらえが必要だったか！

engChrName: MGRR! Don't laugh at me! This isn't funny!
engSearchText: MGRR! Don't laugh at me! This isn't funny!
jpnChrName: もうっ、笑わないでよね！？
jpnSearchText: もうっ、笑わないでよね！？

engChrName: (Heehee! She seems good at heart. Hopefully she and the sellers will learn to get along.)
engSearchText:
(Heehee! She seems good at heart. Hopefully she and
the sellers will learn to get along.)
jpnChrName: （ふふ、バザールの皆さんと   上手くやっていけると良いですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふ、バザールの皆さんと
上手くやっていけると良いですね。）

engChrName: Okay, starting today, you're going to be helping around the bazaar.
engSearchText:
Okay, starting today, you're going to be helping
around the bazaar.
jpnChrName: さて、それでは今日から バザールの仕事を手伝ってもらうとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
さて、それでは今日から
バザールの仕事を手伝ってもらうとしよう。

engChrName: What you're about to do might feel tough while everything's new to you, but trust me, it's all a part of your training.
engSearchText:
What you're about to do might feel tough while
everything's new to you, but trust me, it's all a part of
your training.
jpnChrName: 慣れない君には過酷かもしれんが、 これも修行の内だと思ってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
慣れない君には過酷かもしれんが、
これも修行の内だと思ってくれ。

engChrName: Yeah, right. I doubt it'll be anything THAT hard.
engSearchText: Yeah, right. I doubt it'll be anything THAT hard.
jpnChrName: 過酷ね……いいから早く言いなさいよ。
jpnSearchText: 過酷ね……いいから早く言いなさいよ。

engChrName: I've cleaned ditches and swept chimneys before. Nothing you could suggest'll scare me! Just spit it out already.
engSearchText:
I've cleaned ditches and swept chimneys before.
Nothing you could suggest'll scare me! Just spit it
out already.
jpnChrName: アタシ、どぶさらいだって煙突掃除だって やった事があるんだからね。
jpnSearchText:
アタシ、どぶさらいだって煙突掃除だって
やった事があるんだからね。

engChrName: Well, if you insist. Your first job...is going to be as a barker. Congratulations!
engSearchText:
Well, if you insist. Your first job...is going to be as
a barker. Congratulations!
jpnChrName: よし──では早速君には バザールの呼び込み係りをやってもらう！
jpnSearchText:
よし──では早速君には
バザールの呼び込み係りをやってもらう！

engChrName: You're going to put on a loud voice and do whatever you can to drum up excitement around the stalls and bring in customers!
engSearchText:
You're going to put on a loud voice and do whatever
you can to drum up excitement around the stalls and
bring in customers!
jpnChrName: それぞれの店のウリを 大声で叫んで通行人を呼び込むのだ！
jpnSearchText:
それぞれの店のウリを
大声で叫んで通行人を呼び込むのだ！

engChrName: AJA-BWAHJA-WHAT?! You can't make me do that! I don't know how to, I dunno, hype people up!
engSearchText:
AJA-BWAHJA-WHAT?! You can't make me
do that! I don't know how to, I dunno, hype
people up!
jpnChrName: ええっ！？ お店のウリとか分かんないわよ！
jpnSearchText:
ええっ！？
お店のウリとか分かんないわよ！

engChrName: Sure you do! You just don't realize it yet. Take those apples you can find at Monir's stall.
engSearchText:
Sure you do! You just don't realize it yet. Take those
apples you can find at Monir's stall.
jpnChrName: 例えばモニールさんの店のリンゴならどうだ？
jpnSearchText: 例えばモニールさんの店のリンゴならどうだ？

engChrName: Those apples are so good, you stole them countless times, yes? If anybody can tell customers just how delicious they are, it's you.
engSearchText:
Those apples are so good, you stole them countless
times, yes? If anybody can tell customers just how
delicious they are, it's you.
jpnChrName: 何度も盗むほど美味しいという事は 君がよく分かってるんじゃないか？
jpnSearchText:
何度も盗むほど美味しいという事は
君がよく分かってるんじゃないか？

engChrName: MRRGH! Shut up! All right, all right! I'll give it a try! Just lay off me, already!
engSearchText:
MRRGH! Shut up! All right, all right! I'll give it
a try! Just lay off me, already!
jpnChrName: ～～～ッ！　分かったわよ！ やればいいんでしょ！
jpnSearchText:
～～～ッ！　分かったわよ！
やればいいんでしょ！

engChrName: (Got her hittin' the ground running, I see. Hang in there, kid.)
engSearchText:
(Got her hittin' the ground running, I see. Hang in
there, kid.)
jpnChrName: （ハッ、早速頑張ってるみてえだな。）
jpnSearchText: （ハッ、早速頑張ってるみてえだな。）

engChrName: Hmm... Nobody's coming...
engSearchText: Hmm... Nobody's coming...
jpnChrName: ううむ……来ないな……
jpnSearchText: ううむ……来ないな……

engChrName: Perhaps I made a mistake posting that request and it didn't reach them?
engSearchText:
Perhaps I made a mistake posting that request and it
didn't reach them?
jpnChrName: あの方法できちんと 依頼が届いているのだろうか……？
jpnSearchText:
あの方法できちんと
依頼が届いているのだろうか……？

engChrName: (Huh? Did he say something about posting a request?)
engSearchText:
(Huh? Did he say something about posting
a request?)
jpnChrName: （ん？　依頼だと……？）
jpnSearchText: （ん？　依頼だと……？）

engChrName: (Better check the bulletin board and see if there's anything new.)
engSearchText:
(Better check the bulletin board and see if there's
anything new.)
jpnChrName: （試しに掲示板を確認しておくか。）
jpnSearchText: （試しに掲示板を確認しておくか。）

engChrName: Hell yeah, I like this place already. All this hustle and bustle's my kind of scene.
engSearchText:
Hell yeah, I like this place already. All this hustle and
bustle's my kind of scene.
jpnChrName: ヒュウ、いいねぇ。 こういう賑わいは嫌いじゃねえぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ヒュウ、いいねぇ。
こういう賑わいは嫌いじゃねえぜ。

engChrName: Tharbad's famous for its bazaar.
engSearchText: Tharbad's famous for its bazaar.
jpnChrName: サルバッド名物のバザールですね。
jpnSearchText: サルバッド名物のバザールですね。

engChrName: The last time I came here, I remember there being traditional music and dancing and stuff!
engSearchText:
The last time I came here, I remember there being
traditional music and dancing and stuff!
jpnChrName: 前に来た時はこのあたりで 伝統的な音楽や踊りも見ましたっけ。
jpnSearchText:
前に来た時はこのあたりで
伝統的な音楽や踊りも見ましたっけ。

engChrName: Oooh, that sounds fun! I'd love to see some of that.
engSearchText: Oooh, that sounds fun! I'd love to see some of that.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それは私も 是非見てみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、それは私も
是非見てみたいですね。

engChrName: Hey, I recognize those things. Don't you smoke stuff out of them?
engSearchText:
Hey, I recognize those things. Don't you smoke stuff
out of them?
jpnChrName: あれはたしか…… タバコの一種だったか？
jpnSearchText:
あれはたしか……
タバコの一種だったか？

engChrName: That's right. I've read about them before.
engSearchText: That's right. I've read about them before.
jpnChrName: はい、本で読んだことがあります。
jpnSearchText: はい、本で読んだことがあります。

engChrName: They're 'hookahs,' traditional devices that come from the Central East.
engSearchText:
They're 'hookahs,' traditional devices that come from
the Central East.
jpnChrName: 《水タバコ（シーシャ）》── 大陸中東の伝統的な嗜好品ですね。
jpnSearchText:
《水タバコ（シーシャ）》──
大陸中東の伝統的な嗜好品ですね。

engChrName: Right. Can't say I'm into smoking, but all this talk about vices has me keen on trying some of the booze around here now, heh.
engSearchText:
Right. Can't say I'm into smoking, but all this talk
about vices has me keen on trying some of the booze
around here now, heh.
jpnChrName: ハン、タバコはあんま興味ねぇが こっちの酒はちょい気になるな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、タバコはあんま興味ねぇが
こっちの酒はちょい気になるな。

engChrName: Save the sightseein' for later, folks.
engSearchText: Save the sightseein' for later, folks.
jpnChrName: ま、観光は後にしとけ。
jpnSearchText: ま、観光は後にしとけ。

engChrName: We got an inn we need to check into first. It should be just past that sign over there.
engSearchText:
We got an inn we need to check into first. It should
be just past that sign over there.
jpnChrName: 予約してた宿は…… 向こうの坂の先だな。
jpnSearchText:
予約してた宿は……
向こうの坂の先だな。

engChrName: (Oh, hey!)
engSearchText: (Oh, hey!)
jpnChrName: （あ、それって──）
jpnSearchText: （あ、それって──）

engChrName: Come on, Saara! We've gotta get going!
engSearchText: Come on, Saara! We've gotta get going!
jpnChrName: ほらサァラ姉、早く早く！
jpnSearchText: ほらサァラ姉、早く早く！

engChrName: Okay, okay! Right behind you.
engSearchText: Okay, okay! Right behind you.
jpnChrName: はいはい、今行くから。
jpnSearchText: はいはい、今行くから。

engChrName: Feri! It's so good to see you! How've you been?
engSearchText: Feri! It's so good to see you! How've you been?
jpnChrName: まあまあ、フェリちゃんじゃないかい！ 久しぶりだねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
まあまあ、フェリちゃんじゃないかい！
久しぶりだねぇ。

engChrName: I'm doing great! Nice to see you, too, Ms. Hala!
engSearchText: I'm doing great! Nice to see you, too, Ms. Hala!
jpnChrName: お久しぶりですっ、女将さん！
jpnSearchText: お久しぶりですっ、女将さん！

engChrName: Oh, I see, this must be where—
engSearchText: Oh, I see, this must be where—
jpnChrName: あ、もしかして……
jpnSearchText: あ、もしかして……

engChrName: Yeah, this is where me and the rest of the Kruga stayed before. It's neat to see it again!
engSearchText:
Yeah, this is where me and the rest of the Kruga
stayed before. It's neat to see it again!
jpnChrName: はいっ、前に戦士団で泊まった宿なんです。 ちょっとびっくりしました。
jpnSearchText:
はいっ、前に戦士団で泊まった宿なんです。
ちょっとびっくりしました。

engChrName: Haha. Fate has a way of bringing people together like that. Anyway, welcome to Tharbad, everyone.
engSearchText:
Haha. Fate has a way of bringing people together
like that. Anyway, welcome to Tharbad, everyone.
jpnChrName: はは、これも縁ってヤツかねぇ。 ──改めてサルバッドにようこそだ。
jpnSearchText:
はは、これも縁ってヤツかねぇ。
──改めてサルバッドにようこそだ。

engChrName: Two rooms, right? I'll show you where you'll be staying. Follow me.
engSearchText:
Two rooms, right? I'll show you where you'll
be staying. Follow me.
jpnChrName: ２部屋の予約だったね。 さっそく案内させてもらうよ。
jpnSearchText:
２部屋の予約だったね。
さっそく案内させてもらうよ。

engChrName: Glad to hear it. After you.
engSearchText: Glad to hear it. After you.
jpnChrName: ああ、宜しく頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、宜しく頼むぜ。

engChrName: I see! So you're living and studying in Edith these days, are you?
engSearchText:
I see! So you're living and studying in Edith these
days, are you?
jpnChrName: へえ、じゃあ今は 共和国首都（イーディス）で勉強してるのかい。
jpnSearchText:
へえ、じゃあ今は
共和国首都（イーディス）で勉強してるのかい。

engChrName: I'm impressed! You've grown so much in just a year.
engSearchText: I'm impressed! You've grown so much in just a year.
jpnChrName: たった一年で成長したねぇ。 オバさんビックリしちまったよ！
jpnSearchText:
たった一年で成長したねぇ。
オバさんビックリしちまったよ！

engChrName: Aww, it's no big deal, really. I still have a lot to learn!
engSearchText: Aww, it's no big deal, really. I still have a lot to learn!
jpnChrName: え、えと、そんなことは。 まだまだ全然勉強不足ですし。
jpnSearchText:
え、えと、そんなことは。
まだまだ全然勉強不足ですし。

engChrName: I always have to ask Agnès to explain stuff to me. I feel so bad for her.
engSearchText:
I always have to ask Agnès to explain stuff to me.
I feel so bad for her.
jpnChrName: 分からない所とかも アニエスさんに頼りっきりで……
jpnSearchText:
分からない所とかも
アニエスさんに頼りっきりで……

engChrName: Heehee! Please, it's fine. I enjoy teaching her things. Our Feri is a quick study.
engSearchText:
Heehee! Please, it's fine. I enjoy teaching her things.
Our Feri is a quick study.
jpnChrName: ふふ、でも呑み込みが早いので 教える方としてもやり甲斐がありますね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、でも呑み込みが早いので
教える方としてもやり甲斐がありますね。

engChrName: Well, I'm glad to hear it! I can't wait to see what the future holds for her.
engSearchText:
Well, I'm glad to hear it! I can't wait to see what the
future holds for her.
jpnChrName: うんうん、こりゃあ将来が楽しみだ。
jpnSearchText: うんうん、こりゃあ将来が楽しみだ。

engChrName: So you're her boss, right? Make sure you do your job, too, and look after her well, got it?
engSearchText:
So you're her boss, right? Make sure you do your job,
too, and look after her well, got it?
jpnChrName: おっとアンタ、雇い主なんだってね？ しっかり支えてやんなさいな！
jpnSearchText:
おっとアンタ、雇い主なんだってね？
しっかり支えてやんなさいな！

engChrName: Ahem! Well, somebody thinks pretty highly of you.
engSearchText: Ahem! Well, somebody thinks pretty highly of you.
jpnChrName: ゲホッ…… 随分気に入られてるじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ゲホッ……
随分気に入られてるじゃねえか？

engChrName: Heehee. Yeah, she's always been really nice to me.
engSearchText: Heehee. Yeah, she's always been really nice to me.
jpnChrName: えへへ。 なんだか前から良くしてくれて。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ。
なんだか前から良くしてくれて。

engChrName: This'll make for a pretty solid crash pad. Rooms are clean and the food seems decent.
engSearchText:
This'll make for a pretty solid crash pad. Rooms are
clean and the food seems decent.
jpnChrName: ま、部屋も小綺麗だったし、 メシとかも期待してよさそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、部屋も小綺麗だったし、
メシとかも期待してよさそうだな。

engChrName: Guess it's time to get to work now?
engSearchText: Guess it's time to get to work now?
jpnChrName: ──そんじゃ、始めるかよ？
jpnSearchText: ──そんじゃ、始めるかよ？

engChrName: That it is. Dingo says he's done getting us some 4SPGs ready, too.
engSearchText:
That it is. Dingo says he's done getting us some
4SPGs ready, too.
jpnChrName: ああ──ディンゴの方で ４ｓｐｇの手配も済んでるって話だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──ディンゴの方で
４ｓｐｇの手配も済んでるって話だ。

engChrName: Let's take our time resolving whichever ones catch our eye and then head to the Al-Jumeirah Hotel in the Entertainment District by noon.
engSearchText:
Let's take our time resolving whichever ones catch
our eye and then head to the Al-Jumeirah Hotel in
the Entertainment District by noon.
jpnChrName: 適当にこなしつつ、午後までに 歓楽街のアルジュメイラホテルに向かうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
適当にこなしつつ、午後までに
歓楽街のアルジュメイラホテルに向かうぞ。

engChrName: Sounds good to me!
engSearchText: Sounds good to me!
jpnChrName: 分かりましたっ。
jpnSearchText: 分かりましたっ。

engChrName: Great. Then off to work we go.
engSearchText: Great. Then off to work we go.
jpnChrName: それでは解決業務、開始ですね。
jpnSearchText: それでは解決業務、開始ですね。

engChrName: It's so pretty!
engSearchText: It's so pretty!
jpnChrName: 綺麗ですね……
jpnSearchText: 綺麗ですね……

engChrName: We're definitely in Tharbad, with a view like this!
engSearchText: We're definitely in Tharbad, with a view like this!
jpnChrName: ここに来るとサルバッドに来た、 って感じがします。
jpnSearchText:
ここに来るとサルバッドに来た、
って感じがします。

engChrName: Yeah, you won't find this anywhere else in Calvard.
engSearchText: Yeah, you won't find this anywhere else in Calvard.
jpnChrName: ああ、他じゃ見れない光景だろう。
jpnSearchText: ああ、他じゃ見れない光景だろう。

engChrName: And that over there must be the six-star hotel we'll be visiting.
engSearchText:
And that over there must be the six-star hotel we'll
be visiting.
jpnChrName: そんで、あれが 待ち合わせの六つ星ホテルだな。
jpnSearchText:
そんで、あれが
待ち合わせの六つ星ホテルだな。

engChrName: So that's the Al-Jumeirah Hotel...
engSearchText: So that's the Al-Jumeirah Hotel...
jpnChrName: 《アルジュメイラホテル》……
jpnSearchText: 《アルジュメイラホテル》……

engChrName: Even from this far away, it looks huge.
engSearchText: Even from this far away, it looks huge.
jpnChrName: 遠くからも見えてましたけど、 やっぱり大きいですね。
jpnSearchText:
遠くからも見えてましたけど、
やっぱり大きいですね。

engChrName: The Kowloon Hotel back in Langport's no slouch, but that palace of decadence might as well be made straight out of mira.
engSearchText:
The Kowloon Hotel back in Langport's no slouch,
but that palace of decadence might as well be made
straight out of mira.
jpnChrName: ハッ、煌都にも九龍ホテルがあるが、 ミラのかけ方はケタ違いっぽいな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、煌都にも九龍ホテルがあるが、
ミラのかけ方はケタ違いっぽいな。

engChrName: I got to check out the observation lounge when I was here before, and it was sooo luxurious inside! I was blown away!
engSearchText:
I got to check out the observation lounge when I was
here before, and it was sooo luxurious inside! I was
blown away!
jpnChrName: 前の時に展望ラウンジを覗きましたけど 豪華すぎてびっくりしたくらいです。
jpnSearchText:
前の時に展望ラウンジを覗きましたけど
豪華すぎてびっくりしたくらいです。

engChrName: The city at night looks amazing from up there, too. It felt different compared to Langport.
engSearchText:
The city at night looks amazing from up there, too.
It felt different compared to Langport.
jpnChrName: ちなみに夜景も、ラングポートとは また違った感じで凄く良いんですよっ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに夜景も、ラングポートとは
また違った感じで凄く良いんですよっ。

engChrName: Huh. You don't say? Now I wanna see for myself.
engSearchText: Huh. You don't say? Now I wanna see for myself.
jpnChrName: ほう…… そう言われると気になんな。
jpnSearchText:
ほう……
そう言われると気になんな。

engChrName: Me, too. I'm sure it's as nice as Feri says.
engSearchText: Me, too. I'm sure it's as nice as Feri says.
jpnChrName: ふふ、是非とも見てみたいですね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、是非とも見てみたいですね。

engChrName: All right, that's enough slackin' off. Can't have you kids forgetting about work this quickly.
engSearchText:
All right, that's enough slackin' off. Can't have you
kids forgetting about work this quickly.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、仕事だってのは くれぐれも忘れてくれるなよ？
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、仕事だってのは
くれぐれも忘れてくれるなよ？

engChrName: Hey, Feri. Is that the dancing you saw before?
engSearchText: Hey, Feri. Is that the dancing you saw before?
jpnChrName: あ、もしかして フェリちゃんが見たっていう……
jpnSearchText:
あ、もしかして
フェリちゃんが見たっていう……

engChrName: I think it was a different dancer before, but yeah, it is! Let's check it out!
engSearchText:
I think it was a different dancer before, but yeah, it is!
Let's check it out!
jpnChrName: はい、別の人だと思いますけど…… 行ってみましょうっ。
jpnSearchText:
はい、別の人だと思いますけど……
行ってみましょうっ。

engChrName: (Damn.)
engSearchText: (Damn.)

engChrName: (She's way better than the other dancer I saw!)
engSearchText: (She's way better than the other dancer I saw!)
jpnChrName: （前に見たのよりもずっと……）
jpnSearchText: （前に見たのよりもずっと……）

engChrName: (It's captivating. I can hardly take my eyes off it...)
engSearchText: (It's captivating. I can hardly take my eyes off it...)
jpnChrName: （惹き込まれちゃいますね……）
jpnSearchText: （惹き込まれちゃいますね……）

engChrName: Woo! You girls are awesome!
engSearchText: Woo! You girls are awesome!
jpnChrName: ヒューッ、いいぞー！！
jpnSearchText: ヒューッ、いいぞー！！

engChrName: That was beautiful!
engSearchText: That was beautiful!
jpnChrName: 素敵だったわ……！
jpnSearchText: 素敵だったわ……！

engChrName: (It felt like I was in a dream, watching that...)
engSearchText: (It felt like I was in a dream, watching that...)
jpnChrName: （はぁ、夢の中にいたみたいな……）
jpnSearchText: （はぁ、夢の中にいたみたいな……）

engChrName: (I know. Like those two girls were the only thing in the whole world. Hooks, lines, and sinkers won't get you that good.)
engSearchText:
(I know. Like those two girls were the only thing in
the whole world. Hooks, lines, and sinkers won't get
you that good.)
jpnChrName: （完全にあの子たちの世界に   入りこんじまってたな。）
jpnSearchText:
（完全にあの子たちの世界に
入りこんじまってたな。）

engChrName: (So that's Central Eastern dancing, eh? For a couple of random chicks, they know how to capture an audience.)
engSearchText:
(So that's Central Eastern dancing, eh? For a couple
of random chicks, they know how to capture
an audience.)
jpnChrName: （中東の舞踊か……   小娘どもの癖に魅せやがるな。）
jpnSearchText:
（中東の舞踊か……
小娘どもの癖に魅せやがるな。）

engChrName: Man, oh, man! You girls are hot stuff!
engSearchText: Man, oh, man! You girls are hot stuff!
jpnChrName: ──いや～、大したモンだねぇ。
jpnSearchText: ──いや～、大したモンだねぇ。

engChrName: What?
engSearchText: What?

engChrName: Th-Thank you...?
engSearchText: Th-Thank you...?
jpnChrName: え、えっと……？
jpnSearchText: え、えっと……？

engChrName: That's so much! Are you sure?
engSearchText: That's so much! Are you sure?
jpnChrName: わっ、こんなにいいのー！？
jpnSearchText: わっ、こんなにいいのー！？

engChrName: Go on—help yourselves. We've taken a real liking to you girls.
engSearchText:
Go on—help yourselves. We've taken a real liking to
you girls.
jpnChrName: いいっていいって。 ボクら君たちを気に入っちゃってさー。
jpnSearchText:
いいっていいって。
ボクら君たちを気に入っちゃってさー。

engChrName: All we ask is you come hang out with us. We've got a nice room out in the Entertainment District and everything.
engSearchText:
All we ask is you come hang out with us. We've got a
nice room out in the Entertainment District
and everything.
jpnChrName: ちょっと付き合ってもらうぜ。 歓楽街にいい部屋とってるからよ。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっと付き合ってもらうぜ。
歓楽街にいい部屋とってるからよ。

engChrName: Huh? Are you guys crazy?!
engSearchText: Huh? Are you guys crazy?!
jpnChrName: へっ…… ちょ、なに言ってんのさー！？
jpnSearchText:
へっ……
ちょ、なに言ってんのさー！？

engChrName: I'm...sorry. We're still working.
engSearchText: I'm...sorry. We're still working.
jpnChrName: ……あの、今は興行中ですので……
jpnSearchText: ……あの、今は興行中ですので……

engChrName: What? That not enough cash for you?
engSearchText: What? That not enough cash for you?
jpnChrName: あれ、まだミラが足りないって？
jpnSearchText: あれ、まだミラが足りないって？

engChrName: Fine, we'll give you girls more. As much as you like. Just come with us, already!
engSearchText:
Fine, we'll give you girls more. As much as you like.
Just come with us, already!
jpnChrName: 分かった分かった、 いいからとにかく一緒に来いよ。
jpnSearchText:
分かった分かった、
いいからとにかく一緒に来いよ。

engChrName: Oww! L-Let me go!
engSearchText: Oww! L-Let me go!
jpnChrName: いたっ……は、放してよー！
jpnSearchText: いたっ……は、放してよー！

engChrName: Shaheena!
engSearchText: Shaheena!
jpnChrName: っ……シャヒーナ！
jpnSearchText: っ……シャヒーナ！

engChrName: Hey! What do you guys think you're doing?
engSearchText: Hey! What do you guys think you're doing?
jpnChrName: おい、なんだよお前ら！？
jpnSearchText: おい、なんだよお前ら！？

engChrName: This isn't funny!
engSearchText: This isn't funny!
jpnChrName: ふざけんなコラー！！
jpnSearchText: ふざけんなコラー！！

engChrName: Get your filthy hands off—
engSearchText: Get your filthy hands off—
jpnChrName: その汚ない手を放しやが──
jpnSearchText: その汚ない手を放しやが──

engChrName: Yikes!
engSearchText: Yikes!

engChrName: Ha! Who are you calling filthy, huh? You locals ain't worth shit.
engSearchText:
Ha! Who are you calling filthy, huh? You locals ain't
worth shit.
jpnChrName: へぇ、現地民ごときがボクたちに そんなこと言ってもいいのかな～？
jpnSearchText:
へぇ、現地民ごときがボクたちに
そんなこと言ってもいいのかな～？

engChrName: Now go on! Scram!
engSearchText: Now go on! Scram!
jpnChrName: ハッ、とっとと散りやが──
jpnSearchText: ハッ、とっとと散りやが──

engChrName: Let go of them! NOW!
engSearchText: Let go of them! NOW!
jpnChrName: い い 加 減 に し て 下 さ い。
jpnSearchText: い い 加 減 に し て 下 さ い。

engChrName: OWW!
engSearchText: OWW!
jpnChrName: ぎいっ！？
jpnSearchText: ぎいっ！？

engChrName: Auuugh!
engSearchText: Auuugh!
jpnChrName: あだだだだっ……！
jpnSearchText: あだだだだっ……！

engChrName: Are you two all right?
engSearchText: Are you two all right?
jpnChrName: 大丈夫ですか……！？
jpnSearchText: 大丈夫ですか……！？

engChrName: Y-Yeah...
engSearchText: Y-Yeah...
jpnChrName: え、ええ……
jpnSearchText: え、ええ……

engChrName: What is their problem?!
engSearchText: What is their problem?!
jpnChrName: もう、なんなのー！？
jpnSearchText: もう、なんなのー！？

engChrName: Gah! What is with this freaky kid? Hey, you two! What do you think you're doing? Get over here and—
engSearchText:
Gah! What is with this freaky kid? Hey, you two!
What do you think you're doing? Get over here
and—
jpnChrName: な、なんだこのガキども……！ おい何してる、コイツらを──
jpnSearchText:
な、なんだこのガキども……！
おい何してる、コイツらを──

engChrName: Huh?!
engSearchText: Huh?!

engChrName: Gwurgk!
engSearchText: Gwurgk!

engChrName: I...can't move!
engSearchText: I...can't move!
jpnChrName: う、動けない……！？
jpnSearchText: う、動けない……！？

engChrName: Well, well. We got some jaeger dropouts, I see.
engSearchText: Well, well. We got some jaeger dropouts, I see.
jpnChrName: フン、猟兵崩れってとこか？
jpnSearchText: フン、猟兵崩れってとこか？

engChrName: Sucks to be you two, having such morons for bosses.
engSearchText: Sucks to be you two, having such morons for bosses.
jpnChrName: 大変だなァ、アホに雇われると。
jpnSearchText: 大変だなァ、アホに雇われると。

engChrName: Wh-What did you say?!
engSearchText: Wh-What did you say?!

engChrName: So, you're lookin' for some company, it sounds like. Got yourselves a pretty fancy room reserved here and everything.
engSearchText:
So, you're lookin' for some company, it sounds like.
Got yourselves a pretty fancy room reserved here
and everything.
jpnChrName: ──で、どうするんだ？ 随分いい部屋を取ってるみたいだが。
jpnSearchText:
──で、どうするんだ？
随分いい部屋を取ってるみたいだが。

engChrName: The film festival's not for another three days, you know. What if we helped you catch some z's until then?
engSearchText:
The film festival's not for another three days,
you know. What if we helped you catch some z's
until then?
jpnChrName: そこで映画祭までの３日間、 ベッドで寝たきりになるかよ……？
jpnSearchText:
そこで映画祭までの３日間、
ベッドで寝たきりになるかよ……？

engChrName: Hmph.
engSearchText: Hmph.

engChrName: Hey, what's going on here?
engSearchText: Hey, what's going on here?
jpnChrName: ──何かありましたか！？
jpnSearchText: ──何かありましたか！？

engChrName: Great, now we've got bracers giving us grief!
engSearchText: Great, now we've got bracers giving us grief!
jpnChrName: ゆ、遊撃士まで……！？
jpnSearchText: ゆ、遊撃士まで……！？

engChrName: Shit!
engSearchText: Shit!
jpnChrName: クソ……！
jpnSearchText: クソ……！

engChrName: Just when we thought we could have some fun in this dump of a city, you guys had to ruin it!
engSearchText:
Just when we thought we could have some fun in this
dump of a city, you guys had to ruin it!
jpnChrName: せ、せっかくこんな 貧乏くさい場所に来てやったのに！
jpnSearchText:
せ、せっかくこんな
貧乏くさい場所に来てやったのに！

engChrName: We'd better not catch you again or else there'll be hell to pay! You hear us?!
engSearchText:
We'd better not catch you again or else there'll be hell
to pay! You hear us?!
jpnChrName: てめぇら、次会ったら ただじゃおかねぇからな！
jpnSearchText:
てめぇら、次会ったら
ただじゃおかねぇからな！

engChrName: Pfft. That's supposed to be our line.
engSearchText: Pfft. That's supposed to be our line.
jpnChrName: ハン、こっちの台詞だろうが。
jpnSearchText: ハン、こっちの台詞だろうが。

engChrName: You guys were amazing! You got rid of them like they were nothing!
engSearchText:
You guys were amazing! You got rid of them like they
were nothing!
jpnChrName: すげーな、兄ちゃんたち！
jpnSearchText: すげーな、兄ちゃんたち！

engChrName: I'm so glad to see those guys gone. What a relief!
engSearchText: I'm so glad to see those guys gone. What a relief!
jpnChrName: スカっとしたぜ、やるじゃねえか！
jpnSearchText: スカっとしたぜ、やるじゃねえか！

engChrName: Oh... Guess I made a bit of a scene. I'm sorry.
engSearchText: Oh... Guess I made a bit of a scene. I'm sorry.
jpnChrName: ふう……すみません、 目立っちゃいましたね。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……すみません、
目立っちゃいましたね。

engChrName: It's okay, Feri. It all worked out in the end.
engSearchText: It's okay, Feri. It all worked out in the end.
jpnChrName: ふふ、結果オーライですよ。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、結果オーライですよ。

engChrName: *sigh* What a morning, and we only just got here. ...Hey, you ladies okay? Those guys didn't rough you up too badly, did they?
engSearchText:
*sigh* What a morning, and we only just got here.
...Hey, you ladies okay? Those guys didn't rough you
up too badly, did they?
jpnChrName: やれやれ…… お前さんたち、怪我はねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……
お前さんたち、怪我はねぇか？

engChrName: Oh, no. We're fine!
engSearchText: Oh, no. We're fine!
jpnChrName: う、うん……！
jpnSearchText: う、うん……！

engChrName: Thank you so much!
engSearchText: Thank you so much!
jpnChrName: 助かりました……
jpnSearchText: 助かりました……

engChrName: Well, looks like everything's under control here.
engSearchText: Well, looks like everything's under control here.
jpnChrName: ……大丈夫そうだな。
jpnSearchText: ……大丈夫そうだな。

engChrName: Yeah. I think those were the guys Zin mentioned before, too.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I think those were the guys Zin mentioned
before, too.
jpnChrName: ふむ、しかし彼らは ジン殿から聞いた……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、しかし彼らは
ジン殿から聞いた……

engChrName: With the harassers gone, the audience members donated tips to the two dancers before dispersing.
engSearchText:
With the harassers gone, the audience members
donated tips to the two dancers before dispersing.
jpnChrName: その後、観客たちは娘たちに おひねりを渡して解散し……
jpnSearchText:
その後、観客たちは娘たちに
おひねりを渡して解散し……

engChrName: Likewise, the pair of bracers resumed their patrol.
engSearchText: Likewise, the pair of bracers resumed their patrol.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士たちも巡回に戻っていった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>遊撃士たちも巡回に戻っていった。

engChrName: Here—these are on me.
engSearchText: Here—these are on me.
jpnChrName: ほれ、お兄さんのオゴりだ。
jpnSearchText: ほれ、お兄さんのオゴりだ。

engChrName: Wow, really? Thank you!
engSearchText: Wow, really? Thank you!
jpnChrName: わーっ、いいの！？
jpnSearchText: わーっ、いいの！？

engChrName: You really don't need to. You've already done so much for us.
engSearchText:
You really don't need to. You've already done so
much for us.
jpnChrName: 助けていただいたのは 私たちのほうなのに……
jpnSearchText:
助けていただいたのは
私たちのほうなのに……

engChrName: No, no, I insist. Consider it my way of sayin' thanks for putting on such a good show.
engSearchText:
No, no, I insist. Consider it my way of sayin' thanks
for putting on such a good show.
jpnChrName: いいモン見せてもらったからな、 おひねり代わりと思ってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
いいモン見せてもらったからな、
おひねり代わりと思ってくれ。

engChrName: Heehee! We make a good act, right? Especially Saara! Nobody's as good a dancer as her!
engSearchText:
Heehee! We make a good act, right? Especially Saara!
Nobody's as good a dancer as her!
jpnChrName: フッフーン、やっぱりそう思う？ すごかったでしょ、サァラ姉の踊りは！
jpnSearchText:
フッフーン、やっぱりそう思う？
すごかったでしょ、サァラ姉の踊りは！

engChrName: Shaheena, stop...
engSearchText: Shaheena, stop...
jpnChrName: もう、シャヒーナったら……
jpnSearchText: もう、シャヒーナったら……

engChrName: I'm just glad to see you two are all right after all of that. That's what counts.
engSearchText:
I'm just glad to see you two are all right after all
of that. That's what counts.
jpnChrName: ふふ、とにかく お怪我がなくてよかったです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、とにかく
お怪我がなくてよかったです。

engChrName: I'm really sorry for just barging in like that. I could've done better...
engSearchText:
I'm really sorry for just barging in like that. I could've
done better...
jpnChrName: すみません、あんな風に 乱入してしまって……
jpnSearchText:
すみません、あんな風に
乱入してしまって……

engChrName: Uhh... Actually, what're your names?
engSearchText: Uhh... Actually, what're your names?
jpnChrName: えと……
jpnSearchText: えと……

engChrName: Oh, I guess we haven't introduced ourselves.
engSearchText: Oh, I guess we haven't introduced ourselves.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、自己紹介がまだでしたね。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、自己紹介がまだでしたね。

engChrName: I'm Saara. My younger sister and I dance for a living.
engSearchText: I'm Saara. My younger sister and I dance for a living.
jpnChrName: 私はサァラ── 妹と一緒に踊り子をしています。
jpnSearchText:
私はサァラ──
妹と一緒に踊り子をしています。

engChrName: And I'm Shaheena. Nice to meet you!
engSearchText: And I'm Shaheena. Nice to meet you!
jpnChrName: シャヒーナだよ、よろしくね！
jpnSearchText: シャヒーナだよ、よろしくね！

engChrName: Anyway, what's your deal, old dude? What do you all do? You don't look like bracers.
engSearchText:
Anyway, what's your deal, old dude? What do you
all do? You don't look like bracers.
jpnChrName: で、オジサンたちはなんなの？ 遊撃士じゃなさそうだけど。
jpnSearchText:
で、オジサンたちはなんなの？
遊撃士じゃなさそうだけど。

engChrName: D-Did you just...?
engSearchText: D-Did you just...?
jpnChrName: オッ……
jpnSearchText: オッ……

engChrName: SHAHEENA! Don't call him that! That's rude.
engSearchText: SHAHEENA! Don't call him that! That's rude.
jpnChrName: シャヒーナ、失礼でしょうっ。
jpnSearchText: シャヒーナ、失礼でしょうっ。

engChrName: Huh? But he is. Isn't he?
engSearchText: Huh? But he is. Isn't he?
jpnChrName: え、なにが？
jpnSearchText: え、なにが？

engChrName: BWAHAHAHA! Looks like I'm not the only one who thinks you look old, gramps!
engSearchText:
BWAHAHAHA! Looks like I'm not the only one
who thinks you look old, gramps!
jpnChrName: ぶははははっ！！ 俺以外からも言われちまったなァ？
jpnSearchText:
ぶははははっ！！
俺以外からも言われちまったなァ？

engChrName: Shut up! It isn't funny! *sigh* Anyway...
engSearchText: Shut up! It isn't funny! *sigh* Anyway...
jpnChrName: 笑うんじゃねえっ！ ったく、俺たちは──
jpnSearchText:
笑うんじゃねえっ！
ったく、俺たちは──

engChrName: So you guys go around solving people's problems? That's interesting. I had no idea there were jobs like that in the capital.
engSearchText:
So you guys go around solving people's problems?
That's interesting. I had no idea there were jobs like
that in the capital.
jpnChrName: “解決屋”……共和国首都には そんなお仕事もあるんですね。
jpnSearchText:
“解決屋”……共和国首都には
そんなお仕事もあるんですね。

engChrName: (Could they be the ones people have been talking about since yesterday...?)
engSearchText:
(Could they be the ones people have been talking
about since yesterday...?)
jpnChrName: （それにもしかして   昨日から噂が流れている……）
jpnSearchText:
（それにもしかして
昨日から噂が流れている……）

engChrName: Wow, that's so cool! It sounds like a really, uhh... grownup thing to do!
engSearchText:
Wow, that's so cool! It sounds like a really, uhh...
grownup thing to do!
jpnChrName: へー、なんかカッコいいね！？ えっと、お兄さんには合ってそう！
jpnSearchText:
へー、なんかカッコいいね！？
えっと、お兄さんには合ってそう！

engChrName: ...It's okay, you don't have to tiptoe around me. I'm over it.
engSearchText:
...It's okay, you don't have to tiptoe around me.
I'm over it.
jpnChrName: ……気を使わなくていいぞ。
jpnSearchText: ……気を使わなくていいぞ。

engChrName: Sucks to be you, chief. Anyway, real talk—I'm glad we were there to handle those guys for you girls.
engSearchText:
Sucks to be you, chief. Anyway, real talk—I'm glad
we were there to handle those guys for you girls.
jpnChrName: ククク…… しかしさっきは丸く収まったが。
jpnSearchText:
ククク……
しかしさっきは丸く収まったが。

engChrName: Do creeps like that tend to give you two grief a lot?
engSearchText: Do creeps like that tend to give you two grief a lot?
jpnChrName: ああいう馬鹿どもが涌（わ）くのは 割と日常茶飯事なのか？
jpnSearchText:
ああいう馬鹿どもが涌（わ）くのは
割と日常茶飯事なのか？

engChrName: Actually, no. The vast majority of tourists who come watch us are quite polite.
engSearchText:
Actually, no. The vast majority of tourists who come
watch us are quite polite.
jpnChrName: いえ……いつもならマナーを守って 観て下さる観光客が殆どですけど。
jpnSearchText:
いえ……いつもならマナーを守って
観て下さる観光客が殆どですけど。

engChrName: Though I can't deny that sort of trouble has been on the rise all over the city the past few days.
engSearchText:
Though I can't deny that sort of trouble has been on
the rise all over the city the past few days.
jpnChrName: ああいったトラブルはここ数日、 各方面で増えてきていまして。
jpnSearchText:
ああいったトラブルはここ数日、
各方面で増えてきていまして。

engChrName: Well, that's a bummer. Could it be because...?
engSearchText: Well, that's a bummer. Could it be because...?
jpnChrName: それってやっぱり……
jpnSearchText: それってやっぱり……

engChrName: Of the film festival coming up so soon? I think so.
engSearchText: Of the film festival coming up so soon? I think so.
jpnChrName: 映画祭の影響なんでしょうね。
jpnSearchText: 映画祭の影響なんでしょうね。

engChrName: You only have to look at the parking lots to see that there're people from all over Zemuria, not just Calvard, coming to attend.
engSearchText:
You only have to look at the parking lots to see that
there're people from all over Zemuria, not just
Calvard, coming to attend.
jpnChrName: 駐車場の車だけを見ても、国内外から 沢山の人が集まってるみたいですし。
jpnSearchText:
駐車場の車だけを見ても、国内外から
沢山の人が集まってるみたいですし。

engChrName: And among those visitors are guys who think they're hot shit, makin' it big through investments or startup companies. Perfect recipe for fun.
engSearchText:
And among those visitors are guys who think they're
hot shit, makin' it big through investments or
startup companies. Perfect recipe for fun.
jpnChrName: 投資や新興ビジネスで当てたような イキった連中なんかも多いってところか。
jpnSearchText:
投資や新興ビジネスで当てたような
イキった連中なんかも多いってところか。

engChrName: Given that, I can understand how things would be happening around here.
engSearchText:
Given that, I can understand how things would be
happening around here.
jpnChrName: ……“色々起きてる”のも納得だな。
jpnSearchText: ……“色々起きてる”のも納得だな。

engChrName: I'm sorry, I don't think I know what you mean. Could you—
engSearchText:
I'm sorry, I don't think I know what you mean.
Could you—
jpnChrName: えっと……？
jpnSearchText: えっと……？

engChrName: Don't worry about it. Just stuff to do with work on our end.
engSearchText:
Don't worry about it. Just stuff to do with work on
our end.
jpnChrName: いや、こっちの話さ。
jpnSearchText: いや、こっちの話さ。

engChrName: Well, you guys had real crazy moves when you confronted those other guys back there!
engSearchText:
Well, you guys had real crazy moves when you
confronted those other guys back there!
jpnChrName: ねーねー、それにしても さっきのみんなの動き、凄かったね！
jpnSearchText:
ねーねー、それにしても
さっきのみんなの動き、凄かったね！

engChrName: Feri was so fast, I didn't even see her coming! And you two were super quick, too!
engSearchText:
Feri was so fast, I didn't even see her coming!
And you two were super quick, too!
jpnChrName: フェリは動きが全然見えなかったし、 お兄さんたちも機敏に動いてて……！
jpnSearchText:
フェリは動きが全然見えなかったし、
お兄さんたちも機敏に動いてて……！

engChrName: Hey, you all should learn how to dance while you're in town! I bet you'd do great!
engSearchText:
Hey, you all should learn how to dance while you're
in town! I bet you'd do great!
jpnChrName: そうだ、もしよかったら 滞在中に踊りを覚える気はない？
jpnSearchText:
そうだ、もしよかったら
滞在中に踊りを覚える気はない？

engChrName: I'll teach Feri and Saara'll teach Agnès! What do you say?
engSearchText:
I'll teach Feri and Saara'll teach Agnès! What do
you say?
jpnChrName: フェリはあたしが、 アニエスさんはサァラ姉が教えるし！
jpnSearchText:
フェリはあたしが、
アニエスさんはサァラ姉が教えるし！

engChrName: Sha-hee-na! I'm sure they've got more important things to do than hang out with us!
engSearchText:
Sha-hee-na! I'm sure they've got more important
things to do than hang out with us!
jpnChrName: ちょ、ちょっとシャヒーナ？
jpnSearchText: ちょ、ちょっとシャヒーナ？

engChrName: Heehee! I am a bit curious about how you guys dance, now that you mention it.
engSearchText:
Heehee! I am a bit curious about how you guys dance,
now that you mention it.
jpnChrName: あの伝統舞踊ですか…… ちょっと興味がありますねっ。
jpnSearchText:
あの伝統舞踊ですか……
ちょっと興味がありますねっ。

engChrName: It was so pretty. You two were really amazing to watch. What sort of dance is it, exactly?
engSearchText:
It was so pretty. You two were really amazing
to watch. What sort of dance is it, exactly?
jpnChrName: ふふ、本当に綺麗で凄かったですし…… あれはどういった踊りなんですか？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、本当に綺麗で凄かったですし……
あれはどういった踊りなんですか？

engChrName: We come from a family of dancers that have passed our form down from generation to generation. Our mother taught us these moves.
engSearchText:
We come from a family of dancers that have passed
our form down from generation to generation.
Our mother taught us these moves.
jpnChrName: その、うちは代々踊り子の家系でして、 母から教わったものなんです。
jpnSearchText:
その、うちは代々踊り子の家系でして、
母から教わったものなんです。

engChrName: I guess I wouldn't be against teaching you a little bit about what we do if it helps keep our traditions alive...
engSearchText:
I guess I wouldn't be against teaching you a little bit
about what we do if it helps keep our
traditions alive...
jpnChrName: 伝統を残していくという意味でも 教えること自体は問題ないんですが……
jpnSearchText:
伝統を残していくという意味でも
教えること自体は問題ないんですが……

engChrName: All right. Clearly, it feels like we were meant to meet. If you're interested, I'd be happy to show you the basics. What do you say?
engSearchText:
All right. Clearly, it feels like we were meant to meet.
If you're interested, I'd be happy to show you
the basics. What do you say?
jpnChrName: ……そうですね、折角のご縁ですし 簡単なものでしたらお教えしましょうか？
jpnSearchText:
……そうですね、折角のご縁ですし
簡単なものでしたらお教えしましょうか？

engChrName: Wow, really? Sure, I'd love to learn more once we're done with our work here!
engSearchText:
Wow, really? Sure, I'd love to learn more once we're
done with our work here!
jpnChrName: わぁ……仕事の方が 片付いてきたらぜひっ。
jpnSearchText:
わぁ……仕事の方が
片付いてきたらぜひっ。

engChrName: Well, if Feri's in, I can hardly say no. I don't know if I'll be able to keep up with you, but I'll try my best.
engSearchText:
Well, if Feri's in, I can hardly say no. I don't know if
I'll be able to keep up with you, but I'll try my best.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それじゃあ私も…… ついていけるか分かりませんけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、それじゃあ私も……
ついていけるか分かりませんけど。

engChrName: You know, I bet there are things from it that I could apply to my sword dancing, too. I might just join in on those lessons.
engSearchText:
You know, I bet there are things from it that I could
apply to my sword dancing, too. I might just join in
on those lessons.
jpnChrName: ふむ……剣舞にも応用できそうだし 俺も習ってみんのもアリかもな。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……剣舞にも応用できそうだし
俺も習ってみんのもアリかもな。

engChrName: Whoa! You can do that?!
engSearchText: Whoa! You can do that?!
jpnChrName: ええっ、そんなのやってるの？
jpnSearchText: ええっ、そんなのやってるの？

engChrName: Hey, the more I think about it, the more I think you might even be able to pull off our outfits, too!
engSearchText:
Hey, the more I think about it, the more I think you
might even be able to pull off our outfits, too!
jpnChrName: あ、でもお兄さんなら確かに この衣装も着こなせちゃうかも！
jpnSearchText:
あ、でもお兄さんなら確かに
この衣装も着こなせちゃうかも！

engChrName: Oh, yeah? Sure, that'd be a piece of cake. Nothing I haven't done before.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah? Sure, that'd be a piece of cake. Nothing I
haven't done before.
jpnChrName: ハン……？ ああ、そんくらい余裕だろ♪
jpnSearchText:
ハン……？
ああ、そんくらい余裕だろ♪

engChrName: (Oh, I hadn't thought about wearing those outfits... Do I, umm, really want to?)
engSearchText:
(Oh, I hadn't thought about wearing those outfits...
Do I, umm, really want to?)
jpnChrName: （そ、そういえばその衣装を……   ……ど、どうしましょうっ……？）
jpnSearchText:
（そ、そういえばその衣装を……
……ど、どうしましょうっ……？）

engChrName: I can't wait to start learning!
engSearchText: I can't wait to start learning!
jpnChrName: えへへ、楽しみですねっ。
jpnSearchText: えへへ、楽しみですねっ。

engChrName: *sigh* You kids do recall that we're here on assignment, right?
engSearchText:
*sigh* You kids do recall that we're here on
assignment, right?
jpnChrName: ……やれやれ、マジで仕事を 忘れられちまいそうな勢いだな。
jpnSearchText:
……やれやれ、マジで仕事を
忘れられちまいそうな勢いだな。

engChrName: Hi, Van! Thanks for picking up.
engSearchText: Hi, Van! Thanks for picking up.
jpnChrName: お疲れ様です、アークライドさん。
jpnSearchText: お疲れ様です、アークライドさん。

engChrName: Looks like you're all in Tharbad?
engSearchText: Looks like you're all in Tharbad?
jpnChrName: サルバッドには もう到着されたみたいですね？
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドには
もう到着されたみたいですね？

engChrName: Hey, stranger. Yep, we rolled in here first thing in the morning.
engSearchText:
Hey, stranger. Yep, we rolled in here first thing in
the morning.
jpnChrName: アンタか。 ああ、今朝方滞りなくな。
jpnSearchText:
アンタか。
ああ、今朝方滞りなくな。

engChrName: That's good! I hope the long drive didn't take too much of a toll on you.
engSearchText:
That's good! I hope the long drive didn't take too
much of a toll on you.
jpnChrName: ふふ、長旅お疲れ様でした。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、長旅お疲れ様でした。

engChrName: I know this might be a little early for you, but we also actually got in by airship just a little while ago.
engSearchText:
I know this might be a little early for you, but we also
actually got in by airship just a little while ago.
jpnChrName: 少し早いんですが、私たちも先ほど 定期飛行船で現地入りしまして。
jpnSearchText:
少し早いんですが、私たちも先ほど
定期飛行船で現地入りしまして。

engChrName: Nice. So we'll be able to sit down and talk about the job soon.
engSearchText:
Nice. So we'll be able to sit down and talk about the
job soon.
jpnChrName: そうか、ようやく 依頼の話ができそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
そうか、ようやく
依頼の話ができそうだな。

engChrName: Do you want us to head over right away?
engSearchText: Do you want us to head over right away?
jpnChrName: すぐに向かったほうがいいか？
jpnSearchText: すぐに向かったほうがいいか？

engChrName: Oh, no, there's no rush. As long as we can talk by noon, any time works for us.
engSearchText:
Oh, no, there's no rush. As long as we can talk by
noon, any time works for us.
jpnChrName: いえ、急がなくても 正午までならいつでも大丈夫です。
