jpnSearchText:
いえ、急がなくても
正午までならいつでも大丈夫です。

engChrName: Plus we still need to unpack and—
engSearchText: Plus we still need to unpack and—
jpnChrName: こちらも荷物の整理などを──
jpnSearchText: こちらも荷物の整理などを──

engChrName: Hey, Nina? Have you seen the key to my suitcase anywhere?
engSearchText:
Hey, Nina? Have you seen the key to my
suitcase anywhere?
jpnChrName: ……ねぇニナ、あたしの 衣装ケースの鍵とか知らないかな？
jpnSearchText:
……ねぇニナ、あたしの
衣装ケースの鍵とか知らないかな？

engChrName: (Hmm?)
engSearchText: (Hmm?)

engChrName: Umm, no? Why would I have seen that?
engSearchText: Umm, no? Why would I have seen that?
jpnChrName: もう、知るわけないでしょう？
jpnSearchText: もう、知るわけないでしょう？

engChrName: Ah! Sorry about that! I'll see you all at the hotel, then.
engSearchText: Ah! Sorry about that! I'll see you all at the hotel, then.
jpnChrName: ──すみません、それでは ホテルでお待ちしていますね。
jpnSearchText:
──すみません、それでは
ホテルでお待ちしていますね。

engChrName: Sounds good. See you then.
engSearchText: Sounds good. See you then.
jpnChrName: ああ、またな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、またな。

engChrName: Was that Nina you were talking to?
engSearchText: Was that Nina you were talking to?
jpnChrName: あ……ニナさんからですか？
jpnSearchText: あ……ニナさんからですか？

engChrName: Yeah, sounds like she just got into town. Once we find time, we should make our way over to the Al-Jumeirah Hotel.
engSearchText:
Yeah, sounds like she just got into town. Once we
find time, we should make our way over to the
Al-Jumeirah Hotel.
jpnChrName: ああ、現地入りしたらしい。 折を見てアルジュメイラホテルに行くか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、現地入りしたらしい。
折を見てアルジュメイラホテルに行くか。

engChrName: (Still, that voice sounded like...)
engSearchText: (Still, that voice sounded like...)
jpnChrName: （しかしさっきの声……）
jpnSearchText: （しかしさっきの声……）

engChrName: Hold on, did you say 'Nina'? As in Nina Fenly?!
engSearchText: Hold on, did you say 'Nina'? As in Nina Fenly?!
jpnChrName: って待って、ニナって…… もしかしてニナ・フェンリィのこと？
jpnSearchText:
って待って、ニナって……
もしかしてニナ・フェンリィのこと？

engChrName: You guys know her?!
engSearchText: You guys know her?!
jpnChrName: まさか知り合いなの、お兄さんたち！？
jpnSearchText: まさか知り合いなの、お兄さんたち！？

engChrName: Uhh...
engSearchText: Uhh...
jpnChrName: えっと……
jpnSearchText: えっと……

engChrName: Ah, don't mind her. She just really likes movies.
engSearchText: Ah, don't mind her. She just really likes movies.
jpnChrName: ふふ、すみません、 妹は導力映画の大ファンなんです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、すみません、
妹は導力映画の大ファンなんです。

engChrName: Sometimes the big screen out in the Entertainment District will show free movies, which we'll catch.
engSearchText:
Sometimes the big screen out in the Entertainment
District will show free movies, which we'll catch.
jpnChrName: 歓楽街のスクリーンでたまに 無料公開をしていることもあって……
jpnSearchText:
歓楽街のスクリーンでたまに
無料公開をしていることもあって……

engChrName: Ever since they announced the film festival was coming to Tharbad, Shaheena's been a ball of excitement.
engSearchText:
Ever since they announced the film festival was
coming to Tharbad, Shaheena's been a ball
of excitement.
jpnChrName: 今回の映画祭の話が決まってから ずっと楽しみにしてたみたいで。
jpnSearchText:
今回の映画祭の話が決まってから
ずっと楽しみにしてたみたいで。

engChrName: Well, duh! How could I not be?
engSearchText: Well, duh! How could I not be?
jpnChrName: そんなの当然だよ～！
jpnSearchText: そんなの当然だよ～！

engChrName: Lots of famous actors, actresses, and directors are gonna be in town, not just Nina!
engSearchText:
Lots of famous actors, actresses, and directors are
gonna be in town, not just Nina!
jpnChrName: ニナだけじゃなくて沢山の女優さんや 監督さんたちも来るんだよっ！？
jpnSearchText:
ニナだけじゃなくて沢山の女優さんや
監督さんたちも来るんだよっ！？

engChrName: Are you guys gonna go meet with her later? I'm SO jealous! Augh!
engSearchText:
Are you guys gonna go meet with her later? I'm
SO jealous! Augh!
jpnChrName: え、もしかしてこれからニナに会うの？ いいないいな、羨まし～いっ！！
jpnSearchText:
え、もしかしてこれからニナに会うの？
いいないいな、羨まし～いっ！！

engChrName: Do you want us to try and get you an autograph from her? She'd probably say yes if we ask nicely.
engSearchText:
Do you want us to try and get you an autograph
from her? She'd probably say yes if we ask nicely.
jpnChrName: あはは……もし頼めそうだったら サインをもらってきましょうか？
jpnSearchText:
あはは……もし頼めそうだったら
サインをもらってきましょうか？

engChrName: F-F-For real?! You'd do that for me?!
engSearchText: F-F-For real?! You'd do that for me?!
jpnChrName: ホント！？
jpnSearchText: ホント！？

engChrName: Well, we can't make any promises. Only if she's comfortable with it.
engSearchText:
Well, we can't make any promises. Only if she's
comfortable with it.
jpnChrName: まあ、それくらいは 快くＯＫしてくれそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、それくらいは
快くＯＫしてくれそうだな。

engChrName: Oh, that's fine! Please! I love you guys so much! I promise not to call you an old guy any more if you do this for me!
engSearchText:
Oh, that's fine! Please! I love you guys so much!
I promise not to call you an old guy any more if you
do this for me!
jpnChrName: やった～！！　お兄さんたち大好き！ もう絶対オジサンなんて言わないからね！
jpnSearchText:
やった～！！　お兄さんたち大好き！
もう絶対オジサンなんて言わないからね！

engChrName: You don't have to keep bringing that up!
engSearchText: You don't have to keep bringing that up!
jpnChrName: だから気を使わなくていいっ！
jpnSearchText: だから気を使わなくていいっ！

engChrName: I think there's no escape for you, dude.
engSearchText: I think there's no escape for you, dude.
jpnChrName: ククク……もう諦めろや。
jpnSearchText: ククク……もう諦めろや。

engChrName: I'm really sorry about her. If you could do it, it would mean the world to her.
engSearchText:
I'm really sorry about her. If you could do it, it would
mean the world to her.
jpnChrName: すみません……お願いできれば。 それと本当にお世話になってしまって。
jpnSearchText:
すみません……お願いできれば。
それと本当にお世話になってしまって。

engChrName: Anyway, we should be in town for two or three days.
engSearchText: Anyway, we should be in town for two or three days.
jpnChrName: ま、俺たちもこれから ２、３日は滞在することになる。
jpnSearchText:
ま、俺たちもこれから
２、３日は滞在することになる。

engChrName: If anything else comes up, feel free to contact us. It'll cost you extra, but we'll be more than happy to help.
engSearchText:
If anything else comes up, feel free to contact us.
It'll cost you extra, but we'll be more than happy
to help.
jpnChrName: もしまた何かあったら連絡してきな。 “特別料金”で対応させてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
もしまた何かあったら連絡してきな。
“特別料金”で対応させてもらうぜ。

engChrName: ...Oh! Okay, thank you. I'll let you know if we need anything.
engSearchText:
...Oh! Okay, thank you. I'll let you know if we
need anything.
jpnChrName: ……！ はい、ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
……！
はい、ありがとうございます。

engChrName: After that, the sisters went back to perform some more while Van and the others opted to visit the Entertainment District.
engSearchText:
After that, the sisters went back to perform some
more while Van and the others opted to visit the
Entertainment District.
jpnChrName: その後、再び興行を始める姉妹たちと別れ、 折を見て歓楽街の方へ向かうことにした。
jpnSearchText:
その後、再び興行を始める姉妹たちと別れ、
折を見て歓楽街の方へ向かうことにした。

engChrName: Hi, everyone. It's nice to see you again.
engSearchText: Hi, everyone. It's nice to see you again.
jpnChrName: あら、皆さん。 またお目にかかりましたね。
jpnSearchText:
あら、皆さん。
またお目にかかりましたね。

engChrName: Hey, Shaheena! Hi, Saara!
engSearchText: Hey, Shaheena! Hi, Saara!
jpnChrName: シャヒーナさん、サァラさんも！
jpnSearchText: シャヒーナさん、サァラさんも！

engChrName: Is this your home?
engSearchText: Is this your home?
jpnChrName: ひょっとしてこちらが……？
jpnSearchText: ひょっとしてこちらが……？

engChrName: Yep! It's pretty small, but it's home sweet home!
engSearchText: Yep! It's pretty small, but it's home sweet home!
jpnChrName: うん、狭いけどあたしたちの家！
jpnSearchText: うん、狭いけどあたしたちの家！

engChrName: I wish we could bring you inside, but we've got another performance coming up soon that we need to get ready for.
engSearchText:
I wish we could bring you inside, but we've got
another performance coming up soon that we need to
get ready for.
jpnChrName: 入ってお茶（チャイ）でも──って言いたいけど もうすぐ次の興行なんだよね～。
jpnSearchText:
入ってお茶（チャイ）でも──って言いたいけど
もうすぐ次の興行なんだよね～。

engChrName: It's no problem. Good to see you ladies are keeping busy, honestly. Haven't run into any trouble since this morning, I hope?
engSearchText:
It's no problem. Good to see you ladies are keeping
busy, honestly. Haven't run into any trouble since this
morning, I hope?
jpnChrName: 忙しいようで何よりだ。 ……午前みたいな困ったことは？
jpnSearchText:
忙しいようで何よりだ。
……午前みたいな困ったことは？

engChrName: No, luckily. Thank you for asking.
engSearchText: No, luckily. Thank you for asking.
jpnChrName: ええ、おかげさまで何も。
jpnSearchText: ええ、おかげさまで何も。

engChrName: We've been getting bigger crowds than usual, but luckily, nobody else has acted strangely.
engSearchText:
We've been getting bigger crowds than usual, but
luckily, nobody else has acted strangely.
jpnChrName: いつも以上にお客様は多いですけど マナーを守って楽しんでもらってます。
jpnSearchText:
いつも以上にお客様は多いですけど
マナーを守って楽しんでもらってます。

engChrName: Maybe they heard about how you guys saved the day earlier and that's made all the other weirdos think twice. We can hope!
engSearchText:
Maybe they heard about how you guys saved the day
earlier and that's made all the other weirdos
think twice. We can hope!
jpnChrName: お兄さんたちに助けてもらったのが 噂になってるのかもしれないねー。
jpnSearchText:
お兄さんたちに助けてもらったのが
噂になってるのかもしれないねー。

engChrName: Still...I'm tiiired. I think I'm gonna stop by the hamam on the way back.
engSearchText:
Still...I'm tiiired. I think I'm gonna stop by the
hamam on the way back.
jpnChrName: はー、でもさすがに疲れたよ。 帰りにハマムに寄っていきたいなー。
jpnSearchText:
はー、でもさすがに疲れたよ。
帰りにハマムに寄っていきたいなー。

engChrName: That sounds nice. Hopefully that'll keep your spirits up until we're all done.
engSearchText:
That sounds nice. Hopefully that'll keep your spirits
up until we're all done.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、いいわね。 だったらもうひと頑張りしないと。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、いいわね。
だったらもうひと頑張りしないと。

engChrName: Well, if any more asshats try to creep on you girls, let us know. We'll sort them out just like the others.
engSearchText:
Well, if any more asshats try to creep on you girls, let
us know. We'll sort them out just like the others.
jpnChrName: ま、似たような馬鹿が現れたら言えや。 キッチリ分からせてやるからよ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、似たような馬鹿が現れたら言えや。
キッチリ分からせてやるからよ。

engChrName: Thank you. We really appreciate it. Well, we'd better get back to work.
engSearchText:
Thank you. We really appreciate it. Well, we'd better
get back to work.
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます。 ──それでは失礼しますね。
jpnSearchText:
ありがとうございます。
──それでは失礼しますね。

engChrName: You guys are pretty handsome, but if you're thinking of making a move on Saara, I'd think twice.
engSearchText:
You guys are pretty handsome, but if you're thinking
of making a move on Saara, I'd think twice.
jpnChrName: えへへ、お兄さんたちカッコイイけど お姉にコナかけても無駄だからね～？
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、お兄さんたちカッコイイけど
お姉にコナかけても無駄だからね～？

engChrName: Know why? 'Cause it looks like she's got a boyfriend!
engSearchText: Know why? 'Cause it looks like she's got a boyfriend!
jpnChrName: あれでちゃんと彼氏がいるみたいだし。
jpnSearchText: あれでちゃんと彼氏がいるみたいだし。

engChrName: Oh, really now?
engSearchText: Oh, really now?
jpnChrName: ほう……そうなのか？
jpnSearchText: ほう……そうなのか？

engChrName: Hell, your sister's such a catch, I'd be shocked if she didn't. Don't be surprised if I whisk her away if he turns out to be a loser, though.
engSearchText:
Hell, your sister's such a catch, I'd be shocked if
she didn't. Don't be surprised if I whisk her away if
he turns out to be a loser, though.
jpnChrName: んだよ、まあイイ女だし当然か。 ショボイ野郎なら奪ってもいいがな。
jpnSearchText:
んだよ、まあイイ女だし当然か。
ショボイ野郎なら奪ってもいいがな。

engChrName: Van. Aaron.
engSearchText: Van. Aaron.
jpnChrName: お二人とも……？
jpnSearchText: お二人とも……？

engChrName: Shaheena, what are you doing? We have to go!
engSearchText: Shaheena, what are you doing? We have to go!
jpnChrName: シャヒーナ？ そろそろ行かないと……
jpnSearchText:
シャヒーナ？
そろそろ行かないと……

engChrName: Coming! ...See you guys later!
engSearchText: Coming! ...See you guys later!
jpnChrName: 今行くーっ！ それじゃあ、またね！
jpnSearchText:
今行くーっ！
それじゃあ、またね！

engChrName: Oh, wait! The autographs!
engSearchText: Oh, wait! The autographs!
jpnChrName: あ、そういえばサイン……！
jpnSearchText: あ、そういえばサイン……！

engChrName: We forgot to give them to her.
engSearchText: We forgot to give them to her.
jpnChrName: 渡しそびれちゃいましたね。
jpnSearchText: 渡しそびれちゃいましたね。

engChrName: I wouldn't bother right now when they're about to perform. I'm sure we'll see them again. We can make Shaheena's day then.
engSearchText:
I wouldn't bother right now when they're about
to perform. I'm sure we'll see them again. We can
make Shaheena's day then.
jpnChrName: これから興行みたいだしな。 まあ、また機会はあんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
これから興行みたいだしな。
まあ、また機会はあんだろ。

engChrName: Hey, Mr. Jahm! Nice to see you!
engSearchText: Hey, Mr. Jahm! Nice to see you!
jpnChrName: こんにちはっ、ジャハムさん。 お久しぶりですね！
jpnSearchText:
こんにちはっ、ジャハムさん。
お久しぶりですね！

engChrName: Oh, hey there, Ferida! Wow, you certainly have grown since I saw you a year ago.
engSearchText:
Oh, hey there, Ferida! Wow, you certainly have
grown since I saw you a year ago.
jpnChrName: おお、フェリーダか！ たった１年で大きくなったもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
おお、フェリーダか！
たった１年で大きくなったもんだ。

engChrName: ...And I take it you're the spriggan Hala told me about.
engSearchText:
...And I take it you're the spriggan Hala told
me about.
jpnChrName: ハーラから聞いたが アンタが裏解決屋っていう……？
jpnSearchText:
ハーラから聞いたが
アンタが裏解決屋っていう……？

engChrName: Yep. Name's Van Arkride. Normally I work out of Edith, but I'm here for a job.
engSearchText:
Yep. Name's Van Arkride. Normally I work out of
Edith, but I'm here for a job.
jpnChrName: ああ、首都のアークライドだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、首都のアークライドだ。

engChrName: Hala told us to come meet you. Why don't you tell us what's going on, and we'll see what we can do?
engSearchText:
Hala told us to come meet you. Why don't you tell us
what's going on, and we'll see what we can do?
jpnChrName: こちらも女将から聞いたが まずは状況を教えてもらえるか？
jpnSearchText:
こちらも女将から聞いたが
まずは状況を教えてもらえるか？

engChrName: All right. It's probably easier if I just show you. Follow me.
engSearchText:
All right. It's probably easier if I just show you.
Follow me.
jpnChrName: ああ──とにかく 見てもらった方が話が早い。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──とにかく
見てもらった方が話が早い。

engChrName: Ah, well, I can see how you might have a problem here.
engSearchText:
Ah, well, I can see how you might have a
problem here.
jpnChrName: こいつは……
jpnSearchText: こいつは……

engChrName: Where's all the water?
engSearchText: Where's all the water?
jpnChrName: お湯がない……？
jpnSearchText: お湯がない……？

engChrName: Normally, I get it pumped in here from the oasis through the underground waterway that runs around here.
engSearchText:
Normally, I get it pumped in here from the oasis
through the underground waterway that runs
around here.
jpnChrName: このあたりは昔から地下の水路を通じて オアシスの水を汲み上げてるんだが……
jpnSearchText:
このあたりは昔から地下の水路を通じて
オアシスの水を汲み上げてるんだが……

engChrName: Unfortunately, it suddenly stopped coming in this morning, and it's been like this ever since.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, it suddenly stopped coming in this
morning, and it's been like this ever since.
jpnChrName: どういうわけか、今朝から 全く届かなくなってしまってね。
jpnSearchText:
どういうわけか、今朝から
全く届かなくなってしまってね。

engChrName: That's definitely a little concerning. Does this sort of thing happen often?
engSearchText:
That's definitely a little concerning. Does this sort of
thing happen often?
jpnChrName: なるほど…… こういうことはよくあるのか？
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……
こういうことはよくあるのか？

engChrName: No. Almost never, believe it or not.
engSearchText: No. Almost never, believe it or not.
jpnChrName: いいや、滅多にないことさ。
jpnSearchText: いいや、滅多にないことさ。

engChrName: There was one time when the oasis itself dried up about twenty years ago, but that's about it.
engSearchText:
There was one time when the oasis itself dried up
about twenty years ago, but that's about it.
jpnChrName: ２０年くらい前にオアシスが 枯れかけたことはあったが……
jpnSearchText:
２０年くらい前にオアシスが
枯れかけたことはあったが……

engChrName: Back then, a renowned scholar investigated the problem for us and constructed a water management system that's handled any problems.
engSearchText:
Back then, a renowned scholar investigated the
problem for us and constructed a water management
system that's handled any problems.
jpnChrName: 偉い学者さんが調査をしてくれて 完璧な治水工事をしてくれたからね。
jpnSearchText:
偉い学者さんが調査をしてくれて
完璧な治水工事をしてくれたからね。

engChrName: Who would that be?
engSearchText: Who would that be?
jpnChrName: 偉い学者さん……？
jpnSearchText: 偉い学者さん……？

engChrName: He must mean Professor Latoya Hamilton. She's famous for handling the waterworks out here.
engSearchText:
He must mean Professor Latoya Hamilton.
She's famous for handling the waterworks out here.
jpnChrName: かのＬ・ハミルトン博士が 手がけたという治水工事ですね。
jpnSearchText:
かのＬ・ハミルトン博士が
手がけたという治水工事ですね。

engChrName: It didn't just restore the oasis to where it was at before. In fact, it became several times bigger.
engSearchText:
It didn't just restore the oasis to where it was
at before. In fact, it became several times bigger.
jpnChrName: その結果、元々あったオアシスが 数倍の大きさまで広がって……
jpnSearchText:
その結果、元々あったオアシスが
数倍の大きさまで広がって……

engChrName: Her work is said to be directly linked to Tharbad's rise as an entertainment destination.
engSearchText:
Her work is said to be directly linked to Tharbad's
rise as an entertainment destination.
jpnChrName: サルバッドが遊興都市として発展する きっかけになったんだとか。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドが遊興都市として発展する
きっかけになったんだとか。

engChrName: That's right. What that woman did was nothing short of a miracle for our city.
engSearchText:
That's right. What that woman did was nothing short
of a miracle for our city.
jpnChrName: そうそう、いやぁ、 ホントできた御方だよなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、いやぁ、
ホントできた御方だよなぁ。

engChrName: I happened to catch a glimpse of her, and she seemed incredibly kind. And a real beauty, I might add.
engSearchText:
I happened to catch a glimpse of her, and she seemed
incredibly kind. And a real beauty, I might add.
jpnChrName: その時に見かけたことがあったが 大層綺麗で優しそうな人だったし。
jpnSearchText:
その時に見かけたことがあったが
大層綺麗で優しそうな人だったし。

engChrName: You don't say... Gah! Anyway, getting back to the problem at hand...
engSearchText:
You don't say... Gah! Anyway, getting back to the
problem at hand...
jpnChrName: へえ……っとそれはともかく。
jpnSearchText: へえ……っとそれはともかく。

engChrName: If nothing's wrong with the oasis, then that probably means there's somethin' going on in that underground waterway you mentioned.
engSearchText:
If nothing's wrong with the oasis, then that probably
means there's somethin' going on in that
underground waterway you mentioned.
jpnChrName: オアシスに問題がないなら 地下水路に原因がありそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
オアシスに問題がないなら
地下水路に原因がありそうだな。

engChrName: That's what I've reckoned, too.
engSearchText: That's what I've reckoned, too.
jpnChrName: ああ、そう睨んでいてね。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そう睨んでいてね。

engChrName: I really want to get this figured out so I can reopen my business and get back to serving customers.
engSearchText:
I really want to get this figured out so I can reopen
my business and get back to serving customers.
jpnChrName: なんとか営業再開するためにも 原因を探っておきたいんだが……
jpnSearchText:
なんとか営業再開するためにも
原因を探っておきたいんだが……

engChrName: Unfortunately, the guild's so busy right now that they can't send anyone to take a look until at least tomorrow.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, the guild's so busy right now that they
can't send anyone to take a look until at
least tomorrow.
jpnChrName: 生憎ギルドはてんてこ舞いらしく、 人を回せるのは明日みたいでねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
生憎ギルドはてんてこ舞いらしく、
人を回せるのは明日みたいでねぇ。

engChrName: I know it might cost more to get it done sooner, but do you think you all would be able to handle it instead?
engSearchText:
I know it might cost more to get it done sooner, but
do you think you all would be able to handle
it instead?
jpnChrName: 少々お高くなっても構わないから 頼めないかと来てもらったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
少々お高くなっても構わないから
頼めないかと来てもらったんだ。

engChrName: Basically, you want us to play plumber instead of the guild like they're supposed to. Is that it?
engSearchText:
Basically, you want us to play plumber instead of the
guild like they're supposed to. Is that it?
jpnChrName: ハン、要はギルドの代わりか。
jpnSearchText: ハン、要はギルドの代わりか。

engChrName: I think we should do it. Saara 'n' Shaheena are supposed to come by here after work. I'd hate to see them disappointed...
engSearchText:
I think we should do it. Saara 'n' Shaheena are
supposed to come by here after work. I'd hate to see
them disappointed...
jpnChrName: でも、サァラさんたちも仕事の後に 寄りたいって言ってましたし……
jpnSearchText:
でも、サァラさんたちも仕事の後に
寄りたいって言ってましたし……

engChrName: Me, too. I know this is getting off track from our main assignment, but is there any way we could help him out, Van?
engSearchText:
Me, too. I know this is getting off track from our
main assignment, but is there any way we could help
him out, Van?
jpnChrName: ええ、依頼とは関係なさそうですけど 何とかできないでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
ええ、依頼とは関係なさそうですけど
何とかできないでしょうか……？

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...

engChrName: Yeah, all right. We'll do it.
engSearchText: Yeah, all right. We'll do it.
jpnChrName: 分かった──この件は こちらで引き受けさせてもらう。
jpnSearchText:
分かった──この件は
こちらで引き受けさせてもらう。

engChrName: But you're right, pal. It is going to cost you more. In addition to the guild's standard work fee, I want a free bath for everyone. Deal?
engSearchText:
But you're right, pal. It is going to cost you more.
In addition to the guild's standard work fee, I want a
free bath for everyone. Deal?
jpnChrName: ギルドの規定料金に加えて 入浴を一回無料ってのでどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
ギルドの規定料金に加えて
入浴を一回無料ってのでどうだ？

engChrName: Haha, I think that can be arranged. Deal!
engSearchText: Haha, I think that can be arranged. Deal!
jpnChrName: ハハ、是非ともよろしく頼む！
jpnSearchText: ハハ、是非ともよろしく頼む！

engChrName: So, in that case, you'll need this to get down there.
engSearchText: So, in that case, you'll need this to get down there.
jpnChrName: ──それじゃあ これを持っていってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
──それじゃあ
これを持っていってくれ。

engChrName: Obtained a key to the underground waterway.
engSearchText: Obtained a key to the underground waterway.
jpnChrName: 地下水路の鍵を預かった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>地下水路の鍵を預かった。

engChrName: When you leave here, take a right and you'll find an old maintenance way. You can climb down into the waterway from there.
engSearchText:
When you leave here, take a right and you'll find an
old maintenance way. You can climb down into the
waterway from there.
jpnChrName: ここを出た右手に、古い整備扉があってね。 そこから地下水路に降りられるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ここを出た右手に、古い整備扉があってね。
そこから地下水路に降りられるんだ。

engChrName: But be careful. Monsters do tend to get down there at times.
engSearchText:
But be careful. Monsters do tend to get down there
at times.
jpnChrName: 魔獣も徘徊しているだろうから 十分気を付けてくれよ。
jpnSearchText:
魔獣も徘徊しているだろうから
十分気を付けてくれよ。

engChrName: That shouldn't be a problem. Thanks for the tip.
engSearchText: That shouldn't be a problem. Thanks for the tip.
jpnChrName: ああ、了解だ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、了解だ。

engChrName: Well, what are we waiting for? Let's get those pipes fixed so we can get our bathing on!
engSearchText:
Well, what are we waiting for? Let's get those pipes
fixed so we can get our bathing on!
jpnChrName: そんじゃあサクっと片付けて 一番風呂でも頂くかねぇ♪
jpnSearchText:
そんじゃあサクっと片付けて
一番風呂でも頂くかねぇ♪

engChrName: Cool! Now we can enter.
engSearchText: Cool! Now we can enter.
jpnChrName: よし、これで入れますねっ。
jpnSearchText: よし、これで入れますねっ。

engChrName: Actually, I wanted to ask before we go in: you seemed to be thinking pretty hard earlier before you accepted this gig.
engSearchText:
Actually, I wanted to ask before we go in: you seemed
to be thinking pretty hard earlier before you accepted
this gig.
jpnChrName: ところで──さっき受ける時、 何か考えてやがったな？
jpnSearchText:
ところで──さっき受ける時、
何か考えてやがったな？

engChrName: Something seem off about all this?
engSearchText: Something seem off about all this?
jpnChrName: ひょっとして何か匂ったのか？
jpnSearchText: ひょっとして何か匂ったのか？

engChrName: What?
engSearchText: What?

engChrName: Good eye. I didn't realize anyone was payin' attention. Yeah, there's something.
engSearchText:
Good eye. I didn't realize anyone was
payin' attention. Yeah, there's something.
jpnChrName: ハン、目ざといガキだ。 ──まあ、何となくだが。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、目ざといガキだ。
──まあ、何となくだが。

engChrName: It's just a hunch, but considerin' nothing else has gone wrong the last twenty years, the timing of this sure seems fishy.
engSearchText:
It's just a hunch, but considerin' nothing else has gone
wrong the last twenty years, the timing of this sure
seems fishy.
jpnChrName: ２０年近く何も無かった地下水路が こんなタイミングで異常をきたす……
jpnSearchText:
２０年近く何も無かった地下水路が
こんなタイミングで異常をきたす……

engChrName: I don't know what it is, but it doesn't feel like a coincidence to me.
engSearchText:
I don't know what it is, but it doesn't feel like a
coincidence to me.
jpnChrName: ちょいとばかり不自然な気がしてな。
jpnSearchText: ちょいとばかり不自然な気がしてな。

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...

engChrName: Now that I think about it, the odds of this happening purely by chance do feel awfully low.
engSearchText:
Now that I think about it, the odds of this
happening purely by chance do feel awfully low.
jpnChrName: ……確率論的に言えば 確かに“何か”ありそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
……確率論的に言えば
確かに“何か”ありそうですね。

engChrName: Exactly. Plus it didn't sound like there's been weird gang or monster activity lately, which makes this even more suspicious.
engSearchText:
Exactly. Plus it didn't sound like there's been weird
gang or monster activity lately, which makes this even
more suspicious.
jpnChrName: ま、今のところ半グレだの 奇妙な魔獣だのは出ていないが……
jpnSearchText:
ま、今のところ半グレだの
奇妙な魔獣だのは出ていないが……

engChrName: With all these threatening notes going around and everything with the Geneses, this feels like... an omen.
engSearchText:
With all these threatening notes going around and
everything with the Geneses, this feels like...
an omen.
jpnChrName: それでも脅迫状にゲネシス── 何らかの“兆候”があるのも確かだ。
jpnSearchText:
それでも脅迫状にゲネシス──
何らかの“兆候”があるのも確かだ。

engChrName: Talk about timing.
engSearchText: Talk about timing.
jpnChrName: ……噂をすればかよ。
jpnSearchText: ……噂をすればかよ。

engChrName: What the heck is down there...?
engSearchText: What the heck is down there...?
jpnChrName: この先にいったい何が……？
jpnSearchText: この先にいったい何が……？

engChrName: Your guess is as good as mine. Now stay sharp, everyone. We're going in.
engSearchText:
Your guess is as good as mine. Now stay
sharp, everyone. We're going in.
jpnChrName: とりあえず 引き締めて行くぞ。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえず
引き締めて行くぞ。

engChrName: The Marduk Company? That's not the first I've heard that name recently.
engSearchText:
The Marduk Company? That's not the first I've
heard that name recently.
jpnChrName: 《マルドゥック社》── 最近、たまに伺う名前ですけれど。
jpnSearchText:
《マルドゥック社》──
最近、たまに伺う名前ですけれど。

engChrName: They do security, I think? And I believe they're based outside of Calvard.
engSearchText:
They do security, I think? And I believe they're
based outside of Calvard.
jpnChrName: 確か外国にある警備会社でしたね……？
jpnSearchText: 確か外国にある警備会社でしたね……？

engChrName: Correct. Their main headquarters is located in the Ored State.
engSearchText:
Correct. Their main headquarters is located in the
Ored State.
jpnChrName: ええ、本社は《オレド自治州》になります。
jpnSearchText: ええ、本社は《オレド自治州》になります。

engChrName: While still a young company, it already enjoys a large customer base within and without Calvard.
engSearchText:
While still a young company, it already enjoys a large
customer base within and without Calvard.
jpnChrName: 設立して日の浅い会社ではありますが、 共和国でも多くの方にご愛顧頂いておりまして。
jpnSearchText:
設立して日の浅い会社ではありますが、
共和国でも多くの方にご愛顧頂いておりまして。

engChrName: As I mentioned, Mr. Arkride is contracted with us as an external tester for our tactical research and development division.
engSearchText:
As I mentioned, Mr. Arkride is contracted with us as
an external tester for our tactical research and
development division.
jpnChrName: なお──ヴァン様には《戦術開発部門》の 外部テスターとしてご契約いただいています。
jpnSearchText:
なお──ヴァン様には《戦術開発部門》の
外部テスターとしてご契約いただいています。

engChrName: Yep. That's how I wound up with the program for Mare and my trusty little stun caliber.
engSearchText:
Yep. That's how I wound up with the program for
Mare and my trusty little stun caliber.
jpnChrName: 俺のホロウ──《メア》のプログラムや 『撃剣』なんかもその流れで提供されててな。
jpnSearchText:
俺のホロウ──《メア》のプログラムや
『撃剣』なんかもその流れで提供されててな。

engChrName: We're equal partners in this endeavor.
engSearchText: We're equal partners in this endeavor.
jpnChrName: ま、あくまで対等な契約だが。
jpnSearchText: ま、あくまで対等な契約だが。

engChrName: Beyond that, in recent times, we've developed ties to various nations' public security apparatuses, as well as most every mercenary enterprise.
engSearchText:
Beyond that, in recent times, we've developed ties to
various nations' public security apparatuses, as well as
most every mercenary enterprise.
jpnChrName: 他にも最近では、各国の治安維持組織や 傭兵業の皆様とも懇意にさせて頂いています。
jpnSearchText:
他にも最近では、各国の治安維持組織や
傭兵業の皆様とも懇意にさせて頂いています。

engChrName: We even maintain a technological partnership with the Warriors of Kruga, albeit only in a partial capacity.
engSearchText:
We even maintain a technological partnership with
the Warriors of Kruga, albeit only in a
partial capacity.
jpnChrName: クルガ戦士団との技術提携も 一部ではありますが行っておりますね。
jpnSearchText:
クルガ戦士団との技術提携も
一部ではありますが行っておりますね。

engChrName: Yeah, I remember hearing about that. Although...
engSearchText: Yeah, I remember hearing about that. Although...
jpnChrName: はい、それは聞いています。 でも……
jpnSearchText:
はい、それは聞いています。
でも……

engChrName: ...I've heard rumors about your company before. But that's an awful lot for one private military company to handle.
engSearchText:
...I've heard rumors about your company before.
But that's an awful lot for one private military
company to handle.
jpnChrName: ……噂には聞いていましたけど、 民間軍事会社（ＰＭＣ）がそんなことまで……
jpnSearchText:
……噂には聞いていましたけど、
民間軍事会社（ＰＭＣ）がそんなことまで……

engChrName: Does that mean Marduk basically divides its business between its general security and its tactical research and development divisions?
engSearchText:
Does that mean Marduk basically divides its business
between its general security and its tactical research
and development divisions?
jpnChrName: 《総合警備部門》と《戦術開発部門》の２つを 使い分けているということですか。
jpnSearchText:
《総合警備部門》と《戦術開発部門》の２つを
使い分けているということですか。

engChrName: You guys must be swimming in cash these days.
engSearchText: You guys must be swimming in cash these days.
jpnChrName: 各国の軍や猟兵に技術的サービスを提供しつつ、 一方でそのシェアなんかも奪っているわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
各国の軍や猟兵に技術的サービスを提供しつつ、
一方でそのシェアなんかも奪っているわけだ。

engChrName: Taking up more and more market share as you supply tech services to militaries and jaegers alike sounds like a hell of a recipe for success.
engSearchText:
Taking up more and more market share as you supply
tech services to militaries and jaegers alike sounds like
a hell of a recipe for success.
jpnChrName: さぞかし景気も良さそうだなァ？
jpnSearchText: さぞかし景気も良さそうだなァ？

engChrName: Leave it to Mr. Arkride to employ such sharp assistants. It pleases me to see the next generation is coming along well.
engSearchText:
Leave it to Mr. Arkride to employ such
sharp assistants. It pleases me to see the next
generation is coming along well.
jpnChrName: ……さすがヴァン様の助手の方々。 後進の育成も順調なようで何よりです。
jpnSearchText:
……さすがヴァン様の助手の方々。
後進の育成も順調なようで何よりです。

engChrName: I ain't lookin' for anyone to succeed me here. They're just part-time helpers around the office, that's all.
engSearchText:
I ain't lookin' for anyone to succeed me here.
They're just part-time helpers around the office,
that's all.
jpnChrName: 後進じゃねぇ。 あくまでバイトだ、バイト。
jpnSearchText:
後進じゃねぇ。
あくまでバイトだ、バイト。

engChrName: But enough about us. You still haven't told us what the hell you're doin' all the way out here.
engSearchText:
But enough about us. You still haven't told us what
the hell you're doin' all the way out here.
jpnChrName: ──それで、肝心の“目的”を まだ教えてもらってねぇみたいだが。
jpnSearchText:
──それで、肝心の“目的”を
まだ教えてもらってねぇみたいだが。

engChrName: I understand how dedicated and responsible you are as a concierge, and I appreciate how much you guys value me as a tester.
engSearchText:
I understand how dedicated and responsible you are
as a concierge, and I appreciate how much you guys
value me as a tester.
jpnChrName: アンタの責任感は知ってる── ＭＫ（マルドゥック）が俺をテスターとして買ってるのもな。
jpnSearchText:
アンタの責任感は知ってる──
ＭＫ（マルドゥック）が俺をテスターとして買ってるのもな。

engChrName: And to be clear, I'm grateful for all the maintenance work you do remotely for my Xipha, too. You've been a big help.
engSearchText:
And to be clear, I'm grateful for all the maintenance
work you do remotely for my Xipha, too. You've been
a big help.
jpnChrName: ザイファのメンテも──日頃から リモートでやってくれてるのも感謝しかねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ザイファのメンテも──日頃から
リモートでやってくれてるのも感謝しかねぇ。

engChrName: Yet comin' out here like this—that gets into 'stupid' levels of service. I know for a fact you've got other stuff to do.
engSearchText:
Yet comin' out here like this—that gets into 'stupid'
levels of service. I know for a fact you've got other
stuff to do.
jpnChrName: だが、他にも業務を抱えたアンタがわざわざ “現地”まで来るのは流石にサービス良すぎだろ。
jpnSearchText:
だが、他にも業務を抱えたアンタがわざわざ
“現地”まで来るのは流石にサービス良すぎだろ。

engChrName: So why go to all this trouble, huh? What's going on behind the scenes to make you drop everything and wander on out here?
engSearchText:
So why go to all this trouble, huh? What's going on
behind the scenes to make you drop everything and
wander on out here?
jpnChrName: いったいどんな“裏”があるんだ？
jpnSearchText: いったいどんな“裏”があるんだ？

engChrName: ...I suppose I can fill you in on what's happening, but on one condition.
engSearchText:
...I suppose I can fill you in on what's happening, but
on one condition.
jpnChrName: ……それは先ほどの、不可思議な シャード暴走やホロウの異常行動──
jpnSearchText:
……それは先ほどの、不可思議な
シャード暴走やホロウの異常行動──

engChrName: You agree to tell me about the anomalies surrounding the shards and your holo core, as well as that stolen device. Do we have a deal?
engSearchText:
You agree to tell me about the anomalies surrounding
the shards and your holo core, as well as that
stolen device. Do we have a deal?
jpnChrName: 更には奪われた《装置》についての説明と 引き換えにということで宜しいでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
更には奪われた《装置》についての説明と
引き換えにということで宜しいでしょうか？

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...

engChrName: That's...a lot to ask.
engSearchText: That's...a lot to ask.

engChrName: (This chick plays hard.)
engSearchText: (This chick plays hard.)
jpnChrName: （この女……）
jpnSearchText: （この女……）

engChrName: Heehee. You may rest assured—I'm merely joking. You don't need to go into such detail.
engSearchText:
Heehee. You may rest assured—I'm merely joking.
You don't need to go into such detail.
jpnChrName: ふふ、冗談です。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、冗談です。

engChrName: There are two reasons as to why I've traveled to Tharbad.
engSearchText:
There are two reasons as to why I've traveled
to Tharbad.
jpnChrName: ──今回、わたくしが サルバッドを訪れた業務目的ですが……
jpnSearchText:
──今回、わたくしが
サルバッドを訪れた業務目的ですが……

engChrName: One of them was indeed to make direct contact with Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText:
One of them was indeed to make direct contact with
Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: 一つは、ヴァン様と改めて直接、 コンタクトする事だったのは否定しません。
jpnSearchText:
一つは、ヴァン様と改めて直接、
コンタクトする事だったのは否定しません。

engChrName: After all, I couldn't help but be concerned when our previous call was cut short in the manner that it was.
engSearchText:
After all, I couldn't help but be concerned when our
previous call was cut short in the manner that it was.
jpnChrName: あのような形で通信を打ち切られたので 尚更気になってしまったのもありますし。
jpnSearchText:
あのような形で通信を打ち切られたので
尚更気になってしまったのもありますし。

engChrName: Yeah, uhh...my bad. I didn't mean for it to be such a big deal.
engSearchText:
Yeah, uhh...my bad. I didn't mean for it to be such a
big deal.
jpnChrName: いや……それについては 悪かったとは思ってるけどよ。
jpnSearchText:
いや……それについては
悪かったとは思ってるけどよ。

engChrName: You sound like someone trying to explain to his girl why he was two-timing her when you talk like that, you know.
engSearchText:
You sound like someone trying to explain to his girl
why he was two-timing her when you talk like that,
you know.
jpnChrName: クク、浮気の言い訳をする 亭主みてぇだなァ？
jpnSearchText:
クク、浮気の言い訳をする
亭主みてぇだなァ？

engChrName: (Yikes. Agnès looks super tense!)
engSearchText: (Yikes. Agnès looks super tense!)
jpnChrName: （はっ……   アニエスさんの息吹が仄暗く……）
jpnSearchText:
（はっ……
アニエスさんの息吹が仄暗く……）

engChrName: My other reason for coming to this city is to investigate the film festival in person.
engSearchText:
My other reason for coming to this city is to
investigate the film festival in person.
jpnChrName: そしてもう一つは他でもありません。 『サルバッド映画祭』の現地調査のためです。
jpnSearchText:
そしてもう一つは他でもありません。
『サルバッド映画祭』の現地調査のためです。

engChrName: Say what?
engSearchText: Say what?
jpnChrName: なに……
jpnSearchText: なに……

engChrName: Why would you need to do that?
engSearchText: Why would you need to do that?
jpnChrName: そ、そうなんですか……？
jpnSearchText: そ、そうなんですか……？

engChrName: Quite simply, it is related to the Messeldam Film Festival that was set to take place two months ago.
engSearchText:
Quite simply, it is related to the Messeldam Film
Festival that was set to take place two months ago.
jpnChrName: 直截に言ってしまえば……２ヶ月前に 開催予定だった『メッセルダム映画祭』。
jpnSearchText:
直截に言ってしまえば……２ヶ月前に
開催予定だった『メッセルダム映画祭』。

engChrName: It has to do with the circumstances surrounding its cancellation.
engSearchText:
It has to do with the circumstances surrounding
its cancellation.
jpnChrName: あちらの事情が関係しています。
jpnSearchText: あちらの事情が関係しています。

engChrName: You mean that racial terrorism stuff?
engSearchText: You mean that racial terrorism stuff?
jpnChrName: 民族テロで中止になった……
jpnSearchText: 民族テロで中止になった……

engChrName: No kidding? I think I'm seeing where this is going.
engSearchText: No kidding? I think I'm seeing where this is going.
jpnChrName: ……ハン……？ 何となく見えてきたな。
jpnSearchText:
……ハン……？
何となく見えてきたな。

engChrName: As you all know, Messeldam was forced to cancel the festival after receiving a terrorist threat and witnessing a wave of suspicious fires.
engSearchText:
As you all know, Messeldam was forced to cancel the
festival after receiving a terrorist threat and witnessing
a wave of suspicious fires.
jpnChrName: ──きっかけはテロ予告と相次ぐ不審火で 中止を判断せざるを得なかったメッセルダム市……
jpnSearchText:
──きっかけはテロ予告と相次ぐ不審火で
中止を判断せざるを得なかったメッセルダム市……

engChrName: The city, along with the local security company that was forced to pay a fine for the resulting breach of contract, requested our services.
engSearchText:
The city, along with the local security company that
was forced to pay a fine for the resulting breach of
contract, requested our services.
jpnChrName: それと違約金を負担した現地の警備会社の要請です。
jpnSearchText: それと違約金を負担した現地の警備会社の要請です。

engChrName: That incident appears to be linked to Tharbad's festival, which has received greater attention than was otherwise anticipated.
engSearchText:
That incident appears to be linked to Tharbad's
festival, which has received greater attention than was
otherwise anticipated.
jpnChrName: かのテロの背景と、その中止によって想定以上に 注目を集める『サルバッド映画祭』との因果関係──
jpnSearchText:
かのテロの背景と、その中止によって想定以上に
注目を集める『サルバッド映画祭』との因果関係──

engChrName: As a result, the decision was made to dispatch me to reassess the company's risk evaluation for Calvard.
engSearchText:
As a result, the decision was made to dispatch me
to reassess the company's risk evaluation
for Calvard.
jpnChrName: 共和国における我が社の危機管理評価の更新のため、 改めてわたくしが派遣される運びになりました。
jpnSearchText:
共和国における我が社の危機管理評価の更新のため、
改めてわたくしが派遣される運びになりました。

engChrName: So that's what's going on, huh? Now I get it.
engSearchText: So that's what's going on, huh? Now I get it.
jpnChrName: なるほど……そういう事か。
jpnSearchText: なるほど……そういう事か。

engChrName: Uh, I'm sorry, but I think I got lost somewhere around 'Messeldam canceled.'
engSearchText:
Uh, I'm sorry, but I think I got lost somewhere
around 'Messeldam canceled.'
jpnChrName: えと、まったくもって 全然ついていけないんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
えと、まったくもって
全然ついていけないんですけど……

engChrName: Basically, if I understand her correctly, Risette is here to evaluate Calvard's security risks, nationwide.
engSearchText:
Basically, if I understand her correctly, Risette is here
to evaluate Calvard's security risks, nationwide.
jpnChrName: ……要は共和国全体の 安全保障リスクを分析して……
jpnSearchText:
……要は共和国全体の
安全保障リスクを分析して……

engChrName: That way, she and her company can be prepared to provide any necessary 'services' if and when they're needed.
engSearchText:
That way, she and her company can be prepared to
provide any necessary 'services' if and when
they're needed.
jpnChrName: 必要になりそうな状況で必要なサービスを 提供するための“準備”をしているんですね？
jpnSearchText:
必要になりそうな状況で必要なサービスを
提供するための“準備”をしているんですね？

engChrName: The way she talks, it sounds like Calvard's hardly the only one her place keeps a close eye on.
engSearchText:
The way she talks, it sounds like Calvard's hardly the
only one her place keeps a close eye on.
jpnChrName: ハッ、聞いてる限りだと カルバードだけじゃねえんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、聞いてる限りだと
カルバードだけじゃねえんだろ。

engChrName: Hell...it sounds a lot like how Heiyue's elders tend to think.
engSearchText:
Hell...it sounds a lot like how Heiyue's elders tend
to think.
jpnChrName: まるで黒月の長老どもが考えそうな 思考パターンっつうか……
jpnSearchText:
まるで黒月の長老どもが考えそうな
思考パターンっつうか……

engChrName: These guys have got their fingers in some pretty dicey pies.
engSearchText:
These guys have got their fingers in some pretty
dicey pies.
jpnChrName: オイ── ヤベえんじゃねえか、コイツら？
jpnSearchText:
オイ──
ヤベえんじゃねえか、コイツら？

engChrName: I completely understand your concern. It is certainly true that Marduk makes its money from wars and national-scale law enforcement.
engSearchText:
I completely understand your concern. It is certainly
true that Marduk makes its money from wars and
national-scale law enforcement.
jpnChrName: 無理もありません……戦争や犯罪のリスクを “ビジネス”に変換しているわけですから。
jpnSearchText:
無理もありません……戦争や犯罪のリスクを
“ビジネス”に変換しているわけですから。

engChrName: On the other hand, we also take pride in demonstrably contributing in part to regional security.
engSearchText:
On the other hand, we also take pride in
demonstrably contributing in part to regional security.
jpnChrName: ですが一方で、一部地域の治安維持に 確実に貢献できているという自負もあります。
jpnSearchText:
ですが一方で、一部地域の治安維持に
確実に貢献できているという自負もあります。

engChrName: We also help to combat criminal cabals and other such groups, including ones that have seen their threat level grow...inconceivably large.
engSearchText:
We also help to combat criminal cabals and other
such groups, including ones that have seen their
threat level grow...inconceivably large.
jpnChrName: 更には国際的な犯罪結社や──あり得ない レベルで脅威度が上がった犯罪組織への対策も。
jpnSearchText:
更には国際的な犯罪結社や──あり得ない
レベルで脅威度が上がった犯罪組織への対策も。

engChrName: You're talking about...
engSearchText: You're talking about...
jpnChrName: ……そいつは………
jpnSearchText: ……そいつは………

engChrName: I guess it only makes sense that your company would be involved in that, too.
engSearchText:
I guess it only makes sense that your company would
be involved in that, too.
jpnChrName: 考えてみれば当然、でしたか……
jpnSearchText: 考えてみれば当然、でしたか……

engChrName: So, long story short, circumstances more or less forced you to come out here anyway. I wasn't the only factor.
engSearchText:
So, long story short, circumstances more or less forced
you to come out here anyway. I wasn't the only factor.
jpnChrName: なるほど……俺の件以外にも そこまで“必然”が重なったわけか。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……俺の件以外にも
そこまで“必然”が重なったわけか。

engChrName: That's all I need to know, then. I won't pry any further.
engSearchText:
That's all I need to know, then. I won't pry
any further.
jpnChrName: だったらこれ以上、突っ込む所はねえな。
jpnSearchText: だったらこれ以上、突っ込む所はねえな。

engChrName: Is all that to say that you're basically on loan to us? If so, I'll give you free reign to act however you deem fit while we're here.
engSearchText:
Is all that to say that you're basically on loan to us?
If so, I'll give you free reign to act however you deem
fit while we're here.
jpnChrName: ──体裁は“派遣”社員あたりか？ ３日間だし適当に決めてくれていい。
jpnSearchText:
──体裁は“派遣”社員あたりか？
３日間だし適当に決めてくれていい。

engChrName: Your skills are even better than I expected, now that I've seen 'em in person. You've got my trust, Risette, don't worry.
engSearchText:
Your skills are even better than I expected, now that
I've seen 'em in person. You've got my trust, Risette,
don't worry.
jpnChrName: 腕前も戦術も想像以上だったし、 せいぜいよろしく頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText:
腕前も戦術も想像以上だったし、
せいぜいよろしく頼むぜ。

engChrName: That is very reassuring to hear. It will be a pleasure working together with you in person, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText:
That is very reassuring to hear. It will be a pleasure
working together with you in person, Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: はい、こちらこそ── 宜しくお願いいたします、ヴァン様。
jpnSearchText:
はい、こちらこそ──
宜しくお願いいたします、ヴァン様。

engChrName: Wait a second! Does this mean—
engSearchText: Wait a second! Does this mean—
jpnChrName: ……ええっ！？ それってもしかして……
jpnSearchText:
……ええっ！？
それってもしかして……

engChrName: Are you saying we have to team up with this chick? You sure you don't want to give that some more thought?!
engSearchText:
Are you saying we have to team up with this chick?
You sure you don't want to give that some
more thought?!
jpnChrName: オイオイオイ！ まさかこの女と組むってか！？
jpnSearchText:
オイオイオイ！
まさかこの女と組むってか！？

engChrName: If you guys feel that strongly about it, I won't force you to work with her.
engSearchText:
If you guys feel that strongly about it, I won't force
you to work with her.
jpnChrName: ま、お前らが反対すんなら 流石に無理にとは言わねえが……
jpnSearchText:
ま、お前らが反対すんなら
流石に無理にとは言わねえが……

engChrName: But you all saw what happened back in the waterway. I don't think we should look a gift horse in the mouth.
engSearchText:
But you all saw what happened back in the waterway.
I don't think we should look a gift horse in
the mouth.
jpnChrName: ──さっきの顛末を考えると 打てる手は打っとくべきだと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
──さっきの顛末を考えると
打てる手は打っとくべきだと思ってな。

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...

engChrName: Well...
engSearchText: Well...
jpnChrName: それは……
jpnSearchText: それは……

engChrName: *sigh* I guess you've got a point.
engSearchText: *sigh* I guess you've got a point.
jpnChrName: チッ……そうだったな。
jpnSearchText: チッ……そうだったな。

engChrName: We're dealin' with that girl and the angel thing, and they both ran off once they got their hands on the Genesis.
engSearchText:
We're dealin' with that girl and the angel thing, and
they both ran off once they got their hands on
the Genesis.
jpnChrName: あのヤバイ天使ともう一人の娘…… 《ゲネシス》を回収していったやり口。
jpnSearchText:
あのヤバイ天使ともう一人の娘……
《ゲネシス》を回収していったやり口。

engChrName: We might not have hard evidence yet, but if I had to point fingers at who's behind it, I know who my first guess would be.
engSearchText:
We might not have hard evidence yet, but if I had to
point fingers at who's behind it, I know who my first
guess would be.
jpnChrName: ──まだ決まったわけじゃねえが どうしても連中を思い起こすのは確かだ。
jpnSearchText:
──まだ決まったわけじゃねえが
どうしても連中を思い起こすのは確かだ。

engChrName: Yeah...
engSearchText: Yeah...

engChrName: I agree. It's entirely possible that Almata could be lurking out here, too.
engSearchText:
I agree. It's entirely possible that Almata could be
lurking out here, too.
jpnChrName: このサルバッドにあの人たちが…… アルマータが居るかもしれないんですね。
jpnSearchText:
このサルバッドにあの人たちが……
アルマータが居るかもしれないんですね。

engChrName: I cannot claim to be fully aware of your specific circumstances, but our analysis does suggest that's quite possible.
engSearchText:
I cannot claim to be fully aware of your specific
circumstances, but our analysis does suggest that's
quite possible.
jpnChrName: ──皆様の事情については存じ上げませんが 我が社の分析でもその可能性は低くありません。
jpnSearchText:
──皆様の事情については存じ上げませんが
我が社の分析でもその可能性は低くありません。

engChrName: Having said that, I also believe that it's too early to rule out other potential actors as well.
engSearchText:
Having said that, I also believe that it's too early to
rule out other potential actors as well.
jpnChrName: ですが“他の勢力”である可能性もまた、 現時点では切り捨てるべきではないかと思います。
jpnSearchText:
ですが“他の勢力”である可能性もまた、
現時点では切り捨てるべきではないかと思います。

engChrName: To that end, I will do whatever I can to help, even if I'm still relatively inexperienced as a concierge.
engSearchText:
To that end, I will do whatever I can to help, even if
I'm still relatively inexperienced as a concierge.
jpnChrName: ＳＣとしてまだまだ未熟ですが…… そういった部分でのお手伝いをさせて頂ければ。
jpnSearchText:
ＳＣとしてまだまだ未熟ですが……
そういった部分でのお手伝いをさせて頂ければ。

engChrName: ...Heh.
engSearchText: ...Heh.
jpnSearchText: ………ハン…………

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...

engChrName: Also, regarding the anomaly between Mare and Mr. Arkride...
engSearchText:
Also, regarding the anomaly between Mare and
Mr. Arkride...
jpnChrName: 加えて先ほどの《メア》とヴァン様の異常──
jpnSearchText: 加えて先ほどの《メア》とヴァン様の異常──

engChrName: It's rather curious to see an AI with no will manifest and react in that manner—as well as for its user to be covered so densely in shards.
engSearchText:
It's rather curious to see an AI with no will manifest
and react in that manner—as well as for its user to be
covered so densely in shards.
jpnChrName: 自由意志のないＡＩが可視化して受け答えし、 異様な密度のシャードに全身を覆われる現象……
jpnSearchText:
自由意志のないＡＩが可視化して受け答えし、
異様な密度のシャードに全身を覆われる現象……

engChrName: I may, however, be able to devise a treatment to address the symptoms of such unforeseen 'outbursts.'
engSearchText:
I may, however, be able to devise a treatment to
address the symptoms of such unforeseen 'outbursts.'
jpnChrName: その“想定外の暴走”についても何らかの 対症療法を提示できるかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
その“想定外の暴走”についても何らかの
対症療法を提示できるかもしれません。

engChrName: I speak not only as a professional. I sincerely wish to help on a personal level as well.
engSearchText:
I speak not only as a professional. I sincerely wish to
help on a personal level as well.
jpnChrName: いえ──それについては わたくし自身がそうしたいと思っています。
jpnSearchText:
いえ──それについては
わたくし自身がそうしたいと思っています。

engChrName: Oh...
engSearchText: Oh...
jpnSearchText: ……ぁ………

engChrName: You're really somethin'.
engSearchText: You're really somethin'.
jpnChrName: ………ったく。
jpnSearchText: ………ったく。

engChrName: I understand that I may be imposing upon you, and that you all may have trouble accepting my presence. I truly do.
engSearchText:
I understand that I may be imposing upon you, and
that you all may have trouble accepting my presence.
I truly do.
jpnChrName: 勝手な申し出、とても納得しがたいことは 重々承知しておりますが……
jpnSearchText:
勝手な申し出、とても納得しがたいことは
重々承知しておりますが……

engChrName: Regardless, would it be all right for me to accompany you all for the next few days while you're in the city?
engSearchText:
Regardless, would it be all right for me to accompany
you all for the next few days while you're in the city?
jpnChrName: どうか３日間だけでも皆様と ご一緒させて頂けないでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
どうか３日間だけでも皆様と
ご一緒させて頂けないでしょうか……？

engChrName: ...Risette, it's okay. You don't have to be so hesitant.
engSearchText: ...Risette, it's okay. You don't have to be so hesitant.
jpnChrName: ……リゼットさん。 どうか頭を上げてください。
jpnSearchText:
……リゼットさん。
どうか頭を上げてください。

engChrName: We would be happy to have you with us. In fact, it would be really reassuring.
engSearchText:
We would be happy to have you with us. In fact, it
would be really reassuring.
jpnChrName: こちらこそ宜しくお願いします。 正直──とても心強いです。
jpnSearchText:
こちらこそ宜しくお願いします。
正直──とても心強いです。

engChrName: Yeah! Those wall things you used earlier were really cool, too!
engSearchText:
Yeah! Those wall things you used earlier were really
cool, too!
jpnChrName: えへへ……さっきの “足場”とかも凄かったですし！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……さっきの
“足場”とかも凄かったですし！

engChrName: Hell, if anything, I wouldn't be shocked if you turned out to be more reliable than our chief here.
engSearchText:
Hell, if anything, I wouldn't be shocked if
you turned out to be more reliable than our
chief here.
jpnChrName: ハッ、考えてみりゃどこぞの所長より よっぽど頼りになるんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、考えてみりゃどこぞの所長より
よっぽど頼りになるんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Hey, watch your mouth. Not that I can disagree...
engSearchText: Hey, watch your mouth. Not that I can disagree...
jpnChrName: お前な……ま、否定はしねぇが。
jpnSearchText: お前な……ま、否定はしねぇが。

engChrName: Thank you, Ms. Claudel, Ms. Al-Fayed, Mr. Wei.
engSearchText: Thank you, Ms. Claudel, Ms. Al-Fayed, Mr. Wei.
jpnChrName: ……ありがとうございます。 アニエス様にフェリ様、アーロン様も。
jpnSearchText:
……ありがとうございます。
アニエス様にフェリ様、アーロン様も。

engChrName: Then from now on, I, Risette Twinings...
engSearchText: Then from now on, I, Risette Twinings...
jpnChrName: それではリゼット・トワイニング──
jpnSearchText: それではリゼット・トワイニング──

engChrName: ...will accompany you, Arkride Solutions, during your three-day mission in Tharbad.
engSearchText:
...will accompany you, Arkride Solutions, during
your three-day mission in Tharbad.
jpnChrName: 本日より３日間、アークライド解決事務所に “出向”の形で参加させていただきます。
jpnSearchText:
本日より３日間、アークライド解決事務所に
“出向”の形で参加させていただきます。

engChrName: After that, the group enjoyed a nice, milky batch of chai, courtesy of the inn's proprietress, as thanks for all of their hard work.
engSearchText:
After that, the group enjoyed a nice, milky batch of
chai, courtesy of the inn's proprietress, as thanks for
all of their hard work.
jpnChrName: その後、宿の女将が労いも込めて淹れてくれた ミルクたっぷりの紅茶（チャイ）で一息入れながら……
jpnSearchText:
その後、宿の女将が労いも込めて淹れてくれた
ミルクたっぷりの紅茶（チャイ）で一息入れながら……

engChrName: As they did so, they summarized to Risette the sequence of events up until their current mission for Nina Fenly and Judith Lanster.
engSearchText:
As they did so, they summarized to Risette the
sequence of events up until their current mission for
Nina Fenly and Judith Lanster.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは《ゲネシス》や《グレンデル》、 これまでアルマータが引き起こした事件──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは《ゲネシス》や《グレンデル》、
これまでアルマータが引き起こした事件──

engChrName: They delved into the Geneses and the Grendel, as well as the crimes committed by Almata—revelations that stunned the concierge.
engSearchText:
They delved into the Geneses and the Grendel, as well
as the crimes committed by Almata—revelations that
stunned the concierge.
jpnChrName: そして今回の女優たちの依頼に至るまで、 およそ一通りの事情を大まかにリゼットに説明した。
jpnSearchText:
そして今回の女優たちの依頼に至るまで、
およそ一通りの事情を大まかにリゼットに説明した。

engChrName: For her part, she swore to keep what she learned strictly confidential and not divulge anything to her employer without permission.
engSearchText:
For her part, she swore to keep what she learned
strictly confidential and not divulge anything to her
employer without permission.
jpnChrName: リゼットもまた、驚きをもって受け止めながら 守秘義務としてそれらの情報を無断で “出向元”に送らないことを固く誓い──
jpnSearchText:
リゼットもまた、驚きをもって受け止めながら
守秘義務としてそれらの情報を無断で
“出向元”に送らないことを固く誓い──

engChrName: Such sincere consideration for their circumstances further cemented the newfound trust Arkride Solutions had in Risette.
engSearchText:
Such sincere consideration for their circumstances
further cemented the newfound trust Arkride
Solutions had in Risette.
jpnChrName: そうした真摯で誠意ある配慮によって アニエスたちの信用を改めて勝ち取るのだった。
jpnSearchText:
そうした真摯で誠意ある配慮によって
アニエスたちの信用を改めて勝ち取るのだった。

engChrName: Soon enough, with the sun setting, Van fully recovered and regained his stamina.
engSearchText:
Soon enough, with the sun setting, Van fully
recovered and regained his stamina.
jpnChrName: そして日が暮れてヴァンの体調も完全復活した頃──
jpnSearchText: <C1>そして日が暮れてヴァンの体調も完全復活した頃──

engChrName: The party decided to venture back outside, both to find a place to eat at for dinner, as well as to report back to the actresses on their progress.
engSearchText:
The party decided to venture back outside, both to
find a place to eat at for dinner, as well as to report
back to the actresses on their progress.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちは夕食と、依頼者たちへの報告も兼ねて 夜のサルバッドの街に改めて繰り出すことにした。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちは夕食と、依頼者たちへの報告も兼ねて
夜のサルバッドの街に改めて繰り出すことにした。

engChrName: October 5th, 6:02PM
engSearchText: October 5th, 6:02PM

engChrName: Now this is more my kind of scene! A city only really comes alive at night, if you ask me.
engSearchText:
Now this is more my kind of scene! A city only really
comes alive at night, if you ask me.
jpnChrName: いいねぇ、いいねぇ。 やっぱ夜の街はアガるぜ！
jpnSearchText:
いいねぇ、いいねぇ。
やっぱ夜の街はアガるぜ！

engChrName: You know what that means: time to hit the streets and see what sorts of joints with foxy ladies they've got around here.
engSearchText:
You know what that means: time to hit the streets
and see what sorts of joints with foxy ladies they've
got around here.
jpnChrName: こうなったらネーちゃんのいる店とか 片っ端から冷やかすしかねぇな！
jpnSearchText:
こうなったらネーちゃんのいる店とか
片っ端から冷やかすしかねぇな！

engChrName: Aaron. Do grow up.
engSearchText: Aaron. Do grow up.
jpnChrName: アーロンさん……
jpnSearchText: アーロンさん……

engChrName: I dunno what these 'fox ladies' you're talking about are. All I know is, I'm starving!
engSearchText:
I dunno what these 'fox ladies' you're talking
about are. All I know is, I'm starving!
jpnChrName: ネーちゃん……？ わたしはお腹が空きましたっ。
jpnSearchText:
ネーちゃん……？
わたしはお腹が空きましたっ。

engChrName: Don't mind him—he's just driving with his pants, you might say. We've still got some time to kill before our meeting.
engSearchText:
Don't mind him—he's just driving with his pants, you
might say. We've still got some time to kill before
our meeting.
jpnChrName: ま、クソガキの妄言はともかく、 まだ待ち合わせまで時間がある。
jpnSearchText:
ま、クソガキの妄言はともかく、
まだ待ち合わせまで時間がある。

engChrName: Let's take another look around town while scopin' out somewhere to sit down and eat.
engSearchText:
Let's take another look around town while scopin' out
somewhere to sit down and eat.
jpnChrName: 晩メシの場所も捜しながら 色々探ってみるのもいいだろう。
jpnSearchText:
晩メシの場所も捜しながら
色々探ってみるのもいいだろう。

engChrName: I know it's not the most efficient way of going about things, but it's how I do it as a spriggan.
engSearchText:
I know it's not the most efficient way of going about
things, but it's how I do it as a spriggan.
jpnChrName: ──効率が悪いかもしれんが これが《裏解決屋（スプリガン）》のやり方だ。
jpnSearchText:
──効率が悪いかもしれんが
これが《裏解決屋（スプリガン）》のやり方だ。

engChrName: Hope us just meandering around a bit doesn't drive you too up the wall.
engSearchText:
Hope us just meandering around a bit doesn't drive
you too up the wall.
jpnChrName: 悪いが呆れずに付き合ってくれや。
jpnSearchText: 悪いが呆れずに付き合ってくれや。

engChrName: Oh, no. Not at all. I'm actually quite interested to learn. I've wanted to know more about your work for some time.
engSearchText:
Oh, no. Not at all. I'm actually quite interested
to learn. I've wanted to know more about your work
for some time.
jpnChrName: いえ、とても興味深いですし、 以前から気になっていた所でした。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、とても興味深いですし、
以前から気になっていた所でした。

engChrName: To summarize, the plan is to check for new 4SPG requests, responding to them as necessary while continuing to survey the city on foot, yes?
engSearchText:
To summarize, the plan is to check for new 4SPG
requests, responding to them as necessary while
continuing to survey the city on foot, yes?
jpnChrName: ──４ｓｐｇのチェックも改めて行いつつ、 必要に応じて対応、現地情報を“肌”で得る。
jpnSearchText:
──４ｓｐｇのチェックも改めて行いつつ、
必要に応じて対応、現地情報を“肌”で得る。

engChrName: Then, when the time is right, we'll make our way to the Al-Jumeirah to report in to Ms. Fenly and Ms. Lanster. Is my understanding correct?
engSearchText:
Then, when the time is right, we'll make our way to
the Al-Jumeirah to report in to Ms. Fenly and
Ms. Lanster. Is my understanding correct?
jpnChrName: 頃合いを見てアルジュメイラホテルに 報告に向かう──といった段取りでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
頃合いを見てアルジュメイラホテルに
報告に向かう──といった段取りでしょうか。

engChrName: Wow. You didn't take long to adapt to how we do things.
engSearchText:
Wow. You didn't take long to adapt to how we
do things.
jpnChrName: オイオイ……適応早すぎだろ。
jpnSearchText: オイオイ……適応早すぎだろ。

engChrName: Seriously. It's like she's been with us this whole time.
engSearchText: Seriously. It's like she's been with us this whole time.
jpnChrName: うーん、なんだかずっと お手伝いをしていたような。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、なんだかずっと
お手伝いをしていたような。

engChrName: (Quick, Agnès! You've got to contribute something! Somethiiing...!)
engSearchText:
(Quick, Agnès! You've got to contribute something!
Somethiiing...!)
jpnChrName: （な、なんとなく立場が……）
jpnSearchText: （な、なんとなく立場が……）

engChrName: Oh, yes! We still need to deliver those autographs to Shaheena!
engSearchText:
Oh, yes! We still need to deliver those autographs
to Shaheena!
jpnChrName: ──そうですっ、シャヒーナさんに 色紙の方をお渡ししないと！
jpnSearchText:
──そうですっ、シャヒーナさんに
色紙の方をお渡ししないと！

engChrName: Hey, you're right. I forgot all about that.
engSearchText: Hey, you're right. I forgot all about that.
jpnChrName: おっと、そいつがあったか。
jpnSearchText: おっと、そいつがあったか。

engChrName: Gaaah! Me, too! D'you think she's home by now?
engSearchText: Gaaah! Me, too! D'you think she's home by now?
jpnChrName: そうでしたっ！　えと…… もう家に帰ってる頃でしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
そうでしたっ！　えと……
もう家に帰ってる頃でしょうか？

engChrName: Nah, not yet. Don't you remember? She said she wanted to stop by the hamam on their way back from work.
engSearchText:
Nah, not yet. Don't you remember? She said she
wanted to stop by the hamam on their way back
from work.
jpnChrName: いや、たしか興行帰りに ハマムに寄るとか言ってなかったか？
jpnSearchText:
いや、たしか興行帰りに
ハマムに寄るとか言ってなかったか？

engChrName: Good point. I'm sure it's reopened by now. Might as well stop by and see how they're doing.
engSearchText:
Good point. I'm sure it's reopened by now. Might as
well stop by and see how they're doing.
jpnChrName: ああ、無事再開できただろうし、 折角だから寄ってもいいかもな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、無事再開できただろうし、
折角だから寄ってもいいかもな。

engChrName: Sounds like a plan! W-Well, what are we waiting for? No time to lose! Let's get to work, everyone!
engSearchText:
Sounds like a plan! W-Well, what are we waiting for?
No time to lose! Let's get to work, everyone!
jpnChrName: そ、それでは夜の解決業務、 再開ですね……！
jpnSearchText:
そ、それでは夜の解決業務、
再開ですね……！

engChrName: Heehee, indeed. Lead the way, everyone. I'll follow along.
engSearchText:
Heehee, indeed. Lead the way, everyone. I'll
follow along.
jpnChrName: ふふ…… お付き合いさせて頂きます。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……
お付き合いさせて頂きます。

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: ハマムから謝礼としてミラが振り込まれた。
jpnSearchText: ハマムから謝礼として<C2><C0>ミラが振り込まれた。

engChrName: Risette joined the party.
engSearchText: Risette joined the party.
jpnChrName: リゼットがパーティに加わった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>リゼットがパーティに加わった。

engChrName: Hi, Shaheena! Hi, Saara!
engSearchText: Hi, Shaheena! Hi, Saara!
jpnChrName: シャヒーナさん、サァラさん！
jpnSearchText: シャヒーナさん、サァラさん！

engChrName: Looks like our hunch was right. Good to see you ladies.
engSearchText:
Looks like our hunch was right. Good to see
you ladies.
jpnChrName: やっぱりここに寄ってたか。
jpnSearchText: やっぱりここに寄ってたか。

engChrName: Oh, hello, everyone!
engSearchText: Oh, hello, everyone!
jpnChrName: あ……皆さん！
jpnSearchText: あ……皆さん！

engChrName: The owner was just telling us about you all.
engSearchText: The owner was just telling us about you all.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ちょうどご主人から 皆さんの話を聞いていたところです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、ちょうどご主人から
皆さんの話を聞いていたところです。

engChrName: It sounds like you guys had to clear out some monsters to get the baths back up and running.
engSearchText:
It sounds like you guys had to clear out some
monsters to get the baths back up and running.
jpnChrName: 地下の魔獣をやっつけて ハマムを再開してくれたんだってね～！
jpnSearchText:
地下の魔獣をやっつけて
ハマムを再開してくれたんだってね～！

engChrName: That's amazing! I knew you guys were talented!
engSearchText: That's amazing! I knew you guys were talented!
jpnChrName: うんうん、さっすが あたしが見込んだみんなだよ！
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、さっすが
あたしが見込んだみんなだよ！

engChrName: Thanks again for everything you all did. I'd still be in dire straits if it weren't for you folks.
engSearchText:
Thanks again for everything you all did. I'd still be in
dire straits if it weren't for you folks.
jpnChrName: いや、昼間は本当に助かったよ。 改めて礼を言わせてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、昼間は本当に助かったよ。
改めて礼を言わせてくれ。

engChrName: Eh, all part of being a spriggan. We got plenty out of that whole exercise, too, so it was good for everyone.
engSearchText:
Eh, all part of being a spriggan. We got plenty out of
that whole exercise, too, so it was good for everyone.
jpnChrName: ま、これも仕事ってヤツさ。 おかげで色々収穫もあったしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、これも仕事ってヤツさ。
おかげで色々収穫もあったしな。

engChrName: Well, that's good to hear.
engSearchText: Well, that's good to hear.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それは何よりでしたね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、それは何よりでしたね。

engChrName: By the way, who might you be? I don't believe you were with them earlier.
engSearchText:
By the way, who might you be? I don't believe you
were with them earlier.
jpnChrName: そういえばそちらの方は？ 昼間はお見掛けしませんでしたが。
jpnSearchText:
そういえばそちらの方は？
昼間はお見掛けしませんでしたが。

engChrName: Forgive my late introduction. You may call me Risette. I was dispatched here on short notice.
engSearchText:
Forgive my late introduction. You may call
me Risette. I was dispatched here on short notice.
jpnChrName: 遅ればせながら、急遽“出向”で 参加することとなったリゼットと申します。
jpnSearchText:
遅ればせながら、急遽“出向”で
参加することとなったリゼットと申します。

engChrName: You two are Ms. Saara and Ms. Shaheena, correct? It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance.
engSearchText:
You two are Ms. Saara and Ms. Shaheena, correct?
It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance.
jpnChrName: サァラ様にシャヒーナ様でしたか、 滞在中はよろしくお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
サァラ様にシャヒーナ様でしたか、
滞在中はよろしくお願いいたします。

engChrName: N-Nice to meet you, too.
engSearchText: N-Nice to meet you, too.
jpnChrName: はい、これはご丁寧に……
jpnSearchText: はい、これはご丁寧に……

engChrName: Wait, is that a maid outfit you're wearing?! I've never seen one of those in person before!
engSearchText:
Wait, is that a maid outfit you're wearing?! I've never
seen one of those in person before!
jpnChrName: その衣装、メイドさんってやつ？ あたし初めて見たかも！
jpnSearchText:
その衣装、メイドさんってやつ？
あたし初めて見たかも！

engChrName: Hmm... Not precisely. This is the uniform that I wear for work.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Not precisely. This is the uniform that I wear
for work.
jpnChrName: ふふ、正確には “出向元”の制服となります。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、正確には
“出向元”の制服となります。

engChrName: You can think of it as a combat suit designed to let me offer maximum support to my customers when needed.
engSearchText:
You can think of it as a combat suit designed to let
me offer maximum support to my customers
when needed.
jpnChrName: 顧客を最大限サポートするための 戦闘服のようなものでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
顧客を最大限サポートするための
戦闘服のようなものでしょうか。

engChrName: That sounds, umm, complicated. Whatever it is, you look super cool in it, that's for sure!
engSearchText:
That sounds, umm, complicated. Whatever it is, you
look super cool in it, that's for sure!
jpnChrName: よく分かんないけどカッコイー！
jpnSearchText: よく分かんないけどカッコイー！

engChrName: Hey, since we're all here, why don't you guys join us in the baths?
engSearchText:
Hey, since we're all here, why don't you guys join us
in the baths?
jpnChrName: そうだ、せっかくだから みんなも一緒に入っていったら？
jpnSearchText:
そうだ、せっかくだから
みんなも一緒に入っていったら？

engChrName: There's so much I wanna talk about!
engSearchText: There's so much I wanna talk about!
jpnChrName: 色々話も聞きたいし！
jpnSearchText: 色々話も聞きたいし！

engChrName: That sounds like fun. Maybe we could all get dinner together afterwards, too?
engSearchText:
That sounds like fun. Maybe we could all get dinner
together afterwards, too?
jpnChrName: ふふ、それはいいわね。 よかったら夕食もご一緒にどうですか？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、それはいいわね。
よかったら夕食もご一緒にどうですか？

engChrName: There's a place close by I always go to that I'm sure you all would enjoy.
engSearchText:
There's a place close by I always go to that I'm sure
you all would enjoy.
jpnChrName: この近くに行きつけの店があるんです。
jpnSearchText: この近くに行きつけの店があるんです。

engChrName: Sure. We'd be happy to take you up on that.
engSearchText: Sure. We'd be happy to take you up on that.
jpnChrName: そうだな…… せっかくだからご相伴にあずかるか。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな……
せっかくだからご相伴にあずかるか。

engChrName: Probably not a bad idea for us to wash up before we meet with our clients again, anyway.
engSearchText:
Probably not a bad idea for us to wash up before we
meet with our clients again, anyway.
jpnChrName: 依頼人に会う前に汗を流しとくのも 当然のマナーだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
依頼人に会う前に汗を流しとくのも
当然のマナーだろうしな。

engChrName: Say what you like—I know you're just looking for an excuse to take a dip. Not that I'm AGAINST it.
engSearchText:
Say what you like—I know you're just looking for an
excuse to take a dip. Not that I'm AGAINST it.
jpnChrName: ハッ、てめぇが入りてぇだけだろ…… と言いたいところだが。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、てめぇが入りてぇだけだろ……
と言いたいところだが。

engChrName: I could really use a bite to eat, but that's okay. A bath sounds good after everything we've done today!
engSearchText:
I could really use a bite to eat, but that's okay. A bath
sounds good after everything we've done today!
jpnChrName: お腹も空いていますけど…… その前にサッパリもしたいですっ！
jpnSearchText:
お腹も空いていますけど……
その前にサッパリもしたいですっ！

engChrName: Then it's settled. We'll join you two in the baths.
engSearchText: Then it's settled. We'll join you two in the baths.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、それでは ぜひご一緒させてください。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、それでは
ぜひご一緒させてください。

engChrName: Yay! That's perfect! Come on, I'll show you where the girls' ones are!
engSearchText:
Yay! That's perfect! Come on, I'll show you where the
girls' ones are!
jpnChrName: やったぁ、決まりだねー！ ほら、女の子はこっちこっち！
jpnSearchText:
やったぁ、決まりだねー！
ほら、女の子はこっちこっち！

engChrName: Shaheena, calm down. They've had a long day.
engSearchText: Shaheena, calm down. They've had a long day.
jpnChrName: シャヒーナ、はしゃがないの。
jpnSearchText: シャヒーナ、はしゃがないの。

engChrName: Haha. Take as long as you want in there, folks. You've earned it.
engSearchText:
Haha. Take as long as you want in there, folks.
You've earned it.
jpnChrName: はは、ごゆっくりどうぞ。
jpnSearchText: はは、ごゆっくりどうぞ。

engChrName: Maaan, this blows. I didn't consider the fact that I'd be stuck alone in here with you.
engSearchText:
Maaan, this blows. I didn't consider the fact that I'd
be stuck alone in here with you.
jpnChrName: 考えてみりゃてめぇと二人きりかよ…… チッ、面白くもなんともねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
考えてみりゃてめぇと二人きりかよ……
チッ、面白くもなんともねぇ。

engChrName: Would you pipe down? You're killin' the vibe.
engSearchText: Would you pipe down? You're killin' the vibe.
jpnChrName: ウダウダうるせえな、静かにしてろ。
jpnSearchText: ウダウダうるせえな、静かにしてろ。

engChrName: Just close your eyes and relax. Embrace the tranquility, and then—
engSearchText:
Just close your eyes and relax. Embrace the
tranquility, and then—
jpnChrName: いいか、目を瞑って心を落ち着けるんだ。 やがて来る“その瞬間”を見極めて──
jpnSearchText:
いいか、目を瞑って心を落ち着けるんだ。
やがて来る“その瞬間”を見極めて──

engChrName: Oh, shut up. I bet you every mira in my wallet the girls are living it up on the other side of this wall.
engSearchText:
Oh, shut up. I bet you every mira in my wallet the
girls are living it up on the other side of this wall.
jpnChrName: ハッ、向こうじゃさぞ姦しく、 キャッキャウフフしてんだろうなァ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、向こうじゃさぞ姦しく、
キャッキャウフフしてんだろうなァ。

engChrName: Speaking of girls, man, I'd kill to check out that maid and the older sister's scorching bods right about—bwah!
engSearchText:
Speaking of girls, man, I'd kill to check out that maid
and the older sister's scorching bods right
about—bwah!
jpnChrName: 小娘どもはどうでもいいが、メイドや 姉の方は中々そそる身体を──ぶっ！？
jpnSearchText:
小娘どもはどうでもいいが、メイドや
姉の方は中々そそる身体を──ぶっ！？

engChrName: We sit on sacred ground, punk. Don't defile it with your libido.
engSearchText:
We sit on sacred ground, punk. Don't defile it with
your libido.
jpnChrName: 神聖な儀式（セッション）を乱すんじゃねえ。
jpnSearchText: 神聖な儀式（セッション）を乱すんじゃねえ。

engChrName: Keep it up and I'll scrub you down till your skin is raw, if that's what it takes to clean that dirty brain of yours for the first time.
engSearchText:
Keep it up and I'll scrub you down till your skin is
raw, if that's what it takes to clean that dirty brain of
yours for the first time.
jpnChrName: てめぇのその邪念、肌が赤くなるまで 垢スリでこそぎ落としてやろうか？
jpnSearchText:
てめぇのその邪念、肌が赤くなるまで
垢スリでこそぎ落としてやろうか？

engChrName: All right, I'll drop it! Aidios, you don't have to be so serious about it.
engSearchText:
All right, I'll drop it! Aidios, you don't have to be so
serious about it.
jpnChrName: わ、分ーったっつの…… つかマジトーンになんじゃねえよ！？
jpnSearchText:
わ、分ーったっつの……
つかマジトーンになんじゃねえよ！？

engChrName: Heehee. They're certainly having a lively time over there.
engSearchText:
Heehee. They're certainly having a lively time
over there.
jpnChrName: ふふ…… 盛り上がってらっしゃいますね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……
盛り上がってらっしゃいますね。

engChrName: Ugh... Don't they realize we can hear every word they're saying?
engSearchText:
Ugh... Don't they realize we can hear every word
they're saying?
jpnChrName: もう、聞こえてるの 分かってるんでしょうか……
jpnSearchText:
もう、聞こえてるの
分かってるんでしょうか……

engChrName: He's not wrong, though. All you girls are just as gorgeous as Saara.
engSearchText:
He's not wrong, though. All you girls are just as
gorgeous as Saara.
jpnChrName: うーん、でも確かにみんな サァラ姉にも負けないくらい綺麗だよね～。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、でも確かにみんな
サァラ姉にも負けないくらい綺麗だよね～。

engChrName: I mean, Risette's hair and skin are both so silky, she practically looks like a doll!
engSearchText:
I mean, Risette's hair and skin are both so silky, she
practically looks like a doll!
jpnChrName: リゼットさんは髪サラサラ、肌もスベスベで まるでお人形さんみたいだし。
jpnSearchText:
リゼットさんは髪サラサラ、肌もスベスベで
まるでお人形さんみたいだし。

engChrName: You're so pretty, too, Agnès! And how do you get those when you're only sixteen?!
engSearchText:
You're so pretty, too, Agnès! And how do you
get those when you're only sixteen?!
jpnChrName: アニエスさんも── っていうかホントにまだ１６歳なのっ？
jpnSearchText:
アニエスさんも──
っていうかホントにまだ１６歳なのっ？

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?
jpnChrName: えっ……
jpnSearchText: えっ……

engChrName: I'm only a year younger than you! There's no way I'm gonna be able to catch up that quickly!
engSearchText:
I'm only a year younger than you! There's no way I'm
gonna be able to catch up that quickly!
jpnChrName: あと１年ちょっとで そこまでなれる気がしないよ～！
jpnSearchText:
あと１年ちょっとで
そこまでなれる気がしないよ～！

engChrName: What's your secret? What do you eat to fill out like that, huh?!
engSearchText:
What's your secret? What do you eat to fill out like
that, huh?!
jpnChrName: 何食べてたらそんなになるの～！？
jpnSearchText: 何食べてたらそんなになるの～！？

engChrName: ...Truth be told, I've been kinda curious, too. I'd love to know for future reference.
engSearchText:
...Truth be told, I've been kinda curious, too. I'd love
to know for future reference.
jpnChrName: ……わたしも気になってました。 ぜひ今後の参考にしたいですっ。
jpnSearchText:
……わたしも気になってました。
ぜひ今後の参考にしたいですっ。

engChrName: I, umm, well, I... I don't do anything special.
engSearchText: I, umm, well, I... I don't do anything special.
jpnChrName: べ、別に普通ですからっ……
jpnSearchText: べ、別に普通ですからっ……

engChrName: F-Feri! Stop staring at me so much! You're scaring me!
engSearchText:
F-Feri! Stop staring at me so much! You're
scaring me!
jpnChrName: フェリちゃんまで、そんなに まじまじ見ないでくださいっ。
jpnSearchText:
フェリちゃんまで、そんなに
まじまじ見ないでくださいっ。

engChrName: Shaheena, please. Cool it down a little.
engSearchText: Shaheena, please. Cool it down a little.
jpnChrName: もう、シャヒーナもそのくらいにね。
jpnSearchText: もう、シャヒーナもそのくらいにね。

engChrName: Well, I personally think Ms. Al-Fayed and Ms. Shaheena are very beautiful in their own right.
engSearchText:
Well, I personally think Ms. Al-Fayed and Ms.
Shaheena are very beautiful in their own right.
jpnChrName: ふふ、フェリ様もシャヒーナ様も 十分以上にお綺麗かと思いますが。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、フェリ様もシャヒーナ様も
十分以上にお綺麗かと思いますが。

engChrName: If anything, I should comment on your skin, Ms. Saara. What sort of regimen do you use to achieve such a glossy look?
engSearchText:
If anything, I should comment on your skin,
Ms. Saara. What sort of regimen do you use to
achieve such a glossy look?
jpnChrName: サァラ様は絹のように艶やかな肌…… 何か特別なケアをされていますね？
jpnSearchText:
サァラ様は絹のように艶やかな肌……
何か特別なケアをされていますね？

engChrName: Oh, I just use shea butter. The stuff they make in Tharbad is really good and—
engSearchText:
Oh, I just use shea butter. The stuff they make in
Tharbad is really good and—
jpnChrName: いえいえ、シアバターくらいです。 サルバッド産は質が良くて──
jpnSearchText:
いえいえ、シアバターくらいです。
サルバッド産は質が良くて──

engChrName: HOLY COW! You got Nina Fenly's AND Judith Lanster's autographs?!
engSearchText:
HOLY COW! You got Nina Fenly's AND Judith
Lanster's autographs?!
jpnChrName: ええええっ、ニナだけじゃなくて ジュディス・ランスターのサインまで……！
jpnSearchText:
ええええっ、ニナだけじゃなくて
ジュディス・ランスターのサインまで……！

engChrName: Thank you guys so much! I'll treasure these forever, really!
engSearchText:
Thank you guys so much! I'll treasure these
forever, really!
jpnChrName: ありがとね～、一生の宝物にするっ！
jpnSearchText: ありがとね～、一生の宝物にするっ！

engChrName: Aww, it's no problem! I'm glad you like them!
engSearchText: Aww, it's no problem! I'm glad you like them!
jpnChrName: えへへ、喜んでもらえてよかったです。
jpnSearchText: えへへ、喜んでもらえてよかったです。

engChrName: Those autographs have gotta be worth a pretty mira. We're talking about two of the hottest stars around. Think you might sell them?
engSearchText:
Those autographs have gotta be worth a pretty mira.
We're talking about two of the hottest stars around.
Think you might sell them?
jpnChrName: 今をときめくナンバー１、２女優の サインとなりゃ、さぞ高く売れそうだなァ？
jpnSearchText:
今をときめくナンバー１、２女優の
サインとなりゃ、さぞ高く売れそうだなァ？

engChrName: No way! How could I ever?!
engSearchText: No way! How could I ever?!
jpnChrName: 売らないよ～！　大事にするもん！
jpnSearchText: 売らないよ～！　大事にするもん！

engChrName: Still, it feels so surreal right now.
engSearchText: Still, it feels so surreal right now.
jpnChrName: えへへ、でもなんだか夢みたいだな～。
jpnSearchText: えへへ、でもなんだか夢みたいだな～。

engChrName: I can't believe my own sister is gonna be dancing up on stage with folks like them! Who would've thought?!
engSearchText:
I can't believe my own sister is gonna be dancing up
on stage with folks like them! Who
would've thought?!
jpnChrName: そんな大スターたちとお姉が 同じ舞台に立つことになるなんてさ。
jpnSearchText:
そんな大スターたちとお姉が
同じ舞台に立つことになるなんてさ。

engChrName: Don't get too excited about it all, Shaheena. I don't think they're going to ask me to do anything that big.
engSearchText:
Don't get too excited about it all, Shaheena. I don't
think they're going to ask me to do anything that big.
jpnChrName: ふふ、そんな大したものじゃないわ。 ちょっとした端役だと思うし。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、そんな大したものじゃないわ。
ちょっとした端役だと思うし。

engChrName: Well, I still think it's awesome you get to be involved at all!
engSearchText:
Well, I still think it's awesome you get to be involved
at all!
jpnChrName: それでも十分スゴイってば～！
jpnSearchText: それでも十分スゴイってば～！

engChrName: From what I heard, Salvatore Gotti himself scouted you out. Is that true?
engSearchText:
From what I heard, Salvatore Gotti himself scouted
you out. Is that true?
jpnChrName: 小耳に挟んだが、あのゴッチ監督に スカウトされたみたいだな？
jpnSearchText:
小耳に挟んだが、あのゴッチ監督に
スカウトされたみたいだな？

engChrName: Yeah, he walked right up to me and asked if I wanted to take part in the 'Carnal Cavalcade.'
engSearchText:
Yeah, he walked right up to me and asked if I wanted
to take part in the 'Carnal Cavalcade.'
jpnChrName: はい、例の《フォクシーパレード》に 参加しないかと誘われまして。
jpnSearchText:
はい、例の《フォクシーパレード》に
参加しないかと誘われまして。

engChrName: Wait. By dancing, do you mean for the Carnal Cavalcade?
engSearchText:
Wait. By dancing, do you mean for the
Carnal Cavalcade?
jpnChrName: そいつはもしかして…… 《フォクシーパレード》ってヤツか？
jpnSearchText:
そいつはもしかして……
《フォクシーパレード》ってヤツか？

engChrName: Yeah. Some director named Salvatore Gotti walked up to me and asked if I wanted to take part.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Some director named Salvatore Gotti walked
up to me and asked if I wanted to take part.
jpnChrName: はい、ゴッチ監督という方に 参加しないかと誘われまして。
jpnSearchText:
はい、ゴッチ監督という方に
参加しないかと誘われまして。

engChrName: Not just him. He was with some other snappy-looking guy, too.
engSearchText:
Not just him. He was with some other
snappy-looking guy, too.
jpnChrName: なんか身なりのいいお兄さんと 一緒にスカウトに来たんだよね～。
jpnSearchText:
なんか身なりのいいお兄さんと
一緒にスカウトに来たんだよね～。

engChrName: They went nuts for Saara. Apparently Mr. Gotti was all, 'Baby, you're more perfect than Aidios herself! My parade isn't complete without you!'
engSearchText:
They went nuts for Saara. Apparently Mr. Gotti was
all, 'Baby, you're more perfect than Aidios herself!
My parade isn't complete without you!'
jpnChrName: 『サァラちゃんこそフォクシーパレードの   最後のピースじゃ、間違いなぁい！』
jpnSearchText:
『サァラちゃんこそフォクシーパレードの
最後のピースじゃ、間違いなぁい！』

engChrName: He was dead set on bringing her on, whatever it took. It wasn't long before she folded like a house of cards, heehee.
engSearchText:
He was dead set on bringing her on, whatever it took.
It wasn't long before she folded like a house of
cards, heehee.
jpnChrName: なーんて、熱烈アプローチに ついにお姉も折れちゃったわけ！
jpnSearchText:
なーんて、熱烈アプローチに
ついにお姉も折れちゃったわけ！

engChrName: Shaheena! You don't have to tell them every little thing about it!
engSearchText:
Shaheena! You don't have to tell them every little
thing about it!
jpnChrName: シャ、シャヒーナ…… さすがに恥ずかしいから。
jpnSearchText:
シャ、シャヒーナ……
さすがに恥ずかしいから。

engChrName: I am not sure I know what this 'Carnal Cavalcade' is. Is it some event that will be part of the film festival?
engSearchText:
I am not sure I know what this 'Carnal Cavalcade' is.
Is it some event that will be part of the film festival?
jpnChrName: フォクシーパレード…… 映画祭の演出の一つなのでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
フォクシーパレード……
映画祭の演出の一つなのでしょうか？

engChrName: Yeah, it's a parade that'll kick off when the festival opens.
engSearchText:
Yeah, it's a parade that'll kick off when the
festival opens.
jpnChrName: あー、開幕時の出し物らしいな。
jpnSearchText: あー、開幕時の出し物らしいな。

engChrName: It sounds like it's going to be quite the production. Like Shaheena said, I guess it's supposed to include famous actresses and whatnot.
engSearchText:
It sounds like it's going to be quite the production.
Like Shaheena said, I guess it's supposed to include
famous actresses and whatnot.
jpnChrName: えっと、色々凄そうですけど 名だたる女優の方々も出るそうですし。
jpnSearchText:
えっと、色々凄そうですけど
名だたる女優の方々も出るそうですし。

engChrName: I can see you fitting right in there, Saara! You're gonna do great!
engSearchText:
I can see you fitting right in there, Saara!
You're gonna do great!
jpnChrName: えへへ、サァラさんなら納得ですっ。
jpnSearchText: えへへ、サァラさんなら納得ですっ。

engChrName: I know Gotti can talk pretty raunchy, but his passion and taste are the real deal. He didn't say all that just to be nice.
engSearchText:
I know Gotti can talk pretty raunchy, but his passion
and taste are the real deal. He didn't say all that just
to be nice.
jpnChrName: あの監督、確かにエロ親父だが 見る目と情熱だけは本物だろうからな。
jpnSearchText:
あの監督、確かにエロ親父だが
見る目と情熱だけは本物だろうからな。

engChrName: If he says you're perfect, then he means it. You'll do just fine out there, Saara. I know you've got what it takes.
engSearchText:
If he says you're perfect, then he means it. You'll do
just fine out there, Saara. I know you've got what
it takes.
jpnChrName: アンタなら十分イケるだろ──頑張りな。
jpnSearchText: アンタなら十分イケるだろ──頑張りな。

engChrName: Th-Thanks, Van! That means a lot.
engSearchText: Th-Thanks, Van! That means a lot.
jpnChrName: は、はい……！
jpnSearchText: は、はい……！

engChrName: Heeheehee. Am I seeing things, or are you turning a little red?
engSearchText:
Heeheehee. Am I seeing things, or are you turning a
little red?
jpnChrName: あれれ～、お姉ちょっと赤い～？
jpnSearchText: あれれ～、お姉ちょっと赤い～？

engChrName: I am NOT! Stop it!
engSearchText: I am NOT! Stop it!
jpnChrName: そ、そんなことありません！
jpnSearchText: そ、そんなことありません！

engChrName: Saara! Sheenie!
engSearchText: Saara! Sheenie!
jpnChrName: サァラねーちゃん、シャヒーナ～！
jpnSearchText: サァラねーちゃん、シャヒーナ～！

engChrName: There you two are! Where have you guys been?
engSearchText: There you two are! Where have you guys been?
jpnChrName: やっと見つけたよー。 どこに行ってたんだー？
jpnSearchText:
やっと見つけたよー。
どこに行ってたんだー？

engChrName: Hey, Timur. We were just hanging out in the hamam.
engSearchText:
Hey, Timur. We were just hanging out in
the hamam.
jpnChrName: えへへ、さっきまでハマムに行ってて。
jpnSearchText: えへへ、さっきまでハマムに行ってて。

engChrName: And quit calling me Sheenie! I've got a real name, you know!
engSearchText:
And quit calling me Sheenie! I've got a real name,
you know!
jpnChrName: てゆーかあたしも シャヒーナ姉ちゃんって呼べー！
jpnSearchText:
てゆーかあたしも
シャヒーナ姉ちゃんって呼べー！

engChrName: Haha! Sorry, Sheenie. You'll always be Sheenie to me!
engSearchText:
Haha! Sorry, Sheenie. You'll always be Sheenie
to me!
jpnChrName: にしし、シャヒーナはシャヒーナだし。
jpnSearchText: にしし、シャヒーナはシャヒーナだし。

engChrName: This a friend of yours?
