engSearchText: This a friend of yours?
jpnChrName: 知り合いか？
jpnSearchText: 知り合いか？

engChrName: Yeah, he's a kid from the neighborhood. What's going on, Timur? Why were you looking for us?
engSearchText:
Yeah, he's a kid from the neighborhood.
What's going on, Timur? Why were you looking
for us?
jpnChrName: ええ、近所の子で。 ティムル、こんな時間にどうしたの？
jpnSearchText:
ええ、近所の子で。
ティムル、こんな時間にどうしたの？

engChrName: 'Cause someone asked me to give this to you, Saara, that's why.
engSearchText:
'Cause someone asked me to give this to you, Saara,
that's why.
jpnChrName: さっき、これをサァラ姉ちゃんに 渡してくれってたのまれてさー。
jpnSearchText:
さっき、これをサァラ姉ちゃんに
渡してくれってたのまれてさー。

engChrName: A letter? That's strange. I wonder what it could be. Thanks, Timur.
engSearchText:
A letter? That's strange. I wonder what it could be.
Thanks, Timur.
jpnChrName: 手紙……？ ありがとう、何かしら。
jpnSearchText:
手紙……？
ありがとう、何かしら。

engChrName: ...What the?
engSearchText: ...What the?

engChrName: Is everything okay?
engSearchText: Is everything okay?
jpnChrName: サァラさん？
jpnSearchText: サァラさん？

engChrName: What's wrong, Saa—what in the world?!
engSearchText: What's wrong, Saa—what in the world?!
jpnChrName: どうしたのさ、お姉…… ──って、なにこれ……！？
jpnSearchText:
どうしたのさ、お姉……
──って、なにこれ……！？

engChrName: Decline to participate in the parade, or tragedy will befall you.
engSearchText:
Decline to participate in the parade, or tragedy will
befall you.
jpnChrName: パレードへの参加を辞退せよ── さもなくば災いが降りかかるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
パレードへの参加を辞退せよ──
さもなくば災いが降りかかるだろう。

engChrName: Is this somebody's sick idea of a joke?
engSearchText: Is this somebody's sick idea of a joke?
jpnChrName: おいおい、コイツは……
jpnSearchText: おいおい、コイツは……

engChrName: I can't believe even Saara, of all people, got one of those threatening notes...
engSearchText:
I can't believe even Saara, of all people, got one of
those threatening notes...
jpnChrName: まさか、サァラさんの所にまで 脅迫状が届くなんて……
jpnSearchText:
まさか、サァラさんの所にまで
脅迫状が届くなんて……

engChrName: According to that Timur boy, a Central Easterner that he passed who was working for a shipping company gave the note to him.
engSearchText:
According to that Timur boy, a Central Easterner
that he passed who was working for a shipping
company gave the note to him.
jpnChrName: さっきの子は、通りがかった中東系の 運送会社の人に渡されたそうですが……
jpnSearchText:
さっきの子は、通りがかった中東系の
運送会社の人に渡されたそうですが……

engChrName: I'd guess that delivery person's most likely innocent.
engSearchText: I'd guess that delivery person's most likely innocent.
jpnChrName: ──そいつ自体は多分、シロだろう。
jpnSearchText: ──そいつ自体は多分、シロだろう。

engChrName: Just like with Nina and Judith, the culprit's probably going through several layers to cover up the real origin point of the note.
engSearchText:
Just like with Nina and Judith, the culprit's probably
going through several layers to cover up the real
origin point of the note.
jpnChrName: 女優たちに届いたもの同様、出所を分からなく するために複数箇所を介しているはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
女優たちに届いたもの同様、出所を分からなく
するために複数箇所を介しているはずだ。

engChrName: That makes trackin' 'em down incredibly tricky.
engSearchText: That makes trackin' 'em down incredibly tricky.
jpnChrName: そっちから尻尾を掴むのは厳しいな。
jpnSearchText: そっちから尻尾を掴むのは厳しいな。

engChrName: Slippery bastard. They can't make it easy on us, can they?
engSearchText:
Slippery bastard. They can't make it easy on us,
can they?
jpnChrName: チッ、狡（コス）い手を使いやがる。
jpnSearchText: チッ、狡（コス）い手を使いやがる。

engChrName: Are Saara and Shaheena going to be okay?
engSearchText: Are Saara and Shaheena going to be okay?
jpnChrName: サァラさんたち、大丈夫でしょうか……
jpnSearchText: サァラさんたち、大丈夫でしょうか……

engChrName: I really think you two should talk to the guild about this.
engSearchText:
I really think you two should talk to the guild
about this.
jpnChrName: その……さすがにギルドに 相談した方がいいんじゃないでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
その……さすがにギルドに
相談した方がいいんじゃないでしょうか？

engChrName: I agree. I am sure they will give your case priority attention since it involves a civilian in danger.
engSearchText:
I agree. I am sure they will give your case priority
attention since it involves a civilian in danger.
jpnChrName: ええ、民間人に危機が及ぶ場合、 最優先で対処してくれる筈です。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、民間人に危機が及ぶ場合、
最優先で対処してくれる筈です。

engChrName: I imagine that any fees they would charge for their services would be quite nominal, too.
engSearchText:
I imagine that any fees they would charge for their
services would be quite nominal, too.
jpnChrName: 恐らく費用も格安だと思われますが。
jpnSearchText: 恐らく費用も格安だと思われますが。

engChrName: I don't know about that...
engSearchText: I don't know about that...
jpnChrName: ……それは……
jpnSearchText: ……それは……

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?

engChrName: C'mon, you've gotta do something, Saara! This really creeps me out!
engSearchText:
C'mon, you've gotta do something, Saara! This really
creeps me out!
jpnChrName: そ、そうだよお姉、なんか気持ち悪いし！
jpnSearchText: そ、そうだよお姉、なんか気持ち悪いし！

engChrName: I hate to suggest this, but...maybe you should quit the parade, if that's the safest thing to do.
engSearchText:
I hate to suggest this, but...maybe you should quit the
parade, if that's the safest thing to do.
jpnChrName: その……何だったらいっそのこと パレードの件も断ったっていいんだよ？
jpnSearchText:
その……何だったらいっそのこと
パレードの件も断ったっていいんだよ？

engChrName: No, I can't.
engSearchText: No, I can't.
jpnChrName: ──ううん、それはダメよ。
jpnSearchText: ──ううん、それはダメよ。

engChrName: Apparently preparations for the parade are almost complete.
engSearchText:
Apparently preparations for the parade are
almost complete.
jpnChrName: もうパレードも詰めの段階に 入っているって言っていたもの。
jpnSearchText:
もうパレードも詰めの段階に
入っているって言っていたもの。

engChrName: If I pull out now, I'll probably cause a lot of trouble for the director and everyone else involved in it.
engSearchText:
If I pull out now, I'll probably cause a lot of trouble
for the director and everyone else involved in it.
jpnChrName: 今辞退なんかしたら監督さんだけじゃない、 映画祭そのものに迷惑をかける事になる……
jpnSearchText:
今辞退なんかしたら監督さんだけじゃない、
映画祭そのものに迷惑をかける事になる……

engChrName: That's what'll happen if I turn to the guild, too, isn't it?
engSearchText:
That's what'll happen if I turn to the guild, too,
isn't it?
jpnChrName: ギルドに依頼するということは そういうことですよね？
jpnSearchText:
ギルドに依頼するということは
そういうことですよね？

engChrName: We can't say for sure. But if things go south, I could definitely see that being the case, yeah.
engSearchText:
We can't say for sure. But if things go south, I could
definitely see that being the case, yeah.
jpnChrName: ま、下手したらパレードそのものを 中止させる方向で動くかもなァ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、下手したらパレードそのものを
中止させる方向で動くかもなァ。

engChrName: But, Saara...
engSearchText: But, Saara...
jpnChrName: で、でもお姉……
jpnSearchText: で、でもお姉……

engChrName: Van? I know this is really presumptuous of me to ask, but...
engSearchText:
Van? I know this is really presumptuous of me to
ask, but...
jpnChrName: ……ヴァンさん。 図々しいお願いなのは分かっています。
jpnSearchText:
……ヴァンさん。
図々しいお願いなのは分かっています。

engChrName: ...is this something you and your agency can handle for me?
engSearchText:
...is this something you and your agency can handle
for me?
jpnChrName: “裏解決屋”としての皆さんに この件を依頼できないでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
“裏解決屋”としての皆さんに
この件を依頼できないでしょうか？

engChrName: Of course, I'm prepared to pay for your services. I don't expect you to do it for free.
engSearchText:
Of course, I'm prepared to pay for your services.
I don't expect you to do it for free.
jpnChrName: もちろんお礼もさせていただきますので──
jpnSearchText: もちろんお礼もさせていただきますので──

engChrName: That's real generous of you, taking on her case for cheap as an extension to what we're doing for Nina and Judith.
engSearchText:
That's real generous of you, taking on her case for
cheap as an extension to what we're doing for Nina
and Judith.
jpnChrName: ──女優どもの依頼の延長で 格安で引き受けたのはともかく……
jpnSearchText:
──女優どもの依頼の延長で
格安で引き受けたのはともかく……

engChrName: But don't you get the feeling she's trying to hide something?
engSearchText:
But don't you get the feeling she's trying to
hide something?
jpnChrName: あの女、なんか隠してたっぽいが それはいいのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
あの女、なんか隠してたっぽいが
それはいいのかよ？

engChrName: What? She is?!
engSearchText: What? She is?!

engChrName: I...got that impression, too. I think there's something going on with her that we don't know about.
engSearchText:
I...got that impression, too. I think there's something
going on with her that we don't know about.
jpnChrName: ……そんな雰囲気はありましたが 何か事情があるんだと思います。
jpnSearchText:
……そんな雰囲気はありましたが
何か事情があるんだと思います。

engChrName: Well, a deal's a deal. Whatever it is, we already promised we'd help her.
engSearchText:
Well, a deal's a deal. Whatever it is, we already
promised we'd help her.
jpnChrName: ま、力になるって約束してたしな。
jpnSearchText: ま、力になるって約束してたしな。

engChrName: Plus for all we know, this might turn up some new leads. Following this could be a good idea.
engSearchText:
Plus for all we know, this might turn up some
new leads. Following this could be a good idea.
jpnChrName: 新たな手がかりに 繋がる可能性もあんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
新たな手がかりに
繋がる可能性もあんだろう。

engChrName: As a first step, would you like me to pinpoint which company was responsible for delivering the note?
engSearchText:
As a first step, would you like me to pinpoint which
company was responsible for delivering the note?
jpnChrName: 一応、該当する運送会社の 特定だけはしておきましょうか？
jpnSearchText:
一応、該当する運送会社の
特定だけはしておきましょうか？

engChrName: Wouldn't hurt to know, for sure. In the meantime, we need to go to the Entertainment District.
engSearchText:
Wouldn't hurt to know, for sure. In the meantime, we
need to go to the Entertainment District.
jpnChrName: 念のため頼む。 ──そろそろ歓楽街に向かうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
念のため頼む。
──そろそろ歓楽街に向かうぞ。

engChrName: The other ladies are waiting for us at the hotel. We need to fill them in on everything that's happened, including this new note.
engSearchText:
The other ladies are waiting for us at the hotel.
We need to fill them in on everything that's
happened, including this new note.
jpnChrName: ホテルで依頼人が待ってる。 この件も含めて報告しとかねえとな。
jpnSearchText:
ホテルで依頼人が待ってる。
この件も含めて報告しとかねえとな。

engChrName: With the excitement having died down, the party said their goodbyes, bringing their first day in Tharbad to a close.
engSearchText:
With the excitement having died down, the party said
their goodbyes, bringing their first day in Tharbad to
a close.
jpnChrName: その後、女優たちとも別れて サルバッドの１日目の活動は終了──
jpnSearchText:
その後、女優たちとも別れて
サルバッドの１日目の活動は終了──

engChrName: The group made a beeline straight back to the inn.
engSearchText: The group made a beeline straight back to the inn.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちはまっすぐ宿酒場へと戻った。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ヴァンたちはまっすぐ宿酒場へと戻った。

engChrName: After a full day in addition to such a long drive, everyone's exhaustion was quickly catching up to them.
engSearchText:
After a full day in addition to such a long drive,
everyone's exhaustion was quickly catching up
to them.
jpnChrName: 長距離移動と一日の活動で それぞれ疲れがたまっており……
jpnSearchText:
長距離移動と一日の活動で
それぞれ疲れがたまっており……

engChrName: An early night's rest was in order so as to get ready to resume their investigation the next day. Or so it seemed...
engSearchText:
An early night's rest was in order so as to get ready to
resume their investigation the next day. Or so
it seemed...
jpnChrName: 明後日の映画祭までの調査に備え、 身体を早々に休めるのだった──
jpnSearchText:
明後日の映画祭までの調査に備え、
身体を早々に休めるのだった──

engChrName: What're you talking about? The night's still young!
engSearchText: What're you talking about? The night's still young!
jpnChrName: ──は？　夜はこれからだろ。
jpnSearchText: ──は？　夜はこれからだろ。

engChrName: The girls might be passing out soon, but who's to say we can't stay up and have a little after dark fun, huh?
engSearchText:
The girls might be passing out soon, but who's to say
we can't stay up and have a little after dark fun, huh?
jpnChrName: 小娘どももとっとと寝付きそうだし、 大人の時間と洒落こまねぇでどうすんだ？
jpnSearchText:
小娘どももとっとと寝付きそうだし、
大人の時間と洒落こまねぇでどうすんだ？

engChrName: Kid, I envy your energy. Haven't given up on that nightclub near the casino, huh?
engSearchText:
Kid, I envy your energy. Haven't given up on that
nightclub near the casino, huh?
jpnChrName: カジノの近くにあったナイトクラブか…… 元気だねぇ、お前。
jpnSearchText:
カジノの近くにあったナイトクラブか……
元気だねぇ、お前。

engChrName: I'm tempted to just let you loose and tell you to go have fun on your own.
engSearchText:
I'm tempted to just let you loose and tell you to go
have fun on your own.
jpnChrName: ま、勝手に行ってこいと言う所だが。
jpnSearchText: ま、勝手に行ってこいと言う所だが。

engChrName: But I do that, and I have a feelin' you'll burn half the town down. I'll tag along as your chaperone.
engSearchText:
But I do that, and I have a feelin' you'll burn half the
town down. I'll tag along as your chaperone.
jpnChrName: どんな騒動を起こすか分からねえし 保護者として付き添ってやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
どんな騒動を起こすか分からねえし
保護者として付き添ってやるよ。

engChrName: Hell yeah, that's the spirit! And c'mon—don't act like you weren't totally down to clown.
engSearchText:
Hell yeah, that's the spirit! And c'mon—don't act like
you weren't totally down to clown.
jpnChrName: クク、そう来なくっちゃな。 言い訳としちゃセコすぎるが。
jpnSearchText:
クク、そう来なくっちゃな。
言い訳としちゃセコすぎるが。

engChrName: Oh, shut it. You gotta act respectable when you get to be my age.
engSearchText:
Oh, shut it. You gotta act respectable when you get to
be my age.
jpnChrName: るせぇ、大人には 建前が必要なんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
るせぇ、大人には
建前が必要なんだよ。

engChrName: When do you think you two will be back?
engSearchText: When do you think you two will be back?
jpnChrName: お戻りはどのくらいでしょうか？
jpnSearchText: お戻りはどのくらいでしょうか？

engChrName: GUAH! Where the hell did you come from?!
engSearchText: GUAH! Where the hell did you come from?!
jpnChrName: うおっ……！？ って、いつの間に──
jpnSearchText:
うおっ……！？
って、いつの間に──

engChrName: We'll make sure we're back before midnight. If you could keep the girls distracted for me while we're gone, I'd appreciate it.
engSearchText:
We'll make sure we're back before midnight. If you
could keep the girls distracted for me while
we're gone, I'd appreciate it.
jpnChrName: ……午前様にはならんようにする。 あいつらに心配かけねぇよう頼むわ。
jpnSearchText:
……午前様にはならんようにする。
あいつらに心配かけねぇよう頼むわ。

engChrName: As you wish, Mr. Arkride. Enjoy your night, you two.
engSearchText: As you wish, Mr. Arkride. Enjoy your night, you two.
jpnChrName: お任せくださいませ。 ──どうぞ楽しい夜を。
jpnSearchText:
お任せくださいませ。
──どうぞ楽しい夜を。

engChrName: October 6th, 8:05AM
engSearchText: October 6th, 8:05AM

engChrName: Come on, girls, no need to sulk. Your breakfasts are gonna get cold.
engSearchText:
Come on, girls, no need to sulk. Your breakfasts are
gonna get cold.
jpnChrName: あー、お嬢さん方？　そう膨れんなよ、 せっかくの朝飯がマズくなるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
あー、お嬢さん方？　そう膨れんなよ、
せっかくの朝飯がマズくなるぜ。

engChrName: I mean, get a load of this hummus! This stuff is something else.
engSearchText:
I mean, get a load of this hummus! This stuff is
something else.
jpnChrName: いや～絶品だなぁ、このディップ料理（フムス）。
jpnSearchText: いや～絶品だなぁ、このディップ料理（フムス）。

engChrName: I'm not...mad.
engSearchText: I'm not...mad.
jpnChrName: 別に、怒ってません。
jpnSearchText: 別に、怒ってません。

engChrName: I'm glad you two were able to have fun by yourselves last night.
engSearchText:
I'm glad you two were able to have fun by yourselves
last night.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんたちはいいですよね、 昨夜はお楽しみだったみたいで。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんたちはいいですよね、
昨夜はお楽しみだったみたいで。

engChrName: You should've said something. How am I supposed to protect you if you sneak out like that?
engSearchText:
You should've said something. How am I supposed to
protect you if you sneak out like that?
jpnChrName: ……せめて一言でもあれば。 これでは護衛の意味がありません。
jpnSearchText:
……せめて一言でもあれば。
これでは護衛の意味がありません。

engChrName: Err...
engSearchText: Err...
jpnChrName: うっ……
jpnSearchText: うっ……

engChrName: Look who's in for it now! So much for our trip staying a secret.
engSearchText:
Look who's in for it now! So much for our trip
staying a secret.
jpnChrName: クク、ザマぁ。 結局バレてやんの。
jpnSearchText:
クク、ザマぁ。
結局バレてやんの。

engChrName: My sincerest apologies, Mr. Arkride. It is my fault for not maintaining the façade.
engSearchText:
My sincerest apologies, Mr. Arkride. It is my fault for
not maintaining the façade.
jpnChrName: 申し訳ありません、 フォローしきれずに。
jpnSearchText:
申し訳ありません、
フォローしきれずに。

engChrName: Eh, it's not your fault. You did your best.
engSearchText: Eh, it's not your fault. You did your best.
jpnChrName: ふう、アンタのせいじゃないさ。
jpnSearchText: ふう、アンタのせいじゃないさ。

engChrName: Hell of a time to have that Genesis go off, that's for sure.
engSearchText:
Hell of a time to have that Genesis go off, that's
for sure.
jpnChrName: しかし──俺たちのいない間に また《ゲネシス》が光るなんてな。
jpnSearchText:
しかし──俺たちのいない間に
また《ゲネシス》が光るなんてな。

engChrName: From the sound of it, it lit up right around the time we were catching up with everyone's favorite phantom thief, yeah?
engSearchText:
From the sound of it, it lit up right around the time
we were catching up with everyone's favorite
phantom thief, yeah?
jpnChrName: タイミング的にはちょうど 《怪盗（あの女）》とやり合ってた時だったか？
jpnSearchText:
タイミング的にはちょうど
《怪盗（あの女）》とやり合ってた時だったか？

engChrName: R-Right, although the timing of it may have just been a coincidence.
engSearchText:
R-Right, although the timing of it may have just been
a coincidence.
jpnChrName: ……はい、偶然かもしれませんが。
jpnSearchText: ……はい、偶然かもしれませんが。

engChrName: I was really scared something had happened to you two!
engSearchText:
I was really scared something had happened to
you two!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんたちに何かがと思って 心配したんですからね……？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんたちに何かがと思って
心配したんですからね……？

engChrName: Yeah, I get it. I beefed it, big time.
engSearchText: Yeah, I get it. I beefed it, big time.
jpnChrName: 悪かった、この通りだ。
jpnSearchText: 悪かった、この通りだ。

engChrName: But seeing as Mare-Bear was nowhere to be found, it's not as though the situation was the same as before.
engSearchText:
But seeing as Mare-Bear was nowhere to be found,
it's not as though the situation was the same
as before.
jpnChrName: だがメア公も出てこなかったし、 同じってワケでもなさそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
だがメア公も出てこなかったし、
同じってワケでもなさそうだな。

engChrName: Indeed. Perhaps that suggests there are multiple response patterns that can trigger it.
engSearchText:
Indeed. Perhaps that suggests there are multiple
response patterns that can trigger it.
jpnChrName: ふむ、幾つかの反応パターンが あるということですか……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、幾つかの反応パターンが
あるということですか……

engChrName: Still, who would've guessed it was HER all along? Did you have any idea, small fry?
engSearchText:
Still, who would've guessed it was HER all along?
Did you have any idea, small fry?
jpnChrName: いや～、しかしまさかだよな。 チビ、お前も気付いてたのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
いや～、しかしまさかだよな。
チビ、お前も気付いてたのかよ？

engChrName: Uh, yeah, pretty much. She moves just like in that movie, so...
engSearchText:
Uh, yeah, pretty much. She moves just like in that
movie, so...
jpnChrName: えと、まあ…… 映画と同じ動きでしたし。
jpnSearchText:
えと、まあ……
映画と同じ動きでしたし。

engChrName: Excuse me, just like what movie?
engSearchText: Excuse me, just like what movie?
jpnChrName: 映画と同じ……？
jpnSearchText: 映画と同じ……？

engChrName: Never mind that. It doesn't matter right now.
engSearchText: Never mind that. It doesn't matter right now.
jpnChrName: ま、一旦スルーしてくれ。
jpnSearchText: ま、一旦スルーしてくれ。

engChrName: Hi, everyone. I hope you've had a good morning.
engSearchText: Hi, everyone. I hope you've had a good morning.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、皆さんも── おはようございます。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん、皆さんも──
おはようございます。

engChrName: Oh, hello, Saara. Good morning!
engSearchText: Oh, hello, Saara. Good morning!
jpnChrName: あ……おはようございます。
jpnSearchText: あ……おはようございます。

engChrName: Already out and about this early, huh?
engSearchText: Already out and about this early, huh?
jpnChrName: なんだ、そっちも朝からお出かけか？
jpnSearchText: なんだ、そっちも朝からお出かけか？

engChrName: Yes. I have a meeting to attend over at Vegas Films.
engSearchText: Yes. I have a meeting to attend over at Vegas Films.
jpnChrName: はい、今から打合せで ベガスフィルムに行くんです。
jpnSearchText:
はい、今から打合せで
ベガスフィルムに行くんです。

engChrName: They say we're really going to have to rush to get me ready for the parade.
engSearchText:
They say we're really going to have to rush to get me
ready for the parade.
jpnChrName: 明日に向けて急ピッチで 仕上げる必要があるとかで。
jpnSearchText:
明日に向けて急ピッチで
仕上げる必要があるとかで。

engChrName: And I'm coming along to listen to every word they have to say, 'cause I'M her manager!
engSearchText:
And I'm coming along to listen to every word they
have to say, 'cause I'M her manager!
jpnChrName: フフン、あたしもマネージャーとして しっかり話を聞いてくるつもりだよ。
jpnSearchText:
フフン、あたしもマネージャーとして
しっかり話を聞いてくるつもりだよ。

engChrName: Maybe with a little luck, I'll get to meet Nina Fenly and Judith Lanster!
engSearchText:
Maybe with a little luck, I'll get to meet Nina Fenly
and Judith Lanster!
jpnChrName: えへへ～、ジュディスさんや ニナさんとも会えちゃうかな～！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ～、ジュディスさんや
ニナさんとも会えちゃうかな～！

engChrName: Sounds like an ulterior motive to me.
engSearchText: Sounds like an ulterior motive to me.
jpnChrName: ハッ、それも狙いかよ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、それも狙いかよ。

engChrName: I didn't ask you to tag along, you know. They're probably going to yell at you and ask you to leave.
engSearchText:
I didn't ask you to tag along, you know.
They're probably going to yell at you and ask you
to leave.
jpnChrName: もう……勝手についてきて 怒られても知らないんだからね？
jpnSearchText:
もう……勝手についてきて
怒られても知らないんだからね？

engChrName: I wouldn't be so sure! I think that director's gonna fall head over heels for me, too!
engSearchText:
I wouldn't be so sure! I think that director's gonna fall
head over heels for me, too!
jpnChrName: ヘーキヘーキ、それどころか 監督さんに見初められちゃうかもよ！
jpnSearchText:
ヘーキヘーキ、それどころか
監督さんに見初められちゃうかもよ！

engChrName: I can see it now! 'Shaheena, sweetheart! You're a once-in-a-generation find! You've got what it takes to be the next great star!'
engSearchText:
I can see it now! 'Shaheena, sweetheart! You're a
once-in-a-generation find! You've got what it takes to
be the next great star!'
jpnChrName: 『シャヒーナ君、君こそ   次代のスターになれる逸材だ！』
jpnSearchText:
『シャヒーナ君、君こそ
次代のスターになれる逸材だ！』

engChrName: Aaah, I've gotta figure out what I'm gonna say when that happens! I can't go in unprepared!
engSearchText:
Aaah, I've gotta figure out what I'm gonna say when
that happens! I can't go in unprepared!
jpnChrName: な～んて、言われちゃったらどうしよ～！？
jpnSearchText: な～んて、言われちゃったらどうしよ～！？

engChrName: Ahaha. Well, fingers crossed. Good to see you're still full of energy, Shaheena.
engSearchText:
Ahaha. Well, fingers crossed. Good to see you're still
full of energy, Shaheena.
jpnChrName: あはは……シャヒーナさんは 今日も元気いっぱいですね。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……シャヒーナさんは
今日も元気いっぱいですね。

engChrName: Knowing Gotti, I don't think that's really out of the question!
engSearchText:
Knowing Gotti, I don't think that's really out of
the question!
jpnChrName: えへへ、でも十分 あり得るかもしれませんっ。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、でも十分
あり得るかもしれませんっ。

engChrName: Hey, you'll never know unless you try. Still, I have to imagine this parade's not going to be like your normal dancin'.
engSearchText:
Hey, you'll never know unless you try. Still, I have to
imagine this parade's not going to be like your
normal dancin'.
jpnChrName: ──ま、やれるだけやってみな。 いつもの踊りとは勝手が違うだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
──ま、やれるだけやってみな。
いつもの踊りとは勝手が違うだろうが。

engChrName: With any luck, this opportunity could open some real doors for you. Big doors, I'd think.
engSearchText:
With any luck, this opportunity could open some real
doors for you. Big doors, I'd think.
jpnChrName: それこそ、デカイ扉が開ける なんてこともあるんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
それこそ、デカイ扉が開ける
なんてこともあるんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Thanks, Van. I think so, too. Wish me luck!
engSearchText: Thanks, Van. I think so, too. Wish me luck!
jpnChrName: ……はいっ、頑張ってきますね。
jpnSearchText: ……はいっ、頑張ってきますね。

engChrName: Hey, is it just me or does something feel a little... different between the two of you?
engSearchText:
Hey, is it just me or does something feel a little...
different between the two of you?
jpnChrName: むむむ？　昨日とはな～んか 雰囲気が違うような……
jpnSearchText:
むむむ？　昨日とはな～んか
雰囲気が違うような……

engChrName: Wait, ohwowiewow! Is HE the boyfriend you've been seeing at night? He is, isn't he?!
engSearchText:
Wait, ohwowiewow! Is HE the boyfriend you've been
seeing at night? He is, isn't he?!
jpnChrName: ハッ、さてはお姉が夜に会ってる “彼氏”っていうのは……！
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、さてはお姉が夜に会ってる
“彼氏”っていうのは……！

engChrName: Sha-hee-naaa!
engSearchText: Sha-hee-naaa!
jpnChrName: ちょ、ちょっとシャヒーナ？
jpnSearchText: ちょ、ちょっとシャヒーナ？

engChrName: Nah, I'm afraid not. We all just met yesterday, remember?
engSearchText:
Nah, I'm afraid not. We all just met
yesterday, remember?
jpnChrName: いや、昨日来たばっかの 俺たちなわけねえだろ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、昨日来たばっかの
俺たちなわけねえだろ。

engChrName: Oh, yeah! Oopsies.
engSearchText: Oh, yeah! Oopsies.
jpnChrName: てへ、そうだった。
jpnSearchText: てへ、そうだった。

engChrName: *sigh* Sorry about that. She gets ahead of herself sometimes.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Sorry about that. She gets ahead of
herself sometimes.
jpnChrName: もう…… ごめんなさい、うちの妹が。
jpnSearchText:
もう……
ごめんなさい、うちの妹が。

engChrName: Good luck with your work today, everyone. I hope everything goes well for you—and not just when it comes to my request, either.
engSearchText:
Good luck with your work today, everyone. I hope
everything goes well for you—and not just when it
comes to my request, either.
jpnChrName: 皆さんもお仕事頑張ってください。 “依頼”以外も応援していますから。
jpnSearchText:
皆さんもお仕事頑張ってください。
“依頼”以外も応援していますから。

engChrName: ...You SURE it's not him? Now I'm even more suspicious.
engSearchText:
...You SURE it's not him? Now I'm even
more suspicious.
jpnChrName: うーん、やっぱり怪しいな～……
jpnSearchText: うーん、やっぱり怪しいな～……

engChrName: Extraordinarily sure. Come on, we have to go.
engSearchText: Extraordinarily sure. Come on, we have to go.
jpnChrName: はいはい、いいから行くわよ。
jpnSearchText: はいはい、いいから行くわよ。

engChrName: ...What? Don't tell me you guys think it's actually true.
engSearchText:
...What? Don't tell me you guys think it's
actually true.
jpnChrName: ……なんだ、まさか 真に受けてんじゃねえだろうな？
jpnSearchText:
……なんだ、まさか
真に受けてんじゃねえだろうな？

engChrName: I already explained to you what we were doing last night.
engSearchText:
I already explained to you what we were doing
last night.
jpnChrName: 昨日のことは説明しただろ。
jpnSearchText: 昨日のことは説明しただろ。

engChrName: Yeah, I know, but...still...
engSearchText: Yeah, I know, but...still...
jpnChrName: それはそうなんですけど……
jpnSearchText: それはそうなんですけど……

engChrName: Heehee. That's Mr. Arkride. Ever the ladykiller.
engSearchText: Heehee. That's Mr. Arkride. Ever the ladykiller.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ヴァン様も罪作りですね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、ヴァン様も罪作りですね。

engChrName: Huh? When did Van kill ladies?
engSearchText: Huh? When did Van kill ladies?
jpnChrName: ？　ツミツクリ？
jpnSearchText: ？　ツミツクリ？

engChrName: Heh, you'll get it later on, kid.
engSearchText: Heh, you'll get it later on, kid.
jpnChrName: クク、お子ちゃまには関係ねー話だ。
jpnSearchText: クク、お子ちゃまには関係ねー話だ。

engChrName: Shut up! Come on, tell me!
engSearchText: Shut up! Come on, tell me!
jpnChrName: むっ…… お子ちゃまじゃありませんっ！
jpnSearchText:
むっ……
お子ちゃまじゃありませんっ！

engChrName: And here we go again...
engSearchText: And here we go again...
jpnChrName: だあっ、往来でじゃれるなっ。
jpnSearchText: だあっ、往来でじゃれるなっ。

engChrName: Ahem. Getting back to the topic at hand, we do need to figure out what's going on with these threatening notes.
engSearchText:
Ahem. Getting back to the topic at hand, we do need
to figure out what's going on with these
threatening notes.
jpnChrName: ……コホン、改めて脅迫状の件は 何とか突き止めないと、ですね。
jpnSearchText:
……コホン、改めて脅迫状の件は
何とか突き止めないと、ですね。

engChrName: Especially now that Saara's gotten one, too.
engSearchText: Especially now that Saara's gotten one, too.
jpnChrName: ニナさんたちのためだけじゃなく、 サァラさんたちのためにも。
jpnSearchText:
ニナさんたちのためだけじゃなく、
サァラさんたちのためにも。

engChrName: Right. This being the day before the festival, this'll probably be when things start to pick up.
engSearchText:
Right. This being the day before the festival, this'll
probably be when things start to pick up.
jpnChrName: ああ、映画祭前日── おそらく今日が最初の山場だろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、映画祭前日──
おそらく今日が最初の山場だろう。

engChrName: You've got to figure something's bound to turn up as long as we keep sniffin' around.
engSearchText:
You've got to figure something's bound to turn up as
long as we keep sniffin' around.
jpnChrName: 俺たちが動いていることも含めて “何か”が動きを見せるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
俺たちが動いていることも含めて
“何か”が動きを見せるはずだ。

engChrName: Which is exactly what we're going to do. Let's hunt for more 4SPGs, but keep your eyes peeled. Don't lose sight of why we're really here.
engSearchText:
Which is exactly what we're going to do. Let's hunt
for more 4SPGs, but keep your eyes peeled.
Don't lose sight of why we're really here.
jpnChrName: ４ｓｐｇも含めて改めて嗅ぎ回るから、 取りこぼさねえように鼻を利かせろよ。
jpnSearchText:
４ｓｐｇも含めて改めて嗅ぎ回るから、
取りこぼさねえように鼻を利かせろよ。

engChrName: Right! Of course!
engSearchText: Right! Of course!
jpnChrName: はい……！
jpnSearchText: はい……！

engChrName: Roger!
engSearchText: Roger!
jpnChrName: 了解ですっ。
jpnSearchText: 了解ですっ。

engChrName: You have my full support as always, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText: You have my full support as always, Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: わたくしも本格的に サポートさせて頂きますね。
jpnSearchText:
わたくしも本格的に
サポートさせて頂きますね。

engChrName: After that, Fie reconvened with Van and the others to exchange information.
engSearchText:
After that, Fie reconvened with Van and the others to
exchange information.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちはフィーと改めて情報交換することにした。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ヴァンたちはフィーと改めて情報交換することにした。

engChrName: October 6th, 4:05PM
engSearchText: October 6th, 4:05PM

engChrName: Okay, I think I more or less understand what happened now...
engSearchText:
Okay, I think I more or less understand what
happened now...
jpnChrName: ──なるほど。 大体の状況は分かった気がする。
jpnSearchText:
──なるほど。
大体の状況は分かった気がする。

engChrName: Even if I get the impression you all are leaving out some details.
engSearchText:
Even if I get the impression you all are leaving out
some details.
jpnChrName: 細かい所は省かれてるみたいだけど。
jpnSearchText: 細かい所は省かれてるみたいだけど。

engChrName: Well...
engSearchText: Well...

engChrName: We could say the same about you, Sylphid.
engSearchText: We could say the same about you, Sylphid.
jpnChrName: そいつはお互い様、だろ？
jpnSearchText: そいつはお互い様、だろ？

engChrName: Like how you and none other than the prince of Elsaim are chummy with one another.
engSearchText:
Like how you and none other than the prince of
Elsaim are chummy with one another.
jpnChrName: お前さんとエルザイムの公太子が なんで懇意にしてるのかも含めてな。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんとエルザイムの公太子が
なんで懇意にしてるのかも含めてな。

engChrName: Fair enough. There's nothing to really hide, so no harm in explaining.
engSearchText:
Fair enough. There's nothing to really hide, so no
harm in explaining.
jpnChrName: 単なる個人的なコネだけど…… ま、確かに細かい話はいいかな。
jpnSearchText:
単なる個人的なコネだけど……
ま、確かに細かい話はいいかな。

engChrName: He's just someone I met through this musician I know.
engSearchText:
He's just someone I met through this musician
I know.
jpnChrName: ただ隠すほどのものじゃないから “演奏家つながり”とだけ言っておく。
jpnSearchText:
ただ隠すほどのものじゃないから
“演奏家つながり”とだけ言っておく。

engChrName: ...Ah, I follow you. Now it adds up.
engSearchText: ...Ah, I follow you. Now it adds up.
jpnChrName: ……なるほどな。
jpnSearchText: ……なるほどな。

engChrName: I've heard stories about him before. I see his influence hasn't waned.
engSearchText:
I've heard stories about him before. I see his influence
hasn't waned.
jpnChrName: ふふ、噂だけは存じておりますが いまだ影響力は衰えず、ですか。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、噂だけは存じておりますが
いまだ影響力は衰えず、ですか。

engChrName: ('Musician'? Who is she talking about?)
engSearchText: ('Musician'? Who is she talking about?)

engChrName: Anyway, what's the guild's perspective on all of this?
engSearchText: Anyway, what's the guild's perspective on all of this?
jpnChrName: で、ギルドはどう考えてるんだ？
jpnSearchText: で、ギルドはどう考えてるんだ？

engChrName: Not just what happened here, but everything that's gone down since Messeldam.
engSearchText:
Not just what happened here, but everything that's
gone down since Messeldam.
jpnChrName: 今回の──いやメッセルダムから続く 一連の事件について。
jpnSearchText:
今回の──いやメッセルダムから続く
一連の事件について。

engChrName: We're all in agreement that A is almost definitely involved in what's going on, Zin and the others included.
engSearchText:
We're all in agreement that A is almost definitely
involved in what's going on, Zin and the
others included.
jpnChrName: ジンたちの見解も合わせてだけど 《Ａ》の関与は、ほぼ間違いないと思う。
jpnSearchText:
ジンたちの見解も合わせてだけど
《Ａ》の関与は、ほぼ間違いないと思う。

engChrName: Even putting aside what you're looking for, the presence of that sketchy puppeteer and that angel of hers suggests as much.
engSearchText:
Even putting aside what you're looking for, the
presence of that sketchy puppeteer and that angel of
hers suggests as much.
jpnChrName: そちらの“捜し物”はともかく、 天使を連れた怪しげな使い手の介入──
jpnSearchText:
そちらの“捜し物”はともかく、
天使を連れた怪しげな使い手の介入──

engChrName: That, as well as the attempt at making it look like a case of contaminated drugs and the type of plant used to achieve that.
engSearchText:
That, as well as the attempt at making it look like a
case of contaminated drugs and the type of plant used
to achieve that.
jpnChrName: 何より“薬物汚染”を思わせる状況と その原料っぽい植物が見つかったからには。
jpnSearchText:
何より“薬物汚染”を思わせる状況と
その原料っぽい植物が見つかったからには。

engChrName: That's what I think, too. But aside from that girl and her angel, there's a distinct lack of any of their presence in Tharbad.
engSearchText:
That's what I think, too. But aside from that girl and
her angel, there's a distinct lack of any of their
presence in Tharbad.
jpnChrName: 同感だ──だが“天使使い”はともかく、 マフィアそのものの気配が無さすぎる。
jpnSearchText:
同感だ──だが“天使使い”はともかく、
マフィアそのものの気配が無さすぎる。

engChrName: From what I can tell, none of their members or even any run-of-the-mill gangsters are lurkin' around. That's awful suspicious, if you ask me.
engSearchText:
From what I can tell, none of their members or even
any run-of-the-mill gangsters are lurkin' around.
That's awful suspicious, if you ask me.
jpnChrName: 少なくとも構成員、ないし半グレどもが サルバッド入りしている気配はねぇぞ？
jpnSearchText:
少なくとも構成員、ないし半グレどもが
サルバッド入りしている気配はねぇぞ？

engChrName: Yes, that's not like what happened in Langport at all.
engSearchText: Yes, that's not like what happened in Langport at all.
jpnChrName: はい……ラングポートの時とは 明らかに違うみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
はい……ラングポートの時とは
明らかに違うみたいですね。

engChrName: I assume Messeldam was also different?
engSearchText: I assume Messeldam was also different?
jpnChrName: もしかしてメッセルダムの時とも？
jpnSearchText: もしかしてメッセルダムの時とも？

engChrName: Correct. Messeldam was previously their stronghold, and we've confirmed that there were individuals there who enjoyed their support.
engSearchText:
Correct. Messeldam was previously their stronghold,
and we've confirmed that there were individuals there
who enjoyed their support.
jpnChrName: ええ、あちらは元本拠地という事もあり、 息の掛かった人間は確認されていました。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、あちらは元本拠地という事もあり、
息の掛かった人間は確認されていました。

engChrName: It's very likely that they either masqueraded as anti-immigrant forces, or at least took advantage of the terrorism to carry out what they did.
engSearchText:
It's very likely that they either masqueraded as
anti-immigrant forces, or at least took advantage of
the terrorism to carry out what they did.
jpnChrName: 反移民テロを装って、ないし利用して 事を起こした可能性は高そうですね。
jpnSearchText:
反移民テロを装って、ないし利用して
事を起こした可能性は高そうですね。

engChrName: Meanwhile, we've got contaminated drugs spreading beneath the surface here, with not so much as a street thug to be found.
engSearchText:
Meanwhile, we've got contaminated drugs spreading
beneath the surface here, with not so much as a street
thug to be found.
jpnChrName: 対してこちらでは気配がないのに 水面下で薬物汚染が広がっている……
jpnSearchText:
対してこちらでは気配がないのに
水面下で薬物汚染が広がっている……

engChrName: What do you make of that, Mr. Arkride?
engSearchText: What do you make of that, Mr. Arkride?
jpnChrName: どういう事かな、裏解決屋（スプリガン）さん？
jpnSearchText: どういう事かな、裏解決屋（スプリガン）さん？

engChrName: At this point, all we're doing is just spitballin' and throwin' ideas around, aren't we?
engSearchText:
At this point, all we're doing is just spitballin' and
throwin' ideas around, aren't we?
jpnChrName: ハン……どうやらそちらの方も 大体当たりを付けてそうじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ハン……どうやらそちらの方も
大体当たりを付けてそうじゃねえか？

engChrName: Maybe so, but I have a theory. Hear me out.
engSearchText: Maybe so, but I have a theory. Hear me out.
jpnChrName: 仮にサルバッドにドラッグ汚染が 広がっているとしたら……
jpnSearchText:
仮にサルバッドにドラッグ汚染が
広がっているとしたら……

engChrName: In order for contaminated drugs to flow into Tharbad, you'd need organizational support of SOME sort to pull it off.
engSearchText:
In order for contaminated drugs to flow into
Tharbad, you'd need organizational support of
SOME sort to pull it off.
jpnChrName: 恐らく何らかの組織的な力が どうしても必要になりますよね。
jpnSearchText:
恐らく何らかの組織的な力が
どうしても必要になりますよね。

engChrName: If we assume that there really are no high-ranking members or any gangsters in the city right now...
engSearchText:
If we assume that there really are no high-ranking
members or any gangsters in the city right now...
jpnChrName: マフィアの構成員や準構成員が 現時点でこの街にいないとなると──
jpnSearchText:
マフィアの構成員や準構成員が
現時点でこの街にいないとなると──

engChrName: ...then a local business might have the power and influence to achieve that. Something the size of Vegas Films or similar.
engSearchText:
...then a local business might have the power and
influence to achieve that. Something the size of
Vegas Films or similar.
jpnChrName: たとえばベガスフィルムのような 現地企業なら可能かもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
たとえばベガスフィルムのような
現地企業なら可能かもしれませんね。

engChrName: Of course, the police and guild are both also probably big enough, too.
engSearchText:
Of course, the police and guild are both also probably
big enough, too.
jpnChrName: もちろん警察やギルドなんかも 組織力としては十分でしょうが……
jpnSearchText:
もちろん警察やギルドなんかも
組織力としては十分でしょうが……

engChrName: Uh, just to be clear, I'm only speaking hypothetically here! I'm not saying either of them are behind it!
engSearchText:
Uh, just to be clear, I'm only speaking
hypothetically here! I'm not saying either of them are
behind it!
jpnChrName: あのっ、仮定の話ですから……！
jpnSearchText: あのっ、仮定の話ですから……！

engChrName: Oh, what am I saying? I can't believe I'm even doubting either group, especially with a bracer right here! I'm so sorry...
engSearchText:
Oh, what am I saying? I can't believe I'm even
doubting either group, especially with a bracer
right here! I'm so sorry...
jpnChrName: 警察に加えてギルドまで…… すみません、遊撃士の方を前に。
jpnSearchText:
警察に加えてギルドまで……
すみません、遊撃士の方を前に。

engChrName: No, you're fine, don't be sorry. Surprising as it was, size-wise, you aren't wrong.
engSearchText:
No, you're fine, don't be sorry. Surprising as it was,
size-wise, you aren't wrong.
jpnChrName: いや、それは構わないけど ちょっと驚いた。
jpnSearchText:
いや、それは構わないけど
ちょっと驚いた。

engChrName: I think we can rule out the local guild on this one, though. Everyone here is really busy, and they're short on staff as it is.
engSearchText:
I think we can rule out the local guild on this
one, though. Everyone here is really busy, and they're
short on staff as it is.
jpnChrName: ギルドは仮定でも難しいかな。 仕事が忙しい上に人数も限られるし。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドは仮定でも難しいかな。
仕事が忙しい上に人数も限られるし。

engChrName: Likewise, the local police also seem to be innocent here, even if I was a little suspicious of them myself.
engSearchText:
Likewise, the local police also seem to be innocent
here, even if I was a little suspicious of them myself.
jpnChrName: ついでに現地警察もシロっぽい。 少しだけ疑ってたんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
ついでに現地警察もシロっぽい。
少しだけ疑ってたんだけど。

engChrName: Is that to say you already looked into it? That's good. Saves us the trouble of doin' that ourselves.
engSearchText:
Is that to say you already looked into it? That's good.
Saves us the trouble of doin' that ourselves.
jpnChrName: ああ、裏付けを取ったのか。 だったらこちらの手間も省けたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、裏付けを取ったのか。
だったらこちらの手間も省けたぜ。

engChrName: Which means that out of the organizations you mentioned, there's only one suspect left.
engSearchText:
Which means that out of the organizations you
mentioned, there's only one suspect left.
jpnChrName: これで一つに絞り込めたわけだ。
jpnSearchText: これで一つに絞り込めたわけだ。

engChrName: W-Wait. You don't mean Vegas Films, do you? I know I mentioned them, but aren't they out of the question?
engSearchText:
W-Wait. You don't mean Vegas Films, do you?
I know I mentioned them, but aren't they out of
the question?
jpnChrName: じ、自分で言って何ですけど そちらもあり得ないのでは……？
jpnSearchText:
じ、自分で言って何ですけど
そちらもあり得ないのでは……？

engChrName: I mean, it was Nina and Judith who hired us in the first place, not to mention how much the prince is involved!
engSearchText:
I mean, it was Nina and Judith who hired us in the
first place, not to mention how much the prince
is involved!
jpnChrName: 依頼したのは女優さんたちですし、 殿下が動いている事も考えると──
jpnSearchText:
依頼したのは女優さんたちですし、
殿下が動いている事も考えると──

engChrName: No, we still cannot rule them out.
engSearchText: No, we still cannot rule them out.
jpnChrName: いえ、アニエス様。
jpnSearchText: いえ、アニエス様。

engChrName: For one thing, as actresses, neither Ms. Fenly nor Ms. Lanster 'belong' to Vegas Films.
engSearchText:
For one thing, as actresses, neither Ms. Fenly nor Ms.
Lanster 'belong' to Vegas Films.
jpnChrName: ニナ様にジュディス様にしても ベガスフィルムの所属ではありません。
jpnSearchText:
ニナ様にジュディス様にしても
ベガスフィルムの所属ではありません。

engChrName: Also, while it is true that the principality supports the company, their relationship dates back only the past six months.
engSearchText:
Also, while it is true that the principality supports the
company, their relationship dates back only the past
six months.
jpnChrName: エルザイム公国も後援しているだけで 同社との関係はここ半年ほどだとか。
jpnSearchText:
エルザイム公国も後援しているだけで
同社との関係はここ半年ほどだとか。

engChrName: O-Oh. Huh...
engSearchText: O-Oh. Huh...

engChrName: It's also worth noting that the Tharbad Film Festival was planned separately from Messeldam's.
engSearchText:
It's also worth noting that the Tharbad Film Festival
was planned separately from Messeldam's.
jpnChrName: ちなみにサルバッド映画祭は メッセルダムと関係なく企画されたが……
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにサルバッド映画祭は
メッセルダムと関係なく企画されたが……

engChrName: In fact, compared to Messeldam's, which was an institution, this one had a lot less notoriety going for it at first.
engSearchText:
In fact, compared to Messeldam's, which was an
institution, this one had a lot less notoriety going for
it at first.
jpnChrName: 伝統あるメッセルダム映画祭と比べて 当初は知名度はかなり低かったようだ。
jpnSearchText:
伝統あるメッセルダム映画祭と比べて
当初は知名度はかなり低かったようだ。

engChrName: It was only once Messeldam's festival got canned that Tharbad's stock rose a lot the last two months.
engSearchText:
It was only once Messeldam's festival got canned that
Tharbad's stock rose a lot the last two months.
jpnChrName: だが、メッセルダムの中止を受けて ここ２ヶ月ほどで一気に名前が知られた。
jpnSearchText:
だが、メッセルダムの中止を受けて
ここ２ヶ月ほどで一気に名前が知られた。

engChrName: Which does make sense, when you think about how Calvard is going through a real motion picture boom.
engSearchText:
Which does make sense, when you think about how
Calvard is going through a real motion picture boom.
jpnChrName: 無理もないかな、 共和国は映画が盛んみたいだし。
jpnSearchText:
無理もないかな、
共和国は映画が盛んみたいだし。

engChrName: When there's only one big film festival a year, it's only natural for movie buffs to gravitate toward it, no matter where it is.
engSearchText:
When there's only one big film festival a year, it's
only natural for movie buffs to gravitate toward it, no
matter where it is.
jpnChrName: 年に一度のファンたちのお祭り気分を 引き受けることになったわけだね。
jpnSearchText:
年に一度のファンたちのお祭り気分を
引き受けることになったわけだね。

engChrName: And when you're the company putting the whole thing on, you come away from that situation a winner.
engSearchText:
And when you're the company putting the whole
thing on, you come away from that situation
a winner.
jpnChrName: 少なくとも主催者であるベガスフィルムは “得”をしている構図になる。
jpnSearchText:
少なくとも主催者であるベガスフィルムは
“得”をしている構図になる。

engChrName: Sounds like you guys have it figured out.
engSearchText: Sounds like you guys have it figured out.
jpnChrName: ──辿り着いたようだな。
jpnSearchText: ──辿り着いたようだな。

engChrName: Oh, hi, Dingo. How's Marielle doing?
engSearchText: Oh, hi, Dingo. How's Marielle doing?
jpnChrName: ディンゴさん……マリエルさんは？
jpnSearchText: ディンゴさん……マリエルさんは？

engChrName: She was so tired, she passed out as soon as we got back to the hotel. And now that I know she's safe, I'm here to return the favor.
engSearchText:
She was so tired, she passed out as soon as we got
back to the hotel. And now that I know she's safe,
I'm here to return the favor.
jpnChrName: ホテルに戻るなり疲れて眠った。 ──早速“借り”を返そうと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
ホテルに戻るなり疲れて眠った。
──早速“借り”を返そうと思ってな。

engChrName: I'll cut to the chase. The suspicions surrounding Vegas Films don't stop at the film festival.
engSearchText:
I'll cut to the chase. The suspicions surrounding
Vegas Films don't stop at the film festival.
jpnChrName: ベガスフィルム絡みの怪しい話は 何も今回の映画祭だけに留まらない。
jpnSearchText:
ベガスフィルム絡みの怪しい話は
何も今回の映画祭だけに留まらない。

engChrName: There are rumblings they've poured huge sums of dark money into Tharbad's political and financial circles, like when they set up their HQ.
engSearchText:
There are rumblings they've poured huge sums of
dark money into Tharbad's political and financial
circles, like when they set up their HQ.
jpnChrName: サルバッドに本社を構えた事も含めて、 政財界に巨額の裏金を動かした噂がある。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドに本社を構えた事も含めて、
政財界に巨額の裏金を動かした噂がある。

engChrName: And that money is supposedly going through less than legal channels.
engSearchText:
And that money is supposedly going through less
than legal channels.
jpnChrName: それも──何らかの非合法組織を介してな。
jpnSearchText: それも──何らかの非合法組織を介してな。

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...

engChrName: That's some serious dirt you've dug up. I take it you've got the evidence to back that up?
engSearchText:
That's some serious dirt you've dug up. I take it
you've got the evidence to back that up?
jpnChrName: 業界の裏話か…… 裏は取れてんだろうな？
jpnSearchText:
業界の裏話か……
裏は取れてんだろうな？

engChrName: Basically. I'm ninety-nine percent of the way there.
engSearchText: Basically. I'm ninety-nine percent of the way there.
jpnChrName: ああ、九割九分までは。
jpnSearchText: ああ、九割九分までは。

engChrName: I looked into a number of syndicates, both big and small, including Heiyue, and all of them came back negative.
engSearchText:
I looked into a number of syndicates, both big and
small, including Heiyue, and all of them came
back negative.
jpnChrName: 黒月も含め、大小様々な組織の線を 俺が独自に洗った結果、全てがシロ──
jpnSearchText:
黒月も含め、大小様々な組織の線を
俺が独自に洗った結果、全てがシロ──

engChrName: All of them, that is...except for one.
engSearchText: All of them, that is...except for one.
jpnChrName: ただし、ある一つを除いてな。
jpnSearchText: ただし、ある一つを除いてな。

engChrName: Almata.
engSearchText: Almata.
jpnChrName: 《アルマータ》……
jpnSearchText: 《アルマータ》……

engChrName: Well, that settles that debate. You're just as intrepid a reporter as I heard.
engSearchText:
Well, that settles that debate. You're just as intrepid a
reporter as I heard.
jpnChrName: 繋がったね──なるほど、 噂通りのやり手みたいだね？
jpnSearchText:
繋がったね──なるほど、
噂通りのやり手みたいだね？

engChrName: Why, thank you. I've heard good things about you, too, Miss Sylphid.
engSearchText:
Why, thank you. I've heard good things about you,
too, Miss Sylphid.
jpnChrName: フッ、そちらこそ。
jpnSearchText: フッ、そちらこそ。

engChrName: The only question left to resolve, assuming this is true, is why those threats were sent. That part doesn't square.
engSearchText:
The only question left to resolve, assuming this is
true, is why those threats were sent. That part
doesn't square.
jpnChrName: だが──この構図が正しかった場合、 分からなくなるのが“脅迫状”だ。
jpnSearchText:
だが──この構図が正しかった場合、
分からなくなるのが“脅迫状”だ。

engChrName: Indeed. One would think it would be against their best interests to put their own film festival in jeopardy.
engSearchText:
Indeed. One would think it would be against their
best interests to put their own film festival
in jeopardy.
jpnChrName: ええ、映画祭そのものを危うくするのは 主催企業としての利益とも矛盾しますし。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、映画祭そのものを危うくするのは
主催企業としての利益とも矛盾しますし。

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...
jpnChrName: ふむ………
jpnSearchText: ふむ………

engChrName: Van! Agnès!
engSearchText: Van! Agnès!
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、アニエスさん……！
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、アニエスさん……！

engChrName: You guys still at the inn? I see that bracer chick's with you, too.
engSearchText:
You guys still at the inn? I see that bracer chick's with
you, too.
jpnChrName: まだ宿だったか…… 銀髪の遊撃士もいるみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
まだ宿だったか……
銀髪の遊撃士もいるみたいだな。

engChrName: What's the matter, you two?
engSearchText: What's the matter, you two?
jpnChrName: フェリちゃん、アーロンさん？
jpnSearchText: フェリちゃん、アーロンさん？

engChrName: Yeah. What's got your feathers ruffled?
engSearchText: Yeah. What's got your feathers ruffled?
jpnChrName: どうした……血相変えて。
jpnSearchText: どうした……血相変えて。

engChrName: I'm guessin' you got Shaheena home already? Where are you now?
engSearchText:
I'm guessin' you got Shaheena home already?
Where are you now?
jpnChrName: 妹の方は送ったようだが お前ら、今どこにいるんだ？
jpnSearchText:
妹の方は送ったようだが
お前ら、今どこにいるんだ？

engChrName: We're at Vegas Films!
engSearchText: We're at Vegas Films!
jpnChrName: ベガスフィルムです……！
jpnSearchText: ベガスフィルムです……！

engChrName: After we dropped her off, an employee there contacted us.
engSearchText:
After we dropped her off, an employee there
contacted us.
jpnChrName: その、家に送った直後に そちらの方から連絡があって……！
jpnSearchText:
その、家に送った直後に
そちらの方から連絡があって……！

engChrName: They say Saara vanished from the studio.
engSearchText: They say Saara vanished from the studio.
jpnChrName: 何でもスタジオから 踊り子姉が消えちまったらしい。
jpnSearchText:
何でもスタジオから
踊り子姉が消えちまったらしい。

engChrName: Apparently, it happened while we were out in the desert.
engSearchText:
Apparently, it happened while we were out in
the desert.
jpnChrName: 俺らが砂漠に行ってる間にな。
jpnSearchText: 俺らが砂漠に行ってる間にな。

engChrName: Wha...?
engSearchText: Wha...?

engChrName: She WHAT?!
engSearchText: She WHAT?!
jpnChrName: なんだと……！？
jpnSearchText: なんだと……！？

engChrName: I analyzed the plant you sweethearts found against the substance in those rioting around town, and...
engSearchText:
I analyzed the plant you sweethearts found against
the substance in those rioting around town, and...
jpnChrName: ヴァンちゃんたちが見つけた植物と、 街で暴れた連中から検出された成分──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンちゃんたちが見つけた植物と、
街で暴れた連中から検出された成分──

engChrName: ...we have a match! They're completely identical!
engSearchText: ...we have a match! They're completely identical!
jpnChrName: その二つが完全に一致したの！
jpnSearchText: その二つが完全に一致したの！

engChrName: Oh, wow!
engSearchText: Oh, wow!

engChrName: Needless to say, it was found on the guys who kidnapped Marielle and that dancer.
engSearchText:
Needless to say, it was found on the guys who
kidnapped Marielle and that dancer.
jpnChrName: 勿論、マリエルたちを攫った 男たちからも検出された。
jpnSearchText:
勿論、マリエルたちを攫った
男たちからも検出された。

engChrName: This confirms, without a doubt, that it was an illegal drug.
engSearchText:
This confirms, without a doubt, that it was an
illegal drug.
jpnChrName: 違法ドラッグの存在が 完全に確定した形になるね。
jpnSearchText:
違法ドラッグの存在が
完全に確定した形になるね。

engChrName: When did you...?
engSearchText: When did you...?
jpnChrName: おいおい、いつの間に……
jpnSearchText: <C1>おいおい、いつの間に……

engChrName: Hold on! How the hell are you able to go over the cops' heads and run that sort of test?
engSearchText:
Hold on! How the hell are you able to go over the
cops' heads and run that sort of test?
jpnChrName: っつーか警察を差し置いて そんな検査が出来んのかよ！？
jpnSearchText:
っつーか警察を差し置いて
そんな検査が出来んのかよ！？

engChrName: With this fancy testing device that Van got for me after pulling some strings, that's how.
engSearchText:
With this fancy testing device that Van got for me
after pulling some strings, that's how.
jpnChrName: ウフフ、ヴァンちゃんのコネで届いた この検査機のおかげね。
jpnSearchText:
ウフフ、ヴァンちゃんのコネで届いた
この検査機のおかげね。

engChrName: That would have been for nothing were it not for your knowledge of pharmacology.
engSearchText:
That would have been for nothing were it not for
your knowledge of pharmacology.
jpnChrName: いや、貴方の薬学の 知識があってこそでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
いや、貴方の薬学の
知識があってこそでしょう。

engChrName: That's Bermotti. He never fails to impress.
engSearchText: That's Bermotti. He never fails to impress.
jpnChrName: ええ、さすがは ベルモッティさんね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、さすがは
ベルモッティさんね。

engChrName: Oh, hush, you two! I only know a little from dabbling in it back in the day, that's all. ❤
engSearchText:
Oh, hush, you two! I only know a little from dabbling
in it back in the day, that's all. ❤
jpnChrName: んもう、昔ちょっと かじってただけだってば❤
jpnSearchText:
んもう、昔ちょっと
かじってただけだってば❤

engChrName: Hey, that sounds like...
engSearchText: Hey, that sounds like...
jpnChrName: 今の声は……
jpnSearchText: <C1>今の声は……

engChrName: Orbal hookahs had exploded in popularity in Tharbad in recent days, particularly within the Entertainment District.
engSearchText:
Orbal hookahs had exploded in popularity in Tharbad
in recent days, particularly within the
Entertainment District.
jpnChrName: 近頃、サルバッドの歓楽街を中心に 広まり始めていた《導力シーシャ》──
jpnSearchText:
近頃、サルバッドの歓楽街を中心に
広まり始めていた《導力シーシャ》──

engChrName: Easily obtainable by curious members of the public, the paraphernalia was sold by numerous vendors throughout the city.
engSearchText:
Easily obtainable by curious members of the public,
the paraphernalia was sold by numerous vendors
throughout the city.
jpnChrName: 現物そのものは、各地の販売所で 簡単に手に入れることができ……
jpnSearchText:
現物そのものは、各地の販売所で
簡単に手に入れることができ……

engChrName: Further testing by Bermotti and company confirmed that the substance smoked in them was indeed the illicit drug in question.
engSearchText:
Further testing by Bermotti and company confirmed
that the substance smoked in them was indeed the
illicit drug in question.
jpnChrName: 再びベルモッティらが調べた結果、 違法薬物と同一の成分が検出された。
jpnSearchText:
再びベルモッティらが調べた結果、
違法薬物と同一の成分が検出された。

engChrName: In response, the guild and local police decided to confiscate the devices in secret.
engSearchText:
In response, the guild and local police decided to
confiscate the devices in secret.
jpnChrName: その結果、ギルドと警察は連携して 内々に取り締まりを行うことを決め……
jpnSearchText:
その結果、ギルドと警察は連携して
内々に取り締まりを行うことを決め……

engChrName: Afterwards, once things appeared to settle down around Vegas Films, Van and his cohorts returned to the inn.
engSearchText:
Afterwards, once things appeared to settle down
around Vegas Films, Van and his cohorts returned
to the inn.
jpnChrName: その後──ヴァンたちはベガスフィルム周辺が 落ち着くのを見計らってから、宿に戻った。
jpnSearchText:
その後──ヴァンたちはベガスフィルム周辺が
落ち着くのを見計らってから、宿に戻った。

engChrName: As a precaution, Saara was placed under bracer protection for her own safety.
engSearchText:
As a precaution, Saara was placed under bracer
protection for her own safety.
jpnChrName: なお、巻き込まれたサァラは念のため 遊撃士たちの保護下に置かれることになり……
jpnSearchText:
なお、巻き込まれたサァラは念のため
遊撃士たちの保護下に置かれることになり……

engChrName: She and her sister therefore spent the night on the second floor of the local guild branch.
engSearchText:
She and her sister therefore spent the night on the
second floor of the local guild branch.
jpnChrName: 姉妹揃って、今夜はギルドの支部の ２階に寝泊まりすることになるのだった。
jpnSearchText:
姉妹揃って、今夜はギルドの支部の
２階に寝泊まりすることになるのだった。

engChrName: October 7th, 1:02AM
engSearchText: October 7th, 1:02AM

engChrName: Heehee! Wow, I can't believe we get to sleep at the guild! It's kind of exciting!
engSearchText:
Heehee! Wow, I can't believe we get to sleep at
the guild! It's kind of exciting!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ギルドに泊まるなんて ちょっとワクワクしますっ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、ギルドに泊まるなんて
ちょっとワクワクしますっ。

engChrName: This isn't a game, you know.
engSearchText: This isn't a game, you know.
jpnChrName: もう…… 遊びに行くんじゃないのよ……？
jpnSearchText:
もう……
遊びに行くんじゃないのよ……？

engChrName: Either way, you should get some rest. Trust me—the beds here are nice and comfy.
engSearchText:
Either way, you should get some rest. Trust me—the
beds here are nice and comfy.
jpnChrName: とにかく今日はゆっくり休んで。 ベッドは一応ふかふかだから。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく今日はゆっくり休んで。
ベッドは一応ふかふかだから。

engChrName: Yay! Sounds like we scored, sis!
engSearchText: Yay! Sounds like we scored, sis!
jpnChrName: えへへ、良かったねお姉──
jpnSearchText: えへへ、良かったねお姉──

engChrName: Oh, crap! I need to get a change of clothes!
engSearchText: Oh, crap! I need to get a change of clothes!
jpnChrName: そうだ…… 着替え、取ってこないと！
jpnSearchText:
そうだ……
着替え、取ってこないと！

engChrName: Want me to come with you?
engSearchText: Want me to come with you?
jpnChrName: 付き添おうか？
jpnSearchText: 付き添おうか？

engChrName: That's okay! Our house is practically around the corner. You two go on ahead!
engSearchText:
That's okay! Our house is practically around
the corner. You two go on ahead!
jpnChrName: 大丈夫、すぐそこですから！ お姉と先に入っててください！
jpnSearchText:
大丈夫、すぐそこですから！
お姉と先に入っててください！

engChrName: Shaheena, wait!
engSearchText: Shaheena, wait!
jpnChrName: あ……ちょっとシャヒーナ──
jpnSearchText: あ……ちょっとシャヒーナ──

engChrName: Haha.
engSearchText: Haha.
jpnChrName: ふふ……
jpnSearchText: ふふ……

engChrName: Heehee. I'm so glad Saara made it out of that safe and sound.
engSearchText:
Heehee. I'm so glad Saara made it out of that safe
and sound.
jpnChrName: ……えへへ、ホントに良かった。 お姉が戻ってきてくれて……
jpnSearchText:
……えへへ、ホントに良かった。
お姉が戻ってきてくれて……

engChrName: Makes me wonder if Arusha brought us together with Van and his friends.
engSearchText:
Makes me wonder if Arusha brought us together with
Van and his friends.
jpnChrName: お兄さんたちと会えたのも 翼の女神（アルーシャ）様のお導きだったのかな？
jpnSearchText:
お兄さんたちと会えたのも
翼の女神（アルーシャ）様のお導きだったのかな？

engChrName: Honestly, I wouldn't actually MIND if he dated—
engSearchText: Honestly, I wouldn't actually MIND if he dated—
jpnChrName: うーん、あのお兄さんだったら ホントにお姉の彼氏になっても──
jpnSearchText:
うーん、あのお兄さんだったら
ホントにお姉の彼氏になっても──

engChrName: Why, hello. Lovely night we're having, isn't it?
engSearchText: Why, hello. Lovely night we're having, isn't it?
jpnChrName: ──やあ、良い夜だお嬢さん。
jpnSearchText: ──やあ、良い夜だお嬢さん。

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?

engChrName: Damn. This town's really coming to life now that it's the big day.
engSearchText:
Damn. This town's really coming to life now that it's
the big day.
jpnChrName: ヒュウ、すげえ盛り上がりだな♪
jpnSearchText: ヒュウ、すげえ盛り上がりだな♪

engChrName: Yeah! I don't know if any of the other festivals I've ever seen compare to this!
engSearchText:
Yeah! I don't know if any of the other festivals I've
ever seen compare to this!
jpnChrName: 今まで見たどんなお祭りより 凄いかもしれません……！
jpnSearchText:
今まで見たどんなお祭りより
凄いかもしれません……！

engChrName: Seems like the information blackout on what happened with Dillon's working as intended, too.
engSearchText:
Seems like the information blackout on what
happened with Dillon's working as intended, too.
jpnChrName: ベガスフィルムの件の情報規制も 上手くいっているみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
ベガスフィルムの件の情報規制も
上手くいっているみたいだな。

engChrName: Not that I was worried with René looking after it.
engSearchText: Not that I was worried with René looking after it.
jpnChrName: ルネの奴が手を回してたみたいだし 心配はしてなかったが。
jpnSearchText:
ルネの奴が手を回してたみたいだし
心配はしてなかったが。

engChrName: Between that and the orbal hookah incident, he's certainly proven to be an impressive individual.
engSearchText:
Between that and the orbal hookah incident, he's
certainly proven to be an impressive individual.
jpnChrName: 導力シーシャの件といい、 流石という他ありませんね。
jpnSearchText:
導力シーシャの件といい、
流石という他ありませんね。

engChrName: I have mixed feelings on everything, but...I'm definitely glad to see everyone's hard work paying off.
engSearchText:
I have mixed feelings on everything, but...I'm
definitely glad to see everyone's hard work paying off.
jpnChrName: ちょっと複雑ですけど…… 皆さんの頑張りが報われて良かったです。
jpnSearchText:
ちょっと複雑ですけど……
皆さんの頑張りが報われて良かったです。

engChrName: Even if we can't rest easy just yet.
engSearchText: Even if we can't rest easy just yet.
jpnChrName: まだ油断はできないかもしれませんが。
jpnSearchText: まだ油断はできないかもしれませんが。

engChrName: That we can't. There's still the Carnal Cavalcade at noon, plus the big award ceremony.
engSearchText:
That we can't. There's still the Carnal Cavalcade at
noon, plus the big award ceremony.
jpnChrName: ああ、正午には例のフォクシーパレード、 作品や俳優たちの授賞式も控えている。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、正午には例のフォクシーパレード、
作品や俳優たちの授賞式も控えている。

engChrName: It's entirely possible that trouble could strike during either of those things.
engSearchText:
It's entirely possible that trouble could strike during
either of those things.
jpnChrName: その辺の盛り上がるタイミングで 仕掛けてくる可能性もゼロじゃねえだろう。
jpnSearchText:
その辺の盛り上がるタイミングで
仕掛けてくる可能性もゼロじゃねえだろう。

engChrName: I'm not saying we can't have fun and enjoy ourselves. Just...stay on the lookout for anything suspicious.
engSearchText:
I'm not saying we can't have fun and enjoy ourselves.
Just...stay on the lookout for anything suspicious.
jpnChrName: 楽しみながらでいいが、怪しい動きを “嗅ぎ取れる”ようにはしておけよ？
jpnSearchText:
楽しみながらでいいが、怪しい動きを
“嗅ぎ取れる”ようにはしておけよ？

engChrName: Yeah, yeah, we know the drill by now.
engSearchText: Yeah, yeah, we know the drill by now.
jpnChrName: ハッ、分かってるっつーの。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、分かってるっつーの。

engChrName: You want us to take a stroll around town while checking for any new 4SPGs that've come in, yeah? Nothing we haven't done before.
engSearchText:
You want us to take a stroll around town while
checking for any new 4SPGs that've come in, yeah?
Nothing we haven't done before.
jpnChrName: 諸々巡りながら４ｓｐｇも 一応チェックすりゃーいいんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
諸々巡りながら４ｓｐｇも
一応チェックすりゃーいいんだろ？

engChrName: So this is how Arkride Solutions goes about conducting its risk assessment work. I find it very interesting.
engSearchText:
So this is how Arkride Solutions goes about
conducting its risk assessment work. I find it
very interesting.
jpnChrName: ふふ、アークライド事務所流の 危機管理というわけですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、アークライド事務所流の
危機管理というわけですね。

engChrName: ...It's going to be okay, you guys. We can put our experience from Langport to use here, too.
engSearchText:
...It's going to be okay, you guys. We can put our
experience from Langport to use here, too.
jpnChrName: ……大丈夫です。 煌都での経験も活かせそうですし。
jpnSearchText:
……大丈夫です。
煌都での経験も活かせそうですし。

engChrName: Also, I think we should check on Shaheena and Saara and see how they're doing.
engSearchText:
Also, I think we should check on Shaheena and Saara
and see how they're doing.
jpnChrName: それとシャヒーナさんたちの 陣中見舞いにも行きたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
それとシャヒーナさんたちの
陣中見舞いにも行きたいですね。

engChrName: Definitely. I've been worried about Saara. Hopefully she feels better after a good night's sleep.
engSearchText:
Definitely. I've been worried about Saara.
Hopefully she feels better after a good night's sleep.
jpnChrName: はいっ、サァラさんの調子が 戻っているかどうかも気になりますし。
jpnSearchText:
はいっ、サァラさんの調子が
戻っているかどうかも気になりますし。

engChrName: *sigh* No rest for the weary, it seems. Guess we've got a full plate for our last day in town. Let's get to work, folks.
engSearchText:
*sigh* No rest for the weary, it seems. Guess we've got
a full plate for our last day in town. Let's get to
work, folks.
jpnChrName: ったく……そんじゃあ出張最終日、 解決業務を始めるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ったく……そんじゃあ出張最終日、
解決業務を始めるぞ。

engChrName: But before we begin, I have a very important announcement to make.
engSearchText:
But before we begin, I have a very important
announcement to make.
jpnChrName: だが──その前に一つ、 伝えなければならないことがある。
jpnSearchText:
だが──その前に一つ、
伝えなければならないことがある。

engChrName: Some of you may have heard rumors going around...
engSearchText: Some of you may have heard rumors going around...
jpnChrName: 既に一部で噂になっていることじゃが……
jpnSearchText: 既に一部で噂になっていることじゃが……

engChrName: Last night, Gaspard Dillon, CEO of Vegas Films, sadly passed away unexpectedly.
engSearchText:
Last night, Gaspard Dillon, CEO of Vegas Films,
sadly passed away unexpectedly.
jpnChrName: 昨夜、ベガスフィルム代表取締役の ギャスパー・ディロン氏が急逝された。
jpnSearchText:
昨夜、ベガスフィルム代表取締役の
ギャスパー・ディロン氏が急逝された。

engChrName: I'm not at liberty to disclose what took place. I'm sure more details will be revealed at a later date.
engSearchText:
I'm not at liberty to disclose what took place. I'm sure
more details will be revealed at a later date.
jpnChrName: あー、諸々の事情については いずれ当局の発表があることと思う。
jpnSearchText:
あー、諸々の事情については
いずれ当局の発表があることと思う。

engChrName: Now, I understand that some people may object to us moving forward with the festival.
engSearchText:
Now, I understand that some people may object to us
moving forward with the festival.
jpnChrName: 『そんな時に映画祭など不謹慎だ』 などの意見ももちろんあることじゃろう。
jpnSearchText:
『そんな時に映画祭など不謹慎だ』
などの意見ももちろんあることじゃろう。

engChrName: However! Gaspard was a man of his industry. He wanted this event to succeed as much as anyone!
engSearchText:
However! Gaspard was a man of his industry.
He wanted this event to succeed as much as anyone!
jpnChrName: だが──氏もまた映画祭の成功を願う “映画人”の一人じゃった。
jpnSearchText:
だが──氏もまた映画祭の成功を願う
“映画人”の一人じゃった。

engChrName: That's why we've decided to proceed, to fulfill his wish. We hope you all can understand.
engSearchText:
That's why we've decided to proceed, to fulfill
his wish. We hope you all can understand.
jpnChrName: その遺志を汲むことを我々が選んだ意味、 ご理解頂けると信じている。
jpnSearchText:
その遺志を汲むことを我々が選んだ意味、
ご理解頂けると信じている。

engChrName: Thank you, thank you. I appreciate it.
engSearchText: Thank you, thank you. I appreciate it.
jpnChrName: どうも──どうも、ありがとう。
jpnSearchText: どうも──どうも、ありがとう。

engChrName: The growth of our film industry owes a lot to the prosperity of our country in recent times.
engSearchText:
The growth of our film industry owes a lot to the
prosperity of our country in recent times.
jpnChrName: ……昨今のカルバードの好景気は 映画産業をも大きく成長させてくれた。
jpnSearchText:
……昨今のカルバードの好景気は
映画産業をも大きく成長させてくれた。

engChrName: There are some skeptics out there who say once the good times come to an end, we'll become divided all over again.
engSearchText:
There are some skeptics out there who say once the
good times come to an end, we'll become divided all
over again.
jpnChrName: だがそれが終わった時、かつてあった “分断”がまた起こるのではという声もある。
jpnSearchText:
だがそれが終わった時、かつてあった
“分断”がまた起こるのではという声もある。

engChrName: But I'm sure you all know as well as I do that when it comes to the silver screen, race, ethnicity, and nationality don't matter a bit!
engSearchText:
But I'm sure you all know as well as I do that when it
comes to the silver screen, race, ethnicity, and
nationality don't matter a bit!
jpnChrName: ──じゃが諸君も知っている通り 映画の前に人種や民族、国境の垣根はない！
jpnSearchText:
──じゃが諸君も知っている通り
映画の前に人種や民族、国境の垣根はない！

engChrName: Everyone in the audience is equal and gets to enjoy the greatest experience we can offer!
engSearchText:
Everyone in the audience is equal and gets to enjoy
the greatest experience we can offer!
jpnChrName: 誰もが等しく観客として最高の物語と体験を──
jpnSearchText: 誰もが等しく観客として最高の物語と体験を──

engChrName: Gaspard Dillon left his dream unfulfilled, and for him, this little show business of ours will reach heights he scarcely dared to hope for!
engSearchText:
Gaspard Dillon left his dream unfulfilled, and for
him, this little show business of ours will reach
heights he scarcely dared to hope for!
jpnChrName: 氏の無念を受け止め、我々業界人も 更なる飛躍のきっかけとする覚悟じゃ！
jpnSearchText:
氏の無念を受け止め、我々業界人も
更なる飛躍のきっかけとする覚悟じゃ！

engChrName: We love you, Mr. Gotti!
engSearchText: We love you, Mr. Gotti!
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督～！
jpnSearchText: ゴッチ監督～！

engChrName: I can't wait to see your next movie!
engSearchText: I can't wait to see your next movie!
jpnChrName: 次回作も楽しみにしてるぞ～！
jpnSearchText: 次回作も楽しみにしてるぞ～！

engChrName: All right, enough rambling from me!
engSearchText: All right, enough rambling from me!
jpnChrName: ──さあ、いよいよ時間じゃ！
jpnSearchText: ──さあ、いよいよ時間じゃ！

engChrName: It's time for everyone to relax and forget their troubles! Bathe in this sea of beauty that makes even the Goddess Herself blush!
engSearchText:
It's time for everyone to relax and forget their
troubles! Bathe in this sea of beauty that
makes even the Goddess Herself blush!
jpnChrName: せめて今だけは浮世の憂さを忘れ、 女神すら霞む百花繚乱に酔いしれようっ！
jpnSearchText:
せめて今だけは浮世の憂さを忘れ、
女神すら霞む百花繚乱に酔いしれようっ！

engChrName: That's right! I'm talking about all these gorgeous girls I have with me who've descended upon Tharbad, the city of pleasure!
engSearchText:
That's right! I'm talking about all these
gorgeous girls I have with me who've
descended upon Tharbad, the city of pleasure!
jpnChrName: このサルバッドという黄金郷に舞い降りた とびっきりの雌狐（フォクシー）たちと共に……！
jpnSearchText:
このサルバッドという黄金郷に舞い降りた
とびっきりの雌狐（フォクシー）たちと共に……！

engChrName: Okay, everyone! All together now!
engSearchText: Okay, everyone! All together now!
jpnChrName: さあ、皆さんご一緒に！
jpnSearchText: さあ、皆さんご一緒に！

engChrName: Get ready for the ride of your lives!
engSearchText: Get ready for the ride of your lives!
jpnChrName: 一生忘れられない“刻”を始めるわよ！
jpnSearchText: 一生忘れられない“刻”を始めるわよ！

engChrName: Here we go!
engSearchText: Here we go!
jpnChrName: いっくよー！！
jpnSearchText: いっくよー！！

engChrName: Let the Carnal Cavalcade begin!
engSearchText: Let the Carnal Cavalcade begin!
engHtmlText: ゴッチ監督＆女優たち＆観客
jpnChrName: レッツ、フォクシーパレード！！
jpnSearchText: レッツ、フォクシーパレード！！

engChrName: Woooooow!
engSearchText: Woooooow!
jpnChrName: おおおおっ……！
jpnSearchText: おおおおっ……！

engChrName: This is incredible!
engSearchText: This is incredible!
jpnChrName: ……すっげえええええええっ……！
jpnSearchText: ……すっげえええええええっ……！

engChrName: Who's that girl on stage? She wasn't on the performer list!
engSearchText:
Who's that girl on stage? She wasn't on the
performer list!
jpnChrName: なにあの子……！ 出演リストにはいなかったわよね！？
jpnSearchText:
なにあの子……！
出演リストにはいなかったわよね！？

engChrName: That's Salvatore Gotti for you. All he needs is a rege to dazzle you for selge.
engSearchText:
That's Salvatore Gotti for you. All he needs is a rege
to dazzle you for selge.
jpnChrName: さすがサルバトーレ・ゴッチだ。 魅せ方ってモンを分かってやがる。
jpnSearchText:
さすがサルバトーレ・ゴッチだ。
魅せ方ってモンを分かってやがる。

engChrName: Your sister's real into it, too.
engSearchText: Your sister's real into it, too.
jpnChrName: 妹もキレッキレじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText: 妹もキレッキレじゃねえか？

engChrName: Yeah, she really is! (I'm so proud of you, Shaheena. You worked hard for this!)
engSearchText:
Yeah, she really is!
(I'm so proud of you, Shaheena. You worked hard
for this!)
jpnChrName: ええ、本当に……！ （頑張ったわね、シャヒーナ……）
jpnSearchText:
ええ、本当に……！
（頑張ったわね、シャヒーナ……）

engChrName: How are things on your end?
engSearchText: How are things on your end?
jpnChrName: ──そっちはどうだ？
jpnSearchText: ──そっちはどうだ？

engChrName: Ungh...
engSearchText: Ungh...
jpnSearchText: ───ぁ────

engChrName: Shaheena!
engSearchText: Shaheena!
jpnChrName: シャヒーナ……！
jpnSearchText: シャヒーナ……！

engChrName: H-Huh?
engSearchText: H-Huh?
jpnChrName: あ、あれ……？
jpnSearchText: あ、あれ……？

engChrName: What...happened to us?
engSearchText: What...happened to us?
jpnChrName: 俺たち、一体……
jpnSearchText: 俺たち、一体……

engChrName: Shaheena! Are you okay?!
engSearchText: Shaheena! Are you okay?!
jpnChrName: シャヒーナ、大丈夫……！？
jpnSearchText: シャヒーナ、大丈夫……！？

engChrName: Saara...? What...?
engSearchText: Saara...? What...?
jpnChrName: ………お姉……あ、あたし……
jpnSearchText: ………お姉……あ、あたし……

engChrName: Wh-What...have I done...?!
engSearchText: Wh-What...have I done...?!
jpnChrName: ………あたし、なんてことを………！
jpnSearchText: ………あたし、なんてことを………！

engChrName: I'm sorry, I'm sorry! I used Mom's dances all wrong... So many people are hurt because...because of...!
engSearchText:
I'm sorry, I'm sorry! I used Mom's dances all wrong...
So many people are hurt because...because of...!
jpnChrName: お母さんから受け継いだ踊りで…… ………サルバッドのみんなを───！！
jpnSearchText:
お母さんから受け継いだ踊りで……
………サルバッドのみんなを───！！

engChrName: Shaheena, snap out of it!
engSearchText: Shaheena, snap out of it!
jpnChrName: ──しっかりしなさい、シャヒーナ！
jpnSearchText: ──しっかりしなさい、シャヒーナ！

engChrName: The show still has to go on, silly. The parade isn't over yet.
engSearchText:
The show still has to go on, silly. The parade isn't
over yet.
jpnChrName: 舞台を降りるのはまだ早いわ。 まだパレードは終わってないもの。
jpnSearchText:
舞台を降りるのはまだ早いわ。
まだパレードは終わってないもの。

engChrName: Let's finish what we both started...
engSearchText: Let's finish what we both started...
jpnChrName: 最後までやり切りましょう──
jpnSearchText: 最後までやり切りましょう──

engChrName: ...and show everyone's who's supported us just how bright our future is. All right?
engSearchText:
...and show everyone's who's supported us just how
bright our future is. All right?
jpnChrName: 沢山の人が後押ししてくれた 私たちの“これからの”踊りを。
jpnSearchText:
沢山の人が後押ししてくれた
私たちの“これからの”踊りを。

engChrName: Saara...
engSearchText: Saara...
jpnSearchText: ……お姉………

engChrName: Whoooa...
engSearchText: Whoooa...
jpnSearchText: ………おお…………

engChrName: The crowd's coming together...
engSearchText: The crowd's coming together...
jpnChrName: ……みんなの心が…………
jpnSearchText: ……みんなの心が…………

engChrName: You can do it, girls! Go for it!
engSearchText: You can do it, girls! Go for it!
jpnChrName: ……ねーちゃんたち、頑張れーっ！
jpnSearchText: ……ねーちゃんたち、頑張れーっ！

engChrName: Is everybody watching out there?!
engSearchText: Is everybody watching out there?!
jpnChrName: さあ──ご覧の皆さんも！
jpnSearchText: さあ──ご覧の皆さんも！

engChrName: Let's make this a film festival for the record books! C'mon, everyone!
engSearchText:
Let's make this a film festival for the record books!
C'mon, everyone!
jpnChrName: せっかくの映画祭、 このまま最後まで楽しもうっ……！
jpnSearchText:
せっかくの映画祭、
このまま最後まで楽しもうっ……！

engChrName: What a ride this has been.
engSearchText: What a ride this has been.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、凄いね……
jpnSearchText: やれやれ、凄いね……

engChrName: I just...hope this means things have worked out.
engSearchText: I just...hope this means things have worked out.
jpnChrName: でも── 何とかなったのかな？
jpnSearchText:
でも──
何とかなったのかな？

engChrName: Eeek! This is just the sort of hot scoop I've been looking for!
engSearchText:
Eeek! This is just the sort of hot scoop I've been
looking for!
jpnChrName: うわあああっ……！ スクープ間違いなしですよおっ！！
jpnSearchText:
うわあああっ……！
スクープ間違いなしですよおっ！！

engChrName: Not to burst your bubble, hon, but with the CID in town, I don't know how much anyone is going to be able to cover this event.
engSearchText:
Not to burst your bubble, hon, but with the CID in
town, I don't know how much anyone is going to be
able to cover this event.
jpnChrName: ま、ＣＩＤも介入してるから 何らかの情報規制はありそうだけど。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ＣＩＤも介入してるから
何らかの情報規制はありそうだけど。

engChrName: Maybe, but I've got a feeling readers will still get a little taste of just how hot and fiery things turned out.
engSearchText:
Maybe, but I've got a feeling readers will still get a
little taste of just how hot and fiery things turned out.
jpnChrName: ああ──だが少しくらいは この“熱”を届けられるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──だが少しくらいは
この“熱”を届けられるだろう。

engChrName: Wow, a 4SPG already.
engSearchText: Wow, a 4SPG already.
jpnChrName: あ……ありましたね、４ｓｐｇ。
jpnSearchText: あ……ありましたね、４ｓｐｇ。

engChrName: Guess Dingo got the word out about us. Good to know.
engSearchText:
Guess Dingo got the word out about us. Good
to know.
jpnChrName: ああ、ディンゴが上手く 噂を流してくれたんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ディンゴが上手く
噂を流してくれたんだろ。

engChrName: Is there really that much demand for a spriggan's services in a town like this, though?
engSearchText:
Is there really that much demand for a spriggan's
services in a town like this, though?
jpnChrName: しっかし、黒月が幅を利かせて 遊撃士が色々とやりづれぇ煌都と違って──
jpnSearchText:
しっかし、黒月が幅を利かせて
遊撃士が色々とやりづれぇ煌都と違って──

engChrName: This isn't like Langport, where Heiyue calls the shots. The bracers can operate without anyone else putting the squeeze on them, right?
engSearchText:
This isn't like Langport, where Heiyue calls the shots.
The bracers can operate without anyone else putting
the squeeze on them, right?
jpnChrName: こっちにはそういう制限はねえはずなのに、 それでも裏解決屋は需要があるもんだな？
jpnSearchText:
こっちにはそういう制限はねえはずなのに、
それでも裏解決屋は需要があるもんだな？

engChrName: Yeah, actually, the Tharbad branch is right over there. There's definitely bracers around.
engSearchText:
Yeah, actually, the Tharbad branch is right over there.
There's definitely bracers around.
jpnChrName: ギルドの支部はあちらの方にあります。 ちゃんと常駐の遊撃士もいるはずですが……
jpnSearchText:
ギルドの支部はあちらの方にあります。
ちゃんと常駐の遊撃士もいるはずですが……

engChrName: This is all true, but anywhere you go, there'll always be people with more, ah, sensitive needs who can't use bracer services easily.
engSearchText:
This is all true, but anywhere you go, there'll always
be people with more, ah, sensitive needs who can't
use bracer services easily.
jpnChrName: 相談できねえ悩みを抱えてるやつは どこにでもいるってことだ。
jpnSearchText:
相談できねえ悩みを抱えてるやつは
どこにでもいるってことだ。

engChrName: Plus with the film festival almost here, the guild's probably short on hands and can't get to everyone who needs them.
engSearchText:
Plus with the film festival almost here, the guild's
probably short on hands and can't get to everyone
who needs them.
jpnChrName: 加えてもうすぐ映画祭って時期で ギルドの人手も足りてないだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
加えてもうすぐ映画祭って時期で
ギルドの人手も足りてないだろうしな。

engChrName: Hah, right. Then I guess we picked a good time to show up and help those poor folks who'd otherwise fall through the cracks.
engSearchText:
Hah, right. Then I guess we picked a good time to
show up and help those poor folks who'd otherwise
fall through the cracks.
jpnChrName: ハッ、色々積み重なっての状況ってわけか。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、色々積み重なっての状況ってわけか。

engChrName: Exactly. But remember, we're here on a mission. We can definitely help, but don't lose track of our priorities.
engSearchText:
Exactly. But remember, we're here on a mission.
We can definitely help, but don't lose track of
our priorities.
jpnChrName: まあ、こっちも本命の依頼を抱えてるんだ。 必要に応じて片付けるとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、こっちも本命の依頼を抱えてるんだ。
必要に応じて片付けるとしよう。

engChrName: (Hey, that table we were at yesterday is nice and open.)
engSearchText:
(Hey, that table we were at yesterday is nice
and open.)
jpnChrName: （ちょうど昨日使った   テーブル席が空いてるみてえだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ちょうど昨日使った
テーブル席が空いてるみてえだな。）

engChrName: (Maybe we should save it and then go grab some lunch from the bazaar.)
engSearchText:
(Maybe we should save it and then go grab some
lunch from the bazaar.)
jpnChrName: （今のうちに確保して市場で   昼飯の買い出しをしてくるか？）
jpnSearchText:
（今のうちに確保して市場で
昼飯の買い出しをしてくるか？）

engChrName: The main story will advance once you eat lunch.
engSearchText: The main story will advance once you eat lunch.
jpnChrName: 昼食をとるとメインストーリーが 進むので注意してください。
jpnSearchText:
昼食をとるとメインストーリーが
進むので注意してください。

engChrName: Once Van and the others procured the table, they went off to the market to purchase an array of food.
engSearchText:
Once Van and the others procured the table, they
went off to the market to purchase an array of food.
jpnChrName: その後、ヴァンたちは席を確保してから 市場で様々なフードを買い込み……
jpnSearchText:
その後、ヴァンたちは席を確保してから
市場で様々なフードを買い込み……

engChrName: The local cuisine they found had them smacking their lips in sheer delight.
engSearchText:
The local cuisine they found had them smacking
their lips in sheer delight.
jpnChrName: サルバッドならではの味わいに 舌鼓を打つのだった。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドならではの味わいに
舌鼓を打つのだった。

engChrName: Then, once their meal was over...
engSearchText: Then, once their meal was over...
jpnChrName: そして、食事が終わった頃──
jpnSearchText: <C1>そして、食事が終わった頃──

engChrName: Oh, hey, guys! Morning!
engSearchText: Oh, hey, guys! Morning!
jpnChrName: あ、お兄さんたち！ おはよう！
jpnSearchText:
あ、お兄さんたち！
おはよう！

engChrName: Good to see you're brimming with energy after all that craziness yesterday.
engSearchText:
Good to see you're brimming with energy after all
that craziness yesterday.
jpnChrName: 昨日あんな事があったってのに 朝から元気で何よりだ。
jpnSearchText:
昨日あんな事があったってのに
朝から元気で何よりだ。

engChrName: How are you doing, Saara? Are you holding up, too?
engSearchText: How are you doing, Saara? Are you holding up, too?
jpnChrName: サァラさんはもう大丈夫ですか？
jpnSearchText: サァラさんはもう大丈夫ですか？

engChrName: Yeah, I mostly feel fine after getting some sleep. Thanks for asking.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I mostly feel fine after getting some sleep.
Thanks for asking.
jpnChrName: はい、おかげさまで体調のほうは……
jpnSearchText: はい、おかげさまで体調のほうは……

engChrName: But I've decided to have Shaheena fill in for me at the parade, anyway, just to be safe.
engSearchText:
But I've decided to have Shaheena fill in for me at the
parade, anyway, just to be safe.
jpnChrName: やっぱり、今日のパレードは シャヒーナに任せることにしました。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり、今日のパレードは
シャヒーナに任せることにしました。

engChrName: Saara was just helping me put on the finishing touches to my act, as a matter of fact!
engSearchText:
Saara was just helping me put on the finishing
touches to my act, as a matter of fact!
jpnChrName: 今ちょうどお姉に最後の仕上げを 手伝ってもらってる所なんだ～。
jpnSearchText:
今ちょうどお姉に最後の仕上げを
手伝ってもらってる所なんだ～。

engChrName: You're gonna do great, Shaheena! After all that practice you put in yesterday, there's no way you won't!
engSearchText:
You're gonna do great, Shaheena! After all that
practice you put in yesterday, there's no way
you won't!
jpnChrName: えへへ、シャヒーナさんならきっと大丈夫です！ 昨日もあんなに練習したんですから！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、シャヒーナさんならきっと大丈夫です！
昨日もあんなに練習したんですから！

engChrName: Thanks, Feri. You're right! I'm gonna go out there and blow everyone's minds!
engSearchText:
Thanks, Feri. You're right! I'm gonna go out there
and blow everyone's minds!
jpnChrName: えへへ、ありがとう。 バッチリ決めて行くよ！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、ありがとう。
バッチリ決めて行くよ！

engChrName: I'll show them a dance they won't ever forget! Believe it!
engSearchText:
I'll show them a dance they won't ever forget!
Believe it!
jpnChrName: 絶対絶対、いい踊りを 見せてやるんだから！
jpnSearchText:
絶対絶対、いい踊りを
見せてやるんだから！

engChrName: Oh, yeah? Someone's feeling fired up.
engSearchText: Oh, yeah? Someone's feeling fired up.
jpnChrName: へえー、えらく気合入ってんな。
jpnSearchText: へえー、えらく気合入ってんな。

engChrName: I mean, you saw what happened yesterday. Both me AND my sister got kidnapped, not to mention all the other stuff.
engSearchText:
I mean, you saw what happened yesterday. Both me
AND my sister got kidnapped, not to mention all the
other stuff.
jpnChrName: だって昨日は今までの人生にないくらい 大変な一日だったんだもん。
jpnSearchText:
だって昨日は今までの人生にないくらい
大変な一日だったんだもん。

engChrName: That had to literally be the nuttiest day of my entire life, no doubt!
engSearchText:
That had to literally be the nuttiest day of my entire
life, no doubt!
jpnChrName: あたしとお姉が立て続けに攫われてさ、 あんなことになったし……
jpnSearchText:
あたしとお姉が立て続けに攫われてさ、
あんなことになったし……

engChrName: So you bet that I'm gonna make up for all that stress by making today the BEST day ever! By a long shot!
engSearchText:
So you bet that I'm gonna make up for all that stress
by making today the BEST day ever! By a long shot!
jpnChrName: だから今日は今までにないくらい 最高な一日にするよ！
jpnSearchText:
だから今日は今までにないくらい
最高な一日にするよ！

engChrName: It's gonna be so good, we won't have time to remember any of the bad stuff that's ever happened to us! Nobody will!
engSearchText:
It's gonna be so good, we won't have time to
remember any of the bad stuff that's ever happened
to us! Nobody will!
jpnChrName: 昨日のことも、今までのことも 忘れるくらい素敵な日にね！
jpnSearchText:
昨日のことも、今までのことも
忘れるくらい素敵な日にね！

engChrName: But it'll only happen if I give it my all! That's why I'm so amped up!
engSearchText:
But it'll only happen if I give it my all! That's why I'm
so amped up!
jpnChrName: そのためにも頑張るから！
jpnSearchText: そのためにも頑張るから！

engChrName: Your resolve is truly admirable. With you there, I'm sure the parade will be spectacular.
engSearchText:
Your resolve is truly admirable. With you there, I'm
sure the parade will be spectacular.
jpnChrName: ご立派な覚悟です。 きっと素晴らしいパレードになるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ご立派な覚悟です。
きっと素晴らしいパレードになるでしょう。

engChrName: And, Saara? I want you to know, you've got nothing to worry about.
engSearchText:
And, Saara? I want you to know, you've got nothing
to worry about.
jpnChrName: お姉──何も心配しなくていいからね。
jpnSearchText: お姉──何も心配しなくていいからね。

engChrName: I can handle the spotlight. I'll shine as bright as the sun when I'm dancing on that float, just like you would!
engSearchText:
I can handle the spotlight. I'll shine as bright as the
