sun when I'm dancing on that float, just like
you would!
jpnChrName: あたしがお姉の代わりに 太陽みたいに輝いてみせるから！
jpnSearchText:
あたしがお姉の代わりに
太陽みたいに輝いてみせるから！

engChrName: Brighter than anyone else around, in fact! You can count on it!
engSearchText:
Brighter than anyone else around, in fact! You can
count on it!
jpnChrName: きっときっと、誰よりも！
jpnSearchText: きっときっと、誰よりも！

engChrName: Shaheena...thank you. I'll be watching from the crowd, rooting for you!
engSearchText:
Shaheena...thank you. I'll be watching from the
crowd, rooting for you!
jpnChrName: シャヒーナ…… ええ、応援しているわ。
jpnSearchText:
シャヒーナ……
ええ、応援しているわ。

engChrName: Also, thank you so much for looking out for us. I know we've really put you through the wringer the last few days.
engSearchText:
Also, thank you so much for looking out for us.
I know we've really put you through the wringer the
last few days.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、皆さんも 何度も心配をおかけして、本当にすみません……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん、皆さんも
何度も心配をおかけして、本当にすみません……

engChrName: Nah, it's all good. We took this job knowin' it might not be easy, but we'll see it through.
engSearchText:
Nah, it's all good. We took this job knowin' it might
not be easy, but we'll see it through.
jpnChrName: ……ま、気にすんな。 一応依頼を受けてる身だしな。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、気にすんな。
一応依頼を受けてる身だしな。

engChrName: There is one thing I want to make clear, Shaheena. We've done our best to minimize any uncertainty going into today.
engSearchText:
There is one thing I want to make clear, Shaheena.
We've done our best to minimize any uncertainty
going into today.
jpnChrName: 不安要素は出来るだけ 排除するようにしたんだが……
jpnSearchText:
不安要素は出来るだけ
排除するようにしたんだが……

engChrName: I can't promise that the film festival'll go completely without a hitch...
engSearchText:
I can't promise that the film festival'll go completely
without a hitch...
jpnChrName: それでも、今日の映画祭が何事もなく 終われる保証は出来ねえ。
jpnSearchText:
それでも、今日の映画祭が何事もなく
終われる保証は出来ねえ。

engChrName: ...but I can promise that, whatever happens, we'll take care of it one way or the other.
engSearchText:
...but I can promise that, whatever happens, we'll take
care of it one way or the other.
jpnChrName: だが、何かあっても俺たちが 何とかすることは保証する。
jpnSearchText:
だが、何かあっても俺たちが
何とかすることは保証する。

engChrName: So don't worry about what MIGHT happen. Leave the what-ifs to us. You both go out there and live it up like you should!
engSearchText:
So don't worry about what MIGHT happen.
Leave the what-ifs to us. You both go out there and
live it up like you should!
jpnChrName: だから、安心して行って来い！
jpnSearchText: だから、安心して行って来い！

engChrName: You bet! Thanks, Van!
engSearchText: You bet! Thanks, Van!
jpnChrName: うん、ありがと！
jpnSearchText: うん、ありがと！

engChrName: Yes, thank you, Van. Knowing you're here is so reassuring. I know I can trust you.
engSearchText:
Yes, thank you, Van. Knowing you're here is
so reassuring. I know I can trust you.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん…… 頼りにしています。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさん……
頼りにしています。

engChrName: (I just hope I'm imagining things either way.)
engSearchText: (I just hope I'm imagining things either way.)
jpnChrName: （……気のせいだといいんだが。）
jpnSearchText: （……気のせいだといいんだが。）

engChrName: (Well. All we can do is focus on the here and now. Whatever happens, happens.)
engSearchText:
(Well. All we can do is focus on the here and now.
Whatever happens, happens.)
jpnChrName: （ま、俺たちは今やれることを   やるしかねぇだろ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ま、俺たちは今やれることを
やるしかねぇだろ。）

engChrName: Van, everyone! Excellent timing! I was just about to come talk to all of you.
engSearchText:
Van, everyone! Excellent timing! I was just about to
come talk to all of you.
jpnChrName: おやヴァン君たち、ちょうどいいところに。 これから声を掛けようと思っていたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
おやヴァン君たち、ちょうどいいところに。
これから声を掛けようと思っていたんだ。

engChrName: Prince Sherid! And Naje's with you, too.
engSearchText: Prince Sherid! And Naje's with you, too.
jpnChrName: シェリド公太子にナージェさん……？
jpnSearchText: シェリド公太子にナージェさん……？

engChrName: Not to mention our two favorite actresses.
engSearchText: Not to mention our two favorite actresses.
jpnChrName: 女優たちもいんのか。
jpnSearchText: 女優たちもいんのか。

engChrName: And even Sylphid! It's a party!
engSearchText: And even Sylphid! It's a party!
jpnChrName: それに、《妖精》まで……
jpnSearchText: それに、《妖精》まで……

engChrName: That's quite the crew you've got here, Your Highness. What's the occasion?
engSearchText:
That's quite the crew you've got here, Your Highness.
What's the occasion?
jpnChrName: こんな所で会うには意外な面子だな。 それで、俺たちに何かご用ですか？
jpnSearchText:
こんな所で会うには意外な面子だな。
それで、俺たちに何かご用ですか？

engChrName: Well, His Highness invited us over.
engSearchText: Well, His Highness invited us over.
jpnChrName: その、殿下のほうから誘われまして。
jpnSearchText: その、殿下のほうから誘われまして。

engChrName: We figured taking a bath here would be a nice way to freshen ourselves up for the parade and the awards ceremony.
engSearchText:
We figured taking a bath here would be a nice way to
freshen ourselves up for the parade and the
awards ceremony.
jpnChrName: パレードと授賞式前の景気づけに ハマムで汗を流そうってことになったのよ。
jpnSearchText:
パレードと授賞式前の景気づけに
ハマムで汗を流そうってことになったのよ。

engChrName: As for me, I wanted to take a dip at least once while I was here, anyway, so I was hardly about to say no.
engSearchText:
As for me, I wanted to take a dip at least once while I
was here, anyway, so I was hardly about to say no.
jpnChrName: わたしも一度入ってみたかったし、 ちょうどいい機会だった。
jpnSearchText:
わたしも一度入ってみたかったし、
ちょうどいい機会だった。

engChrName: But! As nice as it is to be accompanied by such lovely ladies, I'd be a bit lonely in the men's bath, so I wanted to invite you all as well.
engSearchText:
But! As nice as it is to be accompanied by such lovely
ladies, I'd be a bit lonely in the men's bath, so I
wanted to invite you all as well.
jpnChrName: ただ女性ばかり誘うのも気が引けるからね、 ぜひヴァン君たちも一緒にと思っていた所さ。
jpnSearchText:
ただ女性ばかり誘うのも気が引けるからね、
ぜひヴァン君たちも一緒にと思っていた所さ。

engChrName: We appreciate the offer. What do you say, Mr. Arkride? We do still have time to spare before the parade officially begins.
engSearchText:
We appreciate the offer. What do you say,
Mr. Arkride? We do still have time to spare before
the parade officially begins.
jpnChrName: まだパレードまで時間がありますが いかがいたしましょう？
jpnSearchText:
まだパレードまで時間がありますが
いかがいたしましょう？

engChrName: You bet we're comin' in. Wouldn't dream of missing somethin' like this.
engSearchText:
You bet we're comin' in. Wouldn't dream of missing
somethin' like this.
jpnChrName: 貸し切りなんて貴重な機会、 逃す手はねえな。
jpnSearchText:
貸し切りなんて貴重な機会、
逃す手はねえな。

engChrName: Not every day you get to rent out an entire bathhouse, after all.
engSearchText:
Not every day you get to rent out an entire bathhouse,
after all.
jpnChrName: ご一緒させてもらいますよ。
jpnSearchText: ご一緒させてもらいますよ。

engChrName: You'll take just about any excuse as long as it gets you in the door, huh?
engSearchText:
You'll take just about any excuse as long as it gets you
in the door, huh?
jpnChrName: っててめぇが入りてえだけじゃねえのか？
jpnSearchText: っててめぇが入りてえだけじゃねえのか？

engChrName: Ahaha! Well, Van's not wrong, is he?
engSearchText: Ahaha! Well, Van's not wrong, is he?
jpnChrName: あはは……まあせっかくですし。
jpnSearchText: あはは……まあせっかくですし。

engChrName: Ahhhhh... This hits the spot.
engSearchText: Ahhhhh... This hits the spot.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……これだよこれ。
jpnSearchText: ふぅ……これだよこれ。

engChrName: Somethin' about having an entire bath to yourself really just makes all your aches and pains melt away.
engSearchText:
Somethin' about having an entire bath to yourself
really just makes all your aches and pains melt away.
jpnChrName: 貸し切りはまた別格というか、 一日の疲れが吹っ飛ぶぜ。
jpnSearchText:
貸し切りはまた別格というか、
一日の疲れが吹っ飛ぶぜ。

engChrName: 'Aches and pains'? Man, you are old as dirt if you're talking like that. Today's only just begun, gramps.
engSearchText:
'Aches and pains'? Man, you are old as dirt if you're
talking like that. Today's only just begun, gramps.
jpnChrName: やだやだ、年寄りはこれだからよ。 だいたい一日は始まったばっかだろーが。
jpnSearchText:
やだやだ、年寄りはこれだからよ。
だいたい一日は始まったばっかだろーが。

engChrName: Haha! And yet I know exactly what Van means.
engSearchText: Haha! And yet I know exactly what Van means.
jpnChrName: フフ、しかしヴァン君の気持ちはよくわかる。
jpnSearchText: フフ、しかしヴァン君の気持ちはよくわかる。

engChrName: My schedule is usually more hectic than you might think. Times like this, where I can relax, unwind, and unburden, are a precious commodity.
engSearchText:
My schedule is usually more hectic than you
might think. Times like this, where I can relax,
unwind, and unburden, are a precious commodity.
jpnChrName: 私もこう見えて結構忙しくてね、 一日のこういう時間は何気に貴重なんだ。
jpnSearchText:
私もこう見えて結構忙しくてね、
一日のこういう時間は何気に貴重なんだ。

engChrName: It's an opportunity to reexamine myself, inside and out, washing everything away and becoming a new me in turn.
engSearchText:
It's an opportunity to reexamine myself, inside and
out, washing everything away and becoming a new
me in turn.
jpnChrName: 自分を内と外から同時に見つめ直すような感覚、 そして全てが洗い流され、新しい自分になる。
jpnSearchText:
自分を内と外から同時に見つめ直すような感覚、
そして全てが洗い流され、新しい自分になる。

engChrName: See, this man here? He understands. That's exactly it, Your Highness! I've always felt that way.
engSearchText:
See, this man here? He understands. That's exactly it,
Your Highness! I've always felt that way.
jpnChrName: おお、さすが殿下、分かってますね！ 俺も常々感じていたんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
おお、さすが殿下、分かってますね！
俺も常々感じていたんですよ。

engChrName: Bathhouses definitely serve a social function, but they're first and foremost a place to engage with yourself. At least in my opinion.
engSearchText:
Bathhouses definitely serve a social function, but
they're first and foremost a place to engage
with yourself. At least in my opinion.
jpnChrName: こういう場所は社交の場としても機能しますが、 やはり本質は自分との対話にある、とね。
jpnSearchText:
こういう場所は社交の場としても機能しますが、
やはり本質は自分との対話にある、とね。

engChrName: Just so! With a mindset like that, I can definitely see you going far in life, Van.
engSearchText:
Just so! With a mindset like that, I can definitely see
you going far in life, Van.
jpnChrName: そうともそうとも！　ハハ、やはり ヴァン君には大いに見込みがあるな。
jpnSearchText:
そうともそうとも！　ハハ、やはり
ヴァン君には大いに見込みがあるな。

engChrName: Oh, great. As if one old fart in my life wasn't enough, now I get to share a bath with two of them.
engSearchText:
Oh, great. As if one old fart in my life wasn't enough,
now I get to share a bath with two of them.
jpnChrName: チッ、オヤジ同士 盛り上がってんじゃねーっつの。
jpnSearchText:
チッ、オヤジ同士
盛り上がってんじゃねーっつの。

engChrName: Forget all that meditative shit! Let's have some fun! A little test of endurance. Who's in?
engSearchText:
Forget all that meditative shit! Let's have some fun!
A little test of endurance. Who's in?
jpnChrName: んなことより、勝負しようぜ勝負！ シンプルに耐久勝負だ！
jpnSearchText:
んなことより、勝負しようぜ勝負！
シンプルに耐久勝負だ！

engChrName: Didn't you hear a word I said? This is a sacred place. It's not somewhere you can just screw around and—
engSearchText:
Didn't you hear a word I said? This is a sacred place.
It's not somewhere you can just screw around and—
jpnChrName: お前な……話聞いてたのかよ？ ここは神聖な──
jpnSearchText:
お前な……話聞いてたのかよ？
ここは神聖な──

engChrName: Actually, I quite like that idea.
engSearchText: Actually, I quite like that idea.
jpnChrName: いや──むしろいい。
jpnSearchText: いや──むしろいい。

engChrName: Nothing like a friendly bout to bring two souls together in spiritual harmony!
engSearchText:
Nothing like a friendly bout to bring two souls
together in spiritual harmony!
jpnChrName: 他者との勝負を通じてこそ交わせる 魂同士の対話もある……違うかい？
jpnSearchText:
他者との勝負を通じてこそ交わせる
魂同士の対話もある……違うかい？

engChrName: I dunno about spiritual whatever, but at least I've got a taker. What about you? Too scared to take me?
engSearchText:
I dunno about spiritual whatever, but at least I've got
a taker. What about you? Too scared to take me?
jpnChrName: ハッ、まったく共感はできねーが なんだオッサン、怖気づいたのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、まったく共感はできねーが
なんだオッサン、怖気づいたのかよ？

engChrName: Not that I blame you when it's clear as day which of us has more stamina.
engSearchText:
Not that I blame you when it's clear as day which of
us has more stamina.
jpnChrName: ま、オッサンの体力じゃあ 負けんのは目に見えてるだろうしなぁ？
jpnSearchText:
ま、オッサンの体力じゃあ
負けんのは目に見えてるだろうしなぁ？

engChrName: Don't get so full of yourself, kid! All right, you want to play, I'll play.
engSearchText:
Don't get so full of yourself, kid! All right, you want
to play, I'll play.
jpnChrName: あからさまに煽ってんじゃねえ！ ……いいだろう、乗ってやる！
jpnSearchText:
あからさまに煽ってんじゃねえ！
……いいだろう、乗ってやる！

engChrName: Excellent! Finally, an opportunity to settle our unfinished business from back at the Sandsea.
engSearchText:
Excellent! Finally, an opportunity to settle our
unfinished business from back at the Sandsea.
jpnChrName: フフ、陽炎砂丘でつかなかった決着、 今こそつけるとしようか！
jpnSearchText:
フフ、陽炎砂丘でつかなかった決着、
今こそつけるとしようか！

engChrName: As ever, I can hear our mighty men getting rowdy on the other side.
engSearchText:
As ever, I can hear our mighty men getting rowdy on
the other side.
jpnChrName: 殿方たちの方は 随分と賑やかですね。
jpnSearchText:
殿方たちの方は
随分と賑やかですね。

engChrName: Oh, for the love of... 'Men,' my foot. They might as well be a bunch of kids.
engSearchText:
Oh, for the love of... 'Men,' my foot. They might
as well be a bunch of kids.
jpnChrName: ったく、子供ねぇ……
jpnSearchText: ったく、子供ねぇ……

engChrName: *sigh* I'm going to have to report this to His Highness' sister later.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I'm going to have to report this to His
Highness' sister later.
jpnChrName: ふう……やはり妹君に 報告するしかありませんね。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……やはり妹君に
報告するしかありませんね。

engChrName: Probably for the best. She at least sounds like she's got her act together. Glad someone out there can make a dent in him.
engSearchText:
Probably for the best. She at least sounds like she's
got her act together. Glad someone out there can
make a dent in him.
jpnChrName: ああ、随分とできた妹さんっていう…… 殿下には効きそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、随分とできた妹さんっていう……
殿下には効きそうですね。

engChrName: Speaking of someone making a dent, Judith...
engSearchText: Speaking of someone making a dent, Judith...
jpnChrName: ふふ、それにしても先輩。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、それにしても先輩。

engChrName: I noticed you've warmed up to Van and his assistants. How did that happen?
engSearchText:
I noticed you've warmed up to Van and his assistants.
How did that happen?
jpnChrName: いつの間にかヴァンさんたちと 随分親しくなっていたんですね？
jpnSearchText:
いつの間にかヴァンさんたちと
随分親しくなっていたんですね？

engChrName: A-Are you out of your mind?! Exactly how do I look like I've 'warmed up' to them?!
engSearchText:
A-Are you out of your mind?! Exactly how do I look
like I've 'warmed up' to them?!
jpnChrName: ど、どこがッ！？ 別に親しくなんかないわよ！
jpnSearchText:
ど、どこがッ！？
別に親しくなんかないわよ！

engChrName: Heehee! It's just a feeling I have.
engSearchText: Heehee! It's just a feeling I have.
jpnChrName: ふふ。
jpnSearchText: ふふ。

engChrName: Oh, shut up! Don't give me that cheeky smile-and-a-giggle!
engSearchText:
Oh, shut up! Don't give me that
cheeky smile-and-a-giggle!
jpnChrName: 何よその生温かい笑顔は！？
jpnSearchText: 何よその生温かい笑顔は！？

engChrName: So that's what happened to Aida... Thanks for filling me in. I really appreciate it.
engSearchText:
So that's what happened to Aida... Thanks for filling
me in. I really appreciate it.
jpnChrName: そう、アイーダがそんな風に…… 教えてくれてありがとう。
jpnSearchText:
そう、アイーダがそんな風に……
教えてくれてありがとう。

engChrName: Your boss told me a little about it before, but I'm still glad I got to hear it from your side as well.
engSearchText:
Your boss told me a little about it before, but I'm still
glad I got to hear it from your side as well.
jpnChrName: 少し前に裏解決屋さんからも聞いてたけど、 貴女からも聞けてよかった。
jpnSearchText:
少し前に裏解決屋さんからも聞いてたけど、
貴女からも聞けてよかった。

engChrName: Even after reading the guild report and talking to Alvis about it, something about it just didn't add up.
engSearchText:
Even after reading the guild report and talking to
Alvis about it, something about it just didn't add up.
jpnChrName: ギルドの報告書は読んだし、アルヴィスからも 話を聞いたけど、いまいちピンと来なくて……
jpnSearchText:
ギルドの報告書は読んだし、アルヴィスからも
話を聞いたけど、いまいちピンと来なくて……

engChrName: Sounds like she was an amazing woman right to the very end.
engSearchText:
Sounds like she was an amazing woman right to the
very end.
jpnChrName: アイーダ、最後まで カッコよかったんだね……
jpnSearchText:
アイーダ、最後まで
カッコよかったんだね……

engChrName: Yeah, she was. I really admired her...
engSearchText: Yeah, she was. I really admired her...
jpnChrName: はい、とても……立派でした。
jpnSearchText: はい、とても……立派でした。

engChrName: I was really hoping to get together with her, Xeno, and Leo one of these days.
engSearchText:
I was really hoping to get together with her, Xeno,
and Leo one of these days.
jpnChrName: いつかゼノたちも一緒に また集まろうと思ったけど……
jpnSearchText:
いつかゼノたちも一緒に
また集まろうと思ったけど……

engChrName: It's not enough to lose the boss. She had to up and go, too, I guess.
engSearchText:
It's not enough to lose the boss. She had to up and
go, too, I guess.
jpnChrName: 団長に続けて、アイーダも………
jpnSearchText: 団長に続けて、アイーダも………

engChrName: I'm sorry, Fie.
engSearchText: I'm sorry, Fie.
jpnChrName: フィーさん……
jpnSearchText: フィーさん……

engChrName: No, it's okay. I'm sorry for getting all gloomy there. Besides, it wasn't all loss for either of us.
engSearchText:
No, it's okay. I'm sorry for getting all gloomy there.
Besides, it wasn't all loss for either of us.
jpnChrName: ごめん、しんみりしちゃって。 でも、失うばかりじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
ごめん、しんみりしちゃって。
でも、失うばかりじゃない。

engChrName: Huh? What do you mean?
engSearchText: Huh? What do you mean?
jpnChrName: え？
jpnSearchText: え？

engChrName: Well, she was something of an older sister to both of us, yeah?
engSearchText:
Well, she was something of an older sister to both of
us, yeah?
jpnChrName: 彼女が遺してくれた繋がりで こうしてフェリと縁ができたんだから。
jpnSearchText:
彼女が遺してくれた繋がりで
こうしてフェリと縁ができたんだから。

engChrName: That gives us a personal connection, and now we're coming together because of it.
engSearchText:
That gives us a personal connection, and now we're
coming together because of it.
jpnChrName: 同じくアイーダの妹分として……
jpnSearchText: 同じくアイーダの妹分として……

engChrName: I don't know about you, but I feel like what we have could turn into something special.
engSearchText:
I don't know about you, but I feel like what we have
could turn into something special.
jpnChrName: この出会いはきっと素敵なものに なるって、そんな予感がする。
jpnSearchText:
この出会いはきっと素敵なものに
なるって、そんな予感がする。

engChrName: Yeah, you're right... Same here!
engSearchText: Yeah, you're right... Same here!
jpnChrName: それは……わたしも同じです！
jpnSearchText: それは……わたしも同じです！

engChrName: Aida talked about you, too, you know. I think she also wanted to see you again.
engSearchText:
Aida talked about you, too, you know. I think she
also wanted to see you again.
jpnChrName: アイーダさんから話を聞いて、ずっと フィーさんに会いたいと思っていました。
jpnSearchText:
アイーダさんから話を聞いて、ずっと
フィーさんに会いたいと思っていました。

engChrName: I can't imagine this is how she ever thought we would meet up.
engSearchText:
I can't imagine this is how she ever thought we would
meet up.
jpnChrName: 思い描いていたのと違う形になりましたが……
jpnSearchText: 思い描いていたのと違う形になりましたが……

engChrName: But I'm so glad we got to talk! This has been great!
engSearchText: But I'm so glad we got to talk! This has been great!
jpnChrName: こうしてお話が出来て、 とても嬉しいです……！
jpnSearchText:
こうしてお話が出来て、
とても嬉しいです……！

engChrName: I'm glad you think so, too.
engSearchText: I'm glad you think so, too.
jpnChrName: それなら良かった。
jpnSearchText: それなら良かった。

engChrName: I...know I'm no replacement for Aida. And I don't wanna be, either.
engSearchText:
I...know I'm no replacement for Aida. And I don't
wanna be, either.
jpnChrName: アイーダの代わりに…… というわけじゃないけど。
jpnSearchText:
アイーダの代わりに……
というわけじゃないけど。

engChrName: But I am a former jaeger. From what I've seen, I get the feeling our combat styles line up pretty well.
engSearchText:
But I am a former jaeger. From what I've seen, I get
the feeling our combat styles line up pretty well.
jpnChrName: わたしも一応元猟兵だし、見た感じ フェリとは戦い方が通じるところもある。
jpnSearchText:
わたしも一応元猟兵だし、見た感じ
フェリとは戦い方が通じるところもある。

engChrName: So if you ever have any questions on stuff, just ask. I'll be more than happy to talk.
engSearchText:
So if you ever have any questions on stuff, just ask.
I'll be more than happy to talk.
jpnChrName: 参考になることならなんでも聞いていいよ。 力になるから。
jpnSearchText:
参考になることならなんでも聞いていいよ。
力になるから。

engChrName: Really? That'd be awesome! Thanks, Fie!
engSearchText: Really? That'd be awesome! Thanks, Fie!
jpnChrName: フィーさん……… ありがとうございます！
jpnSearchText:
フィーさん………
ありがとうございます！

engChrName: In that case, can I ask you something right now?
engSearchText: In that case, can I ask you something right now?
jpnChrName: では早速、一つお聞きしたいことが……！
jpnSearchText: では早速、一つお聞きしたいことが……！

engChrName: Sure. What is it?
engSearchText: Sure. What is it?
jpnChrName: なに？
jpnSearchText: なに？

engChrName: You see, there's something that's been bothering me ever since we came in here.
engSearchText:
You see, there's something that's been bothering me
ever since we came in here.
jpnChrName: ハマムに入ってからずっと 気になっていました……
jpnSearchText:
ハマムに入ってからずっと
気になっていました……

engChrName: All the other girls are—what's something Aaron would say? 'Packing heat,' or something like that?
engSearchText:
All the other girls are—what's something Aaron
would say? 'Packing heat,' or something like that?
jpnChrName: わたし以外の皆さんは 全員すたいるがいいということを！
jpnSearchText:
わたし以外の皆さんは
全員すたいるがいいということを！

engChrName: How can I be like all of them?
engSearchText: How can I be like all of them?
jpnChrName: いつかわたしも、皆さんの ようになれますか？
jpnSearchText:
いつかわたしも、皆さんの
ようになれますか？

engChrName: Okay, that's about the last thing I was expecting you to ask...
engSearchText:
Okay, that's about the last thing I was expecting you
to ask...
jpnChrName: いきなり意外な方向からの質問だね……
jpnSearchText: いきなり意外な方向からの質問だね……

engChrName: I'm sorry. Do you think there's no hope for me?
engSearchText: I'm sorry. Do you think there's no hope for me?
jpnChrName: やはり難しいでしょうか……
jpnSearchText: やはり難しいでしょうか……

engChrName: Well, it's true that Nina and Judith are really beautiful, and the other girls are easy on the eyes, too.
engSearchText:
Well, it's true that Nina and Judith are really
beautiful, and the other girls are easy on the eyes, too.
jpnChrName: 確かに女優二人は言うまでもなく、 他もなかなか……
jpnSearchText:
確かに女優二人は言うまでもなく、
他もなかなか……

engChrName: Still, I don't think you've got anything to worry about. You've still got a lot of time to grow. You'll get there.
engSearchText:
Still, I don't think you've got anything to worry about.
You've still got a lot of time to grow. You'll get there.
jpnChrName: でも大丈夫、フェリの年齢なら むしろ成長はこれからじゃないかな。
jpnSearchText:
でも大丈夫、フェリの年齢なら
むしろ成長はこれからじゃないかな。

engChrName: You really think so?
engSearchText: You really think so?
jpnChrName: 本当ですか？
jpnSearchText: 本当ですか？

engChrName: Think so? I know so. I used to be pretty similar to you until I had a growth spurt right around the time I turned eighteen.
engSearchText:
Think so? I know so. I used to be pretty similar to you
until I had a growth spurt right around the time I
turned eighteen.
jpnChrName: わたしも成人前後で 一気に成長したタイプだから。
jpnSearchText:
わたしも成人前後で
一気に成長したタイプだから。

engChrName: Hey, you two! Mind if I join you?
engSearchText: Hey, you two! Mind if I join you?
jpnChrName: あ、フェリちゃんにフィーさん。 私も失礼しますね。
jpnSearchText:
あ、フェリちゃんにフィーさん。
私も失礼しますね。

engChrName: Aaaaaah...
engSearchText: Aaaaaah...
jpnChrName: はぁぁ………
jpnSearchText: はぁぁ………

engChrName: Oooh, I hope I grow up to be just like Agnès one day!
engSearchText: Oooh, I hope I grow up to be just like Agnès one day!
jpnChrName: わたしもいつか…… アニエスさんのように……！
jpnSearchText:
わたしもいつか……
アニエスさんのように……！

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...

engChrName: Quick question, Agnès: you go to Aramis, yeah?
engSearchText: Quick question, Agnès: you go to Aramis, yeah?
jpnChrName: ……アニエスって確か アラミスの学生だっけ？
jpnSearchText:
……アニエスって確か
アラミスの学生だっけ？

engChrName: Yes, I'm a first year there.
engSearchText: Yes, I'm a first year there.
jpnChrName: はい、アラミス高等学校の一年生です。
jpnSearchText: はい、アラミス高等学校の一年生です。

engChrName: Dang, a first year and you're already...like that. You remind me of a certain class president I knew.
engSearchText:
Dang, a first year and you're already...like that.
You remind me of a certain class president I knew.
jpnChrName: 一年生でこれとは…… うちの委員長を思い出す……
jpnSearchText:
一年生でこれとは……
うちの委員長を思い出す……

engChrName: A...class president? Why?
engSearchText: A...class president? Why?
jpnChrName: 委員長？
jpnSearchText: 委員長？

engChrName: It's nothing, really.
engSearchText: It's nothing, really.
jpnChrName: なんでもない。
jpnSearchText: なんでもない。

engChrName: Anyway, Feri, getting back to our discussion...
engSearchText: Anyway, Feri, getting back to our discussion...
jpnChrName: それよりフェリ、 さっきの続きだけど……
jpnSearchText:
それよりフェリ、
さっきの続きだけど……

engChrName: Truth be told, it's also important to know your limits and recognize you won't have everything others do. It's part of being an adult.
engSearchText:
Truth be told, it's also important to know your limits
and recognize you won't have everything others do.
It's part of being an adult.
jpnChrName: 時には諦めを覚えるのも重要。
jpnSearchText: 時には諦めを覚えるのも重要。

engChrName: That's not what you said before!
engSearchText: That's not what you said before!
jpnChrName: さっきと話が違います！？？
jpnSearchText: <S5>さっきと話が違います！？？

engChrName: Uh, what are you two talking about?
engSearchText: Uh, what are you two talking about?
jpnChrName: えっと……なんの話ですか？
jpnSearchText: えっと……なんの話ですか？

engChrName: Forget it. It's got nothing to do with you.
engSearchText: Forget it. It's got nothing to do with you.
jpnChrName: アニエスさんとは関係のない話です……
jpnSearchText: アニエスさんとは関係のない話です……

engChrName: I can't even begin to imagine what it's like having the things that you do.
engSearchText:
I can't even begin to imagine what it's like having the
things that you do.
jpnChrName: 持つものには理解できない。
jpnSearchText: 持つものには理解できない。

engChrName: H-Huh? Why do I suddenly feel like the odd one out?
engSearchText:
H-Huh? Why do I suddenly feel like the odd
one out?
jpnChrName: なんでしょう、この微妙な疎外感……
jpnSearchText: なんでしょう、この微妙な疎外感……

engChrName: Urgh! How could I lose to a punkass like him?
engSearchText: Urgh! How could I lose to a punkass like him?
jpnChrName: クッ、このガキに負けるとは……！
jpnSearchText: クッ、このガキに負けるとは……！

engChrName: Guess your age is catching up to you, huh, gramps?
engSearchText: Guess your age is catching up to you, huh, gramps?
jpnChrName: やっぱ歳だなオッサン？
jpnSearchText: やっぱ歳だなオッサン？

engChrName: I wish I could say you were wrong, but...but...!
engSearchText: I wish I could say you were wrong, but...but...!
jpnChrName: 今だけは反論できねぇ……！
jpnSearchText: 今だけは反論できねぇ……！

engChrName: Well, I, for one, had a fine time, even if I was the first one to lose.
engSearchText:
Well, I, for one, had a fine time, even if I was the first
one to lose.
jpnChrName: 一番最初にリタイアしたとは言え、 なかなか楽しませてくれたよ。
jpnSearchText:
一番最初にリタイアしたとは言え、
なかなか楽しませてくれたよ。

engChrName: Thank you for joining me, both of you. We'll have to do this again sometime, this communing as men!
engSearchText:
Thank you for joining me, both of you. We'll have to
do this again sometime, this communing as men!
jpnChrName: 感謝する、二人とも。 機会があったらまた裸で語り合おうじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
感謝する、二人とも。
機会があったらまた裸で語り合おうじゃないか。

engChrName: Buddy, if you wanna commune as men, I know some good monasteries of the night, if you catch my drift.
engSearchText:
Buddy, if you wanna commune as men, I know some
good monasteries of the night, if you catch my drift.
jpnChrName: どうせなら次は“夜の店”にでも行こうぜ？
jpnSearchText: どうせなら次は“夜の店”にでも行こうぜ？

engChrName: That sounds like a grand idea! Count me in!
engSearchText: That sounds like a grand idea! Count me in!
jpnChrName: それも一興だねぇ！
jpnSearchText: それも一興だねぇ！

engChrName: Your Highness, I urge you to consider your position before making such commitments.
engSearchText:
Your Highness, I urge you to consider your position
before making such commitments.
jpnChrName: 殿下……？ ご自分の立場をお考えください。
jpnSearchText:
殿下……？
ご自分の立場をお考えください。

engChrName: Ahem. Pardon me. I was merely kidding, of course. Yes.
engSearchText:
Ahem. Pardon me. I was merely kidding, of course.
Yes.
jpnChrName: コホン、もちろん冗談だとも。
jpnSearchText: コホン、もちろん冗談だとも。

engChrName: Heh. No problem. We'll have to be sneaky to make sure you don't get caught by your scary-ass bodyguard.
engSearchText:
Heh. No problem. We'll have to be sneaky to make
sure you don't get caught by your
scary-ass bodyguard.
jpnChrName: ククッ、あの怖い姉さんに 見つからないようこっそり行かねえとな。
jpnSearchText:
ククッ、あの怖い姉さんに
見つからないようこっそり行かねえとな。

engChrName: Don't give the guy any ideas! I really wouldn't push your luck when it comes to that woman.
engSearchText:
Don't give the guy any ideas! I really wouldn't push
your luck when it comes to that woman.
jpnChrName: っておい、本当にやりかねねえから煽るな！
jpnSearchText: っておい、本当にやりかねねえから煽るな！

engChrName: Heehee. For as silly as those guys can be, at least they seem to be having fun.
engSearchText:
Heehee. For as silly as those guys can be, at least they
seem to be having fun.
jpnChrName: ふふ、皆さんは本当に不思議で 楽しそうな方たちですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、皆さんは本当に不思議で
楽しそうな方たちですね。

engChrName: True, but I don't know if we should be especially happy about it in this case...
engSearchText:
True, but I don't know if we should be especially
happy about it in this case...
jpnChrName: 素直に喜んでいいのかどうか 悩ましいところです……
jpnSearchText:
素直に喜んでいいのかどうか
悩ましいところです……

engChrName: Anyway, I think we're going to chill here a little longer before we head out.
engSearchText:
Anyway, I think we're going to chill here a little
longer before we head out.
jpnChrName: とにかくあたしたちはもう少し ここで寛いでいくわ。
jpnSearchText:
とにかくあたしたちはもう少し
ここで寛いでいくわ。

engChrName: We're counting on you guys to get us through the parade and everything else. Don't let us down.
engSearchText:
We're counting on you guys to get us through the
parade and everything else. Don't let us down.
jpnChrName: パレードの時も含めて、 今日も頼んだわよ。
jpnSearchText:
パレードの時も含めて、
今日も頼んだわよ。

engChrName: Not to worry. With us on security, everything's under control. You two ladies just focus on puttin' on a good show.
engSearchText:
Not to worry. With us on security, everything's
under control. You two ladies just focus on puttin' on
a good show.
jpnChrName: 了解だ。 一応警備にも参加するつもりだしな。
jpnSearchText:
了解だ。
一応警備にも参加するつもりだしな。

engChrName: An archaeologist wants our help? That's interesting.
engSearchText: An archaeologist wants our help? That's interesting.
jpnChrName: 考古学者の方からの依頼ですか……
jpnSearchText: 考古学者の方からの依頼ですか……

engChrName: I got a hunch he's not the only one tryin' to reach out. Let's check the bulletin board in the Entertainment District, too.
engSearchText:
I got a hunch he's not the only one tryin' to reach out.
Let's check the bulletin board in the Entertainment
District, too.
jpnChrName: まだ匂いが残ってんな。 歓楽街の掲示板も見に行くぞ。
jpnSearchText:
まだ匂いが残ってんな。
歓楽街の掲示板も見に行くぞ。

engChrName: That should be every bulletin board, right?
engSearchText: That should be every bulletin board, right?
jpnChrName: これで一通り掲示板を回れましたね。
jpnSearchText: これで一通り掲示板を回れましたね。

engChrName: Yep. This is the perfect load for us to have right now.
engSearchText: Yep. This is the perfect load for us to have right now.
jpnChrName: ノルマ的には十分っちゃ十分だが。
jpnSearchText: ノルマ的には十分っちゃ十分だが。

engChrName: We should definitely do a little work. It'll be a good opportunity to hunt for more intel.
engSearchText:
We should definitely do a little work. It'll be a good
opportunity to hunt for more intel.
jpnChrName: 情報収取の意味でも、 こっちも対処しておきたい所だな。
jpnSearchText:
情報収取の意味でも、
こっちも対処しておきたい所だな。

engChrName: Let's take care of at least one of these requests and then go from there.
engSearchText:
Let's take care of at least one of these requests and
then go from there.
jpnChrName: とりあえず、最低でも１件は片付けるぞ。
jpnSearchText: とりあえず、最低でも１件は片付けるぞ。

engChrName: Hey there. We're with Arkride Solutions. You the manager lookin' for some help?
engSearchText:
Hey there. We're with Arkride Solutions. You the
manager lookin' for some help?
jpnChrName: 《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだが。 アンタが依頼主の元締めだな？
jpnSearchText:
《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだが。
アンタが依頼主の元締めだな？

engChrName: I am! You folks sure turned up quick.
engSearchText: I am! You folks sure turned up quick.
jpnChrName: おお！　早速来てくれたのか！
jpnSearchText: おお！　早速来てくれたのか！

engChrName: My name is Fazil. I oversee the bazaar here in the Cultural District.
engSearchText:
My name is Fazil. I oversee the bazaar here in the
Cultural District.
jpnChrName: その通り、私が伝統地区のバザールを 仕切っているファジールという者だ。
jpnSearchText:
その通り、私が伝統地区のバザールを
仕切っているファジールという者だ。

engChrName: Not to be rude, but do you mind if I cut to the chase and explain what I need?
engSearchText:
Not to be rude, but do you mind if I cut to the chase
and explain what I need?
jpnChrName: 早速だが依頼内容について 説明させてもらってもいいだろうか？
jpnSearchText:
早速だが依頼内容について
説明させてもらってもいいだろうか？

engChrName: By all means, take it away.
engSearchText: By all means, take it away.
jpnChrName: ああ、宜しく頼む。
jpnSearchText: ああ、宜しく頼む。

engChrName: Thank you. As I wrote in my post, we've been having problems with a young girl who routinely steals from the stalls here.
engSearchText:
Thank you. As I wrote in my post, we've been having
problems with a young girl who routinely steals from
the stalls here.
jpnChrName: 依頼文に書いたように、 問題なのはスリの常習犯の少女の事だ。
jpnSearchText:
依頼文に書いたように、
問題なのはスリの常習犯の少女の事だ。

engChrName: I've been able to look the other way until now, but unfortunately, it's starting to get out of hand.
engSearchText:
I've been able to look the other way until now, but
unfortunately, it's starting to get out of hand.
jpnChrName: これまでは目をつむって来たが、 それも難しくなって来てなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
これまでは目をつむって来たが、
それも難しくなって来てなぁ……

engChrName: Some say I should just turn her in to the police or guild, but I'd rather not do anything that drastic. I mean...I've seen her. She's a kid.
engSearchText:
Some say I should just turn her in to the police or
guild, but I'd rather not do anything that drastic.
I mean...I've seen her. She's a kid.
jpnChrName: 警察や遊撃士に突き出せと言う者もいるが、 私は出来るだけ穏便に済ませてやりたいんだ。
jpnSearchText:
警察や遊撃士に突き出せと言う者もいるが、
私は出来るだけ穏便に済ませてやりたいんだ。

engChrName: I was hoping you folks could wrangle her up for me so I can sit down and talk to her—try and work something out.
engSearchText:
I was hoping you folks could wrangle her up for me so
I can sit down and talk to her—try and work
something out.
jpnChrName: だから君たちにあの子を捕まえてもらい、 私と対話する機会を作ってほしい。
jpnSearchText:
だから君たちにあの子を捕まえてもらい、
私と対話する機会を作ってほしい。

engChrName: That's all you want us to do?
engSearchText: That's all you want us to do?
jpnChrName: 対話ときたか……
jpnSearchText: 対話ときたか……

engChrName: If that's the case, you really could just talk to the guild. I'm sure a bracer would be happy to help you.
engSearchText:
If that's the case, you really could just talk to
the guild. I'm sure a bracer would be happy to
help you.
jpnChrName: そういう案件なら、遊撃士に話せば 引き受けてもらえそうなモンだが。
jpnSearchText:
そういう案件なら、遊撃士に話せば
引き受けてもらえそうなモンだが。

engChrName: I can see why you would think that, but I'm just interested in helping her. I don't want her to get in trouble.
engSearchText:
I can see why you would think that, but I'm just
interested in helping her. I don't want her to get
in trouble.
jpnChrName: 君が言いたい事は分かる。 だが……私は純粋に彼女を助けてあげたいんだ。
jpnSearchText:
君が言いたい事は分かる。
だが……私は純粋に彼女を助けてあげたいんだ。

engChrName: The bracers, being who they are, would likely feel compelled to come down on her if they knew how much she's stolen.
engSearchText:
The bracers, being who they are, would likely feel
compelled to come down on her if they knew how
much she's stolen.
jpnChrName: スリの常習犯ともなれば、 遊撃士に相談した場合そうもいかないだろう。
jpnSearchText:
スリの常習犯ともなれば、
遊撃士に相談した場合そうもいかないだろう。

engChrName: That's why I thought you and your team might be my best option. You don't need to deal in absolutes the way everyone else does.
engSearchText:
That's why I thought you and your team might be my
best option. You don't need to deal in absolutes the
way everyone else does.
jpnChrName: それならば“裏”と名のつく君たちに 相談した方が確実だと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
それならば“裏”と名のつく君たちに
相談した方が確実だと思ってな。

engChrName: For a guy running a business org, you sure are being lenient with such a big-time shoplifter.
engSearchText:
For a guy running a business org, you sure are being
lenient with such a big-time shoplifter.
jpnChrName: ハッ、仮にも“元締め”だってのに 随分とスリのガキの味方をすんだな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、仮にも“元締め”だってのに
随分とスリのガキの味方をすんだな。

engChrName: What gives? Why do you want to give this girl a pass?
engSearchText: What gives? Why do you want to give this girl a pass?
jpnChrName: そこまでしてそいつを 見逃してやりてぇ理由は何だ？
jpnSearchText:
そこまでしてそいつを
見逃してやりてぇ理由は何だ？

engChrName: It's hard to admit these days...but it's a fair question.
engSearchText: It's hard to admit these days...but it's a fair question.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……はは、恥ずかしい話なんだがね。
jpnSearchText: ふぅ……はは、恥ずかしい話なんだがね。

engChrName: You see, when I was her age, I was also destitute and made ends meet by stealing whatever I could.
engSearchText:
You see, when I was her age, I was also destitute and
made ends meet by stealing whatever I could.
jpnChrName: 実は、私が若い頃は金が無くてね。 盗みで食扶ちを稼いでいたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
実は、私が若い頃は金が無くてね。
盗みで食扶ちを稼いでいたんだ。

engChrName: I was lucky enough to eventually find a job that let me earn an honest living. I shudder to think what would've become of me if I hadn't.
engSearchText:
I was lucky enough to eventually find a job that let me
earn an honest living. I shudder to think what
would've become of me if I hadn't.
jpnChrName: 幸運にも仕事に就く事ができたが…… そうでなければ今頃どうしていた事か。
jpnSearchText:
幸運にも仕事に就く事ができたが……
そうでなければ今頃どうしていた事か。

engChrName: I see a lot of myself in that girl...and want to give her a second chance.
engSearchText:
I see a lot of myself in that girl...and want to give her
a second chance.
jpnChrName: だから、あの子も似た境遇なら チャンスをあげたいと思うんだ。
jpnSearchText:
だから、あの子も似た境遇なら
チャンスをあげたいと思うんだ。

engChrName: Sure, I get you. Still awful generous of you.
engSearchText: Sure, I get you. Still awful generous of you.
jpnChrName: チャンスねぇ……
jpnSearchText: チャンスねぇ……

engChrName: Okay, I think we have a good grasp of the situation. I can understand why you felt it was best to come to us.
engSearchText:
Okay, I think we have a good grasp of the situation.
I can understand why you felt it was best to come
to us.
jpnChrName: 依頼については了解した。 ウチに依頼するだけの筋が通ってると思うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
依頼については了解した。
ウチに依頼するだけの筋が通ってると思うぜ。

engChrName: Does that mean we're going to take this job?
engSearchText: Does that mean we're going to take this job?
jpnChrName: それでは依頼を引き受けるんですね。
jpnSearchText: それでは依頼を引き受けるんですね。

engChrName: You bet we are. (Only question is whether to start right now or save it for later.)
engSearchText:
You bet we are.
(Only question is whether to start right now
or save it for later.)
jpnChrName: ああ。 （今すぐ引き受けちまうか？）
jpnSearchText:
ああ。
（今すぐ引き受けちまうか？）

engChrName: I still need your help dealing with the shoplifter who's been stealing things from sellers in my bazaar.
engSearchText:
I still need your help dealing with the shoplifter who's
been stealing things from sellers in my bazaar.
jpnChrName: 君たちに頼みたいのは バザールのスリの常習犯の少女の事だ。
jpnSearchText:
君たちに頼みたいのは
バザールのスリの常習犯の少女の事だ。

engChrName: Would you be able to bring her over to me so I can sit down and try to work something out with her?
engSearchText:
Would you be able to bring her over to me so I can sit
down and try to work something out with her?
jpnChrName: あの子を捕まえてもらい、 私と対話する機会を作ってくれないか？
jpnSearchText:
あの子を捕まえてもらい、
私と対話する機会を作ってくれないか？

engChrName: (He's already explained why he can't ask anyone else to do this job. Should we go ahead and get started?)
engSearchText:
(He's already explained why he can't ask anyone else
to do this job. Should we go ahead and get started?)
jpnChrName: （ウチの仕事としても筋が通ってるが、   今すぐ引き受けちまうか？）
jpnSearchText:
（ウチの仕事としても筋が通ってるが、
今すぐ引き受けちまうか？）

engChrName: Hate to do this, but can you hold off on gettin' started until just a little later?
engSearchText:
Hate to do this, but can you hold off on gettin'
started until just a little later?
jpnChrName: 悪いが、依頼を始めるタイミングは もう少し待ってもらえるか？
jpnSearchText:
悪いが、依頼を始めるタイミングは
もう少し待ってもらえるか？

engChrName: That's okay. I know you might have other things to do first. I'll be here whenever you're ready.
engSearchText:
That's okay. I know you might have other things to
do first. I'll be here whenever you're ready.
jpnChrName: おお、何か用事があるなら仕方ない。 待っているからいつでも呼んでくれ。
jpnSearchText:
おお、何か用事があるなら仕方ない。
待っているからいつでも呼んでくれ。

engChrName: We're good to go. Let's hammer out a plan of attack.
engSearchText: We're good to go. Let's hammer out a plan of attack.
jpnChrName: ああ、それじゃあ早速 方針を立ててみるとするか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、それじゃあ早速
方針を立ててみるとするか。

engChrName: Once we've found her, we'll get in touch with you. Sound good?
engSearchText:
Once we've found her, we'll get in touch with you.
Sound good?
jpnChrName: 結果が出次第、改めて連絡させてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText: 結果が出次第、改めて連絡させてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Very much so! Thank you for agreeing to help.
engSearchText: Very much so! Thank you for agreeing to help.
jpnChrName: ああ、どうかよろしく頼む……！
jpnSearchText: ああ、どうかよろしく頼む……！

engChrName: I'm going to get back to work now. But if you folks need anything, let me know. I'll drop everything to help.
engSearchText:
I'm going to get back to work now. But if you folks
need anything, let me know. I'll drop everything
to help.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ私は仕事に戻らせてもらうよ。 連絡を貰ったら駆け付けるとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ私は仕事に戻らせてもらうよ。
連絡を貰ったら駆け付けるとしよう。

engChrName: Now, with that settled, first thing we need to do is gather some more information about our little thief.
engSearchText:
Now, with that settled, first thing we need to do is
gather some more information about our little thief.
jpnChrName: さてと……まずは情報収集だな。
jpnSearchText: さてと……まずは情報収集だな。

engChrName: We should speak to some of the merchants and find out what their experience with her has been like.
engSearchText:
We should speak to some of the merchants and find
out what their experience with her has been like.
jpnChrName: そうですね、まずはバザールの方々に 話を伺わないと。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね、まずはバザールの方々に
話を伺わないと。

engChrName: Definitely. Might not be the worst idea to check in at the guild and do a little askin' around about her, either.
engSearchText:
Definitely. Might not be the worst idea to check in at
the guild and do a little askin' around about
her, either.
jpnChrName: ああ、それとギルドの方にも 軽く聞いておくべきかもな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、それとギルドの方にも
軽く聞いておくべきかもな。

engChrName: From the sound of things, it wouldn't surprise me if they have at least some idea of what's going on.
engSearchText:
From the sound of things, it wouldn't surprise me if
they have at least some idea of what's going on.
jpnChrName: 元締めもああ言ってたし、 ある程度の事情は遊撃士も把握してそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
元締めもああ言ってたし、
ある程度の事情は遊撃士も把握してそうだ。

engChrName: That's true. If she's been stealing lots, they might know some stuff.
engSearchText:
That's true. If she's been stealing lots, they might
know some stuff.
jpnChrName: 確かに…… 何か情報を握ってるかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
確かに……
何か情報を握ってるかもしれません。

engChrName: In that case, might as well hit up the temple while we're at it.
engSearchText:
In that case, might as well hit up the temple while
we're at it.
jpnChrName: それを言ったら寺院はどうなんだ？
jpnSearchText: それを言ったら寺院はどうなんだ？

engChrName: I don't know what Tharbad's is like, but you'd think they take in orphans.
engSearchText:
I don't know what Tharbad's is like, but you'd think
they take in orphans.
jpnChrName: サルバッドはどうか知らねえが、 寺院で孤児を保護してるはずだろ。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドはどうか知らねえが、
寺院で孤児を保護してるはずだろ。

engChrName: They probably go out on patrols looking for 'em, too. If this thief's an orphan, they might know about her.
engSearchText:
They probably go out on patrols looking for 'em, too.
If this thief's an orphan, they might know about her.
jpnChrName: その為の巡回もしてるだろうし、 例のガキが孤児なら何か知ってるかもな。
jpnSearchText:
その為の巡回もしてるだろうし、
例のガキが孤児なら何か知ってるかもな。

engChrName: Good thinkin'. That's three stops on our tour, then: the bazaar, the guild branch, and the temple.
engSearchText:
Good thinkin'. That's three stops on our tour, then:
the bazaar, the guild branch, and the temple.
jpnChrName: だな、となるとバザールとギルドと 寺院に聞き込みをしてみるか。
jpnSearchText:
だな、となるとバザールとギルドと
寺院に聞き込みをしてみるか。

engChrName: That's a good amount of people to talk to, but no need to rush. Just take your time and do it right. Ready to roll?
engSearchText:
That's a good amount of people to talk to, but no
need to rush. Just take your time and do it right.
Ready to roll?
jpnChrName: 結構な人数になっちまうが ぼちぼちやっていくぞ。
jpnSearchText:
結構な人数になっちまうが
ぼちぼちやっていくぞ。

engChrName: Okay! Let's see what we can find out!
engSearchText: Okay! Let's see what we can find out!
jpnChrName: はい、頑張りましょう……！
jpnSearchText: はい、頑張りましょう……！

engChrName: Quest Bazaar Burglar started!
engSearchText: Quest Bazaar Burglar started!
jpnChrName: クエスト【バザールのスリ少女】を開始した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>バザールのスリ少女<C1>】を開始した！

engChrName: Oh, I know the girl you must be talking about.
engSearchText: Oh, I know the girl you must be talking about.
jpnChrName: ああ……例のあの子の事ですね？
jpnSearchText: ああ……例のあの子の事ですね？

engChrName: She sneaks into my shop all the time.
engSearchText: She sneaks into my shop all the time.
jpnChrName: 私の店に盗みにくるので、 よく知っていますよ。
jpnSearchText:
私の店に盗みにくるので、
よく知っていますよ。

engChrName: How often would you say she tries to steal stuff from you, ma'am?
engSearchText:
How often would you say she tries to steal stuff from
you, ma'am?
jpnChrName: その、少女が盗みに来るのは どれくらいの頻度なんですか？
jpnSearchText:
その、少女が盗みに来るのは
どれくらいの頻度なんですか？

engChrName: And how much, too? That'd be good to know.
engSearchText: And how much, too? That'd be good to know.
jpnChrName: 盗んでいく量も気になるな。
jpnSearchText: 盗んでいく量も気になるな。

engChrName: Let me think... I'd say she comes here about every other day.
engSearchText:
Let me think... I'd say she comes here about every
other day.
jpnChrName: ええと、そうですね…… ２日に１回くらいの頻度かしら。
jpnSearchText:
ええと、そうですね……
２日に１回くらいの頻度かしら。

engChrName: She never takes a lot. She's just a child—she can only carry so much.
engSearchText:
She never takes a lot. She's just a child—she can only
carry so much.
jpnChrName: 一度に盗む量は少ない方だと思います。 子どもだから持てる量も少ないですしね。
jpnSearchText:
一度に盗む量は少ない方だと思います。
子どもだから持てる量も少ないですしね。

engChrName: So you know for a fact that you're dealing with a loner? She's not in any kind of gang or anything like that?
engSearchText:
So you know for a fact that you're dealing with
a loner? She's not in any kind of gang or anything
like that?
jpnChrName: つまり、間違いなくガキの単独犯って訳か。
jpnSearchText: つまり、間違いなくガキの単独犯って訳か。

engChrName: No, I've never seen her working with anybody else. She's always by herself.
engSearchText:
No, I've never seen her working with anybody else.
She's always by herself.
jpnChrName: ええ、他の仲間と共謀して…… というのは見た事がないです。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、他の仲間と共謀して……
というのは見た事がないです。

engChrName: To be honest, I do feel for her. You hate to see someone so young live like that.
engSearchText:
To be honest, I do feel for her. You hate to see
someone so young live like that.
jpnChrName: まだ子どもなのに、いつまで その日暮らしの生活を続けるのか……
jpnSearchText:
まだ子どもなのに、いつまで
その日暮らしの生活を続けるのか……

engChrName: Hopefully either the police or the temple can take her in soon and give her the help she needs.
engSearchText:
Hopefully either the police or the temple can take her
in soon and give her the help she needs.
jpnChrName: 早い内に警察か寺院が 保護してくれればいいんですけど。
jpnSearchText:
早い内に警察か寺院が
保護してくれればいいんですけど。

engChrName: That's what we're trying to make happen, ma'am. Thanks for talking to us. You've been a big help.
engSearchText:
That's what we're trying to make happen, ma'am.
Thanks for talking to us. You've been a big help.
jpnChrName: ありがとな、参考になったぜ。
jpnSearchText: ありがとな、参考になったぜ。

engChrName: Phew, I think that's finally all of the places we wanted to visit.
engSearchText:
Phew, I think that's finally all of the places we wanted
to visit.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……必要な場所への聞き込みは これで全部終わりましたね。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……必要な場所への聞き込みは
これで全部終わりましたね。

engChrName: Yeah, let's go back to the bazaar and go over everything we heard.
engSearchText:
Yeah, let's go back to the bazaar and go over
everything we heard.
jpnChrName: バザールの方に戻って 情報を整理しましょうか！
jpnSearchText:
バザールの方に戻って
情報を整理しましょうか！

engChrName: Oh, yeah. I know the girl you're looking for, all right. She's in here constantly.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. I know the girl you're looking for, all right.
She's in here constantly.
jpnChrName: ああ、あの子ならよく知ってるとも。 ウチによく盗みに来るからな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、あの子ならよく知ってるとも。
ウチによく盗みに来るからな。

engChrName: Last I saw her was two days ago, I think.
engSearchText: Last I saw her was two days ago, I think.
jpnChrName: 確か、最近だと２日前だったかな？
jpnSearchText: 確か、最近だと２日前だったかな？

engChrName: Wow, that's really recent!
engSearchText: Wow, that's really recent!
jpnChrName: ２日前ですか！
jpnSearchText: ２日前ですか！

engChrName: She looked desperate. You can tell she's going through a real rough patch. Her clothes are filthy.
engSearchText:
She looked desperate. You can tell she's going
through a real rough patch. Her clothes are filthy.
jpnChrName: 服も小汚いし、随分必死な様子でな…… 生活に困ってる事が一目瞭然なんだ。
jpnSearchText:
服も小汚いし、随分必死な様子でな……
生活に困ってる事が一目瞭然なんだ。

engChrName: I can't not help a kid who's clearly just trying to... survive, you know?
engSearchText:
I can't not help a kid who's clearly just trying to...
survive, you know?
jpnChrName: だからつい、余計な世話を 焼きたくなっちまってな。
jpnSearchText:
だからつい、余計な世話を
焼きたくなっちまってな。

engChrName: So, the trick is, I make some food for her, and she gets to 'steal' it.
engSearchText:
So, the trick is, I make some food for her, and she
gets to 'steal' it.
jpnChrName: 料理を作っておいて、 あえて盗ませてあげたりしてるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
料理を作っておいて、
あえて盗ませてあげたりしてるぞ。

engChrName: Awfully generous for someone who's been targeted by her. You don't think she should be apprehended or something?
engSearchText:
Awfully generous for someone who's been targeted
by her. You don't think she should be apprehended
or something?
jpnChrName: 随分と気の利いた店じゃねえか。 捕まえてやろうとは思わねぇのか？
jpnSearchText:
随分と気の利いた店じゃねえか。
捕まえてやろうとは思わねぇのか？

engChrName: Don't get me wrong, it'd be better for everyone if she stopped stealing from my shop!
engSearchText:
Don't get me wrong, it'd be better for everyone if she
stopped stealing from my shop!
jpnChrName: 勿論、スリを止めてくれたらそれが一番さ。
jpnSearchText: 勿論、スリを止めてくれたらそれが一番さ。

engChrName: Last thing I need is word getting around that I'm some kind of easy mark and more organized thieves getting ideas.
engSearchText:
Last thing I need is word getting around that I'm
some kind of easy mark and more organized thieves
getting ideas.
jpnChrName: 他のスリに舐められて、 いいカモだと思われかねないしな。
jpnSearchText:
他のスリに舐められて、
いいカモだと思われかねないしな。

engChrName: But I don't have the heart to stand there and watch a little girl starve right in front of me, so I try to do what I can.
engSearchText:
But I don't have the heart to stand there and watch a
little girl starve right in front of me, so I try to do
what I can.
jpnChrName: だけど飢えさせるのも可哀想だし…… 出来る限り助けてやりたいんだ。
jpnSearchText:
だけど飢えさせるのも可哀想だし……
出来る限り助けてやりたいんだ。

engChrName: Take good care of her when you find her, okay? I trust the bazaar manager will come up with something.
engSearchText:
Take good care of her when you find her, okay?
I trust the bazaar manager will come up
with something.
jpnChrName: だからこそ元締めの考えに期待してるんだ。 アンタ達もあの子の事をよろしく頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText:
だからこそ元締めの考えに期待してるんだ。
アンタ達もあの子の事をよろしく頼むぜ。

engChrName: Of course! We're all on the same team. Thank you for talking to us.
engSearchText:
Of course! We're all on the same team. Thank you for
talking to us.
jpnChrName: はい、出来る限りの事をさせて頂きます。
jpnSearchText: はい、出来る限りの事をさせて頂きます。

engChrName: Phew, I think that's finally all of the places we wanted to visit.
engSearchText:
Phew, I think that's finally all of the places we wanted
to visit.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……必要な場所への聞き込みは これで全部終わりましたね。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……必要な場所への聞き込みは
これで全部終わりましたね。

engChrName: Yeah, let's go back to the bazaar and go over everything we heard.
engSearchText:
Yeah, let's go back to the bazaar and go over
everything we heard.
jpnChrName: バザールの方に戻って 情報を整理しましょうか！
jpnSearchText:
バザールの方に戻って
情報を整理しましょうか！

engChrName: Looking for that infamous little thief, huh? I've definitely heard people talk about her.
engSearchText:
Looking for that infamous little thief, huh?
I've definitely heard people talk about her.
jpnChrName: ああ、例のスリの少女か。 ウチには来た事は一度もないよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、例のスリの少女か。
ウチには来た事は一度もないよ。

engChrName: Can't say she's come to pay me a visit, though.
engSearchText: Can't say she's come to pay me a visit, though.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、勿論うわさなら聞いた事がある。
jpnSearchText: とはいえ、勿論うわさなら聞いた事がある。

engChrName: Knowing Fazil, he probably doesn't want to press charges on her, right?
engSearchText:
Knowing Fazil, he probably doesn't want to press
charges on her, right?
jpnChrName: 元締めは出来る事なら その子を罪に問わないであげたいんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
元締めは出来る事なら
その子を罪に問わないであげたいんだろ？

engChrName: Between you, me, and the post, I think that's going too easy on her.
engSearchText:
Between you, me, and the post, I think that's going
too easy on her.
jpnChrName: 正直言って、甘すぎると思うけどなぁ……
jpnSearchText: 正直言って、甘すぎると思うけどなぁ……

engChrName: Honestly, I think so, too.
engSearchText: Honestly, I think so, too.
jpnChrName: それについては同感だな。
jpnSearchText: それについては同感だな。

engChrName: The way I figure, if there are no consequences for what she's done, then she'll grow up to be completely amoral.
engSearchText:
The way I figure, if there are no consequences for
what she's done, then she'll grow up to be
completely amoral.
jpnChrName: ああ、悪い事をしたのにお咎め無しだなんて、 そんなんじゃロクな大人になれないだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、悪い事をしたのにお咎め無しだなんて、
そんなんじゃロクな大人になれないだろ。

engChrName: Not that I'm one to talk. I'm not the best role model, either.
engSearchText:
Not that I'm one to talk. I'm not the best role
model, either.
jpnChrName: まあ俺も、人に言えるほど 立派なもんじゃないけどさ……
jpnSearchText:
まあ俺も、人に言えるほど
立派なもんじゃないけどさ……

engChrName: Well, we still appreciate what you had to share. Thanks, buddy.
engSearchText:
Well, we still appreciate what you had to share.
Thanks, buddy.
jpnChrName: とりあえず、情報提供助かったぜ。
jpnSearchText: とりあえず、情報提供助かったぜ。

engChrName: Phew, I think that's finally all of the places we wanted to visit.
engSearchText:
Phew, I think that's finally all of the places we wanted
to visit.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……必要な場所への聞き込みは これで全部終わりましたね。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……必要な場所への聞き込みは
これで全部終わりましたね。

engChrName: Yeah, let's go back to the bazaar and go over everything we heard.
engSearchText:
Yeah, let's go back to the bazaar and go over
everything we heard.
jpnChrName: バザールの方に戻って 情報を整理しましょうか！
jpnSearchText:
バザールの方に戻って
情報を整理しましょうか！

engChrName: You're asking about that shoplifter?
engSearchText: You're asking about that shoplifter?
jpnChrName: ああ、スリの女の子ねぇ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、スリの女の子ねぇ。

engChrName: Yes, I've heard of her. She's never been to my stall, however, so I don't know much about her.
engSearchText:
Yes, I've heard of her. She's never been to my stall,
however, so I don't know much about her.
jpnChrName: 噂には聞いてるけど、 ウチには来ていなくて分からないのよ。
jpnSearchText:
噂には聞いてるけど、
ウチには来ていなくて分からないのよ。

engChrName: A bracer actually asked me something similar earlier. I wonder what happened to her after that...
engSearchText:
A bracer actually asked me something similar earlier.
I wonder what happened to her after that...
jpnChrName: 前に遊撃士の人も話を聞きに来たけど、 あれから一体どうなったのやら……
jpnSearchText:
前に遊撃士の人も話を聞きに来たけど、
あれから一体どうなったのやら……

engChrName: You said a bracer talked to you? What did they ask?
engSearchText: You said a bracer talked to you? What did they ask?
jpnChrName: 遊撃士の人が聞き込みを？
jpnSearchText: 遊撃士の人が聞き込みを？

engChrName: It was a while back, but I believe they were investigating how much damage she had caused.
engSearchText:
It was a while back, but I believe they were
investigating how much damage she had caused.
jpnChrName: ええ、結構前の話だけど。 スリ被害の調査をしてると言っていたわ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、結構前の話だけど。
スリ被害の調査をしてると言っていたわ。

engChrName: Personally, I have a really hard time seeing such a young girl struggling so badly.
engSearchText:
Personally, I have a really hard time seeing such a
young girl struggling so badly.
jpnChrName: 私としても、子どもが苦労をしてる 姿を見るのはしのびないからねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
私としても、子どもが苦労をしてる
姿を見るのはしのびないからねぇ。

engChrName: I pray that someone, be it a bracer or whoever, finds her and gets her the help she needs.
engSearchText:
I pray that someone, be it a bracer or whoever, finds
her and gets her the help she needs.
jpnChrName: 早い所、遊撃士でも何でも 助けてくれるといいんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
早い所、遊撃士でも何でも
助けてくれるといいんだけど……

engChrName: I absolutely agree, ma'am. Thank you for your time.
engSearchText: I absolutely agree, ma'am. Thank you for your time.
jpnChrName: そうでしたか…… ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
そうでしたか……
ありがとうございます。

engChrName: (Sounds like the guild has been looking into this, too.)
engSearchText:
(Sounds like the guild has been looking into
this, too.)
jpnChrName: （遊撃士も調査中という事でしょうか？）
jpnSearchText: （遊撃士も調査中という事でしょうか？）

engChrName: (Sure does. All the more reason for us to go and pay a visit to the local branch and see what we can learn.)
engSearchText:
(Sure does. All the more reason for us to go and pay a
visit to the local branch and see what we can learn.)
jpnChrName: （やっぱり遊撃士協会の方にも   探りを入れとく必要がありそうだな。）
jpnSearchText:
（やっぱり遊撃士協会の方にも
探りを入れとく必要がありそうだな。）

engChrName: Phew. I think that's finally all of the places we wanted to visit.
engSearchText:
Phew. I think that's finally all of the places we wanted
to visit.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……必要な場所への聞き込みは これで全部終わりましたね。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……必要な場所への聞き込みは
これで全部終わりましたね。

engChrName: Yeah, let's go back to the bazaar and go over everything we heard.
engSearchText:
Yeah, let's go back to the bazaar and go over
everything we heard.
jpnChrName: バザールの方に戻って 情報を整理しましょうか！
jpnSearchText:
バザールの方に戻って
情報を整理しましょうか！

engChrName: Yes, that's right. We're aware of a thief in the area.
engSearchText: Yes, that's right. We're aware of a thief in the area.
jpnChrName: ……ええ、その件は こちらでも把握しています。
jpnSearchText:
……ええ、その件は
こちらでも把握しています。

engChrName: One of our bracers said they managed to catch a glimpse of her previously.
engSearchText:
One of our bracers said they managed to catch a
glimpse of her previously.
jpnChrName: 以前、ある遊撃士が それらしき少女の後ろ姿を見たそうですが。
jpnSearchText:
以前、ある遊撃士が
それらしき少女の後ろ姿を見たそうですが。

engChrName: But they haven't seen hide nor hair of her while patrolling the city since.
engSearchText:
But they haven't seen hide nor hair of her while
patrolling the city since.
jpnChrName: それを最後に、巡回中には 姿を見せなくなってしまったとか。
jpnSearchText:
それを最後に、巡回中には
姿を見せなくなってしまったとか。

engChrName: So the guild's on the lookout for her. That's good to know.
engSearchText:
So the guild's on the lookout for her. That's good
to know.
jpnChrName: へぇ、随分と警戒心が強いようだな。
jpnSearchText: へぇ、随分と警戒心が強いようだな。

engChrName: Sounds like it could be pretty tough to find her...
engSearchText: Sounds like it could be pretty tough to find her...
jpnChrName: 捕まえる時も 苦労するかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
捕まえる時も
苦労するかもしれませんね。

engChrName: Do you mind if we ask if the guild has a plan for what to do with her if you find her again?
engSearchText:
Do you mind if we ask if the guild has a plan for what
to do with her if you find her again?
jpnChrName: その後、ギルドの方針としては どうされたんですか？
jpnSearchText:
その後、ギルドの方針としては
どうされたんですか？

engChrName: Initially, we were planning to take her into custody, of course.
engSearchText:
Initially, we were planning to take her into custody,
of course.
jpnChrName: 勿論、本格的な確保に 乗り出す予定でした。
jpnSearchText:
勿論、本格的な確保に
乗り出す予定でした。

engChrName: But Fazil and some of the merchants asked us not to be too harsh with her.
engSearchText:
But Fazil and some of the merchants asked us not to
be too harsh with her.
jpnChrName: ですが、元締めの方やバザールの方に 大目に見てほしいと言われまして。
jpnSearchText:
ですが、元締めの方やバザールの方に
大目に見てほしいと言われまして。

engChrName: So, for the time being, we've been hands off about it.
engSearchText: So, for the time being, we've been hands off about it.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士協会としては 一旦保留にしているんです。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士協会としては
一旦保留にしているんです。

engChrName: That's pretty much what Fazil told us, too. That he'd rather settle it privately.
engSearchText:
That's pretty much what Fazil told us, too. That he'd
rather settle it privately.
jpnChrName: ああ、それらしいことを あのオッサンも言ってたな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、それらしいことを
あのオッサンも言ってたな。

engChrName: Which is fair. If the merchants want to try and resolve it themselves, we can't butt in.
engSearchText:
Which is fair. If the merchants want to try and
resolve it themselves, we can't butt in.
jpnChrName: 皆さんの方で解決できるようなら 是非もありません。
jpnSearchText:
皆さんの方で解決できるようなら
是非もありません。

engChrName: I hope that answers your question. Good luck with your search.
engSearchText:
I hope that answers your question. Good luck with
your search.
jpnChrName: 後の事をよろしくお願いしますね。
jpnSearchText: 後の事をよろしくお願いしますね。

engChrName: Thanks. We've got our way of figurin' these things out. We'll make it work.
engSearchText:
Thanks. We've got our way of figurin' these
things out. We'll make it work.
jpnChrName: ま、俺らの流儀でやらせてもらうがな。
jpnSearchText: ま、俺らの流儀でやらせてもらうがな。

engChrName: Phew, I think that's finally all of the places we wanted to visit.
engSearchText:
Phew, I think that's finally all of the places we wanted
to visit.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……必要な場所への聞き込みは これで全部終わりましたね。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……必要な場所への聞き込みは
これで全部終わりましたね。

engChrName: Yeah, let's go back to the bazaar and go over everything we heard.
engSearchText:
Yeah, let's go back to the bazaar and go over
everything we heard.
jpnChrName: バザールの方に戻って 情報を整理しましょうか！
jpnSearchText:
バザールの方に戻って
情報を整理しましょうか！

engChrName: Well, time to find someone else to talk to! Let's go!
engSearchText: Well, time to find someone else to talk to! Let's go!
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、次の聞き込みに行きますか。
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ、次の聞き込みに行きますか。

engChrName: A serial shoplifter around the bazaar? Yes, I've heard about her.
engSearchText:
A serial shoplifter around the bazaar? Yes, I've heard
about her.
jpnChrName: バザールに現れるスリの少女…… ええ、噂では聞いた事があります。
jpnSearchText:
バザールに現れるスリの少女……
ええ、噂では聞いた事があります。

engChrName: In fact, I've sent people into the bazaar to try and look for her.
engSearchText:
In fact, I've sent people into the bazaar to try and
look for her.
jpnChrName: 行くあてがなく罪を犯しているなら 保護することが我々の務め。
jpnSearchText:
行くあてがなく罪を犯しているなら
保護することが我々の務め。

engChrName: If this young girl is committing crimes because she has nowhere else to go, it's our duty to take her in and give her refuge.
engSearchText:
If this young girl is committing crimes because she
has nowhere else to go, it's our duty to take her in and
give her refuge.
jpnChrName: そう思い、他の者を遣わせて、 バザールを探した事もありました。
jpnSearchText:
そう思い、他の者を遣わせて、
バザールを探した事もありました。

engChrName: That's so kind of you. How did the search go?
engSearchText: That's so kind of you. How did the search go?
jpnChrName: それでその後 どうなったのでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
それでその後
どうなったのでしょうか……？

engChrName: One person did manage to see her, but only once. She's vanished into the ether since.
engSearchText:
One person did manage to see her, but only once.
She's vanished into the ether since.
jpnChrName: 一度だけ姿を見た者がいるそうですが、 それ以降は影も形もなく……
jpnSearchText:
一度だけ姿を見た者がいるそうですが、
それ以降は影も形もなく……

engChrName: It pains me to think we aren't able to help her.
engSearchText: It pains me to think we aren't able to help her.
jpnChrName: 本人に相談をする事すら ままならぬ状況なのです。
jpnSearchText:
本人に相談をする事すら
ままならぬ状況なのです。

engChrName: If only we could find her and at least talk to her about her circumstances... Alas.
engSearchText:
If only we could find her and at least talk to her about
her circumstances... Alas.
jpnChrName: 力添え出来ず申し訳ありませぬ。
jpnSearchText: 力添え出来ず申し訳ありませぬ。

engChrName: Wow, she must be pretty determined if she's trying that hard not to get caught.
engSearchText:
Wow, she must be pretty determined if she's trying
that hard not to get caught.
jpnChrName: やっぱり、とてもすばしっこい子 みたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり、とてもすばしっこい子
みたいですね。

engChrName: Thanks for talking to us, Father. We really appreciate it!
engSearchText:
Thanks for talking to us, Father. We really
appreciate it!
jpnChrName: 教えてくれて、ありがとうございましたっ！
jpnSearchText: 教えてくれて、ありがとうございましたっ！

engChrName: Phew, I think that's finally all of the places we wanted to visit.
engSearchText:
Phew, I think that's finally all of the places we wanted
to visit.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……必要な場所への聞き込みは これで全部終わりましたね。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……必要な場所への聞き込みは
これで全部終わりましたね。

engChrName: Yeah, let's go back to the bazaar and go over everything we heard.
engSearchText:
Yeah, let's go back to the bazaar and go over
everything we heard.
jpnChrName: バザールの方に戻って 情報を整理しましょうか！
jpnSearchText:
バザールの方に戻って
情報を整理しましょうか！

engChrName: Okay, shall we find someone else to ask about her?
engSearchText: Okay, shall we find someone else to ask about her?
jpnChrName: それでは、 次の聞き込み先に行きましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
それでは、
次の聞き込み先に行きましょうか。

engChrName: All right, I think we've dug up about as much as we're going to find.
engSearchText:
All right, I think we've dug up about as much as we're
going to find.
jpnChrName: さてと…… これで必要な情報は大体集まったか。
jpnSearchText:
さてと……
これで必要な情報は大体集まったか。

engChrName: Based on what we know, we can probably assume this girl has no friends or family...none living, anyway.
engSearchText:
Based on what we know, we can probably assume this
girl has no friends or family...none living, anyway.
jpnChrName: 今までの情報から想像するに、 例の少女ってのは１人暮らしみてえだな。
jpnSearchText:
今までの情報から想像するに、
例の少女ってのは１人暮らしみてえだな。

engChrName: She seems to live on her own and looks after herself, and no one else.
engSearchText:
She seems to live on her own and looks after herself,
and no one else.
jpnChrName: 仲間や家族はいねえ。 自給自足だけしてる印象だ。
jpnSearchText:
仲間や家族はいねえ。
自給自足だけしてる印象だ。

engChrName: And she's pretty damn good at swiping stuff.
engSearchText: And she's pretty damn good at swiping stuff.
jpnChrName: それに、スリとしても そこそこの腕前みたいじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
それに、スリとしても
そこそこの腕前みたいじゃねえか？

engChrName: Takes skill to avoid getting noticed by people from both the guild and temple, outside of that handful of times.
engSearchText:
Takes skill to avoid getting noticed by people from
both the guild and temple, outside of that handful
of times.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士や寺院の人間の前には そうそう姿を現さねぇんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士や寺院の人間の前には
そうそう姿を現さねぇんだろ。

engChrName: Which means it's not going to be easy to find her.
engSearchText: Which means it's not going to be easy to find her.
jpnChrName: やっぱり一筋縄ではいかなさそうですね。
jpnSearchText: やっぱり一筋縄ではいかなさそうですね。

engChrName: Don't worry! You've got me, remember? I'm sure if we work together, we can nab her!
engSearchText:
Don't worry! You've got me, remember? I'm sure if
we work together, we can nab her!
jpnChrName: でも、わたしもいますし 皆さんとなら捕まえられますよっ！
jpnSearchText:
でも、わたしもいますし
皆さんとなら捕まえられますよっ！

engChrName: One would hope. She might be better than average, but we are still dealin' with a kid here. It shouldn't be impossible.
engSearchText:
One would hope. She might be better than average,
but we are still dealin' with a kid here. It shouldn't
be impossible.
jpnChrName: まあな、やり手とはいえ 相手は一般人の子どもだからな。
jpnSearchText:
まあな、やり手とはいえ
相手は一般人の子どもだからな。

engChrName: Right. Now that we know the score, we should try setting up a stakeout.
engSearchText:
Right. Now that we know the score, we should try
setting up a stakeout.
jpnChrName: さて、次は試しに 張り込みでもしてみるか。
jpnSearchText:
さて、次は試しに
張り込みでもしてみるか。

engChrName: She doesn't know we're lookin' for her, so with any luck, she might come out of hiding if we wait long enough.
engSearchText:
She doesn't know we're lookin' for her, so with any
luck, she might come out of hiding if we wait
long enough.
jpnChrName: 俺達の事はまだ警戒してねぇだろうし、 ノコノコ現れてくれるといいんだが。
jpnSearchText:
俺達の事はまだ警戒してねぇだろうし、
ノコノコ現れてくれるといいんだが。

engChrName: You really think, dude? How the hell do we know she's even going to show up today, let alone when?
engSearchText:
You really think, dude? How the hell do we know
she's even going to show up today, let alone when?
jpnChrName: マジか……今日の何時に 現れるかも分からねぇんだぞ？
jpnSearchText:
マジか……今日の何時に
現れるかも分からねぇんだぞ？

engChrName: We don't. But two of the shopkeepers we talked to did mention that they last saw her two days ago.
engSearchText:
We don't. But two of the shopkeepers we talked to
did mention that they last saw her two days ago.
jpnChrName: それでも、２日前に現れたとの 証言もありましたから。
jpnSearchText:
それでも、２日前に現れたとの
証言もありましたから。

engChrName: Enough time has passed that she might need to come out and 'forage' again. I think it's worth a try.
engSearchText:
Enough time has passed that she might need to come
out and 'forage' again. I think it's worth a try.
jpnChrName: 今日試してみる価値は あるんじゃないでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
今日試してみる価値は
あるんじゃないでしょうか。

engChrName: That's my opinion, too. As for where we'll set up shop, let's talk to the stall owners who saw her before.
engSearchText:
That's my opinion, too. As for where we'll set up
shop, let's talk to the stall owners who saw her before.
jpnChrName: ああ、張り込むなら目撃証言があった屋台だ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、張り込むなら目撃証言があった屋台だ。

engChrName: With any luck, we can all work together.
engSearchText: With any luck, we can all work together.
jpnChrName: まずは店主に話を通してみるぞ。
jpnSearchText: まずは店主に話を通してみるぞ。

engChrName: Oh, nice to see you all again. Is there something I can do for you?
engSearchText:
Oh, nice to see you all again. Is there something I can
do for you?
jpnChrName: あら、今度はどうされましたか。
jpnSearchText: あら、今度はどうされましたか。

engChrName: We meet again. Need something else?
engSearchText: We meet again. Need something else?
jpnChrName: おっと、今度はどうしたんだ？
jpnSearchText: おっと、今度はどうしたんだ？

engChrName: Yeah. It's about that shoplifter we mentioned earlier.
engSearchText: Yeah. It's about that shoplifter we mentioned earlier.
jpnChrName: 実は例のスリの少女について話があってな。
jpnSearchText: 実は例のスリの少女について話があってな。

engChrName: There's somethin' we wanted to discuss with you and the other owner across the street. Could you come with me?
engSearchText:
There's somethin' we wanted to discuss with you and
the other owner across the street. Could you come
with me?
jpnChrName: 向こうの屋台の店主と一緒に 説明しちまうから、出て来てもらえるか？
jpnSearchText:
向こうの屋台の店主と一緒に
説明しちまうから、出て来てもらえるか？

engChrName: Sure, I don't mind.
engSearchText: Sure, I don't mind.
jpnChrName: ええ、分かりました。
jpnSearchText: ええ、分かりました。

engChrName: Yeah, no problem.
engSearchText: Yeah, no problem.
jpnChrName: おう、構わねえよ。
jpnSearchText: おう、構わねえよ。

engChrName: Van and the others split up to talk to each of the shopkeepers.
engSearchText:
Van and the others split up to talk to each of
the shopkeepers.
jpnChrName: ヴァン達は手分けをして ２人の店主に声をかけ……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン達は手分けをして
２人の店主に声をかけ……

engChrName: They explained their plan to try and catch the shoplifter.
engSearchText:
They explained their plan to try and catch
the shoplifter.
jpnChrName: 張り込みを行う旨を相談したのだった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>張り込みを行う旨を相談したのだった。

engChrName: ...Basically, knowing what we do now, we want to set up a stakeout within the bazaar and see if she turns up.
engSearchText:
...Basically, knowing what we do now, we want to set
up a stakeout within the bazaar and see if she
turns up.
jpnChrName: ……っつう訳で、色々と調査した結果 張り込みをしてみようと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
……っつう訳で、色々と調査した結果
張り込みをしてみようと思ってな。

engChrName: Would you two mind if we hid inside your shops to keep an eye out?
engSearchText:
Would you two mind if we hid inside your shops to
keep an eye out?
jpnChrName: アンタ達の店に 協力してもらいてえんだが、どうだ？
jpnSearchText:
アンタ達の店に
協力してもらいてえんだが、どうだ？

engChrName: Oh, go right ahead. You'll be doing us a favor if you manage to capture her, if anything.
engSearchText:
Oh, go right ahead. You'll be doing us a favor if you
manage to capture her, if anything.
jpnChrName: ええ、勿論協力させてもらうわ。 捕まえてもらえるのなら助かりますし。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、勿論協力させてもらうわ。
捕まえてもらえるのなら助かりますし。

engChrName: Yeah, what she said. Plus the manager hired you guys. Of course we trust you, and would be happy to work with you.
engSearchText:
Yeah, what she said. Plus the manager hired you guys.
Of course we trust you, and would be happy to work
with you.
jpnChrName: 元締めが依頼した相手なんだ、 勿論俺も協力させてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
元締めが依頼した相手なんだ、
勿論俺も協力させてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Thank goodness! We're glad you understand. Thank you both so much.
engSearchText:
Thank goodness! We're glad you understand.
Thank you both so much.
jpnChrName: みなさん……ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: みなさん……ありがとうございます。

engChrName: Okay, with that settled, let's split up and get to work.
engSearchText: Okay, with that settled, let's split up and get to work.
jpnChrName: よし、そうと決まれば 早速手分けをするぞ。
jpnSearchText:
よし、そうと決まれば
早速手分けをするぞ。

engChrName: Agnès and Ferida, you take one stall.
engSearchText: Agnès and Ferida, you take one stall.
jpnChrName: アニエスはフェリーダと一緒に張り込め。
jpnSearchText: アニエスはフェリーダと一緒に張り込め。

engChrName: You, punk, are stickin' with me. We'll set up shop in the other stall.
engSearchText:
You, punk, are stickin' with me. We'll set up shop in
the other stall.
jpnChrName: 新人のお前は俺と一緒に来い。
jpnSearchText: 新人のお前は俺と一緒に来い。

engChrName: Hope you don't regret bringing me along, chief. Now you have to deliver and show me how good you are.
engSearchText:
Hope you don't regret bringing me along, chief.
Now you have to deliver and show me how good
you are.
jpnChrName: ハッ、それじゃ所長の実力ってのを 見せてもらおうじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、それじゃ所長の実力ってのを
見せてもらおうじゃねえか。

engChrName: We've got this, Feri!
engSearchText: We've got this, Feri!
jpnChrName: 一緒に頑張りましょうね、フェリちゃん。
jpnSearchText: 一緒に頑張りましょうね、フェリちゃん。

engChrName: Yeah, we'll catch her, no sweat!
engSearchText: Yeah, we'll catch her, no sweat!
jpnChrName: はいっ！
jpnSearchText: はいっ！

engChrName: That girl over there... Could she be the one?
engSearchText: That girl over there... Could she be the one?
jpnChrName: ……！ あの子がもしかして……
jpnSearchText:
……！
あの子がもしかして……

engChrName: She does look really cautious of her surroundings, like a thief would when scoping a place out.
engSearchText:
She does look really cautious of her surroundings, like
a thief would when scoping a place out.
jpnChrName: あの周囲を警戒する動き…… いかにも泥棒っぽい雰囲気です。
jpnSearchText:
あの周囲を警戒する動き……
いかにも泥棒っぽい雰囲気です。

engChrName: (She's SO small. It's sad she has to steal so much in order to survive...)
engSearchText:
(She's SO small. It's sad she has to steal so much in
order to survive...)
jpnChrName: （あんなに小さい女の子が   盗まないと生きていけないだなんて……）
jpnSearchText:
（あんなに小さい女の子が
盗まないと生きていけないだなんて……）

engChrName: Hey, she's coming this way.
engSearchText: Hey, she's coming this way.
jpnChrName: おっ、こっちに来てんぞ。
jpnSearchText: おっ、こっちに来てんぞ。

engChrName: That works out nicely for us. Once we see her steal something, we'll close in and nab her.
engSearchText:
That works out nicely for us. Once we see her steal
something, we'll close in and nab her.
jpnChrName: こいつは好都合だ、 アイツが盗んだ後で確保するぞ。
jpnSearchText:
こいつは好都合だ、
アイツが盗んだ後で確保するぞ。

engChrName: ...Well, that's all the shopping I need done for today.
engSearchText: ...Well, that's all the shopping I need done for today.
jpnChrName: ……よしと、 必要な買い出しは終わりだな。
jpnSearchText:
……よしと、
必要な買い出しは終わりだな。

engChrName: On a different note, the film festival sure has brought an awful lot of people into town.
engSearchText:
On a different note, the film festival sure has brought
an awful lot of people into town.
jpnChrName: しかしよぉ、映画祭の影響か 街に人が多くてまいっちまうよ。
jpnSearchText:
しかしよぉ、映画祭の影響か
街に人が多くてまいっちまうよ。

engChrName: This place already gets hot. Now it's going to feel stuffy everywhere you go because of all the crowds! Ah, what a bother...
engSearchText:
This place already gets hot. Now it's going to feel
stuffy everywhere you go because of all the crowds!
Ah, what a bother...
jpnChrName: ただでさえ暑いのに、 人混みが暑苦しいのなんのって！
jpnSearchText:
ただでさえ暑いのに、
人混みが暑苦しいのなんのって！

engChrName: Haha. Maybe so, but I certainly can't complain about having more customers. I'm happy they're here.
engSearchText:
Haha. Maybe so, but I certainly can't complain about
having more customers. I'm happy they're here.
jpnChrName: ふふ、お客さんが増えてくれて 私としては嬉しいですけど……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、お客さんが増えてくれて
私としては嬉しいですけど……

engChrName: The pickpocket slipped an apple into her bag when she thought nobody was looking.
engSearchText:
The pickpocket slipped an apple into her bag when
she thought nobody was looking.
jpnChrName: スリの少女は手に持っている小袋に リンゴを放り込んだ。
jpnSearchText:
スリの少女は手に持っている小袋に
リンゴを放り込んだ。

engChrName: Dang, kid, you really are as smooth with your hands as I've been led to believe.
engSearchText:
Dang, kid, you really are as smooth with your hands
as I've been led to believe.
jpnChrName: 噂通り、子どもにしては 中々の手際の良さだな。
jpnSearchText:
噂通り、子どもにしては
中々の手際の良さだな。

engChrName: Urgh!
engSearchText: Urgh!

engChrName: There's no need to be scared. We're what you might call 'problem solvers.' We're not here to turn you over to the cops or anything like that.
engSearchText:
There's no need to be scared. We're what you might
call 'problem solvers.' We're not here to turn you over
to the cops or anything like that.
jpnChrName: 俺達は《裏解決屋》っつうモンだ。 言っとくがお前を警察に突き出すつもりはない。
jpnSearchText:
俺達は《裏解決屋》っつうモンだ。
言っとくがお前を警察に突き出すつもりはない。

engChrName: We just wanna talk for a bit, that's all. Like it or not, we need you to come with us.
engSearchText:
We just wanna talk for a bit, that's all. Like it or not,
we need you to come with us.
jpnChrName: 少し話をさせてもらいてぇだけだ。 悪いが無理にでも付き合ってもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
少し話をさせてもらいてぇだけだ。
悪いが無理にでも付き合ってもらうぜ。

engChrName: With a quick feint, the girl managed to sneak straight past Van.
engSearchText:
With a quick feint, the girl managed to sneak straight
past Van.
jpnChrName: スリの少女は素早くフェイントをかけ、 ヴァンの横をすり抜けた！
jpnSearchText:
スリの少女は素早くフェイントをかけ、
ヴァンの横をすり抜けた！

engChrName: Hey!
engSearchText: Hey!
jpnChrName: うおっ！？
jpnSearchText: うおっ！？

engChrName: How's it feel letting a little kid give you the slip?
engSearchText: How's it feel letting a little kid give you the slip?
jpnChrName: ククッ、ざまあねえな。
jpnSearchText: ククッ、ざまあねえな。

engChrName: Van, is everything okay?
engSearchText: Van, is everything okay?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん大丈夫ですか？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん大丈夫ですか？

engChrName: I saw that girl run towards the inn!
engSearchText: I saw that girl run towards the inn!
jpnChrName: あの子は宿酒場の方面に 走って行ったみたいですっ！
jpnSearchText:
あの子は宿酒場の方面に
走って行ったみたいですっ！

engChrName: Don't worry, old man—we'll clean your mess up. Let's move, girls!
engSearchText:
Don't worry, old man—we'll clean your mess up.
Let's move, girls!
jpnChrName: ハッ、オッサンの尻拭いは俺がしてやるよ！ 行くぞお前ら！
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、オッサンの尻拭いは俺がしてやるよ！
行くぞお前ら！

engChrName: Gah! This street's pretty crowded. How'll we ever figure out where she went?
engSearchText:
Gah! This street's pretty crowded. How'll we ever
figure out where she went?
jpnChrName: ううっ、この通りも賑わってますね。 これじゃあの子がどこに行ったのか……
jpnSearchText:
ううっ、この通りも賑わってますね。
これじゃあの子がどこに行ったのか……

engChrName: That must be the idea: blend into all these people and get out unnoticed.
engSearchText:
That must be the idea: blend into all these people and
get out unnoticed.
jpnChrName: 人ごみに紛れて 姿を消そうって魂胆か。
jpnSearchText:
人ごみに紛れて
姿を消そうって魂胆か。

engChrName: Hell if it's gonna work on a couple of pros like us, though!
engSearchText:
Hell if it's gonna work on a couple of pros like
us, though!
jpnChrName: そんな安い手に引っかかるかっての。
jpnSearchText: そんな安い手に引っかかるかっての。

engChrName: Got you, you little punk!
engSearchText: Got you, you little punk!
jpnChrName: ──そこだ！
jpnSearchText: ──そこだ！

engChrName: Wh-What the—?!
engSearchText: Wh-What the—?!
jpnChrName: な、なんだっ！？
jpnSearchText: な、なんだっ！？

engChrName: Hmph!
engSearchText: Hmph!

engChrName: Damn! How the hell is she so slippery?!
engSearchText: Damn! How the hell is she so slippery?!
jpnChrName: あっ、クソッ！ どんだけ身軽なんだよ！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、クソッ！
どんだけ身軽なんだよ！

engChrName: Did she literally just jump onto that tarp and start running on it?!
engSearchText:
Did she literally just jump onto that tarp and start
running on it?!
jpnChrName: 大変ですっ、日除けの布の上を 走って行きましたよ！？
jpnSearchText:
大変ですっ、日除けの布の上を
走って行きましたよ！？

engChrName: Oh, boy. I can already tell she's going to drag this thing out.
engSearchText:
Oh, boy. I can already tell she's going to drag this
thing out.
jpnChrName: ははぁ…… こいつは長丁場になりそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
ははぁ……
こいつは長丁場になりそうだな。

engChrName: Let me go after her next—I can handle heights just fine! I'll get her for you guys!
engSearchText:
Let me go after her next—I can handle heights
just fine! I'll get her for you guys!
jpnChrName: 高所なら任せてくださいっ、 次こそはわたしが捕まえてみせます！
jpnSearchText:
高所なら任せてくださいっ、
次こそはわたしが捕まえてみせます！

engChrName: She might be light on her feet, but she's not as light as this proud Kruga warrior!
engSearchText:
She might be light on her feet, but she's not as light
as this proud Kruga warrior!
jpnChrName: これでもクルガの戦士の端くれ、 身軽さで負けていられませんからっ！
jpnSearchText:
これでもクルガの戦士の端くれ、
身軽さで負けていられませんからっ！

engChrName: Quit running! Stop right there!
engSearchText: Quit running! Stop right there!
jpnChrName: 観念して止まってくださいっ！
jpnSearchText: 観念して止まってくださいっ！

engChrName: I promise, you wanna hear what we have to say, really!
engSearchText:
I promise, you wanna hear what we have to
say, really!
jpnChrName: お話したい事は、あなたにとって 悪い話じゃないんですっ！
jpnSearchText:
お話したい事は、あなたにとって
悪い話じゃないんですっ！

engChrName: Aaah! Hey, don't go wasting food like that, either!
engSearchText: Aaah! Hey, don't go wasting food like that, either!
jpnChrName: あわわっ……！？ 食べ物を粗末にしちゃダメです！
jpnSearchText:
あわわっ……！？
食べ物を粗末にしちゃダメです！

engChrName: Grr, I'm so embarrassed. She managed to shake me off, too!
engSearchText:
Grr, I'm so embarrassed. She managed to shake me
off, too!
jpnChrName: ううっ、不覚です…… 横を抜かれてしまいました……
jpnSearchText:
ううっ、不覚です……
横を抜かれてしまいました……

engChrName: You should've forgotten the apple and stayed on her tail! What were you thinking?
engSearchText:
You should've forgotten the apple and stayed on
her tail! What were you thinking?
jpnChrName: リンゴなんざ 放っとけば良かっただろうが。
jpnSearchText:
リンゴなんざ
放っとけば良かっただろうが。

engChrName: But she stole it! I thought it would be terrible for stolen food to go to waste like that.
engSearchText:
But she stole it! I thought it would be terrible for
stolen food to go to waste like that.
jpnChrName: だって盗まれたリンゴですよ！ 粗末にしていいものかと思って……
jpnSearchText:
だって盗まれたリンゴですよ！
粗末にしていいものかと思って……

engChrName: That's really admirable of you, Feri. I think it's important to keep stuff like that in mind, too.
engSearchText:
That's really admirable of you, Feri. I think it's
important to keep stuff like that in mind, too.
jpnChrName: フェリちゃん偉いですね。 大事な事だと思います。
jpnSearchText:
フェリちゃん偉いですね。
大事な事だと思います。

engChrName: She made a break for the Entertainment District, which might actually be a blessing in disguise.
engSearchText:
She made a break for the Entertainment District,
which might actually be a blessing in disguise.
jpnChrName: ヤツは歓楽街の方に逃げちまったが、 案外好都合かもしれねえな。
jpnSearchText:
ヤツは歓楽街の方に逃げちまったが、
案外好都合かもしれねえな。
