engChrName: That area's a lot more wide open, so she won't have nearly as many places she can slip into easily.
engSearchText:
That area's a lot more wide open, so she won't have
nearly as many places she can slip into easily.
jpnChrName: 歓楽街の方は開けてるから、 ちょこまかと逃げられないだろ。
jpnSearchText:
歓楽街の方は開けてるから、
ちょこまかと逃げられないだろ。

engChrName: This'll be our chance to finally surround her and take her in. Everybody ready?
engSearchText:
This'll be our chance to finally surround her and take
her in. Everybody ready?
jpnChrName: 次こそは上手く包囲して捕まえるぞ！
jpnSearchText: 次こそは上手く包囲して捕まえるぞ！

engChrName: For sure!
engSearchText: For sure!
jpnChrName: はいっ！
jpnSearchText: はいっ！

engChrName: All right, now that we finally get to meet, why don't you tell us your name? Can you do that?
engSearchText:
All right, now that we finally get to meet, why don't
you tell us your name? Can you do that?
jpnChrName: さてと……まずは君の名前を 聞かせてもらえないか？
jpnSearchText:
さてと……まずは君の名前を
聞かせてもらえないか？

engChrName: There's no getting away now, kid. You have nothing else to lose. You might as well talk.
engSearchText:
There's no getting away now, kid. You have nothing
else to lose. You might as well talk.
jpnChrName: ここまで来たんだから観念しやがれ。
jpnSearchText: ここまで来たんだから観念しやがれ。

engChrName: Mmph. My name's...Sinem.
engSearchText: Mmph. My name's...Sinem.
jpnChrName: チッ……アタシの名前はシーナム。
jpnSearchText: チッ……アタシの名前はシーナム。

engChrName: I know it's bad to steal from the bazaar.
engSearchText: I know it's bad to steal from the bazaar.
jpnChrName: バザールの物を盗んでた事は 悪かったと思ってる。
jpnSearchText:
バザールの物を盗んでた事は
悪かったと思ってる。

engChrName: But I'm not sorry about it.
engSearchText: But I'm not sorry about it.
jpnChrName: だけど、反省するつもりはないからね。
jpnSearchText: だけど、反省するつもりはないからね。

engChrName: If I have to steal so I don't die, then I'll steal as much as I have to. Period!
engSearchText:
If I have to steal so I don't die, then I'll steal as much
as I have to. Period!
jpnChrName: お腹が空いて死ぬくらいなら 何度だって盗んでやるんだから。
jpnSearchText:
お腹が空いて死ぬくらいなら
何度だって盗んでやるんだから。

engChrName: That's fair, in its way. It sounds like you really don't have much of a choice.
engSearchText:
That's fair, in its way. It sounds like you really don't
have much of a choice.
jpnChrName: やっぱり…… 仕方ない事だとは思いますけど……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり……
仕方ない事だとは思いますけど……

engChrName: Aye, it's reasonable enough. In that case, let me ask you another question.
engSearchText:
Aye, it's reasonable enough. In that case, let me ask
you another question.
jpnChrName: ふむ、それじゃあ もう少し聞かせてもらうが。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、それじゃあ
もう少し聞かせてもらうが。

engChrName: Where's your family? How have you been living up to this point?
engSearchText:
Where's your family? How have you been living up to
this point?
jpnChrName: ご家族はどうしたんだ。 君は今はどうやって暮らしてるんだ？
jpnSearchText:
ご家族はどうしたんだ。
君は今はどうやって暮らしてるんだ？

engChrName: My mom and I...used to live in the country. But eventually, we ran out of money, so we had to move to find work.
engSearchText:
My mom and I...used to live in the country.
But eventually, we ran out of money, so we had to
move to find work.
jpnChrName: ……元々はお母さんと地方に住んでた。 だけどミラが無いから稼ぎに来たの。
jpnSearchText:
……元々はお母さんと地方に住んでた。
だけどミラが無いから稼ぎに来たの。

engChrName: Ever since my mom got...got sick and died, I've been alone.
engSearchText:
Ever since my mom got...got sick and died, I've
been alone.
jpnChrName: でも、お母さんが病気で死んじゃってから アタシ一人になった。
jpnSearchText:
でも、お母さんが病気で死んじゃってから
アタシ一人になった。

engChrName: I used to do random jobs while going from place to place.
engSearchText:
I used to do random jobs while going from place
to place.
jpnChrName: それからは、たまに働きながら 適当な場所で暮らしてる。
jpnSearchText:
それからは、たまに働きながら
適当な場所で暮らしてる。

engChrName: Oh, Sinem, I'm so sorry! But...you could've gone to the temple. They would've helped you!
engSearchText:
Oh, Sinem, I'm so sorry! But...you could've gone to
the temple. They would've helped you!
jpnChrName: でもそれなら、寺院に行けば 助けてくれたと思いますよ。
jpnSearchText:
でもそれなら、寺院に行けば
助けてくれたと思いますよ。

engChrName: In fact, it might not be too late now! Maybe they'll still take you in.
engSearchText:
In fact, it might not be too late now! Maybe they'll
still take you in.
jpnChrName: なんなら、今からだって 遅くないかもしれませんし。
jpnSearchText:
なんなら、今からだって
遅くないかもしれませんし。

engChrName: Exactly. That's what I also thought.
engSearchText: Exactly. That's what I also thought.
jpnChrName: ああそうだな、 それは私も考えていたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああそうだな、
それは私も考えていたんだ。

engChrName: Pfhah! You guys must be joking.
engSearchText: Pfhah! You guys must be joking.
jpnChrName: ハッ、冗談でしょ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、冗談でしょ。

engChrName: I'm more than just a thief, you know.
engSearchText: I'm more than just a thief, you know.
jpnChrName: アタシがしてきたのは盗みだけじゃない……
jpnSearchText: アタシがしてきたのは盗みだけじゃない……

engChrName: I've done all kinds of bad stuff in order to survive, like delivering sketchy packages for people.
engSearchText:
I've done all kinds of bad stuff in order to survive, like
delivering sketchy packages for people.
jpnChrName: 怪しい物の受け渡しのバイトとか、 色々と悪い事をしてきた。
jpnSearchText:
怪しい物の受け渡しのバイトとか、
色々と悪い事をしてきた。

engChrName: Someone like me doesn't deserve to be taken in.
engSearchText: Someone like me doesn't deserve to be taken in.
jpnChrName: そんなアタシが 世話になる資格は無いでしょ。
jpnSearchText:
そんなアタシが
世話になる資格は無いでしょ。

engChrName: Oh, now you act all noble and mature. Some logic you've got there, kid.
engSearchText:
Oh, now you act all noble and mature. Some logic
you've got there, kid.
jpnChrName: 妙な所で真面目ぶりやがって。
jpnSearchText: 妙な所で真面目ぶりやがって。

engChrName: Whatever... Are we done talking now?
engSearchText: Whatever... Are we done talking now?
jpnChrName: はぁ……こんな話はもういいでしょ。
jpnSearchText: はぁ……こんな話はもういいでしょ。

engChrName: Just turn me over to the cops and get it over with already. You're wasting my time.
engSearchText:
Just turn me over to the cops and get it over
with already. You're wasting my time.
jpnChrName: いいから早くアタシを警察に連れて行きなさいよ。
jpnSearchText: いいから早くアタシを警察に連れて行きなさいよ。

engChrName: No, I'm not going to turn you in. I brought these people in on this precisely to avoid that outcome.
engSearchText:
No, I'm not going to turn you in. I brought these
people in on this precisely to avoid that outcome.
jpnChrName: ……いいや、君の事は警察には引き渡さない。 その為に解決屋に依頼をしたのだからな。
jpnSearchText:
……いいや、君の事は警察には引き渡さない。
その為に解決屋に依頼をしたのだからな。

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?
jpnChrName: えっ……？
jpnSearchText: えっ……？

engChrName: Now I'm not sure what to do. I was originally going to talk to the temple and ask them to look after her.
engSearchText:
Now I'm not sure what to do. I was originally going
to talk to the temple and ask them to look after her.
jpnChrName: だが困ったな……彼女の事は この後寺院に預けるつもりだったんだが。
jpnSearchText:
だが困ったな……彼女の事は
この後寺院に預けるつもりだったんだが。

engChrName: What do you think? What should I do about her?
engSearchText: What do you think? What should I do about her?
jpnChrName: 君の意見も聞かせてもらえないか？
jpnSearchText: 君の意見も聞かせてもらえないか？

engChrName: Good question. Let me think...
engSearchText: Good question. Let me think...
jpnChrName: そうだな……
jpnSearchText: そうだな……

engChrName: (Try as she might to resist, leaving her with the temple is still probably the safest bet.)
engSearchText:
(Try as she might to resist, leaving her with the
temple is still probably the safest bet.)
jpnChrName: （こいつがなんと言おうと、   寺院に預けるのが一番無難だろう。）
jpnSearchText:
（こいつがなんと言おうと、
寺院に預けるのが一番無難だろう。）

engChrName: (If not that, she at least needs someone who can rein her in and set her straight. Hmm...)
engSearchText:
(If not that, she at least needs someone who can rein
her in and set her straight. Hmm...)
jpnChrName: （もしくは、この跳ねっ返りの手綱を握って   導いてくれるヤツがいればいいが……）
jpnSearchText:
（もしくは、この跳ねっ返りの手綱を握って
導いてくれるヤツがいればいいが……）

engChrName: Truth be told, I think the Septian temple is still the best place for her to go.
engSearchText:
Truth be told, I think the Septian temple is still the
best place for her to go.
jpnChrName: 周りのガキどもに馴染めるかどうかも 怪しいかなりの跳ねっ返りだが……
jpnSearchText:
周りのガキどもに馴染めるかどうかも
怪しいかなりの跳ねっ返りだが……

engChrName: Someone as street-hardened as she is might have trouble gettin' along with the other kids there...
engSearchText:
Someone as street-hardened as she is might have
trouble gettin' along with the other kids there...
jpnChrName: ともあれ、身元の引き受け先として 七耀寺院が一番いいのは確かだ。
jpnSearchText:
ともあれ、身元の引き受け先として
七耀寺院が一番いいのは確かだ。

engChrName: ...but if nothing else, you know she'll be in good, safe hands.
engSearchText:
...but if nothing else, you know she'll be in good,
safe hands.
jpnChrName: ここは寺院に保護してもらった方が いいと思うけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ここは寺院に保護してもらった方が
いいと思うけどな。

engChrName: True. You make a good point.
engSearchText: True. You make a good point.
jpnChrName: ふむ、それもそうだな……
jpnSearchText: ふむ、それもそうだな……

engChrName: Then it's settled. I'm going to take you to the temple. It's for you own good.
engSearchText:
Then it's settled. I'm going to take you to the temple.
It's for you own good.
jpnChrName: 君のためにも、 寺院に預けさせてもらうとしようか。
jpnSearchText:
君のためにも、
寺院に預けさせてもらうとしようか。

engChrName: Huh?! You can't just decide where I'm going to go! I don't wanna go to the temple! Anywhere but there!
engSearchText:
Huh?! You can't just decide where I'm going to go!
I don't wanna go to the temple! Anywhere but there!
jpnChrName: はあ！？　勝手に決めないでよね！ 寺院なんて絶対にイヤだから！
jpnSearchText:
はあ！？　勝手に決めないでよね！
寺院なんて絶対にイヤだから！

engChrName: Anywhere, huh? If you feel that strongly about it, we really could take you down to the police station. Your choice.
engSearchText:
Anywhere, huh? If you feel that strongly about it, we
really could take you down to the police station.
Your choice.
jpnChrName: そうか？　寺院が嫌なら、 警察に連れて行くしかねえんだが。
jpnSearchText:
そうか？　寺院が嫌なら、
警察に連れて行くしかねえんだが。

engChrName: Er...
engSearchText: Er...

engChrName: Why the hesitation? Landed on their radar more than you care to admit?
engSearchText:
Why the hesitation? Landed on their radar more than
you care to admit?
jpnChrName: もう何回か補導された事はあるんじゃねーか？
jpnSearchText: もう何回か補導された事はあるんじゃねーか？

engChrName: Hell, even if you haven't, if any of those sellers report you, they'll be on your ass for sure—probably with a big, fat record to show for it.
engSearchText:
Hell, even if you haven't, if any of those sellers report
you, they'll be on your ass for sure—probably with a
big, fat record to show for it.
jpnChrName: そうでなくても、バザールから被害報告をすれば ガキとはいえ立派な前科持ちになるだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
そうでなくても、バザールから被害報告をすれば
ガキとはいえ立派な前科持ちになるだろうな。

engChrName: Argh! You grown-ups are such cowards! You always are!
engSearchText:
Argh! You grown-ups are such cowards! You
always are!
jpnChrName: ～～～ッ！　やっぱり大人って卑怯よ！
jpnSearchText: ～～～ッ！　やっぱり大人って卑怯よ！

engChrName: You don't care about my feelings at all! You think you can look down on me just because I'm a kid and happen to be poor!
engSearchText:
You don't care about my feelings at all! You think you
can look down on me just because I'm a kid and
happen to be poor!
jpnChrName: こっちの気持ちも考えずに 貧しいヤツだから、子供だからって見下して！
jpnSearchText:
こっちの気持ちも考えずに
貧しいヤツだから、子供だからって見下して！

engChrName: That's not true. When I was young, it also felt like it was me against the world, just like you feel right now.
engSearchText:
That's not true. When I was young, it also felt like it
was me against the world, just like you feel right now.
jpnChrName: はは、私も若い頃はそうやって 理不尽さを怨んでいたものだ。
jpnSearchText:
はは、私も若い頃はそうやって
理不尽さを怨んでいたものだ。

engChrName: But you know what? I met this strange vendor who got me off the streets and taught me a great deal.
engSearchText:
But you know what? I met this strange vendor who
got me off the streets and taught me a great deal.
jpnChrName: だが、そんな私を拾って勉強させてくれた 物好きな商人がいてね。
jpnSearchText:
だが、そんな私を拾って勉強させてくれた
物好きな商人がいてね。

engChrName: That's why I know it's important to look after children and teach them what they need to know, even if you have to force it a little sometimes.
engSearchText:
That's why I know it's important to look after
children and teach them what they need to know,
even if you have to force it a little sometimes.
jpnChrName: 多少強引でも、子供を導いてあげる事は 大切なんだと学ばされたんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
多少強引でも、子供を導いてあげる事は
大切なんだと学ばされたんだよ。

engChrName: So how about this: if you agree to stay with the temple, you can come work with us at the bazaar. Would you give that a try?
engSearchText:
So how about this: if you agree to stay with the
temple, you can come work with us at the bazaar.
Would you give that a try?
jpnChrName: そこでなんだが──寺院に預けるとしても、 一緒にバザールで働いてみる気はないか？
jpnSearchText:
そこでなんだが──寺院に預けるとしても、
一緒にバザールで働いてみる気はないか？

engChrName: Are you nuts?! You're giving me work even though you know just how much stuff I stole from you people?
engSearchText:
Are you nuts?! You're giving me work even though
you know just how much stuff I stole from
you people?
jpnChrName: アタシがバザールの物を 盗んでたこと分かって言ってる！？
jpnSearchText:
アタシがバザールの物を
盗んでたこと分かって言ってる！？

engChrName: Oh, I know. And you'll be paying back what you stole as part of that work, too.
engSearchText:
Oh, I know. And you'll be paying back what you stole
as part of that work, too.
jpnChrName: ああ、それなら尚更 働いて返してほしいものだがな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、それなら尚更
働いて返してほしいものだがな。

engChrName: But we'll still pay you and give you food to eat on top of that.
engSearchText:
But we'll still pay you and give you food to eat on top
of that.
jpnChrName: 勿論、給料は払わせてもらうし食事も付けよう。
jpnSearchText: 勿論、給料は払わせてもらうし食事も付けよう。

engChrName: I don't think that's such a bad deal, is it?
engSearchText: I don't think that's such a bad deal, is it?
jpnChrName: 君にとって悪くない条件だと 思うんだがどうかな？
jpnSearchText:
君にとって悪くない条件だと
思うんだがどうかな？

engChrName: I definitely agree that with a personality like hers, she'd have a real tough time fittin' in over at the temple.
engSearchText:
I definitely agree that with a personality like hers,
she'd have a real tough time fittin' in over at
the temple.
jpnChrName: 寺院に馴染めるかどうかも怪しい かなりの跳ねっ返りだからな……
jpnSearchText:
寺院に馴染めるかどうかも怪しい
かなりの跳ねっ返りだからな……

engChrName: Would you be open to taking her in yourself?
engSearchText: Would you be open to taking her in yourself?
jpnChrName: ここはアンタが預かってみちゃどうだ？
jpnSearchText: ここはアンタが預かってみちゃどうだ？

engChrName: Actually...I'd thought about that as well.
engSearchText: Actually...I'd thought about that as well.
jpnChrName: ……正直、それも考えてはいたんだ。
jpnSearchText: ……正直、それも考えてはいたんだ。

engChrName: We have an empty apartment we normally rent out for caravans that's going unoccupied, so she'd still have a place to stay.
engSearchText:
We have an empty apartment we normally rent out
for caravans that's going unoccupied, so she'd still
have a place to stay.
jpnChrName: 商隊用に手配してある 貸家の一室が空いてるから家には困らんしな。
jpnSearchText:
商隊用に手配してある
貸家の一室が空いてるから家には困らんしな。

engChrName: ...You know what? I'll do it. This must be Arusha's hand at work. I'd be happy to be your guardian for a while and see where we go from there.
engSearchText:
...You know what? I'll do it. This must be Arusha's
hand at work. I'd be happy to be your guardian for a
while and see where we go from there.
jpnChrName: ──よし、これも何かの縁だろう。 一時的な保護者として面倒を見ようじゃないか！
jpnSearchText:
──よし、これも何かの縁だろう。
一時的な保護者として面倒を見ようじゃないか！

engChrName: I'll even have you come work with us in the bazaar!
engSearchText: I'll even have you come work with us in the bazaar!
jpnChrName: ついでにバザールで 一緒に働いてもらうとしよう！
jpnSearchText:
ついでにバザールで
一緒に働いてもらうとしよう！

engChrName: Say what?! Who would want a thief working there? Especially with everything I've taken?
engSearchText:
Say what?! Who would want a thief working there?
Especially with everything I've taken?
jpnChrName: どういうつもり？ アタシはバザールの物を盗んでたのよ！？
jpnSearchText:
どういうつもり？
アタシはバザールの物を盗んでたのよ！？

engChrName: ...Oh, I get it. You just wanna feel good about yourself for being sooo kind to some poor little girl who's down on her luck. Is that it?
engSearchText:
...Oh, I get it. You just wanna feel good about
yourself for being sooo kind to some poor little girl
who's down on her luck. Is that it?
jpnChrName: ……さては、貧しいヤツに優しくしてあげる自分は 良い人間だって、悦に浸ってるんでしょ。
jpnSearchText:
……さては、貧しいヤツに優しくしてあげる自分は
良い人間だって、悦に浸ってるんでしょ。

engChrName: If that's all you think about me, I'll stay on my own and steal to survive, thank you very much!
engSearchText:
If that's all you think about me, I'll stay on my own
and steal to survive, thank you very much!
jpnChrName: そんな風に見下されるくらいなら、 一人で生きた方がマシなんだから！
jpnSearchText:
そんな風に見下されるくらいなら、
一人で生きた方がマシなんだから！

engChrName: Haha... I was once in your shoes, believe it or not. There was this nosey merchant who couldn't keep to himself.
engSearchText:
Haha... I was once in your shoes, believe it or not.
There was this nosey merchant who couldn't keep
to himself.
jpnChrName: はは……実は、私自身がこうやって お節介な商人に拾われた事があるんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
はは……実は、私自身がこうやって
お節介な商人に拾われた事があるんだよ。

engChrName: He took me in, gave me a place to stay, taught me how to work...and eventually, I ended up in charge of the whole bazaar.
engSearchText:
He took me in, gave me a place to stay, taught me
how to work...and eventually, I ended up in charge of
the whole bazaar.
jpnChrName: そこで仕事を勉強していく内に、 元締めを任されるようにまでなった。
jpnSearchText:
そこで仕事を勉強していく内に、
元締めを任されるようにまでなった。

engChrName: I've always wanted to give something back for getting a second chance...and, yes, I see that opportunity in you, Sinem.
engSearchText:
I've always wanted to give something back for getting
a second chance...and, yes, I see that opportunity in
you, Sinem.
jpnChrName: あの日の恩を、こういう形で 返していきたいと思っていてね。
jpnSearchText:
あの日の恩を、こういう形で
返していきたいと思っていてね。

engChrName: You may think my offer is insincere—honestly, that's fair. But I think it is still the right thing to do for your situation, one way or the other.
engSearchText:
You may think my offer is insincere—honestly,
that's fair. But I think it is still the right thing to do
for your situation, one way or the other.
jpnChrName: 偽善と思われようと、 正しいと思う提案をさせてもらっているまでだよ。
jpnSearchText:
偽善と思われようと、
正しいと思う提案をさせてもらっているまでだよ。

engChrName: It's okay. I'm sure once you talk to the stall owners and explain your situation to them, they'll let you stay.
engSearchText:
It's okay. I'm sure once you talk to the stall owners
and explain your situation to them, they'll let you stay.
jpnChrName: バザールの皆さんだって、 きちんと話せば受け入れてくれると思います。
jpnSearchText:
バザールの皆さんだって、
きちんと話せば受け入れてくれると思います。

engChrName: You're going to have to be a little brave, but it's a chance to make a fresh start. I think it'll be worth it.
engSearchText:
You're going to have to be a little brave, but it's a
chance to make a fresh start. I think it'll be worth it.
jpnChrName: 勇気がいる事だと思いますけど、 新しい生き方に挑戦してみたらどうですか。
jpnSearchText:
勇気がいる事だと思いますけど、
新しい生き方に挑戦してみたらどうですか。

engChrName: What she said. If you don't want to get too familiar with the cops, now's the time to start getting your act together.
engSearchText:
What she said. If you don't want to get too familiar
with the cops, now's the time to start getting your
act together.
jpnChrName: 警察の世話になりたくなかったら 素直になるこったな。
jpnSearchText:
警察の世話になりたくなかったら
素直になるこったな。

engChrName: It sounds like you don't exactly enjoy living the way you do, anyway, so what's the harm in taking him up on the offer?
engSearchText:
It sounds like you don't exactly enjoy living the way
you do, anyway, so what's the harm in taking him
up on the offer?
jpnChrName: つうか、今の生活に納得がいってねえなら 断る理由もねえだろ。
jpnSearchText:
つうか、今の生活に納得がいってねえなら
断る理由もねえだろ。

engChrName: *sigh* When you guys put it like that, I guess I can't refuse.
engSearchText:
*sigh* When you guys put it like that, I guess I
can't refuse.
jpnChrName: はぁ……そんな言い方されたら 断れないじゃん。
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……そんな言い方されたら
断れないじゃん。

engChrName: All right. I'll work in your freaking bazaar, since you insist.
engSearchText:
All right. I'll work in your freaking bazaar, since
you insist.
jpnChrName: 分かったわよ、バザールで働いてあげる。
jpnSearchText: 分かったわよ、バザールで働いてあげる。

engChrName: Uh, I mean...if you really want me, that is.
engSearchText: Uh, I mean...if you really want me, that is.
jpnChrName: ていうか……働かせて……ほしい、かも。
jpnSearchText: ていうか……働かせて……ほしい、かも。

engChrName: Bahaha! Of course I do! We're happy to have you aboard!
engSearchText:
Bahaha! Of course I do! We're happy to have
you aboard!
jpnChrName: ははは、勿論だ！ これからよろしく頼むよシーナム君！
jpnSearchText:
ははは、勿論だ！
これからよろしく頼むよシーナム君！

engChrName: Phew. That solves that.
engSearchText: Phew. That solves that.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……一件落着、ですね。
jpnSearchText: ふぅ……一件落着、ですね。

engChrName: Finally. That girl sure made us earn our keep.
engSearchText: Finally. That girl sure made us earn our keep.
jpnChrName: ああ、だいぶ働かされちまったがな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、だいぶ働かされちまったがな。

engChrName: Don't I know it! Thanks for going to all that trouble. I really appreciate it.
engSearchText:
Don't I know it! Thanks for going to all that trouble.
I really appreciate it.
jpnChrName: はは、随分と世話をかけてしまったな。 本当に感謝しているよ。
jpnSearchText:
はは、随分と世話をかけてしまったな。
本当に感謝しているよ。

engChrName: Now it's my turn to do the heavy lifting and support her.
engSearchText:
Now it's my turn to do the heavy lifting and
support her.
jpnChrName: バザールの皆の説得をはじめ 色々と仕事は残っているが……
jpnSearchText:
バザールの皆の説得をはじめ
色々と仕事は残っているが……

engChrName: We've got a long road ahead of us, starting with getting the whole bazaar on board. But one way or another, we'll make it work.
engSearchText:
We've got a long road ahead of us, starting with
getting the whole bazaar on board. But one way or
another, we'll make it work.
jpnChrName: これからが私の頑張り所だな！
jpnSearchText: これからが私の頑張り所だな！

engChrName: I bet you will! Good luck, mister!
engSearchText: I bet you will! Good luck, mister!
jpnChrName: はい、どうか頑張って下さいっ！
jpnSearchText: はい、どうか頑張って下さいっ！

engChrName: Thanks! I'll never forget what you all have done for both of us!
engSearchText:
Thanks! I'll never forget what you all have done for
both of us!
jpnChrName: ああ、君たちに心から感謝を──！
jpnSearchText: ああ、君たちに心から感謝を──！

engChrName: Quest Bazaar Burglar completed!
engSearchText: Quest Bazaar Burglar completed!
jpnChrName: クエスト【バザールのスリ少女】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>バザールのスリ少女<C1>】を達成した！

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: Hey, man. Got a few seconds to talk?
engSearchText: Hey, man. Got a few seconds to talk?
jpnChrName: 悪いんだが、少しいいか？
jpnSearchText: 悪いんだが、少しいいか？

engChrName: Certainly! How can I help you all?
engSearchText: Certainly! How can I help you all?
jpnChrName: おや、どうしましたか？
jpnSearchText: おや、どうしましたか？

engChrName: Yeah, we just realized we got scammed into buyin' some fake souvenirs by a street vendor we ran into.
engSearchText:
Yeah, we just realized we got scammed into buyin'
some fake souvenirs by a street vendor we ran into.
jpnChrName: ああ、実はパチモン屋台に騙されて 土産を買っちまってな……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、実はパチモン屋台に騙されて
土産を買っちまってな……

engChrName: We tried to demand our money back, but the guy won't hear any of it.
engSearchText:
We tried to demand our money back, but the guy
won't hear any of it.
jpnChrName: 払い戻しさせてくれって言ってんだが、 向こうが聞いてくれなくてよ。
jpnSearchText:
払い戻しさせてくれって言ってんだが、
向こうが聞いてくれなくてよ。

engChrName: He what?! That's outrageous! I'm so sorry you all fell victim to that.
engSearchText:
He what?! That's outrageous! I'm so sorry you all fell
victim to that.
jpnChrName: なんと……！　つまり詐欺被害に 遭われたという事ですね。
jpnSearchText:
なんと……！　つまり詐欺被害に
遭われたという事ですね。

engChrName: The Tharbad Police view the rampant counterfeiting in this town as a serious problem in need of addressing.
engSearchText:
The Tharbad Police view the rampant counterfeiting
in this town as a serious problem in need
of addressing.
jpnChrName: 以前から“偽ブランド品”の横行は 問題視されていましたが……
jpnSearchText:
以前から“偽ブランド品”の横行は
問題視されていましたが……

engChrName: Your case deserves urgent attention from us. Rest assured, that seller won't get away with this. He WILL be brought to justice, I promise!
engSearchText:
Your case deserves urgent attention from us.
Rest assured, that seller won't get away with this.
He WILL be brought to justice, I promise!
jpnChrName: やはり早急に手を打つ必要がありますね。 必ず検挙してみせますのでご安心を……！
jpnSearchText:
やはり早急に手を打つ必要がありますね。
必ず検挙してみせますのでご安心を……！

engChrName: Well, glad someone out here cares about the little guy.
engSearchText:
Well, glad someone out here cares about the
little guy.
jpnChrName: ハッ、やけに頼もしいじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、やけに頼もしいじゃねえか。

engChrName: Of course! It's an officer's duty above all else to keep the people of this city safe. I'm more than happy to assist.
engSearchText:
Of course! It's an officer's duty above all else to keep
the people of this city safe. I'm more than happy
to assist.
jpnChrName: 市民の皆様の安全を守る事こそが 警察の使命ですからね。
jpnSearchText:
市民の皆様の安全を守る事こそが
警察の使命ですからね。

engChrName: Tell me, where is this scam artist located?
engSearchText: Tell me, where is this scam artist located?
jpnChrName: それでは、問題の屋台の場所は どちらになりますか？
jpnSearchText:
それでは、問題の屋台の場所は
どちらになりますか？

engChrName: Umm, it's on the street that runs by the casino.
engSearchText: Umm, it's on the street that runs by the casino.
jpnChrName: えと、カジノ前の通りにある屋台ですっ！
jpnSearchText: えと、カジノ前の通りにある屋台ですっ！

engChrName: (Oh, crap! Did I make a mistake? Should I have made something up?)
engSearchText:
(Oh, crap! Did I make a mistake? Should I have made
something up?)
jpnChrName: （……って、素直に言ってしまって   大丈夫だったでしょうか……？）
jpnSearchText:
（……って、素直に言ってしまって
大丈夫だったでしょうか……？）

engChrName: (No, that's okay. I think it'll all work out.)
engSearchText: (No, that's okay. I think it'll all work out.)
jpnChrName: （ま、後でどうにかなるだろ。）
jpnSearchText: （ま、後でどうにかなるだろ。）

engChrName: That street, huh? I've never heard of any bootleggers operating there before.
engSearchText:
That street, huh? I've never heard of any bootleggers
operating there before.
jpnChrName: ふむ、カジノ前の通り……ですか。 あんな場所に屋台があったとは初耳ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、カジノ前の通り……ですか。
あんな場所に屋台があったとは初耳ですね。

engChrName: Wait! You know, I just remembered.
engSearchText: Wait! You know, I just remembered.
jpnChrName: ！　ああそういえば……
jpnSearchText: ！　ああそういえば……

engChrName: The higher ups said that we're supposed to prioritize the film festival for now.
engSearchText:
The higher ups said that we're supposed to prioritize
the film festival for now.
jpnChrName: 残念ながら映画祭に向けた業務を 優先するよう上から言われていましてね。
jpnSearchText:
残念ながら映画祭に向けた業務を
優先するよう上から言われていましてね。

engChrName: So as much as I'd like to drop everything and investigate this seller, I'll probably have to wait to look into it another day.
engSearchText:
So as much as I'd like to drop everything and
investigate this seller, I'll probably have to wait to
look into it another day.
jpnChrName: 本来ならば早急に屋台の調査に移りたい所でしたが また後日対応する事になりそうです。
jpnSearchText:
本来ならば早急に屋台の調査に移りたい所でしたが
また後日対応する事になりそうです。

engChrName: But don't you all worry. I'll do everything I can to make sure you folks get every mira back.
engSearchText:
But don't you all worry. I'll do everything I can to
make sure you folks get every mira back.
jpnChrName: 皆様の被害額も取り返せるよう 出来る限り善処させて頂きますね。
jpnSearchText:
皆様の被害額も取り返せるよう
出来る限り善処させて頂きますね。

engChrName: That's good to know. Thank you for listening to us.
engSearchText: That's good to know. Thank you for listening to us.
jpnChrName: はい、ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: はい、ありがとうございます。

engChrName: Cool. We look forward to hearing good news, then.
engSearchText: Cool. We look forward to hearing good news, then.
jpnChrName: それじゃ良い報告を待たせてもらうとするか。
jpnSearchText: それじゃ良い報告を待たせてもらうとするか。

engChrName: (Huh? What's his deal?)
engSearchText: (Huh? What's his deal?)

engChrName: All right, I think that's enough sleuthin' around for now. We got a bombshell to deal with already.
engSearchText:
All right, I think that's enough sleuthin' around
for now. We got a bombshell to deal with already.
jpnChrName: さて、聞き込みはこの程度で十分だろ。 デカい収穫もあった事だしな。
jpnSearchText:
さて、聞き込みはこの程度で十分だろ。
デカい収穫もあった事だしな。

engChrName: We do? I mean, we talked to a bunch of people, but it sure didn't feel like we heard anything that big.
engSearchText:
We do? I mean, we talked to a bunch of people, but it
sure didn't feel like we heard anything that big.
jpnChrName: 確かに色々と情報は聞き出せましたけど、 デカい収穫というと……？
jpnSearchText:
確かに色々と情報は聞き出せましたけど、
デカい収穫というと……？

engChrName: Speak for yourself. There's one part that's definitely been nagging at me.
engSearchText:
Speak for yourself. There's one part that's definitely
been nagging at me.
jpnChrName: ま、引っかかる所はあったよな。
jpnSearchText: ま、引っかかる所はあったよな。

engChrName: Me, too, although I'm not certain whether it's especially significant.
engSearchText:
Me, too, although I'm not certain whether it's
especially significant.
jpnChrName: そうですね、 まだ確信はありませんけど……
jpnSearchText:
そうですね、
まだ確信はありませんけど……

engChrName: Whaaa—?! You're telling me I'm the only one that didn't pick up on it?! Man...
engSearchText:
Whaaa—?! You're telling me I'm the only one that
didn't pick up on it?! Man...
jpnChrName: ええっ～！　ピンと来てないのって わたしだけなんですか！？
jpnSearchText:
ええっ～！　ピンと来てないのって
わたしだけなんですか！？

engChrName: You'll figure it out once we check back in with the stall owner.
engSearchText:
You'll figure it out once we check back in with the
stall owner.
jpnChrName: ま、その辺についても屋台の店主に 直接確認すれば分かるだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、その辺についても屋台の店主に
直接確認すれば分かるだろ。

engChrName: Let's head back to his place and touch base.
engSearchText: Let's head back to his place and touch base.
jpnChrName: 依頼主の所に戻ってみるぞ。
jpnSearchText: 依頼主の所に戻ってみるぞ。

engChrName: (Okay, time to hit up another cop and see what they've got to say.)
engSearchText:
(Okay, time to hit up another cop and see what
they've got to say.)
jpnChrName: （よし、それじゃ他の警官に聞き込みに行くか。）
jpnSearchText: （よし、それじゃ他の警官に聞き込みに行くか。）

engChrName: Hey. Mind if we have another chat?
engSearchText: Hey. Mind if we have another chat?
jpnChrName: おう、また少し話があるんだがいいか？
jpnSearchText: おう、また少し話があるんだがいいか？

engChrName: Oh, hello again. Is there something else I can—
engSearchText: Oh, hello again. Is there something else I can—
jpnChrName: おや、貴方がたは先ほどの……
jpnSearchText: おや、貴方がたは先ほどの……

engChrName: Right, so, it's time to be real. I'm a spriggan, and these are my assistants.
engSearchText:
Right, so, it's time to be real. I'm a spriggan, and
these are my assistants.
jpnChrName: 実は俺達は解決事務所のモンでな。 コイツから依頼を受けて調査してたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
実は俺達は解決事務所のモンでな。
コイツから依頼を受けて調査してたんだ。

engChrName: A concerned citizen, you see, hired us to help with a crooked cop trying to shake him down for hush money concerning his bootlegging.
engSearchText:
A concerned citizen, you see, hired us to help with a
crooked cop trying to shake him down for hush
money concerning his bootlegging.
jpnChrName: パチモン売りに対して口止め料を要求する 汚職警官をなんとかしてくれってな。
jpnSearchText:
パチモン売りに対して口止め料を要求する
汚職警官をなんとかしてくれってな。

engChrName: That's...an interesting assignment you've been given. I fail to see what this has got to do with me, though.
engSearchText:
That's...an interesting assignment you've been given.
I fail to see what this has got to do with me, though.
jpnChrName: ふむ……なるほど。 しかしそのお話と私に何の関係が？
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……なるほど。
しかしそのお話と私に何の関係が？

engChrName: Like hell you do! I'd recognize your smug face anywhere, asshole!
engSearchText:
Like hell you do! I'd recognize your smug face
anywhere, asshole!
jpnChrName: しらばっくれんな！ こっちはお前の顔を覚えてんだからな！？
jpnSearchText:
しらばっくれんな！
こっちはお前の顔を覚えてんだからな！？

engChrName: It's him! This is definitely the guy!
engSearchText: It's him! This is definitely the guy!
jpnChrName: 解決屋さん、やっぱりコイツで間違いねえっ！
jpnSearchText: 解決屋さん、やっぱりコイツで間違いねえっ！

engChrName: If you don't want to be put on trial for extortion, you'd better back off right now, or else!
engSearchText:
If you don't want to be put on trial for extortion,
you'd better back off right now, or else!
jpnChrName: 恐喝罪で訴えられたくなけりゃ 今すぐ口止め料の件を取り消せぇ！
jpnSearchText:
恐喝罪で訴えられたくなけりゃ
今すぐ口止め料の件を取り消せぇ！

engChrName: Wh-Whoa! Take it easy, mister!
engSearchText: Wh-Whoa! Take it easy, mister!
jpnChrName: あわわっ、落ち着いて下さい……！
jpnSearchText: あわわっ、落ち着いて下さい……！

engChrName: I really can't understand what you're even talking about when you yell like that, sir.
engSearchText:
I really can't understand what you're even talking
about when you yell like that, sir.
jpnChrName: さて……そう怒鳴られては 何を言っているのか分かりかねますが。
jpnSearchText:
さて……そう怒鳴られては
何を言っているのか分かりかねますが。

engChrName: If I happened to say anything to you before, then... very well, I take it back.
engSearchText:
If I happened to say anything to you before, then...
very well, I take it back.
jpnChrName: 私に取り消して欲しいものがあるなら、 “取り消して”差し上げますよ。
jpnSearchText:
私に取り消して欲しいものがあるなら、
“取り消して”差し上げますよ。

engChrName: Easy enough, right? Does that make you feel better? Now, if you'll excuse me, I have to leave. I'm really busy right now.
engSearchText:
Easy enough, right? Does that make you feel better?
Now, if you'll excuse me, I have to leave. I'm really
busy right now.
jpnChrName: ……これで安心して頂けたでしょうか？ それでは私は忙しいので失礼させて頂きますよ。
jpnSearchText:
……これで安心して頂けたでしょうか？
それでは私は忙しいので失礼させて頂きますよ。

engChrName: Huh?!
engSearchText: Huh?!
jpnChrName: なっ……！
jpnSearchText: なっ……！

engChrName: What's the rush, pal? We're not done talking.
engSearchText: What's the rush, pal? We're not done talking.
jpnChrName: 悪いが、まだ話は終わってねえぞ？
jpnSearchText: 悪いが、まだ話は終わってねえぞ？

engChrName: I don't think my client can take you at your word. Y'know, given your rampant history of lyin'.
engSearchText:
I don't think my client can take you at your word.
Y'know, given your rampant history of lyin'.
jpnChrName: “嘘つき”のアンタと取り交わした約束なんて 依頼主も信じ切れねえだろうからな。
jpnSearchText:
“嘘つき”のアンタと取り交わした約束なんて
依頼主も信じ切れねえだろうからな。

engChrName: I don't understand. What else do you want from me?
engSearchText: I don't understand. What else do you want from me?
jpnChrName: どういう意味でしょうか？
jpnSearchText: どういう意味でしょうか？

engChrName: Well...how about you give us your full name and precinct?
engSearchText:
Well...how about you give us your full name
and precinct?
jpnChrName: そうだな…… アンタの所属とフルネームを教えてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな……
アンタの所属とフルネームを教えてくれ。

engChrName: We can, you know, run that by the Tharbad Police and make sure you get a commendation for good service.
engSearchText:
We can, you know, run that by the Tharbad Police
and make sure you get a commendation for
good service.
jpnChrName: 今すぐサルバッドの警察に連絡して、 実在するか確かめさせてもらう。
jpnSearchText:
今すぐサルバッドの警察に連絡して、
実在するか確かめさせてもらう。

engChrName: Even if you came in from a different part of the country to help out, they should still have no problem lookin' you up.
engSearchText:
Even if you came in from a different part of the
country to help out, they should still have no problem
lookin' you up.
jpnChrName: 言っておくが、他所から応援に 駆け付けたんだとしても調べはつくはずだぞ。
jpnSearchText:
言っておくが、他所から応援に
駆け付けたんだとしても調べはつくはずだぞ。

engChrName: What's the matter? Cat got your tongue?
engSearchText: What's the matter? Cat got your tongue?
jpnChrName: どうした、言えねえのか？
jpnSearchText: どうした、言えねえのか？

engChrName: You could show us your badge, too. We can look up your details, no problem. Whatever works for you.
engSearchText:
You could show us your badge, too. We can look up
your details, no problem. Whatever works for you.
jpnChrName: それなら警察手帳を見せてみろよ。 それを渡してくれりゃこっちで調べるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
それなら警察手帳を見せてみろよ。
それを渡してくれりゃこっちで調べるぜ。

engChrName: Th-This is ridiculous! I don't have to put up with this!
engSearchText:
Th-This is ridiculous! I don't have to put up
with this!
jpnChrName: な、何を馬鹿な事を── 私が貴方がたに付き合う義理はありません。
jpnSearchText:
な、何を馬鹿な事を──
私が貴方がたに付き合う義理はありません。

engChrName: If you keep this nonsense up, I'll arrest all of you for disturbing the peace!
engSearchText:
If you keep this nonsense up, I'll arrest all of you for
disturbing the peace!
jpnChrName: これ以上余計な詮索を続けるなら、 公務執行妨害で逮捕しますよ！？
jpnSearchText:
これ以上余計な詮索を続けるなら、
公務執行妨害で逮捕しますよ！？

engChrName: ...Ohh, so you'll take us down to the police station, riiight?
engSearchText:
...Ohh, so you'll take us down to the police
station, riiight?
jpnChrName: それならそれで、わたし達を 警察署に連れて行ったらどうですか。
jpnSearchText:
それならそれで、わたし達を
警察署に連れて行ったらどうですか。

engChrName: They'll know you're a fake right away if you do that, you dummy!
engSearchText:
They'll know you're a fake right away if you do that,
you dummy!
jpnChrName: なりすましだと気付かれるに 決まってますからっ！
jpnSearchText:
なりすましだと気付かれるに
決まってますからっ！

engChrName: Little bi—
engSearchText: Little bi—

engChrName: You really are an impostor! What kind of cop talks to civilians like that, huh?!
engSearchText:
You really are an impostor! What kind of cop talks to
civilians like that, huh?!
jpnChrName: ほらな！　その態度、 やっぱりアンタは偽物なんだろ！？
jpnSearchText:
ほらな！　その態度、
やっぱりアンタは偽物なんだろ！？

engChrName: Bastard! You'll pay for making a fool out of me! Let's go!
engSearchText:
Bastard! You'll pay for making a fool out of me!
Let's go!
jpnChrName: この野郎っ！ 散々オレをおちょくりやがって──ッ！
jpnSearchText:
この野郎っ！
散々オレをおちょくりやがって──ッ！

engChrName: You dumbass, don't—!
engSearchText: You dumbass, don't—!
jpnChrName: おい馬鹿ッ──！
jpnSearchText: おい馬鹿ッ──！

engChrName: Stay where you are!
engSearchText: Stay where you are!
jpnChrName: ──近づくなッ！
jpnSearchText: <S5>──近づくなッ！

engChrName: That's it! I tried to keep calm, but you just had to get ahead of yourself. I think it's time you shut the hell up!
engSearchText:
That's it! I tried to keep calm, but you just had to get
ahead of yourself. I think it's time you shut the
hell up!
jpnChrName: 大人しくしてりゃ調子に乗りやがって…… 今すぐ黙らせてやるッ！
jpnSearchText:
大人しくしてりゃ調子に乗りやがって……
今すぐ黙らせてやるッ！

engChrName: Huh?!
engSearchText: Huh?!

engChrName: I tried to warn you, dude!
engSearchText: I tried to warn you, dude!
jpnChrName: チッ、だから警告しただろうが──！
jpnSearchText: チッ、だから警告しただろうが──！

engChrName: Oh, crud! We're starting to draw some serious attention!
engSearchText:
Oh, crud! We're starting to draw some
serious attention!
jpnChrName: ど、どうしましょう、 騒ぎが広がっちゃいます……！
jpnSearchText:
ど、どうしましょう、
騒ぎが広がっちゃいます……！

engChrName: Everybody, please, calm down! We have the situation under control!
engSearchText:
Everybody, please, calm down! We have the situation
under control!
jpnChrName: 皆さん落ち着いて下さい……！
jpnSearchText: 皆さん落ち着いて下さい……！

engChrName: Shit. Could this get any worse?
engSearchText: Shit. Could this get any worse?
jpnChrName: チッ、最悪の状況だな──
jpnSearchText: チッ、最悪の状況だな──

engChrName: (He's right. I don't want this to end with the client getting stabbed.)
engSearchText:
(He's right. I don't want this to end with the client
getting stabbed.)
jpnChrName: （クソッ、依頼人が刺されちまう事だけは   避けてえが──）
jpnSearchText:
（クソッ、依頼人が刺されちまう事だけは
避けてえが──）

engChrName: (On the one hand, I probably can't guarantee his safety unless I give up on apprehending our impostor.)
engSearchText:
(On the one hand, I probably can't guarantee his
safety unless I give up on apprehending
our impostor.)
jpnChrName: （安全の確保を優先するなら、   偽警官を確保するのは難しくなるだろう。）
jpnSearchText:
（安全の確保を優先するなら、
偽警官を確保するのは難しくなるだろう。）

engChrName: (On the other, this guy really seems like bad news. I can try to take him down, but we might not make it out unscathed.)
engSearchText:
(On the other, this guy really seems like bad news.
I can try to take him down, but we might not make it
out unscathed.)
jpnChrName: （タチの悪い犯罪者みてえだし、   多少の犠牲は覚悟して取り押さえちまうか──？）
jpnSearchText:
（タチの悪い犯罪者みてえだし、
多少の犠牲は覚悟して取り押さえちまうか──？）

engChrName: (The client's safety has to come first.)
engSearchText: (The client's safety has to come first.)
jpnChrName: （ここは依頼人の安全が最優先だな。）
jpnSearchText: （ここは依頼人の安全が最優先だな。）

engChrName: (I've got to come up with a bluff or something to get this guy to back off, ASAP.)
engSearchText:
(I've got to come up with a bluff or something to get
this guy to back off, ASAP.)
jpnChrName: （ハッタリでも何でも使って   コイツを引き下がらせる──！）
jpnSearchText:
（ハッタリでも何でも使って
コイツを引き下がらせる──！）

engChrName: Don't try anything stupid.
engSearchText: Don't try anything stupid.
jpnChrName: いいか、お前の方こそ動くんじゃねえ。
jpnSearchText: いいか、お前の方こそ動くんじゃねえ。

engChrName: It won't be long before the real cops come and crash this party.
engSearchText:
It won't be long before the real cops come and crash
this party.
jpnChrName: 間もなくここには 本物の警察が駆け付ける。
jpnSearchText:
間もなくここには
本物の警察が駆け付ける。

engChrName: You seem smart. It wouldn't take much effort for people like us to apprehend your dumb ass. You do realize that, yeah?
engSearchText:
You seem smart. It wouldn't take much effort for
people like us to apprehend your dumb ass. You do
realize that, yeah?
jpnChrName: そうでなくても、俺達の腕なら お前を捕らえるのは簡単だって事は分かるよな？
jpnSearchText:
そうでなくても、俺達の腕なら
お前を捕らえるのは簡単だって事は分かるよな？

engChrName: Hmph.
engSearchText: Hmph.

engChrName: I'll make you a deal. If you calm down and leave quietly, we'll let you go.
engSearchText:
I'll make you a deal. If you calm down and leave
quietly, we'll let you go.
jpnChrName: だが、お前がここで 大人しく引くってんなら見逃してやるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
だが、お前がここで
大人しく引くってんなら見逃してやるぜ。

engChrName: You have to agree to leave my client alone from now on. No exceptions.
engSearchText:
You have to agree to leave my client alone from
now on. No exceptions.
jpnChrName: それと、二度とコイツに 手出しをしないっつう条件付きだ。
jpnSearchText:
それと、二度とコイツに
手出しをしないっつう条件付きだ。

engChrName: And if you don't and you try anything funny again? Well, you don't need us to tell you what'll happen, do you?
engSearchText:
And if you don't and you try anything funny again?
Well, you don't need us to tell you what'll happen,
do you?
jpnChrName: それが飲み込めねえ場合は──分かってるよな？
jpnSearchText: それが飲み込めねえ場合は──分かってるよな？

engChrName: ...If I find out I've been tricked, there'll be hell to pay. Understand?
engSearchText:
...If I find out I've been tricked, there'll be hell to pay.
Understand?
jpnChrName: ……騙しやがったら承知しねえぞ？
jpnSearchText: ……騙しやがったら承知しねえぞ？

engChrName: Yeah, yeah. We're honest, unlike you. Now hurry up and get the hell out of here. We've got no deal till you're gone.
engSearchText:
Yeah, yeah. We're honest, unlike you. Now hurry up
and get the hell out of here. We've got no deal till
you're gone.
jpnChrName: ああ、いいからさっさと消えちまえ。 勿論約束は守ってもらうがな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、いいからさっさと消えちまえ。
勿論約束は守ってもらうがな。

engChrName: Fine. I'm out of here.
engSearchText: Fine. I'm out of here.
jpnChrName: チッ……
jpnSearchText: チッ……

engChrName: (I've got no choice. My brother would be pissed at me if I got thrown in jail.)
engSearchText:
(I've got no choice. My brother would be pissed at me
if I got thrown in jail.)
jpnChrName: （仕方ねえ……   捕まると兄貴に怒られちまうからな……）
jpnSearchText:
（仕方ねえ……
捕まると兄貴に怒られちまうからな……）

engChrName: *sigh* Glad we made it out of that in one piece somehow.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Glad we made it out of that in one
piece somehow.
jpnChrName: ふぅやれやれ……何とかなったか。
jpnSearchText: ふぅやれやれ……何とかなったか。

engChrName: Ugh... I think that encounter took at least a couple years off my life.
engSearchText:
Ugh... I think that encounter took at least a couple
years off my life.
jpnChrName: はぁ……寿命が縮んだかと思ったぜ……
jpnSearchText: はぁ……寿命が縮んだかと思ったぜ……

engChrName: Maybe if you hadn't gone ballistic on the guy, things would've gone more smoothly. You think about that?
engSearchText:
Maybe if you hadn't gone ballistic on the guy, things
would've gone more smoothly. You think about that?
jpnChrName: アンタが勝手な真似しなけりゃ もう少し話が簡単だったんだがな？
jpnSearchText:
アンタが勝手な真似しなけりゃ
もう少し話が簡単だったんだがな？

engChrName: Look, I'm sorry, all right? I just...got caught up in the heat of the moment.
engSearchText:
Look, I'm sorry, all right? I just...got caught up in the
heat of the moment.
jpnChrName: わ、悪かったって…… ついカッとなっちまってよ。
jpnSearchText:
わ、悪かったって……
ついカッとなっちまってよ。

engChrName: Well, at least you're safe now. That's what matters most.
engSearchText:
Well, at least you're safe now. That's what
matters most.
jpnChrName: とにかくマルセロさんが 無事で安心しました。
jpnSearchText:
とにかくマルセロさんが
無事で安心しました。

engChrName: I guess that means this is case closed, huh?
engSearchText: I guess that means this is case closed, huh?
jpnChrName: これで一件落着、って言えそうですね。
jpnSearchText: これで一件落着、って言えそうですね。

engChrName: Yeah. I think we've scared him enough that he'll think twice before trying anything again.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I think we've scared him enough that he'll
think twice before trying anything again.
jpnChrName: ああ、あそこまで警戒してるなら 約束通り依頼主に手出しはしねえだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、あそこまで警戒してるなら
約束通り依頼主に手出しはしねえだろ。

engChrName: It's a shame we couldn't figure out what the dude's end game was, but at least we got the job itself done.
engSearchText:
It's a shame we couldn't figure out what the dude's
end game was, but at least we got the job itself done.
jpnChrName: 何が目的か分からねえが…… これで依頼は達成できそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
何が目的か分からねえが……
これで依頼は達成できそうだな。

engChrName: Afterward, the party addressed the crowd that had formed, glossing over the circumstances while imploring them to disperse.
engSearchText:
Afterward, the party addressed the crowd that had
formed, glossing over the circumstances while
imploring them to disperse.
jpnChrName: その後ヴァン達は、広場にいた周囲の者達に対して 真相を誤魔化しつつ説得し……
jpnSearchText:
その後ヴァン達は、広場にいた周囲の者達に対して
真相を誤魔化しつつ説得し……

engChrName: Once the commotion died down, they all returned to Marcello's stall.
engSearchText:
Once the commotion died down, they all returned to
Marcello's stall.
jpnChrName: 騒ぎがこれ以上広まらない事を確認してから、 マルセロの屋台に戻ったのだった。
jpnSearchText:
騒ぎがこれ以上広まらない事を確認してから、
マルセロの屋台に戻ったのだった。

engChrName: We're taking him in! Get ready! This could get messy!
engSearchText:
We're taking him in! Get ready! This could
get messy!
jpnChrName: ここは多少無理をしてでも 偽警官を確保してやる──！
jpnSearchText:
ここは多少無理をしてでも
偽警官を確保してやる──！

engChrName: I told you, stay away!
engSearchText: I told you, stay away!
jpnChrName: このっ、近寄るんじゃねえ──！
jpnSearchText: このっ、近寄るんじゃねえ──！

engChrName: Aaaugh!
engSearchText: Aaaugh!
jpnChrName: ヒィ──！
jpnSearchText: ヒィ──！

engChrName: Eat shit!
engSearchText: Eat shit!
jpnChrName: 食らいやがれ──！
jpnSearchText: 食らいやがれ──！

engChrName: AAARGH!
engSearchText: AAARGH!
jpnChrName: ぐはぁああっ……！
jpnSearchText: ぐはぁああっ……！

engChrName: Heh, that all you got? You can keep fighting if you like. I enjoy a good tango.
engSearchText:
Heh, that all you got? You can keep fighting if
you like. I enjoy a good tango.
jpnChrName: ハッ、案外歯ごたえがねえな？ それともこれから楽しませてくれるのかよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、案外歯ごたえがねえな？
それともこれから楽しませてくれるのかよ。

engChrName: You get what we're sayin'? Surrender now if you don't wanna get hurt. Now, what's it going to be?
engSearchText:
You get what we're sayin'? Surrender now if you don't
wanna get hurt. Now, what's it going to be?
jpnChrName: ま、これ以上痛い目に合いたくなけりゃ 大人しく降参するこったな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、これ以上痛い目に合いたくなけりゃ
大人しく降参するこったな。

engChrName: Damn you. Guess the odds are stacked against me...
engSearchText: Damn you. Guess the odds are stacked against me...
jpnChrName: クソッ…… 流石に分が悪すぎたか…………
jpnSearchText:
クソッ……
流石に分が悪すぎたか…………

engChrName: Are you all right?!
engSearchText: Are you all right?!
jpnChrName: 大丈夫ですか……！？
jpnSearchText: 大丈夫ですか……！？

engChrName: Oh, no! You're hurt! Here, let me treat you!
engSearchText: Oh, no! You're hurt! Here, let me treat you!
jpnChrName: マルセロさん、怪我をされたんですね…… 今すぐ手当をします！
jpnSearchText:
マルセロさん、怪我をされたんですね……
今すぐ手当をします！

engChrName: Hey, can one of you contact the police for us?
engSearchText: Hey, can one of you contact the police for us?
jpnChrName: 悪いが警察に通報してくれるか？
jpnSearchText: 悪いが警察に通報してくれるか？

engChrName: Although it wouldn't shock me if they're already on their way with how much of a scene we've made.
engSearchText:
Although it wouldn't shock me if they're already on
their way with how much of a scene we've made.
jpnChrName: ま、この様子だと既に連絡が 行ってるかもしれねえけどな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、この様子だと既に連絡が
行ってるかもしれねえけどな。

engChrName: On it!
engSearchText: On it!
jpnChrName: 分かりました……！
jpnSearchText: 分かりました……！

engChrName: Before long, the police came rushing in. Once informed of the situation, they took 'Officer' Camilo into custody.
engSearchText:
Before long, the police came rushing in.
Once informed of the situation, they took 'Officer'
Camilo into custody.
jpnChrName: 間もなくヴァン達のもとに警察が駆け付け…… 事情を説明し、カミロ巡査を引き渡す事となった。
jpnSearchText:
間もなくヴァン達のもとに警察が駆け付け……
事情を説明し、カミロ巡査を引き渡す事となった。

engChrName: Soon enough, it was determined that he was one of the Devancy Brothers, who were wanted in Edith.
engSearchText:
Soon enough, it was determined that he was one of
the Devancy Brothers, who were wanted in Edith.
jpnChrName: するとそこで、彼が首都で指名手配されていた 『ディバンシー兄弟』の一人という事が判明する。
jpnSearchText:
するとそこで、彼が首都で指名手配されていた
『ディバンシー兄弟』の一人という事が判明する。

engChrName: And so, the case of the extorting impostor was laid to rest.
engSearchText:
And so, the case of the extorting impostor was laid
to rest.
jpnChrName: こうして無事に汚職警官ならぬ偽警官を 捕らえたヴァン達は──
jpnSearchText:
こうして無事に汚職警官ならぬ偽警官を
捕らえたヴァン達は──

engChrName: With the culprit now apprehended, they all made their way back to Marcello's stall.
engSearchText:
With the culprit now apprehended, they all made
their way back to Marcello's stall.
jpnChrName: マルセロと共に屋台へと戻っていった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>マルセロと共に屋台へと戻っていった。

engChrName: Please, you've got to help me! Is there any chance I could see a green-haired bracer who works here?
engSearchText:
Please, you've got to help me! Is there any chance I
could see a green-haired bracer who works here?
jpnChrName: お願いします、あの緑髪の遊撃士の方を 呼んで来てもらえませんか？
jpnSearchText:
お願いします、あの緑髪の遊撃士の方を
呼んで来てもらえませんか？

engChrName: I lost my wallet somewhere. I'm hoping if I talk to him, he might know where it could've gone.
engSearchText:
I lost my wallet somewhere. I'm hoping if I talk to
him, he might know where it could've gone.
jpnChrName: あの人に聞けば、もしかしたら 財布を落とした場所が分かるかもしれないんです……！
jpnSearchText:
あの人に聞けば、もしかしたら
財布を落とした場所が分かるかもしれないんです……！

engChrName: Seems the receptionist's a little occupied at the moment.
engSearchText:
Seems the receptionist's a little occupied at
the moment.
jpnChrName: おっと、どうやら取り込み中みてえだな。
jpnSearchText: おっと、どうやら取り込み中みてえだな。

engChrName: This guy must be desperate if he's coming in here at this hour asking for help.
engSearchText:
This guy must be desperate if he's coming in here at
this hour asking for help.
jpnChrName: こんな時間に依頼しに来るたあ、 穏やかじゃなさそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
こんな時間に依頼しに来るたあ、
穏やかじゃなさそうだが。

engChrName: Indeed. Let's watch and see what happens. Perhaps we'll learn something.
engSearchText:
Indeed. Let's watch and see what happens.
Perhaps we'll learn something.
jpnChrName: それでは、少し様子を窺ってみましょうか。
jpnSearchText: それでは、少し様子を窺ってみましょうか。

engChrName: I'm sorry, I'm going to need a little more information first. Could you explain what, exactly, is going on?
engSearchText:
I'm sorry, I'm going to need a little more
information first. Could you explain what, exactly, is
going on?
jpnChrName: 失礼ですが、まずは詳しい状況を 聞かせて頂いてもよろしいでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
失礼ですが、まずは詳しい状況を
聞かせて頂いてもよろしいでしょうか？

engChrName: Uhh, right, of course. Basically, I was on my way to Tharbad, driving along the Sandsea.
engSearchText:
Uhh, right, of course. Basically, I was on my way to
Tharbad, driving along the Sandsea.
jpnChrName: ええ……あれは僕がサルバッドへ 車で向かっている時の事でした。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……あれは僕がサルバッドへ
車で向かっている時の事でした。

engChrName: Everything was going just fine until I suddenly, out of nowhere, blew a tire.
engSearchText:
Everything was going just fine until I suddenly,
out of nowhere, blew a tire.
jpnChrName: 道中、突然タイヤが バーストしてしまったんです。
jpnSearchText:
道中、突然タイヤが
バーストしてしまったんです。

engChrName: Luckily, this green-haired bracer ran over to help us. He was kind enough to patch up the tire with the tools he had.
engSearchText:
Luckily, this green-haired bracer ran over to help us.
He was kind enough to patch up the tire with the
tools he had.
jpnChrName: するとそこに緑髪の遊撃士が駆け付けて…… 手持ちの道具で修理してくれたんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
するとそこに緑髪の遊撃士が駆け付けて……
手持ちの道具で修理してくれたんですよ。

engChrName: It turned out he was heading to Tharbad, too, so we let him hitch a ride with us to thank him for his generosity.
engSearchText:
It turned out he was heading to Tharbad, too, so we
let him hitch a ride with us to thank him for
his generosity.
jpnChrName: 彼もサルバッドに向かっていたそうなので、 お礼も兼ねて後部座席に乗せて送って来たんです。
jpnSearchText:
彼もサルバッドに向かっていたそうなので、
お礼も兼ねて後部座席に乗せて送って来たんです。

engChrName: After that, we all made it to Tharbad. But just as I was going through my things so I could find my wallet and buy some souvenirs...
engSearchText:
After that, we all made it to Tharbad. But just as I
was going through my things so I could find my
wallet and buy some souvenirs...
jpnChrName: その後、まずはサルバッドで お土産を買おうと思って荷物を見たら……
jpnSearchText:
その後、まずはサルバッドで
お土産を買おうと思って荷物を見たら……

engChrName: That's when I realized it went missing, and now I'm scrambling to find it. Isn't there something you can do?!
engSearchText:
That's when I realized it went missing, and now I'm
scrambling to find it. Isn't there something you
can do?!
jpnChrName: いつの間にか、僕の財布が なくなってしまっていたんですよ……！
jpnSearchText:
いつの間にか、僕の財布が
なくなってしまっていたんですよ……！

engChrName: All right, I understand. You want to talk to this bracer to see if he has seen or possesses your wallet?
engSearchText:
All right, I understand. You want to talk to this
bracer to see if he has seen or possesses your wallet?
jpnChrName: 成程……それで、財布を探す過程で 遊撃士からも話を聞いてみたいという事ですね。
jpnSearchText:
成程……それで、財布を探す過程で
遊撃士からも話を聞いてみたいという事ですね。

engChrName: Yeah, that's exactly right. I'm beginning to wonder if maybe I got pickpocketed somehow while he was fixing our tire.
engSearchText:
Yeah, that's exactly right. I'm beginning to wonder if
maybe I got pickpocketed somehow while he was
fixing our tire.
jpnChrName: はい……もしかしたらタイヤの修理中に 誰かに盗まれたのかもしれませんし。
jpnSearchText:
はい……もしかしたらタイヤの修理中に
誰かに盗まれたのかもしれませんし。

engChrName: I just want to ask if he noticed anything strange. Now, is there any way you can call him over?
engSearchText:
I just want to ask if he noticed anything strange.
Now, is there any way you can call him over?
jpnChrName: 気付いた事があれば教えてほしいんです！ どうか彼をここに呼んでもらえませんか？
jpnSearchText:
気付いた事があれば教えてほしいんです！
どうか彼をここに呼んでもらえませんか？

engChrName: I'm sorry. It's probably going to take a little time for us to arrange a meeting with him.
engSearchText:
I'm sorry. It's probably going to take a little time for
us to arrange a meeting with him.
jpnChrName: 申し訳ありませんが……今すぐに、 というのは難しい状況なのです。
jpnSearchText:
申し訳ありませんが……今すぐに、
というのは難しい状況なのです。

engChrName: Based on your description, I know for a fact that he doesn't belong to our branch. That's what makes it tricky.
engSearchText:
Based on your description, I know for a fact that he
doesn't belong to our branch. That's what makes
it tricky.
jpnChrName: 外見の特徴からして、サルバッド支部の 遊撃士ではない事だけは確かなので……
jpnSearchText:
外見の特徴からして、サルバッド支部の
遊撃士ではない事だけは確かなので……

engChrName: I'd say it's more likely that whoever it was who came over and helped you was operating independently.
engSearchText:
I'd say it's more likely that whoever it was who came
over and helped you was operating independently.
jpnChrName: 個人的に応援に駆け付けて下さった 遊撃士という可能性が高いのですが。
jpnSearchText:
個人的に応援に駆け付けて下さった
遊撃士という可能性が高いのですが。

engChrName: No bracer matching that description has registered with us. If he's in town, we probably won't hear from him until at least tomorrow.
engSearchText:
No bracer matching that description has registered
with us. If he's in town, we probably won't hear from
him until at least tomorrow.
jpnChrName: 今の所そういった連絡は来ていないので、 早くても明日以降に連絡がくるものかと……
jpnSearchText:
今の所そういった連絡は来ていないので、
早くても明日以降に連絡がくるものかと……

engChrName: Really...? I guess I'll just have to wait and hope for the best.
engSearchText:
Really...? I guess I'll just have to wait and hope for
the best.
jpnChrName: はぁ……分かりました。 そういう事なら仕方ないですね……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……分かりました。
そういう事なら仕方ないですね……

engChrName: Still, if you hear anything about my wallet tonight, could you get in touch with me?
engSearchText:
Still, if you hear anything about my wallet tonight,
could you get in touch with me?
jpnChrName: でも、財布の事だけでも 今日中に何か分かったら教えて下さいね。
jpnSearchText:
でも、財布の事だけでも
今日中に何か分かったら教えて下さいね。

engChrName: I'll wait around outside, by the oasis, in case anything comes up.
engSearchText:
I'll wait around outside, by the oasis, in case anything
comes up.
jpnChrName: 向こうのオアシスで少し待たせてもらいますから。
jpnSearchText: 向こうのオアシスで少し待たせてもらいますから。

engChrName: *sigh* It never ends...
engSearchText: *sigh* It never ends...
jpnChrName: ふぅ……困りました……
jpnSearchText: ふぅ……困りました……

engChrName: I feel bad for her. It seems the guild's getting so many visitors, she can't catch a break.
engSearchText:
I feel bad for her. It seems the guild's getting so many
visitors, she can't catch a break.
jpnChrName: ギルドも人の出入りが 多くて大変みたいですね……
jpnSearchText:
ギルドも人の出入りが
多くて大変みたいですね……

engChrName: Yeah. I hope that other man manages to find his wallet, too. That's awful, having it stolen.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I hope that other man manages to find his
wallet, too. That's awful, having it stolen.
jpnChrName: お財布泥棒ですか…… 早く見つかるといいんですけど。
jpnSearchText:
お財布泥棒ですか……
早く見つかるといいんですけど。

engChrName: Let's have a chat with her now that we're here and the line's opened up. We could learn somethin' interesting.
engSearchText:
Let's have a chat with her now that we're here and
the line's opened up. We could learn
somethin' interesting.
jpnChrName: ま、情報収集がてら 少し話を聞いてみてもいいかもしれねえな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、情報収集がてら
少し話を聞いてみてもいいかもしれねえな。

engChrName: We meet again. Looks like you're keepin' busy, takin' people's requests this late.
engSearchText:
We meet again. Looks like you're keepin' busy, takin'
people's requests this late.
jpnChrName: よう、こんな時間まで依頼人が来るとは 相当忙しそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
よう、こんな時間まで依頼人が来るとは
相当忙しそうだな。

engChrName: Ah, you all again. You heard that, I'm guessing?
engSearchText: Ah, you all again. You heard that, I'm guessing?
jpnChrName: 解決事務所の皆さんですか…… やはり話を聞いていらしたんですね。
jpnSearchText:
解決事務所の皆さんですか……
やはり話を聞いていらしたんですね。

engChrName: Yeah, we did. I'm sorry, we really didn't mean to pry.
engSearchText: Yeah, we did. I'm sorry, we really didn't mean to pry.
jpnChrName: はい……聞き耳を立ててしまってすみません。
jpnSearchText: はい……聞き耳を立ててしまってすみません。

engChrName: That man said he lost his wallet, right?
engSearchText: That man said he lost his wallet, right?
jpnChrName: あの方がお財布を無くしてしまった という事でしたけど……
jpnSearchText:
あの方がお財布を無くしてしまった
という事でしたけど……

engChrName: If only there was some way to talk to that green-haired bracer he mentioned and get his side of the story.
engSearchText:
If only there was some way to talk to that
green-haired bracer he mentioned and get his side of
the story.
jpnChrName: まずは“緑髪の遊撃士”に話を聞ければ 何か分かるかもしれないという事でしたね。
jpnSearchText:
まずは“緑髪の遊撃士”に話を聞ければ
何か分かるかもしれないという事でしたね。

engChrName: Indeed, although it sounds like determining which bracer it was could prove to be difficult.
engSearchText:
Indeed, although it sounds like determining which
bracer it was could prove to be difficult.
jpnChrName: しかしながら、その緑髪の遊撃士が どなたなのか特定が困難だとか。
jpnSearchText:
しかしながら、その緑髪の遊撃士が
どなたなのか特定が困難だとか。

engChrName: You're telling me. I'm pretty confident it's someone from out of town who decided to come by and help.
engSearchText:
You're telling me. I'm pretty confident it's someone
from out of town who decided to come by and help.
jpnChrName: ええ、おそらく外から応援に 駆け付けて下さった方だとは思うのですが……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、おそらく外から応援に
駆け付けて下さった方だとは思うのですが……

engChrName: But when he'll get in touch...who knows? He could drop by after he's checked out the city tonight. It could take him longer, even.
engSearchText:
But when he'll get in touch...who knows? He could
drop by after he's checked out the city tonight.
It could take him longer, even.
jpnChrName: 街の下見を終えてから連絡をくれるつもりなのか、 明日連絡をくれるつもりなのか……
jpnSearchText:
街の下見を終えてから連絡をくれるつもりなのか、
明日連絡をくれるつもりなのか……

engChrName: Until we can figure out more, there's no way for me to pinpoint which bracer it was that man met.
engSearchText:
Until we can figure out more, there's no way for me
to pinpoint which bracer it was that man met.
jpnChrName: とにかく現在は“緑髪の遊撃士”を 特定する事が出来ない状況ですね。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく現在は“緑髪の遊撃士”を
特定する事が出来ない状況ですね。

engChrName: So it's mostly hurry up and wait for tomorrow. Boo!
engSearchText: So it's mostly hurry up and wait for tomorrow. Boo!
jpnChrName: うーん、少なくとも明日まで待たないと 分からないという事ですか。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、少なくとも明日まで待たないと
分からないという事ですか。

engChrName: You guys are weirdly interested in all this.
engSearchText: You guys are weirdly interested in all this.
jpnChrName: まぁ遊撃士が見つかろうと財布が見つかろうと 知ったこっちゃねえんだが……
jpnSearchText:
まぁ遊撃士が見つかろうと財布が見つかろうと
知ったこっちゃねえんだが……

engChrName: Who cares if this mystery bracer shows up with one wallet or a hundred? Lotta mira, sure, but it's got nothing to do with us.
engSearchText:
Who cares if this mystery bracer shows up with one
wallet or a hundred? Lotta mira, sure, but it's got
nothing to do with us.
jpnChrName: アンタは妙に気になってるみたいじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText: アンタは妙に気になってるみたいじゃねえか？

engChrName: Maybe. Maybe... But somethin' about this whole situation stinks.
engSearchText:
Maybe. Maybe... But somethin' about this whole
situation stinks.
jpnChrName: まあな……確かに俺達には関係ねえ話だが コイツはどうにも“匂い”やがる。
jpnSearchText:
まあな……確かに俺達には関係ねえ話だが
コイツはどうにも“匂い”やがる。

engChrName: Hmm? What do you mean?
engSearchText: Hmm? What do you mean?
jpnChrName: 匂い……ですか？
jpnSearchText: 匂い……ですか？

engChrName: Ah, nothing. Just talkin' to myself. Good luck getting the guy sorted out.
engSearchText:
Ah, nothing. Just talkin' to myself. Good luck getting
the guy sorted out.
jpnChrName: いや、アンタは気にしないでくれ。 それじゃ大変だろうが後は頑張ってくれよ。
jpnSearchText:
いや、アンタは気にしないでくれ。
それじゃ大変だろうが後は頑張ってくれよ。

engChrName: From the sound of that, Van, you don't want to let this go.
engSearchText:
From the sound of that, Van, you don't want to let
this go.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん、この後はどうしましょうか？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん、この後はどうしましょうか？

engChrName: Well...that guy mentioned he was gonna hang out over by the oasis.
engSearchText:
Well...that guy mentioned he was gonna hang out
over by the oasis.
jpnChrName: ふむ……アイツは確か、 この後オアシスに行くとか言ってたよな。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……アイツは確か、
この後オアシスに行くとか言ってたよな。

engChrName: Couldn't hurt to have a chat with him. See if we can coax anything else out.
engSearchText:
Couldn't hurt to have a chat with him. See if we can
coax anything else out.
jpnChrName: ちょいと話を聞いてみても いいかもしれねえ。
jpnSearchText:
ちょいと話を聞いてみても
いいかもしれねえ。

engChrName: As you wish, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText: As you wish, Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: ふふ、かしこまりました。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、かしこまりました。

engChrName: Hey, I wanted to introduce myself. We're from Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText:
Hey, I wanted to introduce myself. We're from
Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: 俺達は《アークライド解決事務所》のモンなんだが。
jpnSearchText: 俺達は《アークライド解決事務所》のモンなんだが。

engChrName: We were just at the guild, too, and happened to overhear your conversation at the front desk.
engSearchText:
We were just at the guild, too, and happened to
overhear your conversation at the front desk.
jpnChrName: さっき偶然ギルドに居合わせてな。 悪いが話を聞かせてもらったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
さっき偶然ギルドに居合わせてな。
悪いが話を聞かせてもらったぜ。

engChrName: Oh, yeah, I kind of remember passing by you people on the way out.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah, I kind of remember passing by you people
on the way out.
jpnChrName: ああ……確かにギルドを出る時 君たちを見かけたような……？
jpnSearchText:
ああ……確かにギルドを出る時
君たちを見かけたような……？

engChrName: Would any of you happen to know where I might find that green-haired bracer?
engSearchText:
Would any of you happen to know where I might
find that green-haired bracer?
jpnChrName: もしかして皆さんは 緑髪の遊撃士の居場所をご存知なんですか？
jpnSearchText:
もしかして皆さんは
緑髪の遊撃士の居場所をご存知なんですか？

engChrName: Not quite. We're actually lookin' for him, too. Got some business of our own.
engSearchText:
Not quite. We're actually lookin' for him, too.
Got some business of our own.
jpnChrName: いいや、実は俺達もその遊撃士に ちょいと用事があって探しててな。
jpnSearchText:
いいや、実は俺達もその遊撃士に
ちょいと用事があって探しててな。

engChrName: I was hopin' you could tell us a little bit more about what happened.
engSearchText:
I was hopin' you could tell us a little bit more about
what happened.
jpnChrName: アンタからもう少し詳しく話を 聞かせてもらいたいと思ったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
アンタからもう少し詳しく話を
聞かせてもらいたいと思ったんだ。

engChrName: Would you mind? Anything else you can think of will help, big or small.
engSearchText:
Would you mind? Anything else you can think of will
help, big or small.
jpnChrName: ソイツに関して何でもいいから 話してみちゃくれないか？
jpnSearchText:
ソイツに関して何でもいいから
話してみちゃくれないか？

engChrName: Like, did he have any other distinct features or did anything else stick out to you in general?
engSearchText:
Like, did he have any other distinct features or did
anything else stick out to you in general?
jpnChrName: 例えば、特徴とか気になった事とかよ。
jpnSearchText: 例えば、特徴とか気になった事とかよ。

engChrName: You, too, huh? I'm sorry. In terms of features, I don't remember anything else other than he had green hair.
engSearchText:
You, too, huh? I'm sorry. In terms of features, I don't
remember anything else other than he had green hair.
jpnChrName: そういう事なら僕としても 協力させてもらいたいですが……
jpnSearchText:
そういう事なら僕としても
協力させてもらいたいですが……

engChrName: I wish I could be of more help on that end. Blast my memory!
engSearchText:
I wish I could be of more help on that end. Blast
my memory!
jpnChrName: すみません、特徴といっても 緑髪の男性だったという事くらいしか覚えていなくて。
jpnSearchText:
すみません、特徴といっても
緑髪の男性だったという事くらいしか覚えていなくて。

engChrName: As for anything else that stuck out—no, nothing really comes to mind.
engSearchText:
As for anything else that stuck out—no, nothing
really comes to mind.
jpnChrName: 後はそうですね……気になった事ですか。 これといった事は無かったのですが……
jpnSearchText:
後はそうですね……気になった事ですか。
これといった事は無かったのですが……

engChrName: Wait, that's not true. Actually, I do remember something that happened after we arrived.
engSearchText:
Wait, that's not true. Actually, I do remember
something that happened after we arrived.
jpnChrName: あっ、でもそういえば…… 車を降りた時の事になるんですが。
jpnSearchText:
あっ、でもそういえば……
車を降りた時の事になるんですが。

engChrName: We bumped into a police officer who was patrolling the parking lot.
engSearchText:
We bumped into a police officer who was patrolling
the parking lot.
jpnChrName: あの時、ちょうど駐車場を見回りに 来ていた警官とばったり会いましてね。
jpnSearchText:
あの時、ちょうど駐車場を見回りに
来ていた警官とばったり会いましてね。

engChrName: I decided to go up to him and say hello. Strike up a little bit of a conversation.
engSearchText:
I decided to go up to him and say hello. Strike up a
little bit of a conversation.
jpnChrName: 僕はそこで軽く挨拶をしたんですが……
jpnSearchText: 僕はそこで軽く挨拶をしたんですが……

engChrName: But for some reason, the bracer looked uncomfortable. He wouldn't look the officer in the eye.
engSearchText:
But for some reason, the bracer
looked uncomfortable. He wouldn't look the officer
in the eye.
jpnChrName: その時、遊撃士の方はどこか気まずそうに 顔を合わせないようにしていたんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
その時、遊撃士の方はどこか気まずそうに
顔を合わせないようにしていたんですよ。

engChrName: A bracer was avoiding a police officer's gaze entirely? That's certainly a little unusual.
engSearchText:
A bracer was avoiding a police officer's gaze entirely?
That's certainly a little unusual.
jpnChrName: 警察と顔を合わせないように、ですか。 確かに少々違和感がありますね。
jpnSearchText:
警察と顔を合わせないように、ですか。
確かに少々違和感がありますね。

engChrName: That's what I thought. I have heard that cops and bracers don't always get along all that well.
engSearchText:
That's what I thought. I have heard that cops and
bracers don't always get along all that well.
jpnChrName: ええ、でも警察と遊撃士は折り合いが 悪いっていう噂もあるじゃないですか。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、でも警察と遊撃士は折り合いが
悪いっていう噂もあるじゃないですか。

engChrName: I figured maybe that's all it was. It did seem odd, though.
engSearchText:
I figured maybe that's all it was. It did seem
odd, though.
jpnChrName: なので、そういう物なのかな……と 思いもしたんですけど。
jpnSearchText:
なので、そういう物なのかな……と
思いもしたんですけど。

engChrName: Wait, I've never heard that before. Is that true?
engSearchText: Wait, I've never heard that before. Is that true?
jpnChrName: えと、警察と遊撃士って 仲が悪いんですか……？
jpnSearchText:
えと、警察と遊撃士って
仲が悪いんですか……？

engChrName: It's common for police and bracers to run into one another at times because they both work to maintain the peace.
engSearchText:
It's common for police and bracers to run into one
another at times because they both work to maintain
the peace.
jpnChrName: 両者とも治安維持を目的としていますから、 現場で鉢合わせる事も多いそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
両者とも治安維持を目的としていますから、
現場で鉢合わせる事も多いそうですね。

engChrName: The difference is, the police work wholly within the law. Meanwhile, a bracer's first duty is protecting people.
engSearchText:
The difference is, the police work wholly within the
law. Meanwhile, a bracer's first duty is
protecting people.
jpnChrName: そこで、法に準じる警察と 民間人の保護を掲げる遊撃士との間で……
jpnSearchText:
そこで、法に準じる警察と
民間人の保護を掲げる遊撃士との間で……

engChrName: So they theoretically can act extralegally to do so, and sometimes they face jurisdictional friction and, well, differences of opinion.
engSearchText:
So they theoretically can act extralegally to do so, and
sometimes they face jurisdictional friction and, well,
differences of opinion.
jpnChrName: 方針の違いでぶつかってしまう事も あるそうです。
jpnSearchText:
方針の違いでぶつかってしまう事も
あるそうです。

engChrName: Oh, I get it. I guess I can see how that'd happen.
engSearchText: Oh, I get it. I guess I can see how that'd happen.
jpnChrName: なるほど、なんとなく想像がつきました。
jpnSearchText: なるほど、なんとなく想像がつきました。

engChrName: In this case, though, I think this 'bracer' of yours might've had other real good reasons for being a little skittish.
engSearchText:
In this case, though, I think this 'bracer' of yours
might've had other real good reasons for being a
little skittish.
jpnChrName: だが今の話を聞く限りだと、 別の意味でも取れそうな反応だよな？
jpnSearchText:
だが今の話を聞く限りだと、
別の意味でも取れそうな反応だよな？

engChrName: Huh? I don't understand. What do you mean?
engSearchText: Huh? I don't understand. What do you mean?
jpnChrName: ……？ それはどういう……？
jpnSearchText:
……？
それはどういう……？

engChrName: Don't worry about it. We're saying that we're going to look into it on our end, too, and see if we can turn anything up.
engSearchText:
Don't worry about it. We're saying that we're going
to look into it on our end, too, and see if we can turn
anything up.
jpnChrName: ま、後は俺達の方でも調査を 進めさせてもらうから任せておいてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、後は俺達の方でも調査を
進めさせてもらうから任せておいてくれ。

engChrName: I get you're keen to have your wallet back, but I think you should call it a night and come back tomorrow.
engSearchText:
I get you're keen to have your wallet back, but I think
you should call it a night and come back tomorrow.
jpnChrName: アンタも、心配なのは分かるが 明日出直して来る事をオススメするぜ。
jpnSearchText:
アンタも、心配なのは分かるが
明日出直して来る事をオススメするぜ。

engChrName: *sigh* I suppose you have a point.
engSearchText: *sigh* I suppose you have a point.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……分かりました、それもそうですね。
jpnSearchText: ふぅ……分かりました、それもそうですね。

engChrName: On that note, if I may... Were you able to find a place to stay, despite losing your wallet?
engSearchText:
On that note, if I may... Were you able to find a place
to stay, despite losing your wallet?
jpnChrName: ちなみに、財布を盗まれたという事でしたが 宿代の方は問題なかったのでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、財布を盗まれたという事でしたが
宿代の方は問題なかったのでしょうか？

engChrName: Yeah, thanks for asking. The guild was kind enough to cover me until I can pay them back.
engSearchText:
Yeah, thanks for asking. The guild was kind enough
to cover me until I can pay them back.
jpnChrName: ええ、ギルドが代わりに宿代や食費を 立て替えてくれたんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ギルドが代わりに宿代や食費を
立て替えてくれたんですよ。

engChrName: As long as I find my wallet soon, everything should work out one way or the other.
engSearchText:
As long as I find my wallet soon, everything should
work out one way or the other.
jpnChrName: なので、近い内に財布が見つかれば なんとかなるかなと思っています。
jpnSearchText:
なので、近い内に財布が見つかれば
なんとかなるかなと思っています。

engChrName: I'm still anxious, but knowing that I've got you all and the guild looking into it, I guess I feel okay going back to my room for the night.
engSearchText:
I'm still anxious, but knowing that I've got you all and
the guild looking into it, I guess I feel okay going
back to my room for the night.
jpnChrName: 不安ではありますけど……皆さんや ギルドを信じて今日は帰らせてもらいますね。
jpnSearchText:
不安ではありますけど……皆さんや
ギルドを信じて今日は帰らせてもらいますね。

engChrName: I am glad to hear that's all been taken care of. Please take care on your way.
engSearchText:
I am glad to hear that's all been taken care of.
Please take care on your way.
jpnChrName: 成程そうでしたか。 それではどうかお気をつけて。
jpnSearchText:
成程そうでしたか。
それではどうかお気をつけて。

engChrName: That's one way to get rid of a guy. Now we can talk openly.
engSearchText:
That's one way to get rid of a guy. Now we can
talk openly.
jpnChrName: ハッ、露骨に追い払いやがったな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、露骨に追い払いやがったな。

engChrName: Right, so it sounds like this 'green-haired bracer' could be an impostor. What are we gonna do about it?
engSearchText:
Right, so it sounds like this 'green-haired bracer'
could be an impostor. What are we gonna do
about it?
jpnChrName: それで？　緑髪の遊撃士ってヤツが “成りすまし”の可能性がある状況でどうすんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
それで？　緑髪の遊撃士ってヤツが
“成りすまし”の可能性がある状況でどうすんだよ。

engChrName: Wait, what? He is?!
engSearchText: Wait, what? He is?!
jpnChrName: ええっ、成りすましですか！？
jpnSearchText: ええっ、成りすましですか！？

engChrName: Are you saying this is like what happened with that fake police officer we had to deal with before?
engSearchText:
Are you saying this is like what happened with that
fake police officer we had to deal with before?
jpnChrName: お昼に遭遇した偽警官と 似た案件という事でしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
お昼に遭遇した偽警官と
似た案件という事でしょうか。

engChrName: It's a distinct possibility, but we can't say for sure yet.
engSearchText: It's a distinct possibility, but we can't say for sure yet.
jpnChrName: ああ、まだ可能性の域を出ねえがな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、まだ可能性の域を出ねえがな。

engChrName: If this is true, that's really underhanded of him.
engSearchText: If this is true, that's really underhanded of him.
jpnChrName: もし本当に偽物の遊撃士だとしたら、 かなり悪質な詐欺ですよね……
jpnSearchText:
もし本当に偽物の遊撃士だとしたら、
かなり悪質な詐欺ですよね……

engChrName: You're tellin' me. Your average person isn't ever gonna suspect a bracer of committin' a crime.
engSearchText:
You're tellin' me. Your average person isn't ever
gonna suspect a bracer of committin' a crime.
jpnChrName: さっきの観光客しかり、大抵のやつは 遊撃士が犯罪をする訳がねえと思ってやがるからな。
jpnSearchText:
さっきの観光客しかり、大抵のやつは
遊撃士が犯罪をする訳がねえと思ってやがるからな。

engChrName: Therefore, if someone were to believably impersonate a bracer, they would be able to get away with a great many things.
engSearchText:
Therefore, if someone were to believably
impersonate a bracer, they would be able to get
away with a great many things.
jpnChrName: それだけに、成りすましだとすれば やりたい放題できるという事ですか……
jpnSearchText:
それだけに、成りすましだとすれば
やりたい放題できるという事ですか……

engChrName: That could be quite damaging to the organization's reputation if nothing was done about it.
engSearchText:
That could be quite damaging to the organization's
reputation if nothing was done about it.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士の名誉を相当 傷つける事になりそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士の名誉を相当
傷つける事になりそうですね。

engChrName: Luckily, as far as we can tell, the only victim who's emerged so far is that man. Or at least, he's the only one to file a report.
engSearchText:
Luckily, as far as we can tell, the only victim who's
emerged so far is that man. Or at least, he's the only
one to file a report.
jpnChrName: でもあの様子だと、被害報告があったのは 今の所あの方だけのようでした。
jpnSearchText:
でもあの様子だと、被害報告があったのは
今の所あの方だけのようでした。

engChrName: If we're quick enough in catching this impostor, we can minimize the amount of damage he'll do.
engSearchText:
If we're quick enough in catching this impostor, we
can minimize the amount of damage he'll do.
jpnChrName: 今からその遊撃士を見つける事が出来れば、 最低限食い止める事ができそうです。
jpnSearchText:
今からその遊撃士を見つける事が出来れば、
最低限食い止める事ができそうです。

engChrName: Eh, normally, I ain't exactly in the business of coverin' the guild's ass or anything. They can handle themselves just fine.
engSearchText:
Eh, normally, I ain't exactly in the business of coverin'
the guild's ass or anything. They can handle
themselves just fine.
jpnChrName: ま、遊撃士の名誉を守ってやるつもりは さらさらねえんだが……
jpnSearchText:
ま、遊撃士の名誉を守ってやるつもりは
さらさらねえんだが……

engChrName: But I don't see the harm in stickin' our necks out just this once. It'll help us understand what's happening on the ground in this town, too.
engSearchText:
But I don't see the harm in stickin' our necks out just
this once. It'll help us understand what's happening
on the ground in this town, too.
jpnChrName: サルバッドが置かれてる状況を把握する為にも 首を突っ込んでみるとするか。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドが置かれてる状況を把握する為にも
首を突っ込んでみるとするか。

engChrName: So, come hell or high water, we'll uncover who this green-haired chump really is.
engSearchText:
So, come hell or high water, we'll uncover who this
green-haired chump really is.
jpnChrName: ここはひとつ 俺達で“緑髪の遊撃士”の正体を暴くぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ここはひとつ
俺達で“緑髪の遊撃士”の正体を暴くぞ。

engChrName: Hey, if it kills time, I'm game. Lead the way, chief.
engSearchText: Hey, if it kills time, I'm game. Lead the way, chief.
jpnChrName: ハッ、まあ退屈しのぎにはなりそうか。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、まあ退屈しのぎにはなりそうか。

engChrName: I see no reason not to proceed. You have my full support as always, Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText:
I see no reason not to proceed. You have my full
support as always, Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: ふふ、勿論わたくしもお供させて頂きます。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、勿論わたくしもお供させて頂きます。

engChrName: Well, if we're gonna do this, what do we do first?
engSearchText: Well, if we're gonna do this, what do we do first?
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、この後はどうしましょうか？
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ、この後はどうしましょうか？

engChrName: Should we see if anyone else has seen this bracer? Maybe if we talk to more people, we can start tracking him down.
engSearchText:
Should we see if anyone else has seen this bracer?
Maybe if we talk to more people, we can start
tracking him down.
jpnChrName: その遊撃士の目撃情報があれば 足取りを追えそうですけど。
jpnSearchText:
その遊撃士の目撃情報があれば
足取りを追えそうですけど。

engChrName: That's exactly what I think we should do. We need to figure out this guy's trajectory.
engSearchText:
That's exactly what I think we should do. We need to
figure out this guy's trajectory.
jpnChrName: ああ、まずはヤツの動向を探る必要があるだろうな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、まずはヤツの動向を探る必要があるだろうな。

engChrName: If he is a fraud, though, it's probably safe to assume that he's keepin' his distance from the Cultural District. For obvious reasons.
engSearchText:
If he is a fraud, though, it's probably safe to assume
that he's keepin' his distance from the
Cultural District. For obvious reasons.
jpnChrName: まず、ひとつ言えるのは、ヤツが偽者だとしたら ギルドのある伝統地区は避けるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
まず、ひとつ言えるのは、ヤツが偽者だとしたら
ギルドのある伝統地区は避けるはずだ。

engChrName: Perhaps we should talk to people in the Entertainment District and see if he's been spotted around there, then.
engSearchText:
Perhaps we should talk to people in the
Entertainment District and see if he's been spotted
around there, then.
jpnChrName: という事は、歓楽街──あちらでどなたかに 声をかけてみるのがいいかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
という事は、歓楽街──あちらでどなたかに
声をかけてみるのがいいかもしれませんね。

engChrName: Good point. The casino dealers could be a good place to start. They're bound to pay close attention to who's coming in.
engSearchText:
Good point. The casino dealers could be a good place
to start. They're bound to pay close attention to who's
coming in.
jpnChrName: あー、客に気を配ってるっつう意味では カジノのディーラーとかいいかもな。
jpnSearchText:
あー、客に気を配ってるっつう意味では
カジノのディーラーとかいいかもな。

engChrName: Anybody who spends a lot of time outside of it might've seen him, too!
engSearchText:
Anybody who spends a lot of time outside of it
might've seen him, too!
jpnChrName: 他には……屋外でゆっくり過ごしている方からも 目撃情報が得られるんじゃないでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
他には……屋外でゆっくり過ごしている方からも
目撃情報が得られるんじゃないでしょうか。

engChrName: All good ideas. Hopefully, once we start talking to some people, we'll come up with some leads.
engSearchText:
All good ideas. Hopefully, once we start talking to
some people, we'll come up with some leads.
jpnChrName: ああ、そこら辺に聞きこめば 何か引っかかるかもしれねえな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そこら辺に聞きこめば
何か引っかかるかもしれねえな。

engChrName: Well, no time like the present. Let's roll.
engSearchText: Well, no time like the present. Let's roll.
jpnChrName: よし、それじゃ早速出発するぞ。
jpnSearchText: よし、それじゃ早速出発するぞ。

engChrName: Quest A Bogus Bracer started!
engSearchText: Quest A Bogus Bracer started!
jpnChrName: クエスト【偽遊撃士？を追いかけろ】を開始した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>偽遊撃士？を追いかけろ<C1>】を開始した！

engChrName: *sigh* I can't believe the bracer we were all looking for turned out to be a fake.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I can't believe the bracer we were all looking for
turned out to be a fake.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……まさか、例の緑髪の遊撃士の正体が 成りすましだっただなんて。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……まさか、例の緑髪の遊撃士の正体が
成りすましだっただなんて。

engChrName: I'm glad you all found him as quickly as you did. He could have caused real problems for us if he'd stayed on the loose for too long.
engSearchText:
I'm glad you all found him as quickly as you did.
He could have caused real problems for us if he'd
stayed on the loose for too long.
jpnChrName: 野放しにしていては、ギルドの名誉に関わる 大事に発展していたかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
野放しにしていては、ギルドの名誉に関わる
大事に発展していたかもしれません。

engChrName: On behalf of the guild, you have our sincere thanks for stopping him. We really appreciate it.
engSearchText:
On behalf of the guild, you have our sincere thanks
for stopping him. We really appreciate it.
jpnChrName: 犯人を捕らえて頂き、ありがとうございました。 遊撃士協会を代表してお礼を申し上げます。
jpnSearchText:
犯人を捕らえて頂き、ありがとうございました。
遊撃士協会を代表してお礼を申し上げます。

engChrName: Nah, don't mention it. Our curiosity got the better of us, that's all.
engSearchText:
Nah, don't mention it. Our curiosity got the better of
us, that's all.
jpnChrName: そういうのはいらねえよ。 俺達で好きにやらせてもらっただけだ。
jpnSearchText:
そういうのはいらねえよ。
俺達で好きにやらせてもらっただけだ。

engChrName: Though some MIGHT say that you guys owe us one, regardless.
engSearchText:
Though some MIGHT say that you guys owe us
one, regardless.
jpnChrName: とはいえ“貸し”ひとつ分には なっちまうかもしれねえな？
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ“貸し”ひとつ分には
なっちまうかもしれねえな？

engChrName: Oh, no question. We're more than willing to compensate you for everything you've done, including paying you for your time.
engSearchText:
Oh, no question. We're more than willing to
compensate you for everything you've done, including
paying you for your time.
jpnChrName: ええ、報奨金を含めて今回の件は きちんとお礼をさせて頂きます。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、報奨金を含めて今回の件は
きちんとお礼をさせて頂きます。

engChrName: I'm just surprised that 'bracer' turned out to be who he was.
engSearchText:
I'm just surprised that 'bracer' turned out to be who
he was.
jpnChrName: それにしても、あの遊撃士の正体も 意外なものでしたね……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、あの遊撃士の正体も
意外なものでしたね……

engChrName: Yeah. Another one of those thieving brothers who are wanted back in Edith. That's crazy.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Another one of those thieving brothers who
are wanted back in Edith. That's crazy.
jpnChrName: 首都を拠点にしているディバンシー兄弟、 その内の１人の犯行だったんでしたっけ。
jpnSearchText:
首都を拠点にしているディバンシー兄弟、
その内の１人の犯行だったんでしたっけ。

engChrName: Just like that fake cop we managed to bust yesterday. At the rate we're going, we'll probably meet their whole damn family tree soon.
engSearchText:
Just like that fake cop we managed to bust yesterday.
At the rate we're going, we'll probably meet their
whole damn family tree soon.
jpnChrName: ハッ、昨日の偽警官が その片割れだったりしてな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、昨日の偽警官が
その片割れだったりしてな。
