engChrName: We can't say for certain, but it sure seems like there's a good chance these brothers could strike again somewhere.
engSearchText:
We can't say for certain, but it sure seems like there's
a good chance these brothers could strike
again somewhere.
jpnChrName: 確証はありませんが……だとしたら 改めて犯罪を犯す可能性もありそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
確証はありませんが……だとしたら
改めて犯罪を犯す可能性もありそうですね。

engChrName: We should keep our guard up in case anything else happens.
engSearchText:
We should keep our guard up in case anything
else happens.
jpnChrName: こちらでも注意しておいた方が よいかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
こちらでも注意しておいた方が
よいかもしれません。

engChrName: We've already managed to nab both of 'em.
engSearchText: We've already managed to nab both of 'em.
jpnChrName: どっちが兄か弟かは知らねえが、 これで２人とも捕らえられた訳だな。
jpnSearchText:
どっちが兄か弟かは知らねえが、
これで２人とも捕らえられた訳だな。

engChrName: Hopefully it means there'll be a little less crime around here, at the very least.
engSearchText:
Hopefully it means there'll be a little less crime
around here, at the very least.
jpnChrName: 少しは犯罪の被害を 抑えられたんじゃないでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
少しは犯罪の被害を
抑えられたんじゃないでしょうか。

engChrName: I wouldn't be so sure. They probably think they can use the commotion from the film festival to make a killing while the killing's good.
engSearchText:
I wouldn't be so sure. They probably think they can
use the commotion from the film festival to make a
killing while the killing's good.
jpnChrName: どうせ、映画祭の混乱に乗じてサルバッドで 甘い蜜を吸おうって魂胆だったんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
どうせ、映画祭の混乱に乗じてサルバッドで
甘い蜜を吸おうって魂胆だったんだろ。

engChrName: If there are MORE of these siblings out there, it's probably safe to assume they're already up to no good, whatever it is.
engSearchText:
If there are MORE of these siblings out there, it's
probably safe to assume they're already up to no good,
whatever it is.
jpnChrName: 他の兄弟とやらも来てんだとしたら、 既に何かしらヤンチャしてそうなモンだがな。
jpnSearchText:
他の兄弟とやらも来てんだとしたら、
既に何かしらヤンチャしてそうなモンだがな。

engChrName: Agreed. The film festival probably needs heightened security in light of all this.
engSearchText:
Agreed. The film festival probably needs heightened
security in light of all this.
jpnChrName: ええ、いずれにせよ映画祭の警備体制を さらに強化していく必要がありそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、いずれにせよ映画祭の警備体制を
さらに強化していく必要がありそうですね。

engChrName: Anyway, thanks again for taking care of all that, everyone. If anything else comes up tomorrow, we'd appreciate your help then, too.
engSearchText:
Anyway, thanks again for taking care of all
that, everyone. If anything else comes up tomorrow,
we'd appreciate your help then, too.
jpnChrName: 明日も有事の際は協力していけますと幸いです。 改めてよろしくお願いしますね、裏解決屋の皆さん。
jpnSearchText:
明日も有事の際は協力していけますと幸いです。
改めてよろしくお願いしますね、裏解決屋の皆さん。

engChrName: Quest A Bogus Bracer completed!
engSearchText: Quest A Bogus Bracer completed!
jpnChrName: クエスト【偽遊撃士？を追いかけろ】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>偽遊撃士？を追いかけろ<C1>】を達成した！

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: Hmm? Would you all happen to be...?
engSearchText: Hmm? Would you all happen to be...?
jpnChrName: ん……？　君達はもしや……
jpnSearchText: ん……？　君達はもしや……

engChrName: That's right. We're with Arkride Solutions. We came to answer your request.
engSearchText:
That's right. We're with Arkride Solutions. We came
to answer your request.
jpnChrName: 依頼を受けて来た 《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
依頼を受けて来た
《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだ。

engChrName: Are you the archaeologist who made that post?
engSearchText: Are you the archaeologist who made that post?
jpnChrName: アンタが依頼人の考古学者で合ってるか？
jpnSearchText: アンタが依頼人の考古学者で合ってるか？

engChrName: Yes, I am! I'm so glad you came. I was concerned whether my 4SPG would reach you.
engSearchText:
Yes, I am! I'm so glad you came. I was concerned
whether my 4SPG would reach you.
jpnChrName: 良かった……４ｓｐｇとやらの方法で 本当に依頼が届くのか心配だったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
良かった……４ｓｐｇとやらの方法で
本当に依頼が届くのか心配だったんだ。

engChrName: Anyway, allow me to introduce myself. My name is Inigo.
engSearchText:
Anyway, allow me to introduce myself. My name
is Inigo.
jpnChrName: ああその通り、私が考古学者のイニゴだ。
jpnSearchText: ああその通り、私が考古学者のイニゴだ。

engChrName: To cut to the chase, I'm about to conduct a survey of the underground waterway and would like you all to escort and protect me.
engSearchText:
To cut to the chase, I'm about to conduct a survey of
the underground waterway and would like you all to
escort and protect me.
jpnChrName: 早速だが、君たちにはこの地下水路を 調査する為の護衛をお願いしたい。
jpnSearchText:
早速だが、君たちにはこの地下水路を
調査する為の護衛をお願いしたい。

engChrName: Really? That dingy place? Can't imagine a guy like you'd have any business there.
engSearchText:
Really? That dingy place? Can't imagine a guy like
you'd have any business there.
jpnChrName: 地下水路ねえ……そんな価値が あるような場所には見えなかったが。
jpnSearchText:
地下水路ねえ……そんな価値が
あるような場所には見えなかったが。

engChrName: Ah! So you've already been down there, have you? That's reassuring.
engSearchText:
Ah! So you've already been down there, have you?
That's reassuring.
jpnChrName: ほう、その口ぶりだと 既に中へ入った事があるようだな。
jpnSearchText:
ほう、その口ぶりだと
既に中へ入った事があるようだな。

engChrName: Believe it or not, that waterway has existed since the Dark Ages, and its construction continued throughout the Middle Ages.
engSearchText:
Believe it or not, that waterway has existed since the
Dark Ages, and its construction continued
throughout the Middle Ages.
jpnChrName: あそこは暗黒時代──古代サルバッドから 中世にかけて建造された地下水路でな。
jpnSearchText:
あそこは暗黒時代──古代サルバッドから
中世にかけて建造された地下水路でな。

engChrName: It bears considerable historical value as a result. With that in mind, there's something inside I wish to investigate in person.
engSearchText:
It bears considerable historical value as a result.
With that in mind, there's something inside I wish to
investigate in person.
jpnChrName: 歴史的にとても価値のある場所で、 直接この目で調べたい事があるのだよ。
jpnSearchText:
歴史的にとても価値のある場所で、
直接この目で調べたい事があるのだよ。

engChrName: Well...I don't see why we can't handle a job like that.
engSearchText: Well...I don't see why we can't handle a job like that.
jpnChrName: そういう事なら……とも思いますけど。
jpnSearchText: そういう事なら……とも思いますけど。

engChrName: But it doesn't sound like you really need spriggan help for this.
engSearchText:
But it doesn't sound like you really need spriggan help
for this.
jpnChrName: でもちょっと《裏解決屋》向きの依頼とは 言い切れないかもしれませんね……
jpnSearchText:
でもちょっと《裏解決屋》向きの依頼とは
言い切れないかもしれませんね……

engChrName: You wrote that the guild told you to come back another day, right?
engSearchText:
You wrote that the guild told you to come back
another day, right?
jpnChrName: 確か、ギルドには日を改めるよう 言われてしまったんですよね。
jpnSearchText:
確か、ギルドには日を改めるよう
言われてしまったんですよね。

engChrName: Yes. Evidently, they're rather occupied with getting things ready for the film festival at the moment.
engSearchText:
Yes. Evidently, they're rather occupied with getting
things ready for the film festival at the moment.
jpnChrName: ああ、ギルドはどうやら 映画祭に向けて慌ただしいようでね。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ギルドはどうやら
映画祭に向けて慌ただしいようでね。

engChrName: Seeing as my request isn't exactly an emergency, it's only natural that they wouldn't prioritize it for now.
engSearchText:
Seeing as my request isn't exactly an emergency, it's
only natural that they wouldn't prioritize it for now.
jpnChrName: 緊急の要件ではないとなると 優先度が下がってしまうようなんだ。
jpnSearchText:
緊急の要件ではないとなると
優先度が下がってしまうようなんだ。

engChrName: Unfortunately, the fact of the matter is that I had to carve out time in order to be here.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, the fact of the matter is that I had to
carve out time in order to be here.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、私も時間を作って こちらに来ている身でね……
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、私も時間を作って
こちらに来ている身でね……

engChrName: I have to leave Tharbad tomorrow. So unless I conduct this survey today, it simply isn't going to happen.
engSearchText:
I have to leave Tharbad tomorrow. So unless I
conduct this survey today, it simply isn't going
to happen.
jpnChrName: 明日にはここを発たねばならない。 なので、絶対に今日調査する必要があるのだ。
jpnSearchText:
明日にはここを発たねばならない。
なので、絶対に今日調査する必要があるのだ。

engChrName: It's still not something that really has to be kept hushed up like our other clients, but I get why you'd ask us.
engSearchText:
It's still not something that really has to be kept
hushed up like our other clients, but I get why you'd
ask us.
jpnChrName: “裏”の事情ではないですけど、 困っている事は確かみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
“裏”の事情ではないですけど、
困っている事は確かみたいですね。

engChrName: As do I. How should we proceed, Mr. Arkride?
engSearchText: As do I. How should we proceed, Mr. Arkride?
jpnChrName: どう致しますか、ヴァン様？
jpnSearchText: どう致しますか、ヴァン様？

engChrName: Good question.
engSearchText: Good question.
jpnChrName: そうだな……
jpnSearchText: そうだな……

engChrName: It does feel like there's somethin' more to this. It could be worth our while to accept his request and see where it takes us.
engSearchText:
It does feel like there's somethin' more to this.
It could be worth our while to accept his request and
see where it takes us.
jpnChrName: どうも“匂い”やがるし、 引き受ける価値はありそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
どうも“匂い”やがるし、
引き受ける価値はありそうだが……

engChrName: I need to conduct a survey in the underground waterway and would like you all to escort and protect me.
engSearchText:
I need to conduct a survey in the underground
waterway and would like you all to escort and
protect me.
jpnChrName: 君たちに、この地下水路を調査する為の 護衛をお願いしたいのだが……
jpnSearchText:
君たちに、この地下水路を調査する為の
護衛をお願いしたいのだが……

engChrName: Would you all be able to help me?
engSearchText: Would you all be able to help me?
jpnChrName: 引き受けてもらえるだろうか？
jpnSearchText: 引き受けてもらえるだろうか？

engChrName: I'll definitely consider your request. Could you give us a little time to come to a decision?
engSearchText:
I'll definitely consider your request. Could you give us
a little time to come to a decision?
jpnChrName: 検討する価値はあると思うが…… もう少し時間を貰えるか？
jpnSearchText:
検討する価値はあると思うが……
もう少し時間を貰えるか？

engChrName: I suppose. I hope you decide soon.
engSearchText: I suppose. I hope you decide soon.
jpnChrName: そうか…… いい返事がもらえる事を期待しているよ。
jpnSearchText:
そうか……
いい返事がもらえる事を期待しているよ。

engChrName: Sure, I don't see the harm in comin' along. It's a good opportunity for us to patrol down there, anyway.
engSearchText:
Sure, I don't see the harm in comin' along. It's a good
opportunity for us to patrol down there, anyway.
jpnChrName: ……ま、地下水路の巡回も兼ねると思えば 受けても構わねえだろう。
jpnSearchText:
……ま、地下水路の巡回も兼ねると思えば
受けても構わねえだろう。

engChrName: Count us in. We'll join you for your survey.
engSearchText: Count us in. We'll join you for your survey.
jpnChrName: いいぜ、アンタの護衛は引き受けた。
jpnSearchText: いいぜ、アンタの護衛は引き受けた。

engChrName: Wonderful! Thank you very much. You're doing me a great favor.
engSearchText:
Wonderful! Thank you very much. You're doing me a
great favor.
jpnChrName: はは、ありがとう助かるよ。
jpnSearchText: はは、ありがとう助かるよ。

engChrName: Well, what are we waitin' for? Let's make our way down.
engSearchText:
Well, what are we waitin' for? Let's make our
way down.
jpnChrName: そんじゃあ、さっそく潜るとするか。
jpnSearchText: そんじゃあ、さっそく潜るとするか。

engChrName: Oh, my. You're looking for a nocturnal sun, too? Those are surprisingly in demand today.
engSearchText:
Oh, my. You're looking for a nocturnal sun, too?
Those are surprisingly in demand today.
jpnChrName: あら、皆さんも《夜の太陽》をお探しで？ 今日はやけに人気なのね。
jpnSearchText:
あら、皆さんも《夜の太陽》をお探しで？
今日はやけに人気なのね。

engChrName: Is that to say we're not the only ones to have asked you about it?
engSearchText:
Is that to say we're not the only ones to have asked
you about it?
jpnChrName: 皆さん“も”とは……？
jpnSearchText: 皆さん“も”とは……？

engChrName: Right. There was another customer before you who bought them from me.
engSearchText:
Right. There was another customer before you who
bought them from me.
jpnChrName: 先に来たお客さんが その高級ザクロを買っていかれたんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
先に来たお客さんが
その高級ザクロを買っていかれたんですよ。

engChrName: She cleaned out my entire stock—all ten of them—as a matter of fact.
engSearchText:
She cleaned out my entire stock—all ten of them—as
a matter of fact.
jpnChrName: 今朝仕入れたばかりの１０個すべて。
jpnSearchText: 今朝仕入れたばかりの１０個すべて。

engChrName: All of them? Then does that mean...
engSearchText: All of them? Then does that mean...
jpnChrName: す、すべて……ということは。
jpnSearchText: す、すべて……ということは。

engChrName: You have no more left for sale?
engSearchText: You have no more left for sale?
jpnChrName: 売り切れってことですよね……
jpnSearchText: 売り切れってことですよね……

engChrName: Yes, that's right. I'm sorry to disappoint you.
engSearchText: Yes, that's right. I'm sorry to disappoint you.
jpnChrName: そ、そんなに落ち込まれると申し訳なくなるわね。
jpnSearchText: そ、そんなに落ち込まれると申し訳なくなるわね。

engChrName: Nah, it's not your fault. We just got an urgent need for some and are tryin' to find some as quickly as we can.
engSearchText:
Nah, it's not your fault. We just got an urgent need
for some and are tryin' to find some as quickly as
we can.
jpnChrName: すまねぇな、こっちも急ぎで欲しかったからよ。
jpnSearchText: すまねぇな、こっちも急ぎで欲しかったからよ。

engChrName: Luck just wasn't on our side this time. We'll try somewhere else. Thanks for your time.
engSearchText:
Luck just wasn't on our side this time. We'll try
somewhere else. Thanks for your time.
jpnChrName: こればかりは巡り合わせだ。 他を探すとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
こればかりは巡り合わせだ。
他を探すとしよう。

engChrName: Actually, before you go, can I ask what you want them for? If you don't mind.
engSearchText:
Actually, before you go, can I ask what you want
them for? If you don't mind.
jpnChrName: あの、差し支えなければ 何に使うのか聞いてもいいですか？
jpnSearchText:
あの、差し支えなければ
何に使うのか聞いてもいいですか？

engChrName: Sure, I don't see the harm in that. Basically...
engSearchText: Sure, I don't see the harm in that. Basically...
jpnChrName: ん？　ああ──
jpnSearchText: ん？　ああ──

engChrName: Van explained what Bermotti was doing at the bartending tournament and why he needed the pomegranate.
engSearchText:
Van explained what Bermotti was doing at the
bartending tournament and why he needed
the pomegranate.
jpnChrName: ヴァンはバーテンダー大会の経緯を説明した。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ヴァンはバーテンダー大会の経緯を説明した。

engChrName: Ah, I see. Thank you for clearing that up!
engSearchText: Ah, I see. Thank you for clearing that up!
jpnChrName: なるほど……
jpnSearchText: なるほど……

engChrName: You know, you might want to talk to Philica—see if she'll let you have some of her stock. She's the one who bought them from me.
engSearchText:
You know, you might want to talk to Philica—see if
she'll let you have some of her stock. She's the one
who bought them from me.
jpnChrName: いくつか譲ってもらえるか フィリカさんにかけ合ってみても良いかも。
jpnSearchText:
いくつか譲ってもらえるか
フィリカさんにかけ合ってみても良いかも。

engChrName: Philica, you said her name was? Where is she located?
engSearchText: Philica, you said her name was? Where is she located?
jpnChrName: フィリカさん、ですか？
jpnSearchText: フィリカさん、ですか？

engChrName: She runs an ice cream stand in the Entertainment District.
engSearchText:
She runs an ice cream stand in the
Entertainment District.
jpnChrName: 歓楽街でアイスクリームの屋台を出してる女性です。 うちのお得意様でして。
jpnSearchText:
歓楽街でアイスクリームの屋台を出してる女性です。
うちのお得意様でして。

engChrName: She's a regular customer of mine. If you tell her I sent you, I think she may be willing to help.
engSearchText:
She's a regular customer of mine. If you tell her I sent
you, I think she may be willing to help.
jpnChrName: 彼女に相談してみるのはどうでしょう？ 私の名前を出してもらって構いません。
jpnSearchText:
彼女に相談してみるのはどうでしょう？
私の名前を出してもらって構いません。

engChrName: I can't make any promises, though.
engSearchText: I can't make any promises, though.
jpnChrName: もちろん約束はできませんけど……
jpnSearchText: もちろん約束はできませんけど……

engChrName: We understand. Thank you for the advice, we sincerely appreciate it. All we can do now is attempt to negotiate and see what happens.
engSearchText:
We understand. Thank you for the advice, we
sincerely appreciate it. All we can do now is attempt
to negotiate and see what happens.
jpnChrName: ここはお言葉に甘えさせて頂きましょうか。 手に入るかは交渉次第ですが。
jpnSearchText:
ここはお言葉に甘えさせて頂きましょうか。
手に入るかは交渉次第ですが。

engChrName: Yeah, not like time's on our side here.
engSearchText: Yeah, not like time's on our side here.
jpnChrName: だな、悠長にしていらんねぇし。
jpnSearchText: だな、悠長にしていらんねぇし。

engChrName: We should run over to that stand. That cocktail's not gonna fix itself.
engSearchText:
We should run over to that stand. That cocktail's not
gonna fix itself.
jpnChrName: お楽しみのカクテルのためだ。 ひとっ走り向かうとしようぜ。
jpnSearchText:
お楽しみのカクテルのためだ。
ひとっ走り向かうとしようぜ。

engChrName: You're strangely eager to help, Aaron. What gives?
engSearchText: You're strangely eager to help, Aaron. What gives?
jpnChrName: むう、調子が良すぎます。
jpnSearchText: むう、調子が良すぎます。

engChrName: ...In any case, I agree with Aaron. The Entertainment District's clearly our best lead.
engSearchText:
...In any case, I agree with Aaron. The Entertainment
District's clearly our best lead.
jpnChrName: ……ともかく、アンタが言うように 歓楽街をあたるのが良さそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
……ともかく、アンタが言うように
歓楽街をあたるのが良さそうだ。

engChrName: Thanks for talking to us, ma'am.
engSearchText: Thanks for talking to us, ma'am.
jpnChrName: 情報提供、ありがとな。
jpnSearchText: 情報提供、ありがとな。

engChrName: Oh, no problem! Good luck finding those pomegranates!
engSearchText:
Oh, no problem! Good luck finding
those pomegranates!
jpnChrName: いえ、手に入るといいですね。
jpnSearchText: いえ、手に入るといいですね。

engChrName: HP, EP, and CP were fully restored, and S-Boost Gauge increased 3 points!
engSearchText:
HP, EP, and CP were fully restored, and S-Boost
Gauge increased 3 points!
jpnChrName: ＨＰ・ＥＰが全回復、 Ｓブーストゲージが３上昇、 ＣＰが２００上昇した！
jpnSearchText:
ＨＰ・ＥＰが全回復、
Ｓブーストゲージが３上昇、
ＣＰが２００上昇した！

engChrName: This is where Saara and Shaheena live, isn't it?
engSearchText: This is where Saara and Shaheena live, isn't it?
jpnChrName: サァラさんたちのご自宅ですね。
jpnSearchText: サァラさんたちのご自宅ですね。

engChrName: Yep, although they don't look to be home right now.
engSearchText: Yep, although they don't look to be home right now.
jpnChrName: ああ、今は不在みたいだな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、今は不在みたいだな。

engChrName: The door is locked.
engSearchText: The door is locked.
jpnChrName: 扉には鍵がかかっている。
jpnSearchText: <C1>扉には鍵がかかっている。

engChrName: I wonder if that way takes you below the city?
engSearchText: I wonder if that way takes you below the city?
jpnChrName: 街の地下に続いているんでしょうか？
jpnSearchText: 街の地下に続いているんでしょうか？

engChrName: No way of knowing right now. We've got not reason to be here.
engSearchText:
No way of knowing right now. We've got not reason
to be here.
jpnChrName: ま、今のところ用はねえだろう。
jpnSearchText: ま、今のところ用はねえだろう。

engChrName: Enter the underground waterway?
engSearchText: Enter the underground waterway?
jpnChrName: 地下水路に入りますか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>地下水路に入りますか？

engChrName: I don't think it's open yet.
engSearchText: I don't think it's open yet.
jpnChrName: まだ開いていないみたいですね。
jpnSearchText: まだ開いていないみたいですね。

engChrName: Guess not. We'll have to come back around and check it out later.
engSearchText:
Guess not. We'll have to come back around and
check it out later.
jpnChrName: ふむ、後でまた覗いてみるか。
jpnSearchText: ふむ、後でまた覗いてみるか。
